Samuel-aam qanrutai yuut apcesten̄i angayuqerkameggnek tamalkuitnek

“Waten angayuqerpeci ayuquciiqaaci,” Samuel-aam nalqigutai. “Qetunraci anguyagciciqai; ilait kevgiurciqut anguyaucessuutegni ikamragkeni, ilait anguyagtaini, ilait-llu maryarcesten͞guluteng ikamrain ciunratni.

Ilait atanerruarurciiqai qaunqivkarluki tiissitsaanek (1,000) angutnek, ilait-llu qaunqivkarluki yuinaak malruk qulmek cipluku (50) angutnek. Qetunrarpeci itumtelarciqai naucetaarvii, pinarikan-llu quyurrluki naullret, pililuki-llu caskui aklui-llu ikamrain.
Panici-llu tepkegcaliurten͞gurciiqut elliinun, caliciqut elliinun kenirten͞guluteng, kelipisten͞guluteng-llu.
Teguciqai assinqurrit nunautevci, naucetaarvigpeci, olive-aat-llu napait, atanerruaminun-llu tunluki.
Teguciqai-llu qulngurutait mukaarkautevci wine-arkautevci-llu anguyagtet-llu angayuqritnun allanun-llu atanerruanun tunluki.
Teguciqai-llu pisteci assinqurrait-llu kuluvautevci ciulvautevci-llu, ellminun-llu calivkarluki.
Teguciqai-llu qulngurutait katngautevci, elpeci-llu elliin teguaqsaguciiqaaci.
Tauna pillerkaq tekiskan, qanekluarciquci cumilnguluci angayuqaci pitekluku, imna elpecen̄ek cucukelci, tau͡gaam
Tau͡gaam yuut niicugniyuumiitaat Samuel-aaq, qanerluteng, “Qang'a! Angayuqangyugtukut,
tuaten pikumta wangkuta-llu ayuqniartukut allacetun angayuqauvilegcetun, nakmiin angayuqamten̄ek ataniurterluta ciuliqagcesterluta-llu anguyagyartuqumta callullgucirluta-llu anguyagmi.”
Samuel-aam niicugnii qanellrit tamalkuita tua-i-llu
kiuguq, “Piyullrat aturru angayuqerkaatnek-llu cikirluki.” Tua-i Samuel-aam qanrutai tamalkuita angutai Israel-aam kingunritnun utercesqelluki.

Angucetangqellruuq tukuulriamek maligcestelirluni-llu Kish-amek aterluni, ilakellriarinek Benjamin-aam; qetunraqluku Abiel-am tutgaqluku-llu Zeror-aam, Becorath-am ilain ilakluku, ilakutaqluku ilain Aphiah-m.
Qetunrarluni at'legmek Saul-aamek, tangkegcinaqluni natlugnericaram nalliinlluni. Saul-aaq ilamini tamalkuitni Israel-aami sugtunruluni it'ganermek ataucimek, tangkegcinarqenruluni-llu.
Ciulvautain ilait Kish-am ayagalliniata, Saul-aaq pia, “Pistet iliit malikluku yuaryarturki ciulviit.”

Ayagtuk qemililriarakun Ephraim-aam nuniikun-llu Shalishah-m, tau͡gaam nalaqevkenaki; cali ayagtuk nuniikun Shaalim-aam, tau͡gaam ciulviit tamaantenritut. Tua-i-llu cali ayagtuk nunautiikun Benjamin-aam, tau͡gaam cali nalaqevkenaki.
Tekicamek Zuph-am nuniinun, Saul-aam pisten̄i pia, “Uterrnaurtukuk kingunemegnun, atama umyuaqenrirluki ciulviit, wangkuk peng'gangyuaraakuk.”
Pista kiuguq, “Uitaqaa! Wani nunarrarmi agayumalriamek angucetangqertuq cakneq qigcikumaluni qanellri tamalkurmeng piciurtelaata. Ullagnaupuk, qanrucuaraakuk nani nataqellerkaatnek ciulviit.”
“Ullakumegnegu, camek cikirciqsen̄uk?” Saul-aaq aptuq. “Issratpuk neqtairutuq, camek-llu cikiutekaunanuk, atam-qaa?”
Pista kiuguq, “Akicuarmek qerrirlimek pingqertua. Taumek cikiryugngaaqa, elliin qanrutniaraakuk nani nalaqellerkamegnek.”

Saul-aaq kiuguq, “Assirtuq tuaten! Kitak ayagluk.” Tua-i ayagtuk nunarrarmun agayumalriim angutem uitavianun. Mayuinanermegni pengukun nunarrarnun, pairkenguk ayagyuanek arnanek mertalrianek. Aptakek ukut arnat, “Ciunerkamek-qaa apertuagituli uitauq nunarrarni?”
(Tamatum nalliini prophet-aaq pilallruat ciunerkamek ap'ritulimek, taumek kia imum camek apcukuniu Agayun qanlallrulriit, “Ullagnaupuk ciunerkamek ap'rituli.”)

“Aa-ang,” ayagyuat arnat kiugut. “Tangrriu, ava-i ciungarpetegni. Cukangnaqkuvtek, anguciqertek. Nunarrarnun tekiteqerlutek, anguciqertek. Tekitellruuq ernerpak yuut ekuavkariqataata elliitnek ekuavigmi qemim qaingani. Yuut kelgumalriit nerngaitut tekiskan tau͡gaam, elliin atawaqercetarkaungaku ekuavkaritekaq ciumek. Waniwa ayakuvtek, anguciqertek neryarturluni mayurpailgan qemikun.”
Tua-i Saul-aaq pisten̄i-llu nunarraat tungiitnun ayagtuk, itqanermegnegun-llu nunanun tangrraak Samuel-aaq agiirtelluku tungmegnun agayuvikelallratnun ayagluni.
Wani-wa akwauvauluku

“Unuaqu mat'um nalliini taivkariciqua angutmek ilakellriarinek Benjamin-aam; mingukiu atanirturten͞gurrluku yumnun Israel-aanun, elliin-llu anirturciqai Philistine-anek. Tangrramku nangteqellrat yum'a niilluki-llu qayagatait ikayuusqelluteng.”
Samuel-aam iigkenun ekngan Saul-aaq,
Tua-i-llu Saul-aam ullagaa Samuel-aaq, ikirtuqam caniantellrani, aptaa-llu, “Qanrusnga nani uitalarta ciunerkarcurta?”

Samuel-aaq kiuguq, “Wiinga ciunerkarcurten͞guunga. Mayurtek ciumni agayuvikelallratnun. Wani-wa unuamek nerellgucirarkaungavtegnga. Unuaqu unuakumi kiuciqanka apyutetek tamalkuita tua-i-llu utertellutek.
Imkut-llu ciulviit tamallret amatiini, peng'garcaqunaki; ak'a nalaqumallruut. Tau͡gaam kituuga Israel-aam yuin piyugpakaqengaat? Elpenguuq, elpet atavet-llu nakmiin ilai.”

Saul-aaq kiuguq, “Benjamin-aam ilakellriarin ilakaatnga, yuullgutkellriit mikelqurrak'acagiit Israel-aami, wiinga-llu nakmiin ilanka cakegtaunrilqurrauluteng ilakellriani. Ciin, taumek wangnun waten qalarcit?”
Tua-i Samuel-aam agutak Saul-aankuk pistii-llu angtuamun enemun aqumevkarlukek-llu stuuluata iquanun kelgumalriit, yuinaq qulmek cipluku (30) aqumgaviatnun.
Samuel-aam kenirta qanrutaa, “Taisgu imna kemek tunelqa elpenun allakaasqelluku.”

Tua-i kenirtem taitaa assinkacagii irupacuum ciuqerranun-llu Saul-aam elliluku. Samuel-aaq-llu qanertuq, “Tangrriu wani-wa allakaumalleq elpet pitekluten. Neriu. Minaumaurallruamken neresqelluku ilagarluki yuut kelellrenka.”
Tua-i Saul-aam nerellguciraa Samuel-aaq tuani ernermi.
Agayuvikelallratnek atraameng nunanun, ingliuraat Saul-aaq enem pakmani qaingani,
tuani-llu qavartuq.
Unuayaarmi Samuel-aam qayagauraa Saul-aaq enem qaingani, “Makluten, ayagcecaaqniamken.” Saul-aaq maktuq, tua-i-llu Samuel-aaq-llu an'uk maliklutek tumyaramun.
Nunat iquatnun tekicamek, Samuel-aam qanrutaa Saul-aaq, “Qanrusgu pista ayaasqelluku ciunemegnegun.” Pistem unitak, Samuel-aaq-llu qanenqigtuq, “Wantauraqaqaa, qanrutniamken Agayutem qanellrinek.”
Tua-llu Samuel-aaq tegutuq putiilekaamek olive-aam uquanek kuvluku-llu qamiqurranun Saul-aam, cingarraarluku-llu qanrutaa, “

Ernerpak uniskuvnga, pairkengciquten malrugnek angutegnek yaaqsinrilkiini qunguan Rachel-aam Zelzah-mi nuniini Benjamin-aam. Qanruciiqaagten ciulviit yualten ak'a nalaqumallruniluki, taukut-llu atavet peng'gartenrirluki elpenek tau͡gaam peng'gartengluni, aptengluni-llu, ‘Qaillun piqatarcia qetunraqa?’

Tuaken ayagciquten tekisvivnun qigcignarqellriamun napamun Tabor-ami, tuani pairkengciquten pingayunek angutnek elliiyartulrianek ekuagiluteng Agayutmun Bethel-aami. Iliit ayauciluni pingayunek qusngirngalguyagarnek, iliit-llu tegumiarluni pingayunek kelipanek, pingayuak-llu tegumiarluni qecigmek muirumalriamek wine-amek.
Taukut aryuqutmek piciqaatgen cikirluten-llu malrugnek kelipagnek, taukut ciuniurarkaugaten.

Tua-i-llu ayagciquten Qemianun Agayutem Gibeah-mi, Philistine-at pelatekaumaviatnun. Nunat iteryaraatni pairkengciquten prophet-aanek atralrianek ekuavigmek qemimelngurmek, aturcetaarluteng qelutelegnek, cauyarluteng, cupu'uryara'arluteng, qelutviarluteng-llu lyre-atgun. Yurarluteng qayagpagaluteng tuaten.
Alqunaq
Waten makut pikata, Agayutem pisqellri tamalkuita pikiki.

Ciumkun atrarciquten Gilgal-aamun, tuani ullakumken elliiciqukuk ekualuki elliitnek ilakuyucaram-llu elliitiinek. Tuani ernerni malrunlegni utaqakina tekitellerkamnun qanrutlerkamnun-llu qaillun pillerkarpenek.”
Saul-aaq tuigcan uniteqatarluku Samuel-aaq, Agayutem tusvikaa Saul-aaq nutaramek ayuqucimek. Tamarmeng-llu Samuel-aam qanrutkellri elliinun tuani ernermi piciurtut.
Tua-llu Saul-aaq pisten̄i-llu tekicagnek Gibeah-mun, quyungqalriit prophet-aat pairtaat. Alqunaq Agayutem anerneran iluiraa, ilagarluki-llu ilungluni yurartuq qayagpagaluni tuaten.
Yuut ciungani nallunricestain tangrramegteggu waten pivkarluku ilameggnun qanertaagutut, “Qaillun una Kish-am qetunraa pia? Saul-aaq-qaa prophet-aarurtuq?”
Angun-llu taukumiu aptuq, “Makut-mi allat prophet-aat kinkunek atangqerrsukseciki?” Waten man'a qaneq ayagnengqertuq, “Saul-aarung'e'rmi-llu-qaa prophet-aarurtuq?”
Saul-aaq taqngami ilungluni yuranermek qayagpaganermek-llu, ayagtuq ekuavigmun qemimi.
Saul-aam angiin tangrramiu pistii-llu aptak, “Nantellrucetek?” “Yuallruapuk ciulviit,” Saul-aam kiugaa. “Nalaqesciigalamegneki, Samuel-aaq ullagluku tangerrsartullruapuk.”
“Camek tua-llu qanrutatek?” Saul-aam angii aptuq.
“Qanrutaakuk ungungssit nataqumallruniluki,” Saul-aaq kiuguq — tau͡gaam qanrutenritaa angani Samuel-aam qanellranek angayuqrurciiqniluni.
Samuel-aam yuut quyurcetai agayuyaasqelluki Mizpah-mi
qanrulluki-llu, “

Wiinga Agayutkarpecia, anirtuasceci tamalkuitnek arenqiallugutevcen̄ek piyunailliqutevcen̄ek-llu, tau͡gaam ernerpak qessakavcia apelcirlua-llu cikiisqelluci angayuqerkarpecen̄ek. Kitaki tua-i, quyurci ciuqerranun
Tua-i-llu Samuel-aam atauciuqaqluki ilakellriit taigu'rcetai,

Tua-llu Samuel-aam ilakellriit kinguveqellriarinek Benjamin-aam taivkarai, Matri-m-llu ilai cucukumaut. Tua-i-llu angutait taukut Matri-m ilain ciuvartut ciuqerranun, Saul-aaq-llu Kish-am qetunraa cucukumauq, kiarcaaqaat, nalaqesciigalamegteggu,
aptaat
Tua-i aqvaqurluteng ullagarrluku anutaat Saul-aaq yugnun, maaten piat it'ganermek ataucimek sugtunrullinilria tamalkuitni ilamini.
Samuel-aaq qanertuq yugnun, “Wani-wa una angun
Yuut tamarmeng qayagpagtut, “Akwanun unguvakili angayuqaq!”
Samuel-aam nalqigtai angayuqam piyunarqucii caliarkai-llu, tua-i-llu igauluki maktaanun, taukut-llu nek'eggtellrui tanqilriamun uitavigmun. Tua-i-llu yuut utertelluki.
Saul-aaq-llu ayagmiuq uterrluni kinguneminun Gibeah-mun. Pinilriit-llu angutet, Agayutmek ircaqruit agtuumalriit, pillguciraat.
Tau͡gaam ilait cakegtaunrilnguut yuut qanertut, “Qaillun uum angutem assilriamek piciqakut?” Ellaita-llu caunrilkaat Saul-aaq, cikiutnek-llu taitevkenaku.

Iraluq cipteqerluku Angayuqam Nahash-am Ammon-aarmium ciuliqagtai anguyagten̄i nunarrarmun Jabesh-aamun nunautiini Gilead-aam kassugulluku-llu. Angutain Jabesh-aam qanrutaat Nahash-aq, “Umyuallguteksagulluta qanra, ciuniurniamteggen atanirturteksagulluten.”
Nahash-aq kiuguq, “Umyuallguteksaguciiqamci waten tau͡gaam piarkaukuma: Ikugciqaqa tamarpeci tallirpilirneq iici kiaresngialirluku-llu tamalkuan Israel-aaq.”
Ciuliqagtai-llu Jabesh-aam qanertut, “Cikirkut ernernek malrunlegnek ayagceciniartukut qaneryartulrianek qaqilluku nunii Israel-aam. Kia ikayunrilkakut, nutaan wangkutnek tuneniartukut elpenun.”
Kevgat qaneryartulriit tekitut Gibeah-mun, Saul-aam uitavianun, qanemciata-llu, yuut qiangartut ciunerkairulluteng.
Saul-aaq tekicarturluni maramek kuluvautminek maligluni, aptuq-llu, “Qaillun piat? Ciin yuut tamarmeng qiagat?” Qanrutaat kevgat qaneryartulriit Jabesh-aamek egmirtellratnek.
Man'a Saul-aam niicaku, Agayutem anerneran iluiraa, qenertem-llu tull'uku.

Malrugnek kuluviignek tegulluni, kepurak itumllukek, kevganun-llu qaneryartulrianun ayagatelluki tamalkuan nuniinun Israel-aam uumek aarcirtuutmek tapirluku: “Kia imum maligtenrilkunikek Saul-aankuk Samuel-aaq-llu anguyagmun waten pimaciqut kuluvautai!”
Yui Israel-aam alingut qaillun
Saul-aam quyurtai Bezek-ami: Israel-aamek pilriit yuinaat akimiaq tiissitsaarullruut (300,000). Judah-mek-llu pillret yuinaat qulen tiissitsaat (30,000).
Qanertut kevganun tekitellernun Jabesh-aamek, “Qanruciki yuc'i unuaqu-gguq erneq qukarpailgan anirtuumaciqut.” Yuin Jabesh-aam man'a niicamegteggu, angniqapiartut
qanerluteng-llu Nahash-amun, “Unuaqu wangkutnek tunciqukut elpenun, tua-i piyullerpetun piniarpekut, assirngatellrakun.”

Tuani unugmi Saul-aam yun'i avgai pingasuirrluki, unuayaarmi-llu alqunaq tekiarrluteng inglumeng pelatekarviatnun curukarait Ammonite-at. Erenrem-llu qukallra tekiteqerluku nangluki tuqutait. Tuqutenritellrit-llu sagtut, qimagluteng ellmeggnek anagyaaqulluteng.
Tua-llu yui Israel-aam qanertut Samuel-aamun, “Nauwa taukut yuut qanellret Saul-aaq wangkutnun angayuqauyunaitniluku? Taiciki wangkutnun, tuqutniaput!”
Tau͡gaam Saul-aaq qanertuq, “Yuk atauciunger'mi tuqucimangaituq ernerpak, tua-i-wa mat'umi ernermi
Samuel-aam-llu qanrutai, “Gilgal-aamun ayalta tamamta yuut-llu tamalkuita niitelluki qanrutkenqiggluku-llu Saul-aaq wangkutnun angayuqaqsagulluku.”

Tamarmeng tua-i ayagtut Gilgal-aamun, tuani-llu tanqilriami uitavigmi nallunairaat yuut tamalkuita nallunrirtelluki Saul-aaq angayuqruniluku. Ekuagiut ilakuyutem elliitainek, Saul-aam-llu yuin-llu tamarmeng Israel-aam angnirpautekaat tuaten pillra.
Tua-llu Samuel-aaq qanertuq yuinun Israel-aam, “Caliaqellruaqa ellimertuutelci. Cikillruamci angayuqamek atanirturtekarpecen̄ek,
tua-i elliin ciuliqagtarkaurrluci. Tau͡gaam wiinga ak'allaurtua qiilinglua-llu, qetunraanka-llu elpecen̄i uitaluteng. Ciuliqagqurallruamci ayagyuarraanemnek man'a engelkarrluku.
Wani-wa wantua. Picurlallrukuma, picilircia ciuqerrani
Yuut kiugut, “Qang'a, piciuvkenak piksaitavkut wall'u uitacurlagceteksaunata; teguteksaunak-llu camek kitumek.”
Samuel-aaq kiuguq, “
“Aa-ang,
Samuel-aaq qanenqigtuq, “
Kitaki uitaqerci nangengqavigpecen̄i, picilirniamci
Jacob-aaq nakmiin-llu ilani itellratni Egypt-aamun uitacurlagceciimaluteng-llu Egypt-aarmiunek, ciuliaci qayagallruut
Tau͡gaam yuut nalluyagutellruat
Tua-i-llu qayagaluteng
taivkallrui Gideon-aaq, Barak-aq, Jephthah, kingumek-llu wiinga. Ataucitaarluta anirtullruamceci ingluvcen̄ek, tua-i-llu unguvaluci pengegnailngurmi.
Tau͡gaam taringellerpecen̄i Angayuqamun Nahash-amun Ammon-aarmiumun curukataucirci, qessakellrauci
“Kitak wani-wa angayuqaq cucukellerci; piyuutekellruarci, wani-wa-llu
Ca tamarmi elluarrluni ayagciquq qigcikekuvciu
Tau͡gaam niisnganrilkuvciu
Taumek, uitaurci nangengqavigpecen̄i, tangerrniararci ucurnarqellria
Kinernarqellriim-qaa nalliintenritukut? Tau͡gaam piicagciqua,
Tua-i Samuel-aaq piicagtuq, tuani-llu ernermi
qanertut-llu Samuel-aamun, “Kitaki, piicakaa
“Alingevkenaci,” Samuel-aaq kiuguq. “Mat'umek assiitqapiarmek taqutellrung'e'rpeci, tuigcaqunaci
Maligcaqunaciki piciunrilnguut agayutet; ikayurciigataaci anirturciiganaci-llu, piciunrilameng.
piciulriamek akqillruuq, elliin-llu taq'lerturluni unisngaitaaci, pillerkiullruami elliin nakmiin yuksagutnaluci.
Wiinga-llu wani-wa,
Niisngaciu
Tau͡gaam taqeksaunaci assiilngirturquvci, elpeci angayuqerci-llu piunriumaciquci.”
Saul-aaq allrakungellruuq (yuinarmek qulmek cipluku 30) angayuqaurtellermini, angayuqaullruuq-llu Israel-aami (tayima allrakuni yuinaagni malrugnek 40).

Saul-aaq cucuklirtuq pingayunek tiissitsaanek (3,000) angutnek, elliin malruk tiissitsaak (2,000) nunaqliqlukek Michmash-ami, qemililriami-llu nuniini Bethel-aam, ayagtelluki-llu atauciq tiissitsaaq (1,000) maligtevkarluku qetunrani Jonathan-aaq Gibeah-mun, nuniitnun ilakellriartain Benjamin-aam. Ilait-llu angutet Saul-aam utertelluki kingunritnun.

Jonathan-aam tuqutaa Philistine-at anguyagtaita atanirturtiit Geba-mi, allat-llu Philistine-at man'a niitaat. Tua-i Saul-aaq ayagceciuq kevganek qayagasqelluki Hebrew-t anguyagmun cupu'uryaraq cupu'urluku tamalkuan sen̄iluku nuniit.

Niitut-llu Israel-aam yui tamarmeng Saul-aamun tuqutniluku Philistine-at atanirturtiit, Philistine-anun-llu cakneq eq'ukniluteng. Yuut tua-i qayagaurun maligtaat pillguciryartuusqelluku Saul-aaq Gilgal-aami.

Philistine-at-llu quyurtut anguyallerkameggnun Israel-aam yui; yuinaq qulmek tiissitsaat (30,000) anguyagcuutet akalrialget ikamrat, arvinelgen-llu tiissitsaat (6,000) horse-aalget anguyagtet, anguyagtet-llu qau͡gyaitun imarpiim cen̄iini amllertalriit. Michmash-amun ayagtut, calaralirneranun Bethaven-aam, tuani-llu qavartarluteng.
Tua-i-llu tukniluteng curugait Israel-aam yui, uuqassugartelluki. Ilait Israel-aam yui iirtut qerranernun ukinernun-llu wall'u teggalqut akulaitnun petmignun elakanun-llu;
ilaita qeraraat Jordan-aaq Kuik nunainun Gad-am Gilead-aam-llu.
Saul-aaq cali Gilgal-aamlluni, yuut-llu ilai kakavluteng alingem ugaani.
Utaqa ernerni malrunlegni Samuel-aaq, Samuel-aam alerqullruciatun, tau͡gaam Samuel-aaq cali taiksaituq Gilgal-aamun. Kiituan yuut unitengaat Saul-aaq,
tua-llu elliin qanrutai, “Taiciki wangnun ekualuki elliitekat, ilakuyutem-llu elliitai.” Elliin-llu elliitekai ekuavkarluki,
wani-wa-llu taqeqanrakun, Samuel-aaq tekilluni. Saul-aam-llu anluni pairrsaagaa ciuniurluku-llu,
tau͡gaam Samuel-aaq qanertuq, “Callrusit?”
Saul-aaq kiuguq, “Yuut unitengellruatnga, elpet-llu taiksaunak taiciqnillerpeni; tamatum-llu avatiini cali, Philistine-at ama-i quyurrluteng Michmash-ami.
Taumek umyuartequa, ‘Philistine-at curukataraatnga wani Gilgal-aami, wiinga-llu piksaunii qaillun ilukegcivkallerkaanek
“Umyugailnguum tau͡gaam piyallratun piuten,” Samuel-aaq kiuguq. “Maligtaqunritan alerquutii
Tau͡gaam watua atanirturinriqatartuten. Narurtellruavgu ellii,

Samuel-aaq-llu ayagtuq Gilgal-amek Gibeah-mun Benjamin-aam nuniinelngurmun. Yuut-llu Gilgal-ami uitalriit maligtaat Saul-aaq ullallrani anguyagten̄i. Gilgal-aamek ayagtut Gibeah-mun nunautiinun Benjamin-aam. Saul-aam yuvrirai anguyagten̄i, tiissitsaam avga yuinarnek tallimanek cipluku (600) amllertaciat nuniinlluni.
Saul-aaq, Jonathan-aaq-llu qetunrani, anguyagtetek-llu arulairtut Geba-mi nunautiini Benjamin-aam; Philistine-at arulaingqaviat Michmash-amlluni.
Philistine-at anguyagtet ayalartut arulaingqavimeggnek uayaariyarturluteng pingasuirrluteng quyungqalriit: atauciin quyungqalriit Ophrah-m tungiinun ayagtut nunautiinelngurmun Shual-am,
allat-llu quyungqalriit tungiinun Beth Horon-aam, allat-llu tuiggluteng tungiinun cetrem caumaluku Zeboim-am Kuignayua yuilquq-llu.
Caviliurtetaituq Israel-aami Philistine-at murilken͞gatki Hebrew-t nuussirpagnek narulkarcuutnek-llu cakneq pilisqumavkenaki.
(Israel-aat tua-i ullalarait Philistine-at itumcissuutmeng nuugit, cakicissuuteteng, piqertuutateng, kepliarissuuteteng-llu ipegcaryarturluki;
akiliutii-wa akicuar atauciq piqertuutamek ipegcarikuvet wall'u kapqaqussuutmek, malruk-wa akicuaraak ipegcarikuvet itumcissuutmek cakicessuutmek-llu.)
Taumek ernermi anguyautellratni Israel-aam yuin anguyagtai atauciunger'mi piitelallrulriit nuussirpagnek narulkarcuutnek-llu Saul-aankuk tau͡gaam qetunrani-llu Jonathan-aaq pingqerraqlutek.
Philistine-at ayagceciut anguyagten̄ek nayuusqelluku Michmash-ami Tevyaraq.
Erenret iliitni Jonathan-aaq qanertuq tan'gaurlurmun saskumi aulukestiitnun, “Qeraqerluk Philistine-at arulaingqaviatnun.” Tau͡gaam Jonathan-aam aatani Saul-aaq qanrutenritaa,
atii uitallruuq pomegranate-anek naugitulim napam aciani Migron-aami, yaaqsinrilkiini Gibeah-m; maligluni tiissitsaam avga yuinarnek tallimanek cipluku (600) anguyagten̄ek.
(Agayulirta tegumialria as'arcen̄aarmek qat'gailitamek Ahijah-ullruuq, qetunraqluku Phinehas-aam tutgaqluku-llu Eli-am, agayulirtiin

Michmash-am Qeraryaraani, Jonathan-aam tumkaani qeraquni Philistine-at pelatekaumaviatnun, malrugnek ipellriignek teggalqurpagtangqertuq, akiqliqlutek qeraryarami: atauciq aterluni Bozez-amek aipaa-llu Seneh-mek.
Aipaa neglirnerani qeraryaram uitaluni, Michmash-aq caumaluku, aipaa-wa ungalalirnerani, Geba caumaluku.
Jonathan-aam qanrutaa tan'gaurluq, “Qeraqerluk uitaviatnun agayutailnguut Philistine-at.
Tan'gaurluq kiuguq, “Qaillun piyullerpetun, umyuallguciramken.”
“Kitaki,” Jonathan-aaq qanertuq. “Qerarciqukuk Philistine-anun-llu tangertellunuk.
Qanruskakuk utaqasqelluteng ellaita ullagnalunuk, uitaurniartukuk nani uitavimegni.
Tau͡gaam taisqekatkuk, tuaten piniartukuk, tauna nallunailkutauciquq
Tua-i tamarmek tangercetuk Philistine-anun, Philistine-at-llu qanertut, “Tang atam! Hebrew-t ilait anelriit igten̄ek iirvimeggnek!”
Tua-llu qayagaurtut Jonathan-aamun tan'gaurlurmun-llu, “Wavet mayuqertek! Qanerkangqertukut elpetegnun!”
Jonathan-aam qanrutaa tan'gaurluq, “Maligesnga.
Jonathan-aaq mayurtuq tuaken tevyaramek aurrluni, tan'gaurluum-llu maligtaa. Jonathan-aam curukarai Philistine-at iqurqelluki-llu, tan'gaurluum-llu tuqurqelluki.
Ciuqlirmi tuani tuqurqillermegni Jonathan-aaq tan'gaurluq-llu tuquciuk yuinaam (20) nuniini angutnek nunam acre-aam avgan iluani.
Tamarmeng Philistine-at nunarrarnelnguut alingniurtut cakneq; uayaaristet anguyagtet-llu uitavimeggni uulgata'artut alingem ugaani; nuna pekluni, angtuamek-llu ciunerkairulluteng.
Saul-aam anguyagtain murilkellriit Gibeah-mi nunautiini Benjamin-aam tangrrait Philistine-at aqvaqualriit uunguciinateng.
Tua-i Saul-aam qanrutai anguyagten̄i, “Naaqiciki anguyagtet nallunairluku-llu kina catailucianek.” Tuaten piameng nallunriraat Jonathan-aaq tan'gaurluq-llu saskuin ayagacestiit cataitellinilriik.
“Taisgu as'arcen̄a'ar qat'gailitaq wavet,” Saul-aaq qanertuq Ahijah-mun agayulirtem̄un. (Tuani ernermi Ahijah-m ayautellrua ciunratgun Israel-aam yuin.)
Saul-aam-llu qalarusnginanrani agayulirta, uunguciirutellrat Philistine-at arulaingqaviatni arcariinartuq, taumek Saul-aam qanrutaa, “Pillerkartaituq apelcillerkaanek
Tua-i ellii anguyagten̄i-llu ciutmun ayagtut anguyagyarturluki Philistine-at, calluutellriit ellmeggnun uunguciitem ugaani.
Hebrew-t ilait, Philistine-anun ilautellret maligutellret-llu qavartarviatnun, cimirinqigtut ilimeggnek ilaksagullukek-llu Saul-aankuk Jonathan-aaq-llu.
Ilait, iirumallret qemiini Ephraim-aam, niitut Philistine-at qimaganiluki, tua-i ellait-llu ilautut curugluki-llu Philistine-at,
callugluteng ayagtut kiturluku Bethaven-aaq. Tuani ernermi

Israelite-at piniatut kaigluteng tuani ernermi, tua-i-wa Saul-aaq, piciuluni akqillermikun, pisqutmek taqutellruan: “Aniqlaan kitumun imumun tuciiquq nerelriamun neqmek ernerpak akinaurpailegma inglumnun.” Taumek kina nereksailnguq camek ernerpak.
Tamarmeng tekitut napalilriamun nataqulluteng-llu evegtaat neqaitnek tamiini cailkami.
Napalilria tamana yuilqurmiutarmek paatakaarrlainauluni, tau͡gaam kina atauciunger'mi nerenrituq ilarriinek tua-i-wa tamarmeng alinguryuameng Saul-aam akeqnerrlugutiinek.

Tau͡gaam Jonathan-aam niitellrunritaa atani akeqnerrlugtellrani yuut aniqlaatmek; taumek yagtaa tegumiani muraggak, kapulluku-llu evegtat eniitnun, neraa-llu yuilqurmiutaq paatakaaq. Egmian-llu wanirpak ayuqucia assiriqertuq.
Tau͡gaam anguyagtet iliita qanrutaa, “Tamamta kaigem piniacetaakut, tau͡gaam atavet akeqnerrlugtellruakut qanerluni-llu, ‘Umyuarrlugciun tull'i kitumun imumun neqmek nerelriamun ernerpak.’”
Jonathan-aaq kiuguq, “Assiitqapiarmek-llu atamni taqupaa yumten̄un! Tangerciu qaillun pitalriamek assiriqertellra ayuqucima nerngama evegtaat neqaitnek!
Qaillun-kiq pitalriamek assinrullruyarta ernerpak yumta nerellrukunegteki neqet tegulteng cirlaklermeggni ingluput. Nutaan-kiq qaillun amllertalrianek Philistine-anek tuqucillruyartat!”
Tuani ernermi Israel-aam yuin cirlakellruit Philistine-at, anguyagluteng ayagluteng Michmash-amek Aijalon-aaq tekilluku. Wani-wa-llu tua-i Israel-aam yui piniatqapiarangluteng kaigem ugaani,
tua-i-llu curukarait tegulteng inglumeggnek, teguluki-llu qusngit kuluviit-llu, pilagait tuani, nerluki-llu kemgit augtuumaita.
Saul-aaq-llu qanrutaat, “Tangerrluku, yuut assiilngirtut
Allamek-llu ellimeqlirtuq: “Yuut akuliitnun ullagaluki qanruciki wavet taicesqelluki kuluvautait qusngiutait-llu. Wani tuqurqekaugait nerluki-llu; assiilngirarkaunritut
Saul-aaq nauciuq ekuavigmek
Saul-aam qanrutai anguyagten̄i, “Atrarluta curugnauput Philistine-at unugmi, teglegiluki erqaarvianun, tamalkuita-llu tuqulluki.”
“Kiiki assiryuklerpetun pii,” ellait kiugut.
Tau͡gaam agayulirta qanertuq, “Ciumek Agayun apelcirraarnaurput.”
Tua-i Saul-aam kangiiturvikaa Agayun, “Curuglaki-qaa Philistine-at? Cirlakutmek-qaa cikirciqerpekut?” Tau͡gaam Agayun tuani ernermi kiunrituq.
Tua-llu Saul-aaq qanertuq ciuliqagtaitnun yuut, “Tailuci wavet nallunrirnaurci ca assiilnguq atuumallrucianek ernerpak.
Akqiunga unguvalriakun
Tua-llu Saul-aam qanrutai, “Tamarpeci nangerci yaavet, Jonathan-aaq-llu wangkuk wavet nangerciiqukuk.”
“Assirngatellrakun elpenun pii,” ellait kiugut.
Saul-aaq qanertuq
Tua-llu Saul-aaq qanertuq, “Nalimegnek cucuklirci qetunraqa Jonathan-aaq wall'u wiinga.” Jonathan-aaq-llu cucukumauq.
Tua-llu Saul-aam aptaa Jonathan-aaq, “Callrusit?”
Jonathan-aaq kiuguq, “Nerqallruunga evegtaat neqaitnek muraggarkun tegumiamkun. Kitaki waniwa, upingaunga tuqullerkamnun.”
Saul-aaq qanertuq, “Agayutem tuquskilia tuqutaunrilkuvet!”
Tau͡gaam yuut qanertut Saul-aamun, “Jonathan-aaq-qaa, uumek angtuamek cirlakutmek anagkengucetellra Israel-aam, tuqutauqatartuq? Qang'a! Akqiukut unguvalriakun
Taum kinguani, Saul-aam maligtenrirai Philistine-at, utertut-llu nakmiin nunautmeggnun.
Saul-aam angayuqaurtellmi Israel-aanun kinguani, anguyagai ingluni tamaita: Moab-am yui, Ammon-aam, Edom-aam-llu, angayuqri Zobah-m, Philistine-at-llu. Nani tamiin anguyagaqami cirlakilartuq.
Anguyallruuq alingunani cirlakellruluki-llu Amalek-aam yui. Anaulluki-llu Israel-aam yui tamalkuitnek curugtaitnek.
Saul-aam qetunrai ukuullruut Jonathan-aaq, Ishvi, Malchishua-wa. Alqaqliat paniin aterluni Merab-amek, kinguqlia-wa Michal-aaq.
Nulirra-wa Ahinoam-aaq, pania Ahimaaz-am; anguyagtain-wa atanirturtiit elliin ilurii Abner-aaq, qetunraa elliin angiin Ner-am.
Saul-aam atii Kish-aaq Abner-aam-llu atii Ner-aq qetunraqellruak Abiel-aam.
Unguvallmi taktaciatun, Saul-aam tukniluni anguyaallrui Philistine-at. Taumek nallunrirqami angutmek pinilriamek alinguraranrilngurmek-llu, anguyagtem̄inun ilautelallrukai.
Samuel-aaq qanertuq Saul-aamun, “Wiinga wani-wa
Anucimirqecetaaqatarai Amalek-aam yui ciuliarita inglukellruitki Israel-aam yui Egypt-aamek taillratni.

Ayagci curugluki-llu Amalek-aam yui piunrinqegcaarluki-llu cait tamalkuita. Carraungraan uitaciiyaqunaci; tamalkuita tuqulluki angutet, arnat, mikelnguut, mikelnguyagaat-llu; kuluviit, qusngit, qulugnelget ungungssit, ciulviit-llu.”
Saul-aam quyurtai anguyagten̄i yuvrirluki-llu Telem-aami: yuinaulliniut qulen tiissitsaat (200,000) anguyagtet Israel-aamek qulen-wa tiissitsaat (10,000) Judah-mek.
Tua-i-llu ellii anguyagten̄i-llu ayagtut Amalek-aam nunarpiinun utaqaluteng-llu alangiilluki curukallerkameggnek kuignayugmi.

Ayagceciuq-llu aarcirtuutmek Kenite-anun yuinun, yuut taukut ciuliarita assirluki ilaliullrukait Israel-aam yui taillratni Egypt-aamek: “Ayagci unilluki Amalekite-at, tapqulluci tuqutenritniamci.” Tua-i Kenite-at ayagtut.
Saul-aam cirlakai Amalek-aam yui, callugluki Havilah-mek ayagluni Shur-aaq tekilluku, calaralirnerani Egypt-aam;
elliin-llu teguaqaa Angayuqaq Agag-aq Amalek-aarmiu unguvaluku tuqulluki-llu yuut tamalkuita.

Tau͡gaam Saul-aam anguyagten̄i-llu uitataat Agag-am unguvii tuqutevkenaki-llu assinqurrait qusngit kuluviit-llu, assinqurrait kuluvayagaat qusngiyagaat-llu, wall'u allat assilriit; kiingan piunrirait atuungailnguut wall'u caungailnguut.
“Pinqigcuumiraunga angayuqrurtellemnek Saul-aaq; wangnek tuigtuq alerquutenka-llu narurrluki.” Samuel-aaq-llu qenertuq, unugpak-llu takumcuca'artuq

Unuayaarmi ercan ayagluni kiarcarturaa Saul-aaq. Niituq-llu Saul-aaq ayallruniluku nunarrarmun Carmel-aamun, tuani-llu naucillrulliniuq nallunailkutamek ellminek umyuaqluni, tua-i-llu Gilgal-aamun ayagluni.
Samuel-aam ullagaa Saul-aaq, ciuniuraa-llu elliin, qanerluni, “
Samuel-aaq aptuq, “Ciin-mi, niicia kuluviit nepaitnek qusnginek-llu?”
Saul-aaq kiuguq, “Anguyagtem̄a tegukengalqait Amalek-aam yuinek. Uitatellruit qusngit kuluviit-llu assinqurrait elliiteknaluki ekualuki
“Arulaiqaqaa,” Samuel-aam qanrutaa, “qanrutniamken camek
“Qanrusnga,” Saul-aaq qanertuq.
Samuel-aaq kiuguq, “Elpenek umyuartequteng'e'rpet cakegtauvkenak, ciuliqagtekaatgen ilakellriartain Israel-aam.
ayagcetellruaten-llu ellimerrluten piunriisqelluki taukut umyuarrliqpialriit Amalek-aam yui. Qanrutellruaten anguyagluki tamalkuita tuqutesqelluki.
Ciin-mi, tua-i, niitenriciu? Ciin avula'allrusit tukuutnek, taqulluten-llu quyakenrilkiinek
“Maligtaqullruaqa
Tau͡gaam anguyagtem̄a tuqutellrunritait assinqurrit qusngit kuluviit-llu tegulteng; tailluki tau͡gaam maavet Gilgal-aamun elliiteknaluki ekualuki
Samuel-aaq qanertuq, “Naliak
Ingluliurutlek elliinun cangallrunrituq angalkiyaratun, ucuryagcaraq-llu assiilngiryarauluni agayutngualiyaratun. Taumek qessakngavgu
“Aa-ang, assiilngillruunga,” Saul-aaq qanertuq. “Narurtellruaqa
Watua tau͡gaam kaigaunga, au͡g'arisgu assiilnguqa maligglua-llu utertellemni, agayuniartua
“Maliggluten uterrngaitua,” Samuel-aaq kiuguq. “Qessakellruan
Tua-llu Samuel-aaq tuigtuq ayakatarluni, tau͡gaam Saul-aam tegua ulikutaakun, allegtuq-llu.
Samuel-aam qanrutaa, “
Israel-aam ucurnarqelria Agayutii iqluyuituq umyualinqigcuunani-llu. Yuunginaraunrituq — umyuani-llu cimiyuinaku.”
“Assiilngirtua,” Saul-aaq qanertuq. “Tau͡gaam caunrilkenritqaqia tangvallratni ciuliqagtaita yuut Israel-aam-llu yuin. Utertellemni maligesnga agayuniartua
Tua-i Samuel-aam maligtaa, Saul-aaq-llu agayuuq
“Taiciu Angayuqaq Agag-aq wangnun,” Samuel-aaq qanertuq. Agag-aq elliinun taiguq, uuleggluni alingluni, umyuarteqluni, “Qatlinarqellriatun-llu ayuqvaa tuquqatallermi!”
Samuel-aaq qanertuq, “Nuussirpagpet amlleret aanaulriit irniariucetellruciatun, waniwa aanan irniariuciiquq.” Kepuraa-llu Agag-aq tumaumanrirluku ekuaviim ciuqerrani Gilgal-aami.
Tua-i-llu Samuel-aaq ayagtuq Ramah-mun, Angayuqaq-llu Saul-aaq kinguneminun uterrluni Gibeah-mun.
Samuel-aam-llu unguvallmi taktaciatun tangenqigtenritaa angayuqaq; tau͡gaam angniilutek'laraa.
“Qaillun tuaten piciqsia?” Samuel-aaq aptuq. “Saul-aam niiskuniu man'a tuquciiqaanga!”
Unayaqniaran Jesse ekuagillerkamun, qanruciiqamken qaillun pillerkarpenek. Uqumek mingugniaran angayuqrurrluku angun pisqumalqa.”
Samuel-aaq piuq
“Aa-ang,” ellii kiuguq. “Taigua elliiyarturlua ekuagilua
Tekicameng, Samuel-aam tangrraa Jesse-m qetunraa Eliab-aaq umyuarteqluni-llu, “Una angun wani nangengqalria
Tau͡gaam
Tua-llu Jesse-m qayagauraa qetunrani Abinadab-aq tailluku-llu Samuel-aamun. Tau͡gaam Samuel-aaq qanertuq, “Qang'a, cali una
Tua-i Jesse-m taitaa Shammah-q. “Qang'a, cali una
Tuaten piurluni Jesse-m taitai malrunlegen qetunrani Samuel-aamun. Samuel-aaq-llu qanertuq elliinun, “Qang'a,
Tua-llu aptaa, “Cali-qaa allanek qetunrangqertuten?”
Jesse kiuguq, “Kinguqlikacaangqertut, tau͡gaam tayima qusnginek qaunqiuq.”
“Aqvavkarru,” Samuel-aaq qanertuq, “Elliitekngaitarput ekuagarkaq taivailgan.”
Tua-i Jesse-m taisqevkaraa. Tauna tangkegcinarquq, calrunani yun'erraq, iik-llu qevlialutek.
Samuel-aam olive-aam uqua tegua mingugluku-llu David-aaq anelgutain ciuqerratni. Egmian-llu
Elliin pistain qanrutaat, “Nallunritarput anernerrlugmun Agayutmek kingunelegmun nangteqevkaucin.
Taumek ellimerkut kiarrniartukut angutmek aturcetaaryugngalriamek qelutelegmek harp-amek. Anernerrluk tuskan elpenun, angun tauna aturcetaarniartuq, elpet-llu ataam canrirciquten.”
Saul-aam ellimerrai, “Yuarucia angutmek aturcetaayulriamek tailluku-llu wangnun.”
Nayurtain iliit qanertuq, “Jesse nunarriini Bethlehem-aam qetunrangqertuq aturcetaayulimek. Cali-llu alingura'arpek'nani tangkegcinaqluni-llu, anguyagtekegtaar, puqigluni-llu.
Tua-i Saul-aaq ayagceciuq kevganek Jesse-mun qanresqelluki, “Taivkarru qetunraan David-aaq, qaunqituli qusnginek.”
Jesse-m ayagcetaa David-aaq Saul-aamun malilirluku piyagarmek qusngirngalngurmek, ciulvagmek atmirluku kelipanek, qecik-wa caqun wine-amek muirumaluni.
David-aaq tekituq Saul-aamun kevgiullerkani-llu ayagnirluku. Saul-aam cakneq assikaa nakmikaa-llu ellii saskuminun ayagacisten͞gurcesqelluku.
Tua-llu Saul-aaq ayagceciuq kevgamek Jesse-mun qanerluni, “Assikaqa David-aaq. Maani uitavkarru caliamni.”

Tuaken ayagluni, anernerrluk Agayutmek kingunelek tut'aqan Saul-aamun, David-aam aqvaluku qelutelek harp-aq aturcetaalartuq. Anernerrluk-llu ayalartuq, Saul-aam-llu ayuqucia assiriluni ayuqucimitun-llu ayuqliriluni.
Philistine-at quyurtut Socoh-mun anguyakatarluteng, nunarrarmun Judah-melngurmi; pelatekiurtut Ephes Dammim-aamek at'legmun, Socoh-m Azekah-m-llu akuliinelngurmun.
Saul-aaq Israel-aam-llu yui quyurtut pelatekiurluteng-llu Elah-m Kuignayuani, tuani-llu uptut anguyakatarluki Philistine-at.
Philistine-at caniqliqu'urluteng nangertut qemimun Israel-aam-llu yui akilirneranun, akuliitni-wa kuignayuk.
Angun at'lek Goliath-aamek, nunarpiinek Gath-am, an'uq Philistine-at pelatekaumaviatnek inglukarcurluni Israel-aat yuin iliitnek. It'ganret qulngunritaraat cipluku sugtutauq
aturluni punernermek qat'gailitamek uqamaltaluni usperet yuinaat arvinlegen talliman-wa (125) punernermek-llu qamiqurriryailkutmek.
Iruk-llu cali akngircailkuterlutek punernermek capkutamek, tegumiarluni-llu punernermek narulkarcuutmek tusgani agaluni.
Narulkautaa ellegtaluni muragtaatun 'lumarrissuutem muriim, cavik-llu cingilga akimiarnek (15) uspernek uqamaltaluni. Anguyagta-wa ciunrakun ayalria tegumiaqluku capkutaa.
Goliath-aam nangerrluni qayagpagai Israel-aam yui, “Caliceci maani, upingaluci anguyagmun? Wii Philistine-augua, elpeci Saul-aam pistaini! Cucuklirci iliitnek anguyagtevci callugtekamnek.
Anagkengluni tuquskanga, pisteksaguciiqerpecikut wangkuta; tau͡gaam wii anagkenglua tuquskumku, elpeci pisteksaguciiqamceci.
Wani-wa wanirpak ingluliisqua Israel-aam yuin anguyagtainun. Alingura'arpek'naci cucukliisqamci kitumek callugtekamnek!”
Saul-aam anguyagten̄i-llu man'a niitellermeggni, alingqapiartut.
David-aaq qetunraqellrua Jesse-m, Ephrathite-auluni Bethlehem-aamek Judah-mi. Jesse qetunrangqellruuq pingayunlegnek, Saul-aam-llu angayuqrullran nalliini, ak'a angukaraurlu'urrluni.
Kinguqliqellriit pingayun qetunrain maligtellruat Saul-aaq anguyagmun. Amaqliat Eliab-aaruluni, kinguqlia-wa Abinadab-aq, pingayuak-wa Shammah-q.
David-aaq kinguqliqacagauluni, pingayun-llu anngani Saul-aami uitallratni,
David-aaq ut'rartaqluni Bethlehem-aamun pilallruuq, atami ungungssii auluksarturluki.
Goliath-aam ingluliisqelluni Israel-aam yui piurallrui unuakut atakut-llu tamalkuita erenret yuinaak malruk (40) aturluki.
Erenret iliitni Jesse qanertuq David-aamun, “Ayauten avganek puckam kelipimalrianek mukaarkanek ukunek-llu qulnek kelipanek, cukangnaqluten ayautniaten anelgutevnun pelatekaumaviatni.
Ukut-llu cali ayaulluki qulen cheese-aat atanirturtiitnun. Kangingnaurniaran qaillun amaqlirpet ayuquciat ut'rulluten-llu camek nasvagarkarpenek nallunairluku tangellruciit assirluteng-llu piciit.
Angayuqaq Saul-aaq, anngaten, allat-llu tamarmeng Israel-aam yui, Elah-m Kuignayuani anguyagluki Philistine-at.”

David-aaq makcara'artuq unuaquan, allamek-llu qaunqescirluki qusngit, teguluki neqet, ayagtuq Jesse-m ellimerruciatun. Tekituq pelatekaumaviatnun Israel-aam yui anuraqanratgun anguyallerkameggnun, qayagauraluteng anguyagcuutmek.
Philistine-at Israel-aam-llu yuin anguyagtai nek'ameggnun nangertut anguyakatarluteng, atunem caumalluteng.
David-aam unitai neqet atanerruamun qaunqestiitnun aklut, aqvaqurluni-llu anguyallerkaata engeliinun, ullagluki anngani, aptai qaillun ayuquciitnek.
Qalarusnginanrani, Goliath-aaq ciuvartuq Israel-aam-llu yuinek inglukarcurluni ciungani pilaucirmitun. David-aam-llu niitaa.
Israel-aam yuin tangrramegteggu Goliath-aaq, aqvaqurluteng qimagaut alingqapiarluteng.

“Atam tangerqerru!” ilameggnun qanertaarutut. “Niiciu unayaqutii calluusqelluni! Angayuqaq Saul-aaq akqillruuq angtuamek akilirciqniluku kina imna tuqutestii; tunciqaa-llu panini kassuucesqelluku, taum-llu atiin ilai akiliqurautnek akilicivkarngaunaki.”

David-aam aptai angutet mallgesken̄i, “Camek nunuliutengqerciqa angun uum Philistine-am tuqucestii petuirluku-llu Israel-aaq mat'umek kasngunarqellriamek? Kituuga-llu una agayumanrilnguq Philistine-aq narurciyugngalria anguyagtainek unguvalriim Agayutem?”
Qanrutaat-llu qaillun pimallerkaanek angun tuqucestii Goliath-aam.

Eliab-aam, David-aam anngaan, niitaa David-aaq angutet qalarutellrani. Qenqerrutaa David-aaq qanerluni-llu, “Calisit maani? Kia aulukaki qusngiten yuilqumi? Elpet elisngakugtaalalriami! Kiingan taiguten tangvagyarturluki callulriit!”
“Qaillun-mi-tanem waniwa pisia?” David-aaq aptuq. “Camek-qaa ap'arcesciigatua?”
Tuiggluni-llu allamun angutmun tuaten cali aptaa, uumikuaqan tua-i aptaqan, kiutiit ayuqurluni.
Ilaita angutet niitaa qanellra David-aam, qanrutaat-llu Saul-aaq, elliin-llu taisqevkaraa.
David-aaq qanertuq Saul-aamun, “Elpet Ucurnarqellriami, kina alingenrilli uumek Philistine-amek! Ullagluku wiinga callugyarturciqaqa.”
“Qang'a,” kiuguq Saul-aaq. “Qaillun elpet callugyarciu? Tan'gaurluuguten, ellii-llu anguyagten͞gumallruluni yuurqaanerminek!”
“Elpet Ucurnarqellriami,” David-aaq qanertuq, “Wii atama qusngii qaunqelaranka. Iliini yugtutuli wall'u taqukaq ayauciaqan qusngiyagarmek,
kingunrakun maligtelaraqa, curukarluku-llu, anirtularaqa qusngiyagaq. Yugtutulim-llu wall'u taqukam caukanga, qecugmigluku tuqluakun kaugtuarulluku tuqutelaraqa.
Tuqucillrurtua yugtutulinek taqukanek-llu, tuaten-llu piyugngaaqa una agayumanrilnguq Philistine-aq, caunrilkilria anguyagtainek unguvalriim Agayutem.
aviutellruanga yugtutulinek taqukanek-llu; aviuciiqaanga-llu uumek Philistine-amek.”
“Kitaki,” Saul-aaq kiuguq, “Ayii,
Tunaa-llu elliin nakmiin qat'gailitani David-aamun atuusqelluku: punerneq qamiqurri'iryailkun, ellia David-aam qamiqurranun, paltuugluku-llu akngircailkutmek.

David-aam nemrutaa Saul-aam nuussirpii qat'gailitam qainganun, piyuangnaqluni, tau͡gaam pisciigatuq, tamakunek atuneq elisnganrilamiu. “Callugciigatua makunek aturlua,” qanertuq Saul-aamun. “Waten pineq elisnganritaqa.” Tua-i tamalkuita yuugai.
Tegua qusngiliurcuun ayaruni tegulluni-llu tallimanek manigcetellrianek teggalqunek kuiggaarmek ekluki-llu qemaggviminun. Elluqautni upingaluku, an'uq pairrsaagluku Goliath-aaq.
Philistine-aq piyuaguq tungiinun David-aam, capkutami tegumiaqestii ciunermikun piyuavkarluku. Canimelliinarluni,
tangrramiu-llu mecikluku David-aaq, umyuamikun cakneq caunrilkaa tan'gaurluqegtaaraungan.
Qanertuq-llu David-aamun, “Cassuutngua tamana muragaq? Qimugten͞guyukarpenga-qaa?” Qayagaurauq-llu aniqlaatnek agayutminek David-aamun.
“Kitaki,” kiikirturaa David-aaq, “tuneniarqa temen yaqulegnun ungungssinun-llu neresqelluku.”
David-aaq kiuguq, “Ullagarpenga nuussirpagluten, narulkautarluten, cavigmek-llu nuulegmek narulkarcuuterluten, tau͡gaam wiinga ullagamken atrakun
Mat'umi ernermi
tamarmeng-llu maanelnguut tangerciqaat
Goliath-aaq ataam piyuaguq David-aam tungiinun, David-aaq-llu cukamek aqvaqurtuq Philistine-at anguyagmun upingalriit tungiitnun callugyarturluku.
Kauluku qemaggvini anciuq teggalqumek, tauna-llu elluqautaa Goliath-aamun. Nall'artaa cunguakun qupluku ilqurra, Goliath-aaq-llu iquuq pucikarluni nunamun.
Tua-i, nuussirpagmek aturpek'nani, David-aam cirlakluku tuqutaa Goliath-aaq elluqautmek teggalqumek-llu caskirluni!
Aqvaqurluni ullagartaa, canianun-llu nangerrluni, tegua Goliath-aam nuussirpii caquanek, qamiqurra-llu kepaa tuqulluku.
Philistine-at tangrramegteggu anamacestem̄eng tuqucia, qimagluteng ayagtut.

Anguyagtain Israel-aam Judah-m-llu qayagpagaluteng aqvaqurluteng maligtait Gath-aq tekilluku ikirtuqainun-llu Ekron-aam. Philistine-at iqulartut akngiringalriit tumyaram mengliinun ayalriim Shaaraim-amun, tekilluku Gath-aq Ekron-aaq-llu.
Tua-llu Israel-aam yui utercameng malirqallermeggnek Philistine-at, uayaaraat qavartarviat.
David-aam-llu teguluku Goliath-aam qamiqurra ayautaa Jerusalem-aamun, tau͡gaam Goliath-aam saskui elliin avaliqai pelatekamini.
Tua-llu Saul-aam tangllerminiu David-aaq callugyartullrani Goliath-aaq, aptaa Abner-aaq, anguyagtem̄i atanirturtiit, “Abner-aaq, kia au͡gna qetunraqau?”
“Nalluaqa,” Abner-aam kiugaa.
“Kitak ayagluten nallunringnaqiu,” Saul-aam ellimerraa.
Tua-i-llu David-aaq utercan pelatekaumavigmun tuquqaarluku Goliath-aaq, Abner-aam ullautaa Saul-aamun. David-aam cali ang'aqluku Goliath-aam qamiqua.
Saul-aam aptaa, “Tan'gurraaq, kia qetunraqaten?”
“Wiinga qetunraqaanga kevgarpet Jesse-m Bethlehem-aamek,” David-aaq kiuguq.
Saul-aankuk David-aaq-llu qalarutlermegnek qaqiutuk. Taum kinguani, Saul-aam qetunraa Jonathan-aaq yugnikutmek imanguq David-aamun keneksagulluku-llu ellmitun pitarrluku.
Saul-aam avaliqsagutaa David-aaq tuaken ernermek ayagluni utercetevkenaku-llu kingunranun.
Jonathan-aaq akqiuq nangyuilngurmek yugnikutmek David-aamun cakneq kenkellni pitekluku.
Yuugaa ulikutaq atuqengani tunluku-llu David-aamun, tapeqluku qat'gailitani cali-llu nuussirpani, urluvni, naqugutni-llu.

David-aaq piluaqerluni pilallruuq tamalkuitni caliaqsartullmini Saul-aam ayagcetaqani, taumek Saul-aam atanerruarurtellrukii anguyagtem̄inun. Mat'umek quyatengqertut tamarmeng Saul-aam atanerruari anguyagtai-llu.

David-aaq uterrnginanrani tuquqaarluku Goliath-aaq anguyagtet-llu uterrnginanratni tamarmeng, arnat nunainek Israel-aam anluteng pairrsaagaat Angayuqaq Saul-aaq. Aturluteng angnirnarqellrianek yuarutnek, yurarluteng, aturcetaarluteng-llu tambourine-anek lyre-anek-llu.
Angnillermeng nalliini arnat aturtut, “Saul-aaq tuqucillruuq tiissitsaanek (1,000), tau͡gaam David-aaq qulnek tiissitsaanek (10,000).”

Saul-aam man'a assikenritaa, cakneq-llu qenngenguq. Qanertuq, “David-aaq pillruniat qulnek tiissitsaanek (10,000), tau͡gken wiinga kiingan tiissitsaanek (1,000). Piinanermeggni-llu angayuqrurciiqaat waniwa!”
Taumek ciknayagutaa paqnakengluku-llu David-aaq tuaken ernermek ayagluni.

Unuaquan anernerrluum Agayutmek kingunelgem iluiraa Saul-aaq, qanpagauq-llu enemini usviirutellriatun. David-aaq aturcetaartuq qelutelegmek harp-amek, unuaquaqan pilaucirmitun, Saul-aam-wa tegumiaqurqii narulkarcuun.
“Ussukcauciiqaqa qacarnermun,” Saul-aaq umyuartequq, malrurqugnek-llu narulkaraa; tau͡gaam David-aaq avitaqluni.
Saul-aam alikaa David-aaq
Taumek Saul-aam ayagcetaa ataniurten͞gurrluku-llu tiissitsaanun (1,000) anguyagten̄un. David-aam anguyagten̄i ciuliqagtelarai anguyagmi
piluaqerrlainarluni-llu callmini tamalkuitni,
Saul-aam tanglaraa David-aam piluaqerallra alikevsiangluku-llu.
Tau͡gaam tamarmeng yuut Israel-aami Judah-mi-llu kenkaat David-aaq piluaqerluni ciuliqagten͞gullra pitekluku.
Tua-i Saul-aaq qanertuq David-aamun, “Wani-wa alqaqliq panika Merab-aq. Tunciqaqa elpenun nuliqsagucesqelluku elpenun kevgiuresqellua uluryaunak piciuluten-llu anguyagten͞guluten, inglulirluki-llu
David-aaq kiuguq, “Kituungama nakmiin-llu ilanka-llu caungata nengaugaurteqatarcia Angayuqamun?”
Tau͡gaam pillerkaq tekican Merab-am tunumallerkaa David-aamun, tunumallruuq Adriel-aamun Meholah-rmiumun.
Saul-aam panian Michal-aam, kenegyagutaa David-aaq, Saul-aam-llu niitellerminiu man'a, ilukegcitkaa.
Saul-aaq umyuartequq, “Tunciqaqa Michal-aaq David-aamun; elliikun napceciiqaqa, tuqutauniartuq Philistine-atgun.” Taumek aipiriluni Saul-aaq qanertuq David-aamun, “Nengauksaguciiqamken.”
Ellimerrai atanerruani kiimelulluku qalarucesqelluku David-aaq waten qanrulluku, “Angayuqam ilukegcitkaaten atanerruarin-llu assikaatgen; waniwa assirciquq elpet kassuuskuvgu pania.”
Tua-i mat'umek qanrutaat David-aaq, ellii-llu kiuguq, “Angtuamek takarnarqelriaruuq nengaugurtellerkaq angayuqamun, angtuaruuq wangtun arrsaulriamun camek-llu takarnarqutailngurmun.”
Pistet-llu qanrutaat Saul-aaq David-aam qanellranek,

Saul-aam-llu ellimerrai David-aaq qanrucesqelluku: “Kiingan tua-i angayuqam piyuutekaa elpenun nulirruciisqelluku nulirkaa Philistine-at nuugillritnek yuinarnek tallimanek (100), akinaurutekluku ingluminun.” (Waten Saul-aaq picirkillruuq David-aaq tuqutausqelluku Philistine-atgun.)
Saul-aam atanerruarin egmirtaat David-aamun Saul-aam qanellra, David-aaq-llu angniqapiartuq umyuaqegciluni angayuqamun nengaugurteqatallerminek. Unuaqu kassuuteqatarluni,

David-aaq anguyagten̄i-llu ayagluteng tuquciut qulnek yuinarnek (200) Philistine-anek. Nuugillrit-llu agutai angayuqamun naaqluki-llu takuani, nengauksagucesqelluni. Tua-i Saul-aam tun'arkaurtaa panini Michal-aaq kassuucarakun David-aamun.
Saul-aam taringaa nallunailngurmek
Taumek alikevsiangaa David-aaq ingluku'urluku-llu unguvallmi taktaciatun.

Philistine-at anguyagtait tailartut callugluteng-llu, tau͡gaam anguyalteng tamalkuan David-aaq piluaqanruuralartuq tamalkuitni Saul-aam allani atanerruarini. Tamana-llu pitekluku David-aaq neq'ayaraurtuq.
Saul-aam qanrutaa Jonathan-aaq qetunrani tamalkuita-llu atanerruani, upniluni tuqutnaluku David-aaq. Tau͡gaam Jonathan-aam assikqapiararaa David-aaq,
taumek elliin qanrutaa, “Atama tuquituraaten. Mulngakekina unuaqu unuakumi; iiqina nallunarqellriamun natmun tuantaurluten-llu.
Ayagciqua nangerrlua-llu atama caniani naucetaarvigmi iirumavigpeni, qanerciqua-llu elpenek elliinun. Camek nallunriquma nallunriceciiqamken.”

Jonathan-aam nanraraa David-aaq Saul-aamun qanerluni-llu, “Picurlagmek caliyaqunak kevgarpenun David-aamun. Ellii picurlagmek taquteqaqsaituq elpenun; pairrluku tau͡gaam, ca tamalkuan pillra angtuaruluni ikayuutnguuq elpenun.
Unguvani qevellrua tuqutellerminiu Goliath-aaq,
Saul-aaq ilumunqaartuq Jonathan-aam qanellranek akqiluni-llu
Tua-i Jonathan-aam qayagauraa David-aaq qanrulluku-llu canek tamalkuitnek pillernek; tua-i-llu ullaulluku Saul-aamun, David-aam-llu kevgiuraa angayuqaq ciungani pillrucimitun.
Anguyak-llu Philistine-at inglukluki ayagninqigtuq. David-aam curugai cirlakuurateng-llu qimagtut.
Erenret iliitni anernerrluum
Saul-aam David-aaq ussukcaucessaagyaaqaa qacarnermun narulkautmikun, tau͡gaam David-aaq avituq, narulkaun-llu qacarnermun kapulluni. David-aaq-llu qimagluni anagtuq.

Tuani cali unugmi Saul-aaq ayagceciuq anguyagten̄ek David-aam enii murilkesqelluku tuqucesqelluku-llu unuaqu unuakumi. Michal-aam, David-aam nulirran, aarcirturaa, “Atakurpak qimanrilkuvet, unuaqu tuqumaciquten.”
Atrartaa egalerkun, qimagluni-llu anagtuq.
Tua-llu tegulluni enemelngurmek agayutnguamek, ellia inglermun, putuskaq-llu qusngirngalnguut melquitnek pilimalria qamiquan nalliinun elliluku, patuluku-llu.
Saul-aam-llu anguyagtain tailuteng aqvallratgu David-aaq, Michal-aam qanrutai naulluuniluku.
Tau͡gaam Saul-aam utercetai ellaitnek tangrresqelluku David-aaq. Elliin ellimerrai, “Akigarluku ingelrikun wangnun taiciu, tuqutniarqa.”
Itertut-llu ellait nataqluku-llu enemiutaq agayutnguaq inglerni putuskaq-llu qusngirngalnguut melqurritnek piliaq qamiquan nalliini.
Saul-aam aptaa Michal-aaq, “Ciin picirkartuyarucia waten ingluka-llu ayagtelluku?”
Arnaq kiuguq, “Qanellruuq tuquciiqnilua ikayunrilkumni anagtelluku.”
David-aaq anagtuq ayagluni-llu Samuel-aamun Ramah-mi qanrutaa-llu canek tamalkuitnek Saul-aam ellminun pillrinek. Tua-i Samuel-aaq-llu ayagtuk Naioth-aamun tuantaurlutek-llu.
Saul-aaq-llu qanrutaat David-aaq Naioth-aametniluku Ramah-mi.

Ayagceciuq-llu anguyagten̄ek qillerrluku tegustekainek. Tangertut quyungqalrianek prophet-aanek yuralrianek qayagpagaluteng-llu, Samuel-aamek ciuliqagterluteng. Tua-llu Agayutem anerneran nuvai Saul-aam anguyagtai, ellait-llu cali yurangut qayagpagaluteng-llu.
Mat'umek Saul-aaq niicami, cali kevganek ayagceciuq, taukut-llu cali ellait yurangut qayagpagaluteng-llu. Ayagcecinqigtuq-llu pingayiriluni, taukut-llu tuaten cali piut.
Tua-i-llu ellii ayagtuq Ramah-mun. Tekicami-llu elakarpagmun Secu-mi, apyutkak nanluciagnek Samuel-aankuk David-aaq-llu qanrutaat-llu Naioth-aametnilukek.
Ayainanrani ellii-llu anerneran Agayutem iluiraa, yuranguq-llu qayagpagaluni tuaten Naioth-aaq tekilluku.
Aturani yuugai yurarluni-llu qayagpagaluni Samuel-aam takuani, inangqaluni-llu matarmi tuani ernermi unugpak-llu. (Man'a ayagneqaa waten qanlallrata, “Saul-aaq-llu-qaa prophet-aarurtuq?”)
Tua-llu David-aaq qimagtuq Naioth-aamek Ramah-mi ullagluku-llu Jonathan-aaq. “Camek pillrusia?” ellii aptuq. “Camek picurlagmek atullrusia? Camek picurlagmek pillrusia aatavnun tuquituutekaanek?”

Jonathan-aaq kiuguq, “Agayutem piyuutekenritaa tuqullerkan! Aatama qanrut'laraanga canek tamalkuitnek pillerminek, arcaqalrianek wall'u arcaqanrilengraata, man'a-llu wangnun iirumasngaitaa. Piciunritqapiartuq!”

Tau͡gaam David-aaq kiuguq, “Aatavet nallunritqapiararaa qaillun pitalriamek elpenun assikuciqa, umyuamikun-llu taqutellruuq qaillun piqatallminek nallunrircessngaunak, tua-i-wa cakneq akngirterpagciqngavet. Piciulriamek qanertua elpenun unguvalriakun
Jonathan-aaq qanertuq, “Piyullerpenek wii piciqua caungraan.”
“Unuaqu piyaraqaa Nutaram Iralum Nerevkaritem,” David-aaq qanertuq, “nerellgucirarkaugaqa-llu angayuqaq. Tau͡gaam cangalkenrilkuvgu, ayaglua iirumaciqua naucetaarvigni atakurnatkaanun yaaliaku.

Atavet elpekekaku estuulumtenriluciqa, qanruskiu taqsuarirlua kaigavikellruniluten cukangnaqlua kingunemnun utercuglua Bethlehem-aamun, pillerkaq tekican pinariaqan ekuavkarilallerput wangkuta tamamta ilakellriani.
Qanqan, ‘Canrituq,’ Assirciqua; tau͡gaam qenqerreskan, nallunriciiqan cumiggluni elliinun wii akngircuucia.
Uumek niigarteqernga, pegtevkenaku-llu takarnarqellria akqutellren wangnun. Tau͡gaam pinarqutengqerquma, elpet tuquskia. Ciin atavnun ullaucarcia tuqutausqellua?”
“Umyuarteqsunaitaaten mat'umek!” Jonathan-aaq kiuguq. “Nallunrilkumku-qaa atamnun cumiggluni akngirtengnaqucia, qanrucanritamken?”
Tua-llu David-aaq aptuq, “Kia-mi nallunriceciiqanga atavet kiukaten qenerrluni?”
“Ayakarnaurtukuk naucirivignun,” Jonathan-aaq kiuguq. Tua-i ayagtuk,
Jonathan-aam-llu qanrutaa David-aaq, “
Akngirtengnaqerkaukaten,
Unguvakuma-llu, pegcaqunaku umyugailkartevkenak akqutellren piciuluten-llu wangnun pikina; tau͡gaam tuqukuma,
manimakiu wangnun piciuluten pillren nakmiin ilamnun akwarpak.
akqutelpuk atunem navgumanrilkili. Navgumakan,
Pulenglluni Jonathan-aam David-aaq akqivkaraa ellii kenkesqelluni, Jonathan-aam kenekngamiu David-aaq ellmitun pitarrluku.
Tua-llu Jonathan-aam qanrutaa, “Unuaqu Nutaram Iralum Nerevkaritekngaku, cataitellren nallunaiciiquq uitanrilkuvet neryarami.
Amatiiku cataitellren nallunaiciiquq arcaqerluni; taumek ayii tuavet iirviklerpenun ciungani, iirluten-llu tunuatnun teggalqut qalliqellriit tuani.
Nutaan tauna pitgarciqaqa pingayunek pitegcautnek, iingaaquqellriatun.

Tua-llu qanruciiqaqa kevgaqa kiarcartuusqelluki. Waten qanruskumku, ‘Tangerrluku, pitegcautet ukalirnerpeni uitaut; aqvaki,’ taum nallunairciqaa aarnailucia elpenun anyugngacin-llu. Piciulriamek qanertua unguvalriakun
Tau͡gaam qanruskumku, ‘Pitegcautet akilirnerpeni uitaut,’ ayakina, tua-i-wa
Imna-llu atunem akqutlerpuk,
Tua-i David-aaq iirtuq naucetaarvignun. Nutaram Iralum Nerevkaritiini, Angayuqaq Saul-aaq neryarturtuq
aqumluni-llu nek'elallerminun qacarnerem canianun. Abner-aaq canianun aqumuq, Jonathan-aaq-llu akianun aqumuq estuulumi. David-aam uitavia yuunani,
Saul-aaq-llu camek qanenrituq tuani ernermi, tua-i-wa umyuarteqngami, “Qaillun imna piuq, piciryaraq aturluku menuitenrituq.”
Unuaquani Iralum Nutaram Nerevkaritiin, David-aam enekelallra cali yuituq, Saul-aam-llu Jonathan-aaq apluku, “Ciin David-aaq taiksaita neryarturluni akwauvaq ernerpak-llu?”
Jonathan-aaq kiuguq, “Taqsuarirluni pillruanga ayagcecesqelluni Bethlehem-aamun.

‘Ayagcessnga,’ ellii qanellruuq, ‘nakmiin ilama angnirluteng atuqataatgu ekuagiluteng kalukaryaraq nunani, anelgutma-llu ellimellruanga tuancesqellua. Taumek, yugnikek'ngaqkumken, ayagcessnga tangerrnianka ilakutanka.’ Tamatumek picirluni aqumllermini estuuluvni uitanrituq.”
Saul-aam qenqerrutaa Jonathan-aaq qanrulluku-llu, “Inglucitellruuq ukvertuvkenani-llu aanan! Wani-wa nallunriraqa ingluarvikucia David-aaq kasngunariuten elpenek aanan tapeqluku!
Nalluan-qaa David-aaq unguvaluku angayuqaurcesciigalucin mat'umun nunamun? Wanirpak taicarturru maavet — ellii tuqutnarqaa!”
“Ciin tuquarkauga?” Jonathan-aaq aptuq. “Callrua?”
Tuaten pian, Saul-aam narulkaraa narulkarcuutminek Jonathan-aaq tuqutnaluku, Jonathan-aam-llu taringaa ataminun ilumun cumiggluni tuqucuucianek David-aaq.

Jonathan-aaq nang'e'rtuq estuulumek qenerrluni tuani-llu ernermi camek nerevkenani — erenran aipani Nutaram Iralum Nerevkaritem. Cakneq umyuarniurutkaa David-aaq, Saul-aam-wa tua-i assiitellriakun qanrutekngaku.
Unuaquan unuakumi Jonathan-aaq ayagtuq naucetaarvigmun tangerrsarturluku David-aaq, pillerkiullrucirmegtun. Malilirluni tan'gaurlurmek
qanrutaa-llu, “Aqvaqurluten yuarniaten pitegcautet pitgautarkanka.” Tan'gaurluq akvaqurluni ayagarcan, Jonathan-aaq pitgartuq ciunranun.
Tan'gaurluum tekicaku pitegcautem tusvillra, Jonathan-aam qayagpagaa, “Pitegcaun ava'antuq!
Tuani nangerngaurpek'nak! Kiiki!” Tan'gaurluum tegua pitegcaun uterrluni-llu angayu­qa­minun,
nalluluku camek iqungqerrucia; kiimek Jonathan-aankuk David-aaq-llu nalluvkenaku.
Jonathan-aam tunai saskuni tan'gaurlurmun qanrulluku-llu ut'rucesqelluki nunanun.

Tan'gaurluq ayaumarian, David-aaq nangertuq qalliqellriit teggalqut tunuatnek, ciisqumiggluni palurtuq kegginaminek nuna agturluku pingayurqunek-llu ciktaarluni. Tamarmek Jonathan-aaq-llu qialutek cingautellermegni; David-aam angniitellra arcaqanruluni Jonathan-aami.
Tua-llu Jonathan-aaq qanertuq David-aamun, “Agayutem nayurliten.
David-aaq ayagtuq agayulirtem̄un Ahimelech-aamun Nob-ami. Ahimelech-aaq an'uq uuleggluni pairrsaagluku apluku-llu, “Ciin maavet taisit kiivet?”
“Taigua angayuqam ellimerranga,” David-aam kiugaa. “Qanrutellruanga kitumun nallunriisqevkenaku ca pitekluku taivkaucini. Malinka qanrutellruanka nani quyurtellerkamten̄ek.
Wanirpak canek avalingqercit? Cikirnga tallimanek kelipanek canek-llu allanek pingqerrutacirpetun.”
Agayulirta qanertuq, “Kelipapianek piitua, kiingan tanqilrianek kelipanek; teguyugngaaten maliten ukaqvaggun arniuqsailkata.”
“Piksailnguut-wa,” David-aaq kiuguq. “Malinka piciryarat aturluki menuitelartut natmun-llu ayacuarangramta; maa-i arcaqerluteng ellimerrumallemten̄i pinarqelriamek!”
Tua-i agayulirtem cikiraa David-aaq tanqilrianek kelipanek, kiingan kelipautengqerrami elliitngullernek Agayutmun, au͡g'arluki qigcignarqellriamek estuulumek cimillritnek nutaranek kelipanek.
(Saul-aam qusngiliurtain ciuqliat, Doeg-aaq, Edom-aarmiu, nall'arulluni tamaantellruuq tuani ernermi, agayumacikun caliarkani caliaqsartuumaluku.)

David-aaq qanertuq Ahimelech-aamun, “Narulkarcuutengqertuten-qaa wall'u nuussirpagmek wangnun cikiuteksugngakevnek? Angayuqam ellimerrutiin ayagarcecanga patakarlua pillerkaitellruunga aqvallerkamnek narulkarcuuteka wall'u allamek saskumek.”

Ahimelech-aaq kiuguq, “Nunaqliqaqa nuussirpii Goliath-aam Philistine-am, tuqutellerpet Elah-m Kuignayuani; tunuantuq as'arcen̄araam qat'gailitam, nemrusngaluni 'lumarrarmun. Piyukuvgu, teguu, kiimi saskuuguq maani.”
“Taisgu,” David-aaq qanertuq. “Allamek assinranek nuussirpagmek pitaituq nani.”
Tua-i David-aaq ayagtuq, qimagauluni Saul-aamek, ayagluni-llu Angayuqamun Achish-amun Gath-armiumun.

Angayuqam atanerruari qanertut Achish-amun, “Una-qaa David-aarunrituq, angayuqaulria nunamini? Una imuuguq arnat atuutekellrat, yurarluteng, ‘Saul-aaq tuqucillruuq tiissitsaanek (1,000), tau͡gaam David-aaq tuqucillruuq qulnek tiissitsaanek (10,000).’”
Qanellrita cakneq agturaat David-aam ayuqucia, alinguryukapiartuq-llu Angayuqamek Achish-amek.
Taumek David-aaq avatiitni uitaaqami, umyugairusngualanguq usvillugtellriatun-llu ayuqliriluni nayumiqangnaqaqatni; igaqtaraqluni-llu nunarpiim ikirtuqainun nuiqluni tuaten ungaminun.
Tua-i Achish-aq qanertuq atanerruaminun, “Atam tangerqerru! Angun una usvillugtuq! Ciin taiceciu wangnun?
Amllenritut-qaa ak'a usvillugtellriit avatemni? Ciin allamek taiceci paayaartekamnek usvillugtellriamek maani nakmiin enemni?”
David-aaq qimagtuq nunarpiinek Gath-am ayagluni-llu qerranqumun yaaqsinrilkiini nunarraam Adullam-aam. Anelgutain nakmiin-llu ilain niicamegteggu tuanetniluku ullagaat.
Yuut pikegtakumanrilnguut wall'u akiilngulget wall'u narrlagcimalriit ullagaat, nuniini yuinaat yuinaat (400) angutet quyurmeng, ciuliqagteksagutaat-llu.
David-aaq ayagtuq tuaken Mizpah-mun Moab-ami qanerluni-llu angayuqranun Moab-am, “Kitaki aataka aanaka-llu uitavkaqerkek elpeni nallunrirnatkamnun qaillun Agayutem piqatallra wangnun.”
Tua-i unitak angayuqaagni angayuqranun Moab-am, tuantaurtuk-llu David-aam iirumallran taktaciatun qerranqumi.
Tua-llu prophet-aaq Gad-aq taiguq David-aamun qanerluni-llu, “Maani uitanrilu; patagmek ayii nuniinun Judah-m.” Tua-i David-aaq an'uq ayagluni-llu napainun Hereth-aam.

Caqerluni Saul-aaq Gibeah-metellruuq, aqumgaluni napam tamarisk-amek atellgem aciani qemim qaingani, narulkarcuutminek tegumiarluni, tamarmeng-llu atanerruari nangengqaluteng avatiini. Qanrutaat-llu David-aam anguyagtain-llu nanluciat nallunrirniluku,

qanertuq-llu atanerruaminun, “Niicugnici, yuini Benjamin-aam! Umyuartequci-qaa David-aamun cikirnayukluci naucetaarvignek wine-arkat-llu naucetaarviitnek tamarpeci, atanerruarurrluci-llu anguyagtem̄inun?

Tamana-qaa pitekluku aassaqluci camek picirkiurtuci wangnun? Atauciunger'mi ilavci qanrutenritaanga wiinga nakmiin qetunraqa taqutniluku ililirarkaurrluku David-aaq? Kia atauciunger'mi umyuarniurutkenritaanga wiinga wall'u qanrutevkenii David-aaq, nakmiin anguyagtem̄a iliit, wanirpak waniwa yuarniluku pillerkamek tuqutnalua, qetunramnun-llu eguaqurniluku.”
Doeg-aaq tuani nangerngallruuq Saul-aam atanerruari ilagarluki, ellii-llu qanertuq, “Tangellruaqa David-aam ullallraku Ahimelech-aaq qetunraa Ahitub-aam Nob-ami.
Ahimelech-aam aptellrua
Tua-i-llu Angayuqam Saul-aam taisqaa agayulirta Ahimelech-aaq tamalkuita-llu ilakutai, taukut cali agayulirten͞gulriit Nob-ami, taigut-llu elliinun.
Saul-aaq qanertuq Ahimelech-aamun, “Niicugni, Ahimelech-aaq!”
“Wani-wa, angayuqamaa,” ellii kiuguq.

Saul-aam aptaa, “Ciin elpetek David-aaq-llu aassaqlutek picirkiurcetek wangnun? Ciin neqnek cikillrusiu nuussirpagmek-llu, apelciucilluku-llu Agayutmun? Tua-i waniwa ingluksagutaanga utaqaluni-llu qaku arenqikallrani tuqutnalua!”
Ahimelech-aaq kiuguq, “David-aaq piciunqurrauguq atanerruarpeni! Nakmiin nengaukan, atanerruaqluku ciuqliuluni nakmiin nayurtevnun, quyinrulriamek-llu takaqumaluni takarnarqellriami atanruvigmi.

Aa-ang, apelciutelaraqa Agayutmun, nutaan-llu pivkenaku. Man'a-llu aassaqlunuk picirkiurnillrat, Elpet Ucurnarqellriami, piciliyunarqenritarpenga wiinga wall'u nakmiin ilama iliit. Wiinga camek nalqapiartua mat'um waten pilriim tungiinun!”
Angayuqaq qanertuq, “Ahimelech-aaq, elpet tamalkurmeng-llu ilakutaten tuqunarquci.”
Tua-llu qanertuq nayurten̄un canimini nangengqalrianun, “Tuquciki

Tua-i Saul-aaq qanertuq Doeg-aamun, “Elpet tuquski!” —Doeg-aam-llu tamalkuita tuqutai. Tuani ernermi tuquciuq yuinaat cetaman tallimanek cipluku (85) agayulirten̄ek piyunarquciliumaluteng as'arcen̄araam qat'gailitam aturyugngastainek.
Saul-aam-llu tamalkuita yui Nob-am, nunarpiita agayulirtet, tuqurqevkarai: angutet arnat-llu, mikelnguut anqiiyagaat, kuluviit, ciulviit, qusngit-llu — tamarmeng tuqucimaut.
Tau͡gaam Abiathar-aq, Ahimelech-aam qetunrain iliit, ayakartuq, ayagluni-llu ilaksagutaa David-aaq.
Qanrutaa qaillun Saul-aam tuqurqillranek agayulirtainek
David-aam qanrutaa, “Tuani ernermi tangllemni Doeg-aaq, nallunritellruaqa nallunailngurmek Saul-aaq qanrutarkaucianek. Taumek wiinga pinarqelriaruunga tuqutaullratnun tamarmeng ilakutarpet.
Wangnetauraa alingyaqunak-llu. Saul-aam tamamnuk tuqucugaakuk, tau͡gaam wangni pengegnaiciiquten.”
David-aaq niituq Philistine-anun anguyagniluku nunarrii Keilah-m tegliurluteng-gguq tuaten quyurrnerra'arnek mukaarkanek.
Tua-i apelciraa
“Aa-ang,”
Tau͡gaam David-aam anguyagtain qanrutaat, “Wangkutnun alingnarqellriit amllertut maani Judah-mi; nutaan arcaqanruciquq ayakumta Keilah-mun anguyagyarturluki Philistine-at anguyait.”
Tua-i David-aam cali apelcinqigtaa
David-aaq tua-i anguyagten̄i-llu ayagtut Keilah-mun anguyaluki-llu Philistine-at; tuqutait amlleret ungungssiutait teguluki-llu. Tuaten tua-i David-aam anirturaa tauna nunarraq.
Abiathar-am qetunraan Abimelech-aam ayakarluni ilautellermini David-aamun Keilah-mi, ang'aqellrua as'arcen̄aar qat'gailitaq.
Saul-aaq-llu qanrutaat David-aaq ayagniluku Keilah-mun, qanertuq-llu, “Agayutem pinimnun ellia. David-aaq ellminek naptuq tailuni casgulegmun nunarrarmun asvairquciumalriamek ikirtuqalegmun.”
Tua-i Saul-aam qayagaurai anguyagten̄i anguyagyartuusqelluki, piyualuki ullaasqelluku Keilah-q kassugulluki-llu David-aaq anguyagtai-llu.
David-aam niicami Saul-aamun curukatarniluni, qanertuq agayulirtem̄un Abiathar-amun, “Wangnun taisgu as'arcen̄aar.”
Tua-i-llu David-aaq qanerluni, “
Yuin-qaa Keilah-m tunciqaatnga Saul-aamun? Ilumun-qaa Saul-aaq taiciquq, niitellrucimtun?
“Yuin-llu-qaa Keilah-m tunciqai anguyagtenka wiinga-llu Saul-aamun?” David-aaq aptenqigtuq.
“Piciqut,”

Tua-i David-aaq anguyagten̄i-llu tiissitsaam avga yuinarnek tallimanek cipluku (600) nuniini amllertalriit, quyurmeng egmian Keilah-mek ayagtut arulaiqsaunateng. Saul-aam-llu niicami David-aaq ayakarniluku Keilah-mek, taq'itaa pillerkiullni.
David-aaq uitaurtuq iirumaluni qemililriami nunami, yuilqumi Ziph-am yaaqsinrilkiini. Saul-aam yuarturalaraa, tau͡gaam Agayutem tuneksaitaa David-aaq elliinun.
David-aam elpekaa Saul-aamun tuqutengnaqucini.
David-aaq Horesh-aami uitauq, yuilqumi Ziph-am yaaqsinrilkiini.
Jonathan-aam ullagaa tuani caceturqaurluku-llu Agayutem aulukutiin piciucianek,
qanerluni elliinun, “Alingenrilu. Atama Saul-aam akngircesciigaciiqaaten. Nallunritqapiararaa elpengucia angayuqerkaa Israel-aam wiinga-llu kinguqlirraugarkauciqa elpenun.”
Elkek umyugailkartevkenatek akqiuk yugnikutarkaulutek atunem. David-aaq uitauq Horesh-aami, Jonathan-aaq-llu kingunerminun uterrluni.
Yuut ilaita Ziph-armiut ullagaat Saul-aaq Gibeah-mi qanerluteng-llu, “David-aaq iirumauq nunautemten̄i Ingrimi Horesh-aami Hachilah-mi, ungalalirnermi Judea-m yuilqurtaani.
Nallunritarput, Elpet Ucurnarqellriami, qaillun pitalriamek teguaqsuucia elpenun, taumek taitai nunamten̄un, pinritevkenaku teguvkarciqaput elpenun.”
Saul-aaq kiuguq, “
Ayagci nallunrivsiaryarturluku-llu; nallunrinqegcaarluku nanlucia kitumun-llu tuani tangellrucia. Niitellruunga picirkartupiarniluku.

Nallunrirciki nanteqapiarauciitnek iirvik'lallri, pinritevkenaci-llu egmian qanrucarturniavcia. Nutaan maliggniamci, uitakan-llu tua-i tamaani uitanillratni, wiinga pissurciqaqa, Judah-m nunii tamalkuan qaqilluku yuararkaungramku.”
Tua-i ayagtut uterrluteng-llu Ziph-amun ciungani Saul-aam. David-aaq anguyagten̄i-llu uitaluteng yuilqurtaani Maon-aam, nunanialngurmi kuignayugmi ungalalirnerani Judea-m yuilqurtaan.

Saul-aaq anguyagten̄i-llu ayagtut kiarcarturluku David-aaq, tau͡gaam ellii mat'umek niituq ayagtuq-llu teggalqulilriamun qemimun yuilquani Maon-am tuanlluni-llu. Saul-aam man'a niicamiu, kingunrirturaa David-aaq.

Saul-aaq anguyagten̄i-llu qemim akilirnerani uitaut, avvingaluteng David-aamek anguyagtainek-llu, amalirnemeggni uitalrianek. Cukangnaqluteng qimangnaqait Saul-aaq anguyagtai-llu, taukut anguluki teguaqeqataiceteng.
Tua-llu piqerluni kevgaq tekituq Saul-aamun-llu qanerluni, “Uterten wanirpak! Philistine-at itertut nunamun!”
Tua-i Saul-aaq utertuq maligtellerminek David-aaq anguyagyarturluki Philistine-at. Taumek tauna nuna pilaqiit Avvucaraq Qemiq.
David-aaq-llu ayiimi ayagtuq nuniinun Engedi-m, tuani-llu iirumaurluni.
Saul-aaq utercan anguyallerminek Philistine-at, qanrutaat David-aaq uitaniluku yuilqumi Engedi-m yaaqsinrilkiini.
Saul-aaq malilirluni tiissitsaanek pingayunek (3,000) assinqurritnek anguyagtet Israel-aami yuaryarturait David-aankut anguyagtai-llu calaralirnerani atellget Nuyurtalriit Qusngirngalnguut Teggalqut.
Tekituq qerranqumun mallgeskiitni qusngit casguita tumyaram mengliini iterluni-llu yuqerrnaluni. Cuna-wa waniwa qerranquq tauna David-aam anguyagtain-llu iirumaviat qamani iluqvani.
Qanrutaat, “Waniwa pillerkan!
Tau͡gaam David-aaq umyuarniunguq,
qanertuq-llu anguyagtem̄inun, “
Tua-i David-aam taringevkarai anguyagten̄i curugarkaunritniluku Saul-aaq.
Saul-aaq nangertuq, anluni qerranqumek, ayagluni-llu.
Nutaan David-aaq an'uq kingunrakun qayagaurluku-llu, “Elpet Ucurnarqellriami!” Saul-aaq kingyartuq, David-aaq-llu palurtuq nunamun qigcigyugluni
qanerluni-llu, “Ciin ukveqlarciki yuut qanelriit wangnun akngirtengnaqniluten?
Elpenek waniwa tangrran qerranqum

Tang, atamaa, tangrru una ulikutarpet ilii tegumiaqa! Tuqucugngallruyaaqamken, tau͡gaam kiingan uumek ilairutellruunga. Uum taringevkarliten wiinga umyuarteqenrilucimnek elpet ingluknaluten wall'u akngirrnaluten. Elpet pissuravnga tuqutnalua, wiinga camek assiitellriamek piksailengramken.
Kitaki
Nallunritan avaken qanruyun, ‘Assiilnguq atularaat kiimeng assiilnguut yuut.’ Taumek wiinga akngirrngailkemken.
Tangrru angayuqran Israel-aam tuqutengnaqkengaa! Tangrru malirqerakengaa! Tuqumalria qimugta, ungilagliar!
cuqciciquq, ellii-llu nallunairiciquq nalirpuk alarucianek. Kitaki man'a yuvriqiliu, ikayurlua, anirturlua-llu wiinga elpenek.”
David-aaq taqngan qanenermek, Saul-aaq qanertuq, “Ilumun-qaa elpenguuten, David-aaq qetunramni?” Qiangarrluni-llu.
Tua-llu qanertuq David-aamun, “Elluarrluten piuten, wiinga-llu alarrlua. Cakneq assirlua pillruarpenga, wiinga assiitellriamek cakneq taquteng'e'rma elpenun!
Mat'umi ernermi manian assilria calian wangnun, tuqutenrilavnga,
Qavcirqunek kia ingluni pitaqerraarluku ayagcetenqigtelartau akngirtevkenaku?
Waniwa ilumunqaartua angayuqrurtarkaucivnek Israel-aamun angayuqauvik-llu ciumuugarkaucia atanirturiluten elpet.
Tau͡gaam akqia
David-aaq akqiuq tuaten piciqniluni.
Tua-i-llu Saul-aaq kingunerminun uterrluni, David-aankut-llu anguyagten̄i-llu uterrluteng iirumavimeggnun.
Samuel-aaq tuquuq, Israel-aam-llu yuin tamarmeng quyurrluteng angniilutkaat. Tua-i-llu qunguulluku nuniinun Ramah-mi.
Mat'um kinguani, David-aaq ayagtuq yuilqurtaanun Paran-aam.

Angutetangqellruuq ilakellriarinek Caleb-aam aterluni Nabal-amek, kingunengqerrluni nunarriinek Maon-am, nunauterluni-llu yaaqsinrilkiini nunarraam Carmel-aam. Angun una tukuuqapiarluni, pikistekluku tiissitsaat pingayun (3,000) qusngit tiissitsaat-llu (1,000) qusngirngalnguut. Nulirra Abigail-aq kenegnaqapiartuq elisngalriaruluni-llu, tau͡gaam ellii angun umyuarrliqellriaruuq, qenngalriaruluni-llu.
Nabal-aq kepliarillruuq qusngiutminek Carmel-aami,
David-aam-llu, yuilqumtellriim, man'a niitaa,
taumek ayagceciuq qulnek ayagyuanek angutnek ellimerrluki ayaasqelluki Carmel-aamun, yuaresqelluku Nabal-aq, aryuqutmek-llu ellminek kingunelegmek qanrutesqelluku.
Elliin alerquagai waten Nabal-aq qanrucesqelluku: “David-aam aryuqutmek tuyuraaten, yugnikekmaa, umyuaqutkegtaarmek piluten, nakmiin-llu ilaten, tamalkuita-llu cat piuteten.

Niituq asmegciniluten qusngivnek, nallunricesqumaaten-llu qusngiliurteten wangkutni uitallruniluki wangkuta-llu picurlallrunritaput. Ca-llu ellaita piat teglegumallrunrituq Carmel-aami uitallrata taktaciatun.

Apeskiki, ellaita qanruciiqaatgen. Taigukut kalukaryarami, David-aam-llu apelciraaten ciuniunqegcaaraasqelluta. Taumek cikirkut wangkuta kevgarpeni pikangqerrutacirpetun yugnikek'ngavnun-llu David-aamun.”
David-aam anguyagtain qanrutkaat man'a qanrutkarkaq Nabal-amun David-aam atrakun. Utaqaluteng-llu tuani,
Nabal-aq-llu kiuyaqlirtuq, “David-aaq-qaa? Kituuga tauna? Ciungani niiteksaitua taumek! Makuni ernerni nuna man'a muirumauq ayakallernek pisten̄ek!
Wiinga tegungaitanka kelipautenka mer'utkaa-llu, ungungssit-llu tuqurqellrenka qusnginek kepliartemnun pikisqelluki, tunluki-llu yugnun taillernun naken kingunengqerruciinateng!”
David-aam anguyagtai utertut elliinun qanrulluku-llu Nabal-am qanellranek.

“Naqugci nuussirpagpecen̄ek!” ellimerrai, tamarmeng-llu tuaten piut. David-aaq-llu cali ellii naqugtuq nuussirpaminek ayagluteng-llu yuinarnek yuinarnek (400) nuniini anguyagtem̄inek maligluni, unilluki yuinaat qulen (200) kingunemeggnun akluliurtelluki.

Pistain Nabal-am iliit qanertuq Nabal-am nulirranun Abigail-amun, “Niitellruuten-qaa? David-aaq taivkariuq kevganek yuilqumek kingunerluteng aryuqutmek tuyurluku atanerruaput, tau͡gaam elliin ciuniucurlagai.
Tau͡gken ellait wangkutnun assirluteng pillruut; qaillukuaqallrunritaakut, ilakurallemten̄i-llu yuilqumi, ca wangkutnek pikestelek teglegumallrunrituq.
Camun pinayukluta murilkellruitkut ernermi unugtuumaan ilalillemta taktaciatun qaunqelluki katngaput.
Kitak man'a umyuangcauskiu nallunairluten-llu qaillun pillerkarpenek. Man'a assiitqapiarciqsugnarquq atanerruamten̄un tamalkuitnun-llu nakmiin ilainun. Umyuarrliqsiiyaagami kina maligtaqungaitaa!”

Abigail-aq cukangnaqluni quyurciuq yuinarnek qulnek (200) kelipanek, malrugnek qeciignek caqutegnek muirumalutek wine-amek, tallimanek kelipimalrianek qusnginek, malrugnek cuqegnek kelipimalrianek mukaarkanek, yuinarnek tallimanek (100) qillerqanek issuumayagarnek, qulnek-llu yuinarnek (200) kinertarnek fig-anek, atmiulluki-llu ciulvagnun.
Qanrutai-llu pistet, “Ciumek ayagci maligciiqamci.” Tau͡gaam camek uini qanrutevkenaku.
Ayainanermini qemiq uivluku alqunaq igvaartai David-aaq anguyagtai-llu tungminun tailriit.
David-aaq umyuartequ'urallruluni, “Ciin-kiq qaunqellrusia au͡g'um angutem aklui maani yuilqumi? Ca-llu elliin pia teglegumallruvkenani, waten tua-lli-wa ayuqellriakun akinauqiinga ikayullemnek!
Agayutem yaggviklua tuquskilia tuqutenrilkumki tamaq'apiaraita au͡gkut anguyagtet unuakuurpailgan!”
Abigail-am tangrramiu David-aaq, atraqertuq aqumgaviminek nunamun-llu palurrluni
David-aam it'gainun, qanerluni-llu elliinun, “Kitaki niicugninga! Wiinga avalitngunaurtua.
Ilangcivkenaku uitasgu Nabal-aq, camun atuunrilnguq! At'mi kangia atuq'apiararaa — usvitunrilnguq!
tauna akinaurcetenritevkallren tuqutenritevkartiit-llu inglukestevvet. Akqiunga waniwa unguvalriakun
Kitaki, ciuniurru una cikiun taitelqa elpenun, tunluku-llu anguyagtevnun.
Kitaki-tang au͡g'arisnga, carraungraan picurlallemnek.
Kia imum curukaqaten tuqutengnaqluten-llu,
-llu tamalkuita pimarikaki assilriit akqutkellni elpenun angayuqaurrluten-llu Israel-aamun,
pinqigcuumirataiciiquten wall'u umyuarniurutaunak, tuqucillerpenek camek pitaunak wall'u umyuan aturluku akinaullerpenek.
David-aaq-llu qanertuq elliinun, “Nanraumali
Quyanarquq Agayun umyuaqegtaaravnek mat'umek-llu ernerpak caliarpenek wiinga aviullua tuqucillerkamnek wall'u umyuaqa aturluku akinaullerkamnek.
nayumiqallruanga akngircetevkenak. Tau͡gaam piciulriamek qanertua unguvalriakun Agayutiikun Israel-aam cukangnaqluten paiqallrunrilkuvnga, tamarmeng Nabal-am anguyagtai tuqutauyartut unuakullrani.”
Tua-i-llu David-aam ciuniurai taitellri ellminun qanerluni-llu elliinun, “Uterten kingunerpenun peng'garcaqunak-llu. Pisqumallren aturciqaqa.”
Abigail-aq utertuq Nabal-amun, enemini kalukalriamun angayuqam kalukalauciatun. Taangiqluni angnirluni-llu, tua-i camek qanrutenritaa unuaquan tau͡gaam.
Tua-i-llu, taangiqenrian, qanrutaa tamalkuitnek. Nal'aqertuq-llu temii pekcesciiganani.
Erenret-llu tayima qulen kinguatni
David-aam niicami Nabal-aq tuquniluku, qanertuq, “Nanraumali
Tua-i-llu, David-aaq ayagceciuq qanermek kassuucugluku Abigail-aq.
Pistain ullagaat Carmel-aami qanrulluku-llu, “David-aam taivkaraakut ellminun taicesqelluten nuliqsugluten.”
Abigail-aq palurtuq nunamun qanerluni-llu, “Wiinga kevgaugua elliinun, upingalua pistain it'gaitnek erurillerkamnun.”
Egmian nangertuq ekluni-llu ciulvaminun. Maligluni tallimanek kevgaminek, maligtai David-aam pistai, David-aam-llu nuliqsagutaa.
David-aaq nulirtullruuq Ahinoam-aamek Jezreel-armiumek, tua-i-llu cali waniwa Abigail-aq nuliqsagulluku.
Tamatum-llu nalliini, Saul-aam tunellruluku panini Michal-aaq, David-aam nuliaqellra, Palti-mun qetunraanun Laish-aam, kingunelegmek nunarriinek Gallim-aam.
Angutet qavcin taigut Ziph-amek Saul-aamun Gibeah-mi qanrulluku-llu David-aaq iirumaniluku Ingrimi Hachilah-mi iquani Judea-m yuilqurtaan.
Egmian Saul-aaq ayagtuq maligluni pingayunek tiissitsaanek (3,000) assinqurraitnek anguyagtet Israel-aami yuilqurtaanun Ziph-am David-aaq yuaryarturluku,
qavartartut-llu tumyaram mengliini Ingrim Hachilah-m. David-aaq cali yuilqumlluni, nallunriami-llu Saul-aamun tailuku yuaryarturniluni,
ayagceciuq aassaqu'urluteng nallunringnaqerkanek, nallunrirtuq-llu ilumun Saul-aam tuantellinicianek.

Egmian ayagtuq nallunairluku-llu naniqapiar uitacia Saul-aankuq Abner-aaq-llu qetunraan Ner-am, atanerruarata Saul-aam anguyagtain, qavartarviak. Saul-aaq qavartuq qavartarvimeggni, anguyagtai-wa avatiini.
Tua-llu David-aam aptak Abimelech-aaq Hittite-aq, Abishai-aq-llu anelgutii Joab-am (aanalutek Zeruiah-mek), “Nalirpetek maligciiqanga Saul-aam qavartarvianun?”
“Wii piciqua,” Abishai-aq kiuguq.

Tua-i tuani unugmi David-aankuk Abishai-aq-llu itertuk Saul-aam qavartarvianun tangrraak-llu Saul-aaq qavarluni qavartarvimeng qukaani panani kapusngaluku nunamun qamiqumi canianun. Abner-aaq anguyagtet-llu qavarluteng avatiini.
Abishai-aq qanertuq David-aamun, “Agayutem inglun pinirpenun ellia atakurpak. Kitaki narulkautnauqa elliin nakmiin panaa anpaciluku pekviirluku nunamun ataucirqumek narulkarluku—Aipirinqiggviirluku!”
Tau͡gaam David-aaq qanertuq, “Akngirtarkaunritan!
Unguvalriakun
inerqurlia akngirtengnaqlerkaanek tauna elliin

Tua-i David-aam tegua panaq mervik-llu canik'acagaanek Saul-aam qamiquan, tua-i-llu elkek Abishai-aq-llu ayaglutek. Kia tangenrritaa wall'u nallunrinritaa watnallrak wall'u kina tupagpek'nani—tamarmeng qavaryugluteng, tua-i-wa
Tua-i-llu David-aaq qerarluni akilirneranun kuignayuum pengum kangranun, yaaqsiggarluni pingailkiitnun,
qayagpagluni-llu Saul-aam anguyagtainun Abner-aamun-llu, “Abner-aaq! Niicugngaavnga-qaa!”
“Kina imna qayagpagalria tuparqelluku angayuqaq?” Abner-aaq kangingnaurtuq.
David-aaq kiuguq, “Abner-aaq, angenqurraunrituten-qaa yugni Israel-aami? Ciin-mi tua-i murilkenriciu camun pillerkaa angayuqerpet? Ava-i kina itellruuq qavartarvigpecen̄un tuqucarturluku angayuqan.
Elluarrluku caliaqenritan caliarkan, Abner! Piciulua qanertua unguvalriakun
Saul-aam elitaqaa David-aam erinii aptuq-llu, “David-aaq, elpenguuten-qaa, qetunramaa?”
“Aa-ang, Angayuqaaq,” David-aaq kiuguq.
Cali-llu ilaluku, “Ciin, tua-i cali malirqeraurcia, wiinga kevgavni? Camek pillrusia? Camek picurlagmek taqutellrusia?
Angayuqaaq, niicugniu qanerkaqa.
Tuqutauvkaryaqunii nunakumanrilngurmi, uitavikenrilkiini

Saul-aaq kiuguq, “Wiinga alarrlua piunga. Uterten, David-aaq, qetunramaa! Wiinga akngirtenqiggngaitamken, tua-i-wa unguvaka piunrinrilavgu mat'umi unugmi. Usviinii pillruunga. Angelriamek alartellruunga!”
David-aaq kiuguq, “Wani-wa panan, Angayuqaaq. Anguyagtevvet iliit taivkarluku aqvavkarru.
nunulilarai yuut ukvertulriit ellualriit-llu. Ernerpak paivcaaqaten wangnun, tau͡gaam wiinga akngirtenritamken, elpet
Ernerpak unguvan piunrillrunrilucimtun, tuaten-llu
Saul-aaq qanertuq David-aamun, “Agayutem atawaqertelliten, qetunramaa! Piluaqerciquten callerpeni tamaitni!”
Tua-i David-aaq ayagtuq, Saul-aaq-llu uterrluni kinguneminun.
David-aaq ellminek qanrutuq, “Erenret makut iliitni Saul-aam tuquciiqaanga. Assinruciquq wangnun qimakuma Philistia-mun. Saul-aam yuanrirniaraanga Israel-aami, wiinga-llu camek aarniunritniartua.”
Tua-i David-aaq anguyagten̄i-llu tiissitsaam avga yuinarnek tallimanek cipluku (600) amllertalriit egmian ayagtut Achish-amun qetunraanun Moach-am, angayuqranun Gath-am.

David-aaq anguyagten̄i-llu nunalgartut tuani Gath-ami nakmiin ilateng ilakluki. David-aam nuliagni malruk malikak, Ahinoam-aaq Jezreel-armiu, Abigail-aq-llu, aipaineq Nabal-am kingunra, Carmel-aarmiu.
Saul-aam niicami David-aaq qimallruniluku Gath-amun, taqaa yuanermek.
David-aaq qanertuq Achish-amun, “Yugnikekuvnga, nunacuarmek cikirnga uitavigkamnek. Canricaaquq, wiinga uitallgutkenrilengramken atanruvigmi nunarpagmi.”
Tua-i Achish-am cikiraa nunacuarmek Ziklag-amek, man'a-llu pitekluku Ziklag-aq nakmiillaqaat angayuqrin Judah-m tuakenirnek.
David-aaq Philistia-mi uitallruuq iraluni akimiaq ataucimek cipluku.

Tamatum nalliini David-aam anguyagten̄i-llu curulallruit yui Geshur-aam, Girzi-m, Amalek-aam-llu, tamakumiungumallret nunami ak'anun. Alangiilluki curugaqluki nunait yaaqsilria Shur-aq tekilluku, ak'akik-llu camavet Egypt-aamun,
tuqurqelluki tamalkuita angutet arnat-llu tegularluki-llu qusngit, kuluviit angucalut, ciulviit, qulugtellriit-llu ungungssit, aturaungraata-llu. Utertaqluni Achish-amun,
taum aptaqluku, “Natmun maa-irpak ayallrusit?” David-aam-llu qanrulluku ayallruniluni ungalalirneranun Judah-m wall'u nunautiitnun ilakellriarin Jerahmeel-am wall'u nunautiitnun Kenite-at uitaviata.

David-aam tuqurqaqluki yuut tamalkuita, angutet arnat-llu, kina uterrluku Gath-amun qanemcisqevkenaku qaillun anguyagten̄i-llu piqapiarallratnek. Waten waniwa David-aaq pillrulliniuq Philistia-mi uitallmi taktaciatun.
Achish-am kemyukaa David-aaq qanrulluni, “Cakneq eq'ukumallni pitekluku nakmiin yum'inek Israelite-anek qaillun piviinani kevgiurciqaanga unguvallmi taktaciatun.”
Tamatum kinguani Philistine-at quyurtait anguyagteteng anguyagnaluku Israel-aaq, Achish-aq-llu qanertuq David-aamun, “Taringumakina anguyagteten-llu callugarkaucirci wiinga ililirlua.”
“Aa-ang,” David-aaq kiuguq. “Wiinga kevgaqerpenga, tungaunaku-llu tangerciqan qaillun piyugngalqa.”
Achish-aq qanertuq, “Assilliniuq! Nakmiin wiinga murilkesteksaguteqataramken.”

Wani-wa Samuel-aaq tuqullruuq, tamarmeng-llu Israel-aat angniilutkellruluku tungmaggluku-llu Ramah-mun, nakmiin nuniinun. Saul-aam-llu antellrui ciunerkarcutulit angalkumirtaatulit-llu Israel-aamek anesqelluki.
Philistine-at anguyagtet quyurtut pelatekiurluteng-llu yaaqsinrilkiinun nunarraam Shunem-aam; Saul-aam-llu quyurtai Israel-aam yui pelatekiurluteng-llu Ingrimi Gilboa-mi.
Saul-aam tangllermini anguyagtait Philistine-at, cakneq alinguq,
taumek aptaa
Tua-llu Saul-aam ellimerrai atanerruani, “Kiarucia arnamek ciunerkarcurtem̄ek, wiinga ullagluku apqauryarturniarqa.”
“Endor-ami ataucimek pitangqertuq,” ellait kiugut.

Tua-i Saul-aaq nallunarcartuq ellminek; allanek aturanek at'uq, tan'gerian-llu ayagtuq malrugnek anguyagtegminek maligluni arnaq tangerrsarturluku. “Kangiituucisnga anernernun qanrullua-llu qaillun piarkamek,” tauna qanrutaa, “Qayagaurru anernera angutem aterpagtellma.”

Tauna arnaq kiuguq, “Ilumun nallunritan Angayuqam Saul-aam qaillun pillrucia, qaillun qessangraata ayagcetellrucianek ciunerkarcutulit angalkumirtaatulit-llu Israel-aamek. Ciin-mi, tua-i, napcetengnaqlua tuqutauvkangnaqsia?”
Tua-i-llu Saul-aam arnaq akqaa, “Unguvalriakun
“Kitumek qayagaurutqatarciken?” tauna arnaq aptuq.
“Samuel-aamek,” ellii kiuguq.
Arnam tangrramiu Samuel-aaq, aarpagtuq qanerluni-llu Saul-aamun, “Ciin picirkartuyarucia? Elpet Angayuqauguten Saul-aaq!”
“Alingenrilu!” angayuqam qanrutaa. “Camek tangercit?”
“Tangertua anernermek pugelriamek nunamek,” arnaq kiuguq.
“Qaillun tangellra ayuqa?” aptaa.
“Angukara'urluuguq alailria,” kiuguq. “Ulikutamek aturluni.”
Tua-i Saul-aam nallunriraa Samuel-aarucia, palurtuq-llu nunamun qigcigyugluni.
Samuel-aaq qanertuq Saul-aamun, “Ciin uitacurlagcecia? Ciin utercecia?”

Saul-aaq kiuguq, “Wiinga angtuamek arenqiallugingaunga! Philistine-at anguyagaatnga, Agayutem-llu cakaarlua. Kiunanrirlua, prophet-aatgun, qavangutgun-llu. Taumek qayagauqemken, elpenun qanrucesqellua qaillun pillerkamnek.”
Samuel-aaq qanertuq, “Ciin qayagaurcia
piaten qanrutlerminek elpet tumeklua: tegullrua angayuqauvik elpenek tunluku-llu David-aamun.
Elpet narurtellruan
Tunciqaatek elpet Israel-aaq-llu Philistine-anun. Unuaqu qetunraten-llu ullagciqerpecia, cali-llu Israel-aam anguyagtai
Egmianun Saul-aaq iquuq nengingaluni-llu nunami, cakneq alingluni Samuel-aam qanrutellranek. Pinianani, camek nereksailami ernerpak unugpak-llu.
Arnam-llu ullagaa tangerrluku-llu alingqapiarallra, taumek qanrutaa, “Kitaki, angayuqaaq, unguvaka qevvluku pisqellerpetun pillruunga.
Niiskiu pisqelqa. Neqkiuqerlaken. Nernarqaaten piningqerrniartuten pektaullerpeni.”
Saul-aaq niicuumiituq qanerluni-llu ellii camek nerngaitniluni. Tau͡gaam atanerruarin kiikirturaat neresqelluku. Cayaqlirluni tua-i niituq, nangertuq-llu nunamek, aqumluni-llu inglernun.
Arnam cukangnaqluni tuqutaa kuluvayagaq uqungcallni. Mukaamek-llu piluni, uptaa, kelipiluni-llu quleciryaraunaku.
Ellii neqet Saul-aam atanerruarin-llu ciuqerratnun, nerait-llu. Ayagluteng-llu tuani unugmi.
Philistine-at quyurtait tamalkuita anguyagteteng Aphek-aamun, Israel-aam yui pelatekiurumallratni ulevlami Jezreel-am Kuignayuani.

Talliman Philistine-at angayuqrit ayagtut anguyagteteng-llu ilait yuinaat tallimaugaqluteng (100) tiissitsaaruaqluteng-llu (1,000) anguyagtet; David-aaq anguyagten̄i-llu ayagtut kingunratgun maliggluku Angayuqaq Achish-aq.
Philistine-at atanirturtaita tangrrait apluteng-llu, “Caliat makut Hebrew-t maani?”
Achish-aq kiuguq, “Una David-aaruuq, atanerruara Angayuqam Saul-aam Israel-aami. Nayullrurtaanga akaarnun maa-i. Camek taquteksaituq canganarqutkaminek tairraanerminek wangnun.”

Tau͡gaam Philistine-at atanerruarita qenrutaat Achish-aq qanerluteng-llu elliinun, “Utercessgu tauna angun nunakiutellerpenun. Maligcecaqunata anguyagyartuqumta; anguyausnginanemten̄i ingluksagucuaraakut. Cakun-qaa allakun angayuqaminun cayuumaksagutenqigtellerkaituq tuqurqillermikun tau͡gaam anguyagtemten̄ek?
