Tua-i-wa, una imuuguq David-aaq, arnat atuutekellrat, yurarluteng tuaten, ‘Saul-aaq tuquciuq tiissitsaarugarnek (1,000s), tau͡gaam David-aaq qulnguaqluki tiissitsaarugaat.’” (10,000s)

Achish-am taisqaa David-aaq qanrulluku-llu, “Piciulua qanertua unguvalriakun Agayutiikun Israel-aam elpet piciullruniluten wangnun; quyalua-llu maliksaramken callugyarturlua anguyagmi. Camek picurlautmek nataquteksaitua elpeni tairraanerpenek wangnun. Tau͡gaam allat angayuqat ciuniunritaatgen.
Taumek uterten kingunerpenun nepaunak, camek-llu taqucaqunak umyugaita qiperrlutekaatnek.”

David-aaq-llu kiuguq, “Camek picurlallrusia? Tua-i qanllerpetun, camek nataquteksailkuvet picurlallemnek wangni ernermek ayaglua kevgiungerraanemnek, ciin maligcesciigacia elpet, angayuqamni, callugluki-llu ingluten?”
“Wiinga umyuallguciramken,” Achish-aq kiuguq. “Wiinga umyuarteqlemni piciuguten an'gilaatun Agayutem. Tau͡gaam allat angayuqat qanertut maligcesciigatniluta anguyagmun.
Taumek, David-aaq, unuaqu unuakumi elpeci tamarpeci Saul-aaq unilluku taillerni wangnun makcara'arluci tanqigiarauciatun ayakici.”
Tua-i David-aaq anguyagten̄i-llu ayagyara'artut unuaquan unuakumi uterrluteng Philistia-mun, Philistine-at-llu ciumurrluteng Jezreel-amun.
Erenrek malruk kinguagni David-aaq anguyagten̄i-llu tekitut Ziklag-amun. Amalekite-at curullrulliniat ungalalirnera Judah-m anguyagluku-llu Ziklag-aq. Ekuavkarluku-llu nunarraq
teguluki-llu arnat tamalkuita; kitumek tuqucillruvkenateng, tau͡gaam yuut ayaulluki tamalkuita ayiimeng.
Tua-llu David-aaq anguyagten̄i-llu tekicameng, tangrraat nunarraq ekuamaluni nulirrit-llu, qetunrait, paniit-llu ayautellrulliniluki.
David-aaq anguyagten̄i-llu qiagut mernupiangameng tau͡gaam taqluteng.
David-aam-llu nuliak malruk tamarmek ayautellrullinilukek.
David-aaq tua-i waniwa arenqiallugterpagtuq, tamarmeng anguyagten̄i angtuamek angniilata irniameggnek tamarilteng pitekluku, akeqnerrlualuku-llu teggalqunek miluquyugluku; tau͡gaam
David-aaq-llu qanertuq Abiathar-amun agayulirtem̄un qetunraanun Abimelech-aam, “Taisgu as'arcen̄a'ar qat'gailitaq,” Abiathar-am-llu taitaa elliinun.
David-aam-llu kangiiturvikaa
Ellii kiuguq, “Kingunrirturki; anguciqaten anauciiqaten-llu teguat.”
Tua-i David-aaq anguyagten̄i-llu tiissitsaam avga yuinarnek tallimanek cipluku (600) ayagtut, tekicameng-llu Kuiggarmun Besor-amun, ilait tuavet unegtut.
Tua-i David-aaq arulairpek'nani ayagtu'rtuq maligluni yuinarnek yuinarnek (400) anguyagten̄ek; allat yuinaat qulen (200) mernussiyaagameng qerallerkameggnek kuicuar unegtut.
Anguyagtet David-aam malii nalaqutut Egypt-aarmiumek ayagyuamek yuilqumi David-aamun-llu ullaulluku. Cikiraat neqkamek mermek-llu,
kinertarnek-llu fig-anek, malrugnek-llu qillerqaagnek issuumanek. Nererraarluni, piniriqertuq; camek nereksaitellrulliniuq wall'u meqsaunani ernerni pingayuni.
David-aam aptaa, “Kituuga angayuqan, camiungusit-llu?”
“Egypt-aarmiunguunga, pisten͞gulua Amalekite-amun,” kiuguq. “Angayuqama unitellruanga amatiinim yaatiini naulluulqa pitekluku.
Curugluku uayallruaput nunautiit Cherethite-at ungalalirnerani Judah-m nunautiit-llu ilakellriarin Caleb-aam, ekuavkallruaput-llu Ziklag-aq.”
“Ayaucugngaavnga-qaa taukunun uayaaristen̄un?” David-aam aptaa.
Ellii kiuguq, “Piciqamken Agayutem atrakun akqekuvnga tuqusngaitnilua wall'u tunngaitnilua angayuqamnun.”
Ayautaa-llu David-aaq taukunun.
Uayaaristet uitaut sagingaluteng tamaani, nerluteng, merluteng, angnirluteng-llu amlleqapiaraat tegukengateng pitekluki Philistia-mek Judah-mek-llu.

Erqaarallrani unuaquan David-aam curugai anguyagluki-llu atakurvianun. Taukut-llu yuinaat yuinaat (400) yun'erraat qulugtellrianun ungungssinun ekluteng ayakallret avatiitni, kitumek qimagluni ayalriartaituq.
David-aam anirturai yuut tamalkuita pikliutenqiggluki-llu tamalkuita aklut-llu Amalek-aat tegullrit, nuliagni-llu malruk tapeqlukek;
ca carraungermi cataitevkenani. David-aam ut'rutai tamalkuita anguyagtem̄i qetunrait paniit-llu, aklut-llu tamalkuita Amalek-aat tegullrit.
Tegunqigtai-llu tamalkuita katngiit; anguyagtain ayautait ungungssit tamalkuita ciuqliqluki qanertut-llu, “Ukut David-aamek pikestengqertut!”

Tua-llu David-aaq utertuq imkunun yuinarnun qulnun (200) angutnun piniatessiyaagluteng maligucesciiganateng unegtellernun kuicuarmi Besor Brook-ami. Taigut-llu pairrsaagluki David-aankut anguyagtai-llu, David-aam-llu ciuniurai angnirluni.
Tau͡gaam umyuarrliqellriit pikegtaunrilnguut-llu anguyagtet David-aam malillri qanertut, “Maligtellrunrilatkut, cikirngaitaput ilaitnek uayaaramta. Tegurraarluki nuliateng irniateng-llu ayagniartut.”
Tau͡gaam David-aaq kiuguq, “Anelgutemni, waten pinarqenrituci
Kia imum ciuniurngaitaa qanelci! Tamarmeng tuvqakutarkaugut: kina imna uneggluni aklut nayullrukaki ayuqluku cikiumaciquq pikaanek ayagluni anguyalleq pitacirluku.”
David-aaq mat'umek picirkiutmek taqutuq, tuakenirnek-llu piciryaraqluku Israel-aami.
David-aaq utercami Ziklag-amun, ayauceciuq tegukengameng ilaitnek yugnikek'ngaminun, ciuliqagtainun Judah-m, qanercirluki, “Wani-wa cikiun elpecen̄un uayaaramten̄ek
Ayaucetai Bethel-aam yuinun, Ramah-m yuinun ungalalirnerani Judah-m, nunarraat-llu yuitnun Jattir-aami,
Aroer-aami, Siphmoth-aami, Eshtemoa-mi,
Racal-aami-llu; ilakellriarinun Jerahmeel-am, Kenite-anun,
yuinun-llu nunarraitni Hormah-m, Borashan-aam, Athach-aam,
Hebron-aam-llu. Ayagceciuq tamalkuitnun nunanun anguyagten̄i-llu ayagavillermeggnun.
Philistine-at anguyagtut inglukluki Israel-aat Ingrimi Gilboa-mi. Amlleret Israel-aam yui tuani tuqucimaut, ilait-llu, Angayuqaq Saul-aaq qetunrai-llu ilakluki qimagtut.
Tau͡gaam Philistine-at anguluki pingayun Saul-aam qetunrai tuqutait, Jonathan-aaq, Abinadab-aq, Malchishua-llu.
Callullrat tukniuq Saul-aam avatiini, ellii-llu nall'artaat ingluin pitegcautiita cakneq akngirrluku.

Qanrutaa-llu yun'erraq saskumi tegumiaqestiit, “Amuluku nuussirpiin tuqusnga, makut agayumanrilnguut Philistine-at ciriteklua tuqutenritniaraatnga.” Tau͡gaam yun'erraq tuaten pillerkaminek alingeqapiartuq. Taumek Saul-aam nakmiin nuussirpani tegua ellminek-llu tuavet iqullu­ni.
Yun'erraam tangrramiu Saul-aam tuqucia, ellii-llu iqullu­ni nakmiin nuussirpaminun tuqullgutekluku-llu Saul-aaq.
Tua-i tuaten Saul-aaq, pingayun qetunrai, yun'erraq-llu tuqullruut; tamarmeng Saul-aam anguyagtai tuquluteng tuani ernermi.

Tua-i Israel-aam yui akilirnerani Kuignayuan Jazreel-aam calaralirnerani-llu Kuigem Jordan-aam niicameng Israel-aam yui anguyagtet qimagniluki Saul-aaq-llu qetunrai-llu tuquniluki, nunarrateng cakaarluki qimagtut. Philistine-at-llu tekilluteng nunarraat tamakut yiirait.
Unuaquani anguyallmeng Philistine-at ayagtut tuqumalriit uayaryarturluki akluitnek, nalaqait-llu Saul-aaq qetunrain-llu temait cailkami taklarmeng Ingrimi Gilboa-mi.
Qamiqurriraat Saul-aaq, akngircailkutairluku, kevganun-llu ayagatevkarluku Philistia-q qaqilluku qanrutkesqelluku qanemcikegtaar agayutnguaritnun yuitnun-llu.
Tua-i-llu saskui elliluki agayuvianun agayutnguarata arnam Astarte-am, ussukcaulluku-llu temii qacarnermun avapailitaanun nunarpiim Beth Shan-am.
Niitellermeggni yui Jabesh-aam Gilead-aami mat'umek Philistine-at pillratnek waten Saul-aamun,
alingilqurrait angutet ayagtut arulaiqsaunateng unugpak Beth Shan-amun. Atrartait temait Saul-aam qetunrain-llu qacarnermek, ut'rutait Jabesh-aamun, ekuavkarluki-llu tuani.
Enrit-llu teguluki elaulluki napacuaraam tamarisk-aam acianun nunarrarni, yagluteng-llu nereksaunateng ernerni malrunlegni.
Saul-aam tuqullran kinguani David-aaq utertuq cirlakraarluki Amalek-aam yui erenregni-llu malrugni uitaluni Ziklag-ami.

Unuaquan ayagyuaq angun tekituq Saul-aam yuilqumi uitavianek. Nasvagnaluku angniilucini aturani allgullruluki urr'amek-llu qamiquni elliivikluku. Ullagluku David-aaq ciktuq nunamun qigcikutni maniluku.
David-aam aptaa, “Naken taillrusit?”
“Ayakallruunga Israel-aam yuin uitaviatnek,” ellii kiuguq.
“Qanrusnga qaillun pillratnek,” David-aaq qanertuq.
“Anguyagteput qimallruut calluutellrianek,” tauna kiuguq, “amlleret-llu anguyagteput tuqucimaluteng. Saul-aankuk-llu qetunrani-llu Jonathan-aaq cali tuqucimallruuk.”
“Qaillun nallunriciu Saul-aankuk Jonathan-aaq-llu tuqullruciak?” David-aam aptaa.
Ellii kiuguq, “Ingrim Gilboa-m qaingantellruunga, tangellruaqa-llu Saul-aaq narulkarcuutminun aksaumaluni ayagassuutet-wa akalrialget horse-aatgun-llu pilriit ingluin kassugucartuqiit.
Tua-llu tuigtuq, tangerrlua-llu, qayagauraanga. Kiugaqa, ‘Aa-ang, wantua!’
Aptaanga kituucimnek, qanrutaqa-llu Amalekite-aunilua.
Tua-llu qanertuq, ‘Tailuten tuqusnga! Wiinga cakneq akngiringaunga, tuquqatarlua-llu.’
Tua-i ullagluku tuqutellruaqa, nallunrilamku tuquciqngan egmian iqukuni. Tua-i-llu teguluku nasqerrun qamiqurranek talliraq-llu tallianek, taitellruagka elpenun.”
David-aam aturani allgurai angniinani, tamarmeng-llu anguyagtai elliitun piluteng.
Iluteqluteng angniitut yagluteng-llu atakurnatkaanun Saul-aaq Jonathan-aaq Israel-aaq-llu pitekluki, yui
David-aam aptaa yun'erra'ar qanrucarturtellni qanemcimek, “Camiungusit?”
“Amalek-aaruunga, tau͡gaam nunavcen̄i uitalartua.”
David-aam aptaa, “Qaillun piluten alingunak tuquciu
Tua-llu David-aam anguyagtem̄i iliit qayagauraa qanerluni-llu, “Tuqusgu!” Taum anguyagtem kaugturaa Amalekite-aq akngirrluku egmirtelluku-llu,
qanrutaa-llu David-aam Amalek-aaq tauna, “Elpenek mat'umun tekiututen. Elpenek picurlaututen apervikuallerpeni tuqutellruniluku
David-aam atullrua man'a yuarun angniilun Saul-aamun qetunraanun-llu Jonathan-aamun,
alerquulluku-llu elitnaurutkesqelluku yuinun Judah-m. (Igausngauq
“Qaingatni Israel-aam qemiin ciuliqagteput tuquut!
Cacetunqurrait anguyagtemta iquut!
Qanruteksaqunaku Gath-ami
wall'u tumyaraini Ashkelon-aam.
Arnait Philistia-rmiut quyavkaryaqunaki;
paniit agayumanrilnguut nunaniryugcecaqunaciki.
“Ellalluk yukutaq-llu igtenrilli Gilboa-m ingriinun;
naucetaarvii-llu kesianek naugiyuilkilit!
Capkutait cacetulriit uitiita cailkami kasngunaqluteng;
capkutaa Saul-aam qevlercaumanrirtuq uqumek.
Jonathan-aam urluvra tuqunarqellruuq,
Saul-aam nuussirpii naklegitellruuq,
iqutaqluki pinilegpaulriit, tuqutaqluki inglut.
“Saul-aaq Jonathan-aaq-llu angnirnaqlutek kenegnaqlutek-llu;
quyurmek unguvami, quyurmek tuqumi;
cukanrulutek yaqulpagni, pininrulutek yugtutulini.
“Arnaini Israel-aam, angniilutkiciu Saul-aaq!
Aturirtuumallruaci akitulrianek kavirlinek taqmagnek
tangnirqucirluci-llu qevlialrianek suulutaanek-llu.
“Cacetulriit anguyagtet iqucimaut,
tuqucimaluteng anguyagmi.
Jonathan-aaq taklauq tuqumaluni qemini.
“Angniilutkamken, anelgutmaa Jonathan-aaq;
kenegnarqellruuten wangni!
assiqapigtellruuq kenken wangnun,
assinruluni-llu kenkutiini arnam.
“Cacetulriit anguyagtet iquut,
saskuit cakaarumaut atuunrirluteng.”
Mat'um kinguakun, David-aam aptaa
“Aa-ang,”
“Naliat?” David-aaq aptuq.
“Hebron-aaq.”
David-aaq tua-i ayagtuq Hebron-aamun, maliklukek malruk nuliagni: Ahinoam-aaq, Jezreel-armiulleq, Abigail-aq-llu Nabal-am aipainra, Carmel-aarmiulleq.
Cali-llu malikai anguyagten̄i nakmiin-llu ilait, nunalgarrluteng-llu nunarrarnun Hebron-aam avatiinun.
Tua-i-llu Judah-m yui tekilluteng Hebron-aamun uqumek mingugaat David-aaq angayuqaurrluku Judah-mun.
Niitellermini David-aaq yugnun Jabesh-aami Gilead-aamelngurmi tungmagtellrucia Saul-aaq,
ayagceciuq anguyagtet ilaitnek qanerkirluki: “
Watua-llu
Piniqici cacetuluci-llu! Angayuqerci Saul-aaq tuquuq, yuin-llu Judah-m uqumek mingullruatnga ellaita angayuqaqsagullua.”
Atanerruarat Saul-aam anguyagtain, Abner-aaq qetunraa Ner-am, qimallruuq Saul-aam qetunraanek Ishbosheth-amek maligluni Jordan-aam akianun Mahanaim-amun.
Tuani Abner-aam angayuqrurtaa Ishbosheth-aaq nunautainun Gilead-aam, Asher-aam, Jezreel-am, Ephraim-aam, Benjamin-aam-llu, tamiini-llu Israel-aami.
Ellii yuinaagnek malrugnek (40) allrakungellruuq angayuqrurtellermini Israel-aamun, atanirturiluni-llu allrakugni malrugni.
Tau͡gaam yuullgutkellriari Judah-m maligtaat David-aaq,
atanirturaa-llu Hebron-aamlluni tamalkuan Judah malrunlegni avegmek cipluku allrakuni.
Abner-aaq atanerruari-llu Ishbosheth-aam ayagtut Mahanaim-amek nunarpiinun Gibeon-aam.
Joab-aq, aanalek Zeruiah-mek, allat-llu David-aam anguyagtain atanerruarin paiqerait nanvarra'armi, tuani-llu tamarmeng aqumut, Israel-aam yui ukalirnermun Judah-m-llu yui akilirnermun.
Abner-aaq qanertuq Joab-amun, “Kitaki yun'erraat ilait akiqliitnun saskutgun anagtassiigutevkaqerlaut.”
“Kitaki,” Joab-aq kiuguq.
Tua-i qula malrugnek cipluku (12) angutet, Ishbosheth-aamek ilakellriartain Benjamin-aam, callugait qula malrugnek cipluku David-aam yui.

Tamarmeng ingluteng qamiqurritgun tegularait kap'lerulluku-llu nuussirpani caniqerranun inglumi, tua-i yuinaq cetamanek cipluku (24) tamarmeng iquut tuquluteng ataucikun. Taumek nuna tauna Gibeon-aami atengqellria “Nuussirpiit Nuniit.”
Tua-llu tuknilria anguyak ayagnirtuq, Abner-aaq-llu Israel-aam-llu yui cirlakait David-aam anguyagtain.
Pingayun qetunrai Zeruiah-m tuantut: Joab-aq, Abishai, Asahel-aaq-llu. Asahel-aaq, aqvaquryugngalriim cukataluni yuilqurmiutartun tuntutun,
malirqeraa Abner-aaq, aqvaqurluni ciuneqluku ullagluku.
Abner-aaq kingyarluni qanertuq, “Elpenguuten-qaa, Asahel-aaq?”
“Aa-ang,” kiuguq.
“Malirqanrilnga!” Abner-aaq qanertuq, “Malirqerru anguyagtet iliit teguluku-llu ca tegumiara.” Tau͡gaam Asahel-aam taqevkenani malirqeraa.
Pulenglluni Abner-aam qanrutaa, “Malirqaranrirnga! Ciin tuqucetengnaqu'urcit wangnun? Qaillun tangerrsugngaciqsia anelguten Joab-aq?”

Tau͡gaam Asahel-aaq taqsunrituq; tua-i Abner-aam, tunutmun kap'lerulluku narulkarcuutni, aqsiigken'gun nall'artaa narulkarcuun tunuakun anqertelluku. Asahel-aaq-llu nunamun ayaluqertuq tuquluni, tamarmeng-llu tuavet tekitellriit taklavianun arulairluteng tuavet nangengqalartut.
Tau͡gaam Joab-ankuk Abishai-aq-llu kingunrirturaak Abner-aaq, akertem-llu tevillrani tekituk qemianun Ammah-m, keggaknelirneranelnguum Giah-m tumyaraani yuilqurtaanun Gibeon-aam.
Angutet ilakellgutkelriartainek Benjamin-aam quyurtut Abner-aam avatiinun ataam nangerrluteng-llu qemim kangranun.

Abner-aaq qayagaurtuq Joab-amun, “Callugturqatartukut-qaa imumirpak? Tangerciigatan-qaa iquani neqnialngurtun ayuqerkaucia? Wangkuta ilakutaqavkut. Qaku anguyagteten alerquqatarciki malirqanermek taqesqelluta?”
“Piciulua qanertua unguvalriakun Agayutkun,” Joab-aq kiuguq, “qanenrilkuvet, anguyagtem̄a malirqerturyaraatgen unuakuurrnatkaanun.”
Tua-llu Joab-am cupu'uryaraq cupaa nallunailkutaqluku arulairesqelluki kingunrirtunermek Israel-aam yui; tua-i-llu anguyallrat arulairtuq.
Abner-aaq anguyagten̄i-llu eglertut Jordan Valley-kun taumi unugmi; qerarluku Jordan-aaq Kuik, eglerqaarluteng-llu unuaquan unuakumi, tekitut kingunermeggnun Mahanaim-amun.
Joab-am taqngameng malirqanermek, yun'i tamalkuita quyurtai nallunrirluni-llu yuinaunritaraan cataitellinilriit, ilaluteng Asahel-aamek.
David-aam anguyagtain tuqutellrulliniit yuinaat akimiaret yuinarnek pingayunek cipluki (360) Abner-aam yui ilakellgutkelriarinek Benjamin-aam.
Joab-am anguyagten̄i-llu teguat Asahel-aam temii tungmaggluku-llu ilakellriit tungmagciviatnun Bethlehem-aami. Egilraurluteng-llu unugpak erqaarallrani-llu kingunilluteng Hebron-aamun.
Callugturallrat ukut inglukellriit anausngastain Saul-aam nakmiin ilai, anausngastain-llu David-aam ak'anun pimallrulliniuq. David-aam piniriinallra maliggluku, inglukestai piniarusngiinallruut.
Ukut arvinelgen qetunrai, tungliqutacirmegcetun yuurtellermeggni, yuurtellruut David-aamun Hebron-aami: Amnon-aaq, aanaluni Ahinoam-aamek, Jezreel-armiumek;
Chileab-aaq, aanaluni Abigail-amek, Nabal-am aipainranek, Carmel-aarmiunek; Absalom-aaq-llu, aanaluni Maacah-mek, panianek Angayuqam Talmai-am Gesher-aarmium;
Adonijah-q, aanaluni Haggith-aamek; Shephatiah-q aanaluni Abital-aamek;
Ithream-aq-llu, aanaluni Eglah-mek. Tamarmeng ukut qetunrai yuurtellruut Hebron-aami.
Callugturallrat taqeksaunani ayagturallrani David-aam Saul-aam-llu nakmiin ilain anguyagtain, Abner-aaq piniriinartuq Saul-aam maligcestaini.
Erenret iliitni Ishbosheth-aam Saul-aam qetunraan Abner-aaq piciliraa tut'ellruniluku Saul-aam nulirruara Rizpah, pania Aiah-m.

Mat'umek piterluni Abner-aaq cakneq qenertuq. “Umyuartequten-qaa nalluani piciunritlemkun Saul-aaq akngirrnayukluku? Ilumun-qaa umyuartequten kevgiuryukluku Judah?” ellii qanlertuq. “Piqarraamek ayaglua piciullruunga atavnun Saul-aamun tusngalrianun, anelgutainun, yugnikek'ngainun-llu, cirlakevkanrilkurcetellruamken-llu David-aamun; tau͡gken ernerpak picurlautmek nataqututen wangni arnamek picirluten!

akqaa David-aaq angayuqauvik Saul-aamek kinguvrinek-llu teguciqniluku David-aamun-llu ataniurceciiqnilukek tamarkegenka Israel-aaq Judah-llu, nuniita iquanek ayagluku iquanun. Waniwa Agayutem kaugturlua tuquskilia man'a piciurcetenrilkumku!”
Ishbosheth-aaq-llu cakneq alingami Abner-aamek camek qanerciigatuq.

Abner-aaq qanerten̄ek ayagceciuq David-aamun, taum nalliini Hebron-aamelngurmun, qanresqelluki, “Kia man'a nuna atanirtuqatartau? Akqutmek taquten pillguteklua, ikayurniamken pikliutelluku Israel-aaq elpenun.”
“Assirpaa!” David-aaq kiuguq. “Akqutmek taquciiqua elpenun ataucimek tau͡gaam piterlua: taitnarqan Saul-aam pania Michal-aaq wangnun taikuvet tangerrsarturlua.”

David-aaq-llu ayagceciuq qaneryartulrianek Ishbosheth-aamun qanresqelluki, “Wangnun nulirqa utercessgu Michal-aaq. Akilitellruaqa yuinarnek tallimanek (100) Philistine-at nuugillrita amiitnek nuliqsagutnaluku.”
Tua-i Ishbosheth-aam teguvkaraa uinganek Paltiel-aamek qetunraanek Laish-aam.
Paltiel-aam-llu maligtaa tekilluku Bahurim-aaq, qiagurluni ayagtu'rluni. Tau͡gaam Abner-aaq qanellrani, “Uterten,” tuaten pillruuq.
Abner-aam ullagluki ciuliqagtai Israel-aam qanrutellrui, “Ak'anun David-aaq angayuqaqsuumallruarci.
Wani-wa una pillerkarci. Neq'akiciu waten
Abner-aam cali qanrutai yuullgutkelriartai Benjamin-aam ayagluni-llu Hebron-aamun qanrucarturluku David-aaq qaillun Benjamin-aam Israel-aam-llu yui umyuallguteksagulluteng picirkillratnek.
Abner-aaq tekican David-aamun Hebron-aami yuinarnek (20) angutnek maligluni, David-aam kalukautellrui.

Abner-aam David-aaq qanrutaa, “Ayaglua wani-wa pikliucartuqatarqa tamalkuan Israel-aaq Elpenun Takarnarqellriamun. Ciuniurciqaatgen angayuqauluten, piksullren-llu piksaguciiqan atanirturluku-llu nuna tamalkuan.” David-aam tua-i Abner-aaq akqaa cayailkuciumaciqniluku ayagtelluku-llu.

Tamatum kinguani Joab-aq allat-llu David-aam anguyagtain atanirturtait tekitut uayaryallermeggnek, tekiulluteng amllernek tegukengameggnek. Abner-aaq, tau͡gaam, Hebron-aami tamaantenrirluni David-aami, David-aam ayagcetellruaku akeqluku cayailkuciumaciqniluku.
Joab-aq anguyagten̄i-llu tekicata, qanrutaat Abner-aaq taillruniluku angayuqamun David-aamun ayagcecimallruniluku-llu akeqluku cayailkuciumaciqniluku.
Tua-i Joab-am ullagluku angayuqaq qanrutaa, “Camek taqutellrusit? Abner-aam ullallruaten—ciin tuaten ayagceciu?
Taillruuq iqlunaluten nallunrirnaluku-llu calallren tamalkuan natmun-llu ayallren tamalkuan. Ilumun tamana nallunritan!”
David-aaq unicamiu, Joab-aq ayagceciuq qanerten̄ek aqvavkarluku Abner-aaq, ut'rutaat-llu Sirah-m Elakaanek; tau͡gaam man'a nallullrua David-aam.

Abner-aaq tekican Hebron-aamun, Joab-am kiingan agutaa ikirtuqamun, kiingan qalarutqatarnganaku, tuani-llu kapaa aqsiigken'gun. Tua-i Abner-aaq tuqutauguq elliin tuqutellruaku Joab-am anelgutii Asahel-aaq.
David-aam niitellerminiu qanemciq, qanertuq, “

Taum anucimirqecetaarutii tusngakili Joab-amun tamalkuitnun-llu nakmiin ilainun! Kinguvaqili ilakellriarini angutnek ciissingqerturluteng akuramegteggun, wall'u pellernarqellriamek ciissirluni qaimikun, wall'u arnartarnek tau͡gaam calitulimek, wall'u tuqutauluni anguyagmi, wall'u-qaa neqkaitu'rturluni.”
Tua-i tuaten Joab-aq anelgutni-llu Abishai-aq akinaurtuk Abner-aamun tuqutellra amaqlirmek anguyagmi Gibeon-aami pitekluku.

Tua-i-llu David-aam ellimerturaa Joab-aq yui-llu aturait allguusqelluki, missuullernek atuusqelluki, angniilutekluku-llu Abner-aaq. Tungmagcillratni-llu Angayuqaq David-aaq, ellii, qunguk tunuagnegun piyuallruuq.
Abner-aaq tungmagcimallruuq Hebron-aami, angayuqaq-llu qastuluni qiallruuq qungumi, tamarmeng-llu yuut.
David-aaq atullruuq mat'umek angniilutmek Abner-aamun:
“Ciin-kiq Abner-aaq tuqua usvitunrilngurtun?
Unatai qillengqavkenateng,
It'gai-llu qillrutaunateng;
Tuquuq tuqucimalriatun picurlaumalriatgun.”
Yuut-llu qiatekenqigtaat.
Ernerpak yuut David-aaq camek neresquryaaqaat, tau͡gaam piciuluni akqiuq, “Agayutem igtellua tuquskilia camek nerkuma erneq iquklipailgan!”
Mat'um-llu umyugaat nall'artaa ilukegcitkaat-llu. Tangerrluku, cat tamarmeng angayuqam callrin ilukegcivkarai yuut.
Tamarmeng David-aam yuin Israel-aam-llu yuin taringumaat angayuqam ilagautenritellra tuqutaullranun Abner-aam.
Angayuqam qanrutai atanerruani, “Taringenritaci-qaa mat'umi ernermi angtuaq ciuliqagta tuqucianek Israel-aami?
Wiinga angayuqaunge'rma cucukumalua Agayutmek, ernerpak piniatuq ayuquciqa. Ukut Zeruiah-m qetunrai callugyunqessiyaagtut wangni.
Saul-aam qetunraan Ishbosheth-aam niitellerminiu Abner-aaq tuqucimaniluku Hebron-aami, alinguq, tamarmeng-llu yui Israel-aam alingenga'artut.

Ishbosheth-aaq malrugnek atanerruangqertuq ciuliqagten͞gulriignek uayaaristen̄un, Baanah-nkuk Rechab-aq-llu, qetunraak Rimmon-aam, Beeroth-aarmiuk yuullgutkelriartaini Benjamin-aam. (Beeroth-aaq naaqutnguuq ilakluku Benjamin-aam.
Nakmiin yui qimagaullruluteng Gittaim-amun, tuakenirnek-llu tuantauraraqluteng.)

Alla kinguvra Saul-aam Jonathan-aam qetunraqellrua Mephibosheth-aaq, tallimanek allrakungqelleq Saul-aankuk Jonathan-aaq-llu tuqucimallragni. Qanemciq tekican tuqullragnek nunarpiinek Jezreel-am, aulukestiin kevkarluku qimallruuk; tau͡gaam cukangnaqsiyaallermini igcetaa, tussitelanguq-llu.
Rechab-ankuk Baanah-llu ayagtuk Ishbosheth-aam eniinun tekillutek-llu tuavet erenrem qukallran nuniini qavaqaciinanrani.
Arnaq amiigmi uitalria qavarningllermini qavaqallruluni mukaarkamek carririinanermini, tua-i Rechab-ankunun Baanah-llu itqata'arlutek itertuk.
Itrumariamek, Ishbosheth-aam inarrvianun itertuk, tuani qavaryugluni qavarluni, tuqutaak-llu. Qamiqurra-llu kepaak, malikluku-llu ayagtuk, unugpak-llu piyualutek kuignayugkun Jordan Valley-kun.
Tunaak-llu qamiquq atanermun David-aamun Hebron-aami qanrulluku-llu, “Wani-wa qamiqua Ishbosheth-aam, qetunraan ingluvet Saul-aam, tuqutessaagcetlerpet. Ernerpak
David-aam kiugak, “Akqiunga unguvalriakun
Qanertem tailuni Ziklag-ami qanrucestellma Saul-aam yuunrillranek umyuarteqsaaqellruuq qanemcikegtaarmek taicuklua. Wii teguluku tuqutevkallruaqa. Tuaten qanemcikegtaarii nunulillruaqa!

Taumi arcaqanruqatarpagta yurrluut tuqucilriit pinarqutailngurmek angutmek qavalriamek elliin nakmiin eniini! Wani-wa wiinga akinauqataramtek tuqutellerpetegnek tauna, nunam-llu qainganek perrirlutek au͡g'arlutek!”

David-aam pisqutni qanrutkaa, anguyagtain-llu tuqutagket Rechab-ankuk Baanah-llu, kepluki-llu unatekek it'gakek-llu, agarrluki-llu nuniinun nanvarraraam Hebron-aami. Teguat-llu Ishbosheth-aam qamiqurra elaulluku-llu Abner-aam qunguanun Hebron-aami.
Tua-llu tamarmeng ilakellgutkelriarin Israel-aam ullagaat David-aaq qanrulluku-llu, “Wangkuta elpet kemellgutkarpekut aullgutekluta-llu.
Mat'um ciungani, Saul-aamek-llu atanengqellemta nalliini, yui Israel-aam ciuliqagtellruaten anguyagmi,
Tua-i tamarmeng Israel-aam ciuliqagtain ullagaat angayuqaq David-aaq Hebron-aami. Ellii-llu akqutmek taqutuq pillgutekluki, ellaita-llu mingugaat, angayuqaurtuq-llu Israel-aami.
David-aaq allrakungqellruuq yuinaq qulnek cipluku (30) angayuqrurtellermini, atanirturillruuq-llu allrakuni yuinaagni malrugni (40).
Hebron-aamek atanirtullrua Judah-q tamalkuan allrakuni malrunlegni avegmek cipluku, Jerusalem-aamek-llu Israel-aaq tamalkuan Judah-q-llu allrakuni yuinaq qulmek cipluku pingayun-wa (33).

Pillerkaq tekituq angayuqaq David-aaq anguyagten̄i-llu ayallerkaat curugyarturluku Jerusalem-aaq. Jebusite-at, tamakurmiut, umyuartequt David-aamun cirlakngaicukluku nunarpak, taumek qanrutaat, “Watqapik maavet iterngaituten; cikmiumalriarung'e'rmeng tussitellriarung'e'rmeng-llu itercessngaitaatgen.”
(Tau͡gaam David-aam teguaqellrua cayailkutalek Zion-aami, nallunairutengluni-llu “David-aam Nunarpiinek.”)

Taumi ernermi David-aaq yum'inun qanertuq, “Kia-qaa maani Jebusite-at eq'ukai wangtun pitaluni? Tuqucugngaluki-llu? Kitaki ayagci nunam acianelngurkun mer'em ayagyarakun curukarluki-llu cikmiumaluteng tussitellriit.” (Taumek qanrutkumalria, “Cikmiumalriit tussitellriit-llu iterciigatut
Teguaqerraarluku cayailkun, David-aaq tuani nunalillruuq acirluku-llu “David-aam Nunarpiinek.” Nautaa nunarpak taum avatiikun, ayagnirluni nunamek imirillrata nalliinek keggaknelirnerakun qemim.
Piniriinartuq-llu,
Angayuqaq Hiram-aaq, Tyre-armiu ayagceciuq tuneniarten̄ek David-aamun; pikirluku cedar-aanek muragnek enelisten̄ek-llu teggalquliurten̄ek-llu, atanruvilisqelluku.
Tua-i David-aaq taringuq
Nugtartellmi kinguani Hebron-aamek Jerusalem-aamun, David-aaq allanek ilai nulirruani nuliani-llu, qetunrai-llu panii-llu ilangluteng.
Ukut mikelnguut elliinun yuurtellruut Jerusalem-aami: Shammua-q, Shobab-aq, Nathan-aaq, Solomon-aaq,
Ibhar-aq, Elishua-q, Nepheg-aq, Japhia-q,
Elishama-q, Eliada-q, Eliphelet-aaq-llu.
Philistine-at qanrutait David-aaq angayuqaurtellruniluku Israel-aanun, tua-i anguyagtait ayagtut teguaqsarturluku. David-aam niicamiu man'a, atrartuq cayailkut'legmun.
Philistine-at tekitut kuignayugmun Rephaim Valley-mun tauna-llu yirluku.
David-aam apelciraa
“Aa-ang, curua!”
Tua-i David-aaq ayagtuq Baal Perazim-aamun tuani-llu cirlakai Philistine-at. Qanertuq, “
Philistine-at qimagluteng ayakallermeggni, agayutnguateng katagait, David-aam-llu yun'i-llu ayautait.
Tua-i-llu Philistine-at utertut kuignayugmun Rephaim Valley-mun yinqiggluku-llu.
Pulenglluni David-aam apelcinqigtaa
Niiskuvet nepiitnek arulaiqsaunateng ayalriit napat kangritgun, nutaan curukina tua-i ayagciqngama ciuvni cirlaksarturluki Philistine-at anguyagtait.”
David-aam tua-i
Pulenglluni David-aam quyurcetai assinqurrait anguyagtet Israel-aami, quyurrluteng tiissitsaat yuinaat qulmek cipluku (30,000) anguyagtet,
ciuliqaggluki-llu Baalah-mun Judah-melngurmun, tuaken iluvautnaluku Agayutem Akqutiin Yaassiiga,
Teguat Abinadab-am eniinek qemim qainganelngurmek ekluku-llu nutaramun ikamracuarmun. Uzzah-nkuk Ahio-llu, Abinadab-am qetunraagken, nayumiqaluku ikamracuar,
Ahio-q ciunrakun piyualuni.
David-aaq pinrilqurrunateng-llu Israel-aam yui yurarluteng aturluteng-llu pitacirmegcetun qigcignarisqelluku
Tekiteqerluteng mukaarkanek quyurcivianun Nacon-aam, kuluvak paallacalkartuq, Uzzah-m-llu yagqualuni Akqutem Yaassiiga teguleraa.
Egmian-llu
taumek tauna nuna aterpagtelaraat Perez Uzzah-mek
Tua-llu David-aaq alinguq
Tua-i umyuartequq malikenritnaluku Jerusalem-aamun; tau͡gaam, tumyaramek caqirrluni ullautaa Obed Edom-aam eniinun, nutem yuuguralriamun nunarpiini Gath-am.
Tuantuq-llu iraluni pingayuni,
Angayuqaq David-aaq niituq Akqutem Yaassiiga pitekluku
Angutet taukut ayaucestai arvinlegnek amlliqanratgun, David-aam arulaircetai elliiviklermini
David-aaq, aturarluni kiingan ungungssit melqurritnek pilimalriamek 'lumarrarmek qukamikun, yurartuq pitacirmitun qigcignarivkarnaluku
Elliin-llu tamarmeng-llu Israel-aam yuin ayautaat Akqutem Yaassiiga mayuulluku Jerusalem-aamun angnirluteng qayagpagaluteng cupu'uryarat-llu qalrialuteng.
Yaassiik itrusnginanratgu nunarpagmun, Michal-aaq, Saul-aam pania, egalerkun qinerrluni tangrraa Angayuqaq David-aaq yurarluni qecgaurluni tuaten
Taitaat Yaassiik nekaanun-llu elliluku Pelatekamun David-aam nekiullranun. Nutaan-llu elliiluni ekuagarkanek ilakuyutem-llu elliitiinek
Taqngami elliinermek ekuagarkanek, yuut atawaqercetai atrakun
aruqluki-llu tamalkuita neqnek. Cikirai tamalkuita angutet arnat-llu Israel-aami kelipamek tamalkumek, kemegmek kelipimalriamek, issuumayagarnek-llu. Tua-i-llu tamarmeng kingunermeggnun uterrluteng.

Wanikuan, David-aaq utertellrani ilani aryuqsarturluki, Michal-aam anluni paiqeraa. Qanertuq, “Angayuqrata Israel-aat at'mi angucia nallunriqanircetaa ernerpak! Maniluku ellminek umyuarkilucini tangvallratni arnat kevgiurtet anguyagtaini!”
David-aaq kiuguq, “Yurallruunga qigcikluku
takarnairutevsiarlua wangnek. Elpet umyuartequteng'e'rpenga cauvkenii elpeni, tau͡gaam taukut arnat carpaulua umyuartequciiqaatnga!”
Michal-aaq, Saul-aam pania, irniangeqaqsaituq.
Angayuqaq David-aaq elkartuq atanruvimini,
Tua-llu angayuqaq qanertuq prophet-aamun Nathan-aamun, “Tang wiinga uitalrianga enemi piliaqumalriami cedar-aanek napanek, tau͡gken Agayutem Akqutiin Yaassiiga pelatekami uitaaqluni!”
Nathan-aaq-llu kiuguq, “Ca imna umyuarteqellren aturru, tua-i-wa
Tau͡gaam taumi unugmi
“Ayagluten qanrucarturru kevgaqa David-aaq waten qanernilua elliinun, ‘Elpengunrituq piliaqestekaa agayuvigpiim uitavigkama.
Aviuqaanemnek ayaglua Israel-aam yui Egypt-aamek man'a tekilluku, agayuvigpagmi uitaqaqsaitua; ayagaurallruunga pelatekami uitaurlua.
Tamiin ayagaurallemni yui Israel-aam malikluki iliit ciuliqagtet cucukellma apteqaqsaitaqa ciin piliksailucimnek agayuvigpagmek cedar-aanek pilimalriamek.’
“Taumek qanrusgu kevgaqa David-aaq Wiinga-gguq,
Pillgucillruamken natmun ayallren tamiin, cirlakluki-llu inglukesteten tamalkuita curullerpeni. Ucurnariciqamken angelriatun ciuliqagtaitun ellarpiim.

Cucuklillruunga uitavigkaatnek yum'a Israel-aat tuavet-llu elkartellruluki, yuusqelluki nangteqenrirluki. Maavet nunamun itraanermeggnek, curuumalartut aarilngurnek yugnek, tau͡gaam man'a atuumanqiggngaituq. Akqamken qaillun pivkarngaunak tamalkuitnun inglukestevnun kinguverkavnek-llu cikirarkauluten.
Yuunriquvet tungmagcimaluten-llu ciuliavnun ilaulluten, qetunrarpet iliit angayuqrurciiqaqa angayuqauvia-llu pinircetarkauluku.
Ellii taunguciquq naucestekaa agayuvigpagkama, pengegnairciqaqa-llu elliinun kinguvalria atanirturten͞guurallerkaat ilakellriit piugurararkauluku akwarpak.
Wiinga atakeciqaanga ellii-llu qetunraqciqaqa. Picurlakan, anucimirqecetaarciqaqa ataulriim anucimirqecetaarilaucianek qetunraminek.
Tau͡gaam taqngaitaqa nayumiqanermek Saul-aaq taqellrucimtun, au͡g'alqa elpet atanrurcesqelluten.
Kinguvengqerrlainarciquten, angayuqauviin-llu akwarpak piuvkarciqaqa. Atanirturten͞guurallerkarci-llu ilakellriani iquklisngaituq.’”
Nathan-aam-llu qanrutaa David-aaq tamalkuitnek Agayutem nasvallrinek ellminun.
Tua-llu Angayuqaq David-aaq itertuq Pelatekaanun
Tau͡gken-am cali wani-wa tamakut ilaaten, Nutem Piulriami
Camek cali elpenun qanerciqsia! Wiinga elpet nallunritarpenga, kevgavni.
Elpet pisqutkellruan caliarkaqluku-llu waten piarkaullren; makunek angtuanek taqutellruuten wiinga alerquanalua.
Elpet angtatailnguuvagcit, Nutem Piulriami

Allamek waten angayuqauvillgutkelriartaituq nunami Israel-aatun, anirtullerpenek teguarullratnek elpet nakmiin yuksagutnaluki. Ucurnarqellriit nanrarnarqellriit-llu caliaqellerpet ellaitnun sagtaat ucurnarqucin ella iluarrluku. Antaten allat angayuqauvillgutkelriit agayutait-llu yut'en tekicartullratni, yuut petuilten Egypt-aamek nakmiin piknaluki.
Israel-aaq nakmiin yuksagutan akwarpak, elpet-llu,
“Tua-llu wani-wa,
Ucurnarqucin angtuaruciquq, akwarpak-llu yuut qanerciqut, ‘
Artuqailnguq, Agayutiini Israel-aam! Nalirrugutaunii piicagyugngaunga uumek piicautmek elpenun, manillruavgu man'a tamalkuan wangnun, kevgavnun, qanrullua-llu kinguvrenka angayuqaurciiqniluki.
“Tua-llu wani-wa, Nutem Piulriami
Apelciramken atawaqaasqelluki kinguvrenka taqeksaunateng quyakurniaraat naklekuten. Elpet, Nutem Piulriami
Mat'um kinguani Angayuqam David-aam curunqigtai Philistine-at, cirlakluki-llu, ataniurinrirtelluki-llu nunamek.
Tua-i-llu cirlakai Moab-armiut. Teguat inarcetai nunamun pingayun-llu malrugnek ilangarqurluki tuqutai. Tua-i Moab-armiut elliin ataniungai akiliqurautnek-llu elliinun akilicilangluteng.

Tuamta-llu cirlakaa angyuqra Syria-m nuniin Zobah-mi, Hadadezer-aaq qetunraa Rehob-am, Hadadezer-aaq ayainanrani tegunqigcarturluku ataniullni nuna tamalkuan cen̄iini Kuigem Euphrates-aam kialirnerani uitalria.

David-aam teguaqai tiissitsaaq tiissitsaam-llu avga yuinarnek qulnek cipluku (1,700) horse-aatgun anguyagyaramek elitnaurumalriit yuinaat-wa tiissitsaat (20,000) nangrrarmeng anguyatulit. Uitaciiluni horse-aanek yuinaat talliman (100) ikamrat malrugnek akalrialget anguyagcuutet pikanritnek, cipnerit-llu tamalkuita iruirqelluki.

Syrian-aat-llu Damascus-aarmiut ayagcecillratni anguyagten̄ek ikayuryarturluku Angayuqaq Hadadezer-aaq, David-aam curugai tuqulluki-llu yuinaat tiissitsaat yuinarnek yuinarnek cipluku (22,000) anguyagtet.
Tua-i-llu nauciluni anguyagten̄ek yul'egnek uitavignek nuniitni, ellait-llu yuksagutai elliinun akiliqurautnek akilicilangluteng.
David-aam teguaminun tapqutai suulutaat capkutat tegumiaqelallrit Hadadezer-aam anguyagtain ayaulluki-llu Jerusalem-aamun.
Cali tegutuq amlleqapiarmek punernermek Betah-mek Berothai-mek-llu, nunarpiignek atanirtuq'ngagkenek Hadadezer-aam.
Angayuqaq Toi-aq Hamath-armiu niituq David-aamun cirlakniluki tamalkuita Hadadezer-aam anguyagtai.

Taumek qetunrani Joram-aaq ayagcetaa ciuniuryartuusqelluku Angayuqaq David-aaq quyakesqelluku-llu cirlakillranek Hadadezer-aamek, inglukluku amllerqunek elliin Toi-am callulallruamiu. Joram-am payuggluku David-aaq cikiutnek piliaqumalrianek suulutaamek, qerrirlimek, punernermek-llu.
Angayuqam David-aam elliitekai atulaasqelluki agayuaqata, ilaluki-llu qerrirlimek suulutaamek-llu tegulallerminek nunarugarnek cirlaklerminek,
Edom-aamek, Moab-amek, Ammon-aamek, Philistia-mek, Amalek-aamek-llu, ilaluki-llu ilaitnek tegullmi Hadadezer-aamek.
David-aaq ucurnarivsiartuq utertellermini tuqurqirraarluni akimiaq pingayunek cipluku tiissitsaanek (18,000) Edom-aarmiunek Kuignayuani Taryum.
Nauciuq anguyagtarnek uitavignek tamalkuan Edom-aami, yuut-llu tamaani elliin yuksagutai.
David-aaq atanirturiuq tamiini Israel-aami murilkelluki-llu yum'i elluarrluteng assilriakun-llu pimallerkaat.
Joab-aq, aanalek Zeruiah-mek, atanirturtekellruat anguyagtet; Jehoshaphat-aq-wa qetunraa Ahilud-aam aulukestiit cat igausngalriit;
Zadok-aq qetunraa Ahitub-aam, Ahimelech-aaq-llu qetunraa Abiathar-am agayulirten͞gulutek; Seraiah-llu qanercetaarviim igartekluku.
Benaiah-m qetunraan Jehoiada-m ataniumai David-aam nakmiin murilkestai; David-aam-llu qetunrai agayulirten͞guluteng.
David-aaq erenret iliitni paqnayugluni aptuq, “Kitumek-qaa tua-i Saul-aam nakmiin ilaini uitalriartaituq? Pitangqerqan, nakleksugyaaqaqa Jonathan-aaq pitekluku.”
Pistetangqellruuq Saul-aam nakmiin ilakluku aterluni Ziba-mek, qanrucimauq-llu David-aaq ullaasqelluku. Angayuqam-llu aptaa, “Ziba-uguten-qaa?”
“Wani-wa kevgiuryukaarluten,” ellii kiuguq.
Angayuqam aptaa, “Pitairutuq-qaa Saul-aam nakmiin ilainek ellaitnun takaqutmek naklekutmek-llu piarkamnun, Agayun akqellrucimtun tuaten piciqnilua?”
Ziba kiuguq, “Ataucimek cali pitangqertuq Jonathan-aam qetunraini. Tauna piyuayuunani.”
“Nanta?” Angayuqaq aptuq.
“Eniini Machir-aam Ammiel-aam qetunraan Lodebar-ami,” Ziba kiuguq.
Tua-i Angayuqam David-aam aqvavkaraa.

Mephibosheth-aaq-llu, qetunraa Jonathan-aam tutgarii Saul-aam, tekicami, ciktuq ciuqerranun David-aam qigcikutni maniluku. David-aaq qanertuq, “Mephibosheth-aaq,” Kiuguq-llu, “Wani-wa kevgiuryuumaluten.”
“Alingenrilu,” David-aaq qanertuq. “Naklekciqamken aatan Jonathan-aaq pitekluku. Uterceciiqaqa elpenun nuna tamalkuan apa'urlurpet Saul-aam piutellra, estuulumni-llu ciuniurumarrlainarciquten.”
Mephibosheth-aaq ciktenqiggluni qanertuq, “Wiinga cangallrunritua tuqumalriami qimugtem̄i, elpeni takarnarqellriami! Ciin waten assirlua piqatarcia?”
Angayuqam-llu qayagauraa Ziba, Saul-aam kevgaa, qanerluni-llu, “Cikiqataarqa Mephibosheth-aaq, atanerruarpet tutgarii, tamalkuitnek Saul-aam nakmiin-llu ilain piinek.

Elpet, qetunravet, pistevet-llu naucirivikciqaat nuna atanerruarpet Saul-aam nakmiin-llu ilai pitekluki quyurciluten-llu, neqkangqercetarkauluki ellait. Tau͡gaam Mephibosheth-aaq ellii ilaurrlainarciquq estuulumni.” (Ziba qetunrarluni akimiarnek yuinarnek-llu (20) pisterluni.)
Ziba kiuguq, “Ca tamalkuan caliaqeciqaqa Elpet Takarnarqellriami pisqellren.”
Tua-i Mephibosheth-aaq nerlartuq angayuqam estuuluani, angayuqam qetunrai ilalirluki.
Mephibosheth-aaq qetunracuarangqertuq Mica-mek aterluni. Tamarmeng uitalriit Ziba-m nakmiin ilaini pisten͞gurtut Mephibosheth-aamun.
Tua-i Mephibosheth-aaq, piyuasciigalnguq inglugtun it'gagmikun, Jerusalem-aarmiungurtuq, ner'aqluni neryarat tamaitni angayuqam estuuluani.
Mat'um kinguakun Angayuqaq Nahash-aq Ammon-aarmiu tuquuq, qetunraa-llu Hanun-aaq angayuqrurrluni.

Angayuqaq David-aaq qanertuq, “Wiinga piciulriamek yugnikutmek piarkaugua Hanun-aamun, elliin atiin Nahash-am wangnun pillruciatun.” Tua-i David-aaq ayagceciuq kevganek qanrucarturtelluku naklekniluku.
Tekitellratni Ammon-aamun,

Ammonite-at ciuliqagtet qanertut angayuqamun, “Umyuartequten-qaa aatavnek takaqillni pitekluku David-aaq ukunek taivkariyukluku qanrucarturluten naklekniluten? Tuaten pinrituq! Maavet taivkallrui pinrilnguarluki yuvriryarturtelluku man'a nunarpak, teguaqnaluta!”
Teguaqai-llu Hanan-aam David-aam kevgai, ungairai-llu ungaita ingluit, aturait-llu kepluki mecangqait tekilluki, ayagtelluki-llu.
Kasnguyugtut cakneq utertellerkameggnun kingunermeggnun. David-aam niicamiu qaillun pillrat, qanrucarturcetai Jericho-mi uitasqelluki utertevkenaki ungait naunatkaitnun.

Ammonite-at taringut ellmeggnek David-aamek inglukiurucimeggnek, tua-i anguyagtekameggnek piteklirtut tiissitsaanek yuinarnek (20,000) Syria-rmiunek anguyagten̄ek Bethrehob-amek Zobah-mek-llu, qula-llu malrugnek cipluku tiissitsaanek (12,000) anguyagten̄ek Tob-amek, angayuqamek-llu Maacah-mek tiissitsaanek (1,000) anguyagtelegmek.
David-aam niitaa man'a ayagcetaa-llu Joab-aq akiuryarturtelluki tamalkuitnun anguyagten̄un.

Ammon-aarmiut ayagtut arulaiqsaunateng upluteng-llu uitavigkameggni Rabbah-m iteryaraani, nunarpameng atanruviani, allat-wa tamarmeng Syria-rmiut anguyagtet-llu Tob-amek, Maacah-llu, uptellriit uitavigkameggni camek capkutailngurmi yuilqumi.
Joab-am tangrraa inglumeng anguyagtaitnun curukataucini ciunerminek kingunerminek-llu, tua-i cucuklirtuq Israel-aam anguyagtain assinqurraitnek elliluki-llu Syria-rmiut ciunratnun caumaluki.
Cipnerit anguyagtem̄i tunai anelgutminun Abishai-amun ataniuresqelluki, ellii-llu nekaitnun Ammon-aarmiut caumaluki.
Joab-am qanrutaa, “Syria-rmiunun tangerquvnga cirlakevkarlua, tailuten ikayuryartuqia, Ammon-aarmiut-llu cirlakekatgen, tailua ikayurciqamken.
Piniqici alingevkenaci-llu! Pitacirramcetun calluutnauput yup'ut nunarpai-llu Agayutemta.
Joab-aq yun'i-llu ciutmun ayagtut curugluteng, Syria-rmiut-llu qimagluteng.

Ammonite-at tangrramegteki Syria-rmiut ayagavkarluki aqvaqurluki, qimagtut Abishai-amek uterrluteng nunarpagmun. Tua-i-llu Joab-aq kingutmun cauguq callullerminek Ammon-aarmiut uterrluni-llu Jerusalem-aamun.
Syria-rmiut taringut cirlakucirmeggnek Israel-aanun, tua-i-llu qayagaurait tamalkuita anguyagteteng quyurrluki.

Angayuqam Hadadezer-aam taisqevkarai Syria-rmiut keggaknelirnerani Kuigem Euphrates-aam uitalriit, tekitut-llu Helam-aamun ataniurterluteng Shobach-amek, atanerruaratnek anguyagtain Angayuqam Hadadezer-aam Zobah-rmium.

David-aaq mat'umek niicami, quyurtai Israel-aat anguyagtait, qerarluku-llu Kuik Jordan-aaq, arulaiqsaunateng-llu ayagluteng Helam-aamun, tuani Syria-rmiut upingaluteng caumaluku. Tua-llu anguyallrat ayagnirtuq,

Israel-aam-llu yuin kingupiartait Syria-rmiut anguyagtait. David-aaq yun'i-llu tuquciut tiissitsaam avga yuinarnek qulnek cipluku (700) Syria-rmiunek akalrialget alulartaitnek yuinaagnek-llu malrugnek tiissitsaagnek (40,000) horse-aatgun anguyatulinek, ekiliraat-llu Shobach-aq, inglumeng atanerruarat, tauna-llu tuquluni anguyagvimeggni.
Angayuqat yuliucimalriit Hadadezer-aamun taringameng cirlakumacimeggnek Israel-aanun, inglucitenrirluteng ellaitnun iliksagutait. Syria-rmiut-llu alinguqaat ikayullerkait Ammon-aam yui.

Up'nerkaani taum allrakum angayuqat anguyaucarturyaraata nalliini, David-aam ayagcetaa Joab-aq atanerruarinek maligluku Israel-aanek-llu anguyagten̄ek; cirlakait Ammon-aarmiut avatairluku-llu kassugulluku Rabbah-m nunarpii. Tau͡gaam ellii David-aaq Jerusalem-aami uitauq.

Erenret iliitni, atakuyartumi, David-aaq maktuq qavaqacillerminek atanruviim-llu enem pakmavet qainganun mayurluni. Kangainanermini pakmani, tangertuq arnamek ervuqalriamek enemini. Kenegnaqapiarluni.
Tua-i David-aaq ayagceciuq kevgamek kituuciiresqelluku, nallunriraa Bathsheba-ullinilria, Eliam-aam pania Uriah-m-llu nuliqluku Hittite-am.

David-aaq ayagceciuq kevganek aqvavkarluku, taitaat-llu elliinun, elliin-llu akusrarutekaa. (Wani-wa tauna arnaq taqnerrarluni iralumi piciryaramitun menuircallerminek.) Tua-i-llu uterrluni kingunerminun.
Taum kinguani nallunriraa qingaucini qanrucarturcetaa-llu David-aaq.
David-aam-llu qanrucarturtelluku Joab-aq: “Taivkarru Uriah Hittite-aq.” Tua-i Joab-am ayagcetaa David-aamun.
Uriah tekican, David-aam aptaa Joab-aq anguyagtet-llu assiuciatnek, qaillun-llu callullrat ayuqucianek.
Tua-i-llu Uriah qanrutaa, “Kingunerpenun uterrluten mernuinerciqeryartua.” Uriah-llu an'uq, David-aaq-llu cikiutmek ayagceciuq eniinun.
Tau͡gaam Uriah kingunerminun utertenrituq; qavarluni tau͡gaam atanruviim ikirtuqaini angayuqam nayurtai ilagarluki.
David-aaq niicami Uriah eniinun utertellrunritniluku, elliin aptaa, “Cataicimarraarluten nutaan uterteng'e'rpet; ciin enevnun utertenricit?”
Uriah kiuguq, “Israel-aam Judah-m-llu angutai ayaumaut anguyagmun,
Tua-i David-aaq qanertuq, “Kitak maanten erneq iquklilluku, unuaqu utercetniamken.” Tua-i Uriah uitauq Jerusalem-aami tuani ernermi unuaquan-llu.
David-aam kelgaa atakutaryartuusqelluku taangiqevkarluku-llu. Tau͡gaam cali tuani unugmi utertenrituq; qavarluni tau͡gaam ulimi qaingani atanruviim nayurtain uitaviatni.
Unuaquani unuakumi David-aaq igartuq Joab-amun ayagtelluku-llu Uriah-kun.
Waten igartuq, “Ciuqaqlirnun Uriah ellikiu, callulriit tukninqurraitnun, tua-i-llu kingupiarluci tuqutauvkarluku.”
Tua-i-llu Joab-am nunarpak kassugusnginanermini, Uriah ayagcetaa nallunritlerminun inglumeng tukniluteng callugviatnun.
Ingluita anguyagtait an'ut nunarpagnek callugluki-llu Joab-am anguyagtai; David-aam-llu atanerruarin ilait tuqutaugut, Uriah-llu ilakluku.
Tua-i-llu Joab-aq ayagceciuq igamek David-aamun qanemcilluku anguyallermeggnek,
alerquraa-llu kevgaq, “Qanruqaartelluni angayuqaq anguyiim ayuqucianek,
eq'uqerrluni apciiqelliaten, ‘Ciin malleksissiyaagluku nunarpak callugceciki? Nallullruaci-qaa pitgaquyugngaciat qacarnernek?

Neq'akenritaci-qaa qaillun Abimelech-aam Gideon-aam qetunraan tuqutaullra? Nauwa Thebez-aami pillrulria, tuani arnam milqautellrukii miilissuutem teggalqua unavet qacarnerkun tuqulluku-llu. Ciin, tua-i, malleksissaagutellruceci qacarnermun?’ Angayuqam mat'umek apeskaten, qanruskiu, ‘Atanerruan-llu-wa Uriah tuqutaullrulria.’”
Tua-i kevgaq ayagtuq David-aamun qanrulluku-llu canek Joab-am ellimerrutainek qanresqelluku elliinun.
Qanertuq, “Ingluput wangkutni pininrullruut anluteng-llu nunarpagnek callugyarturluta yuilqumi, tau͡gaam kingutmun utercetellruaput nunarpiim ikirtuqainun.
Tua-i-llu pitgaquluta qacarnermek, ilait-llu Elpet Takarnarqellriami, atanerruaten tuqutaullruut; cali-llu atanerruan Uriah tuqutauluni.”

David-aaq qanertuq kevgamun, “Caceturqauqiu Joab-aq qanrulluku-llu umyuarniuresqevkenaku, nallunarqelaan kina tuquarkaucia anguyagmi. Qanruskiu yaggluku pinirikanirluku curuusqelluku nunarpak teguaqluku-llu.”
Bathsheba-m niicamiu uimi tuqutaucia, angniilutkaa.
Angniilutkellra pelluan, David-aam taitevkaraa atanruvigmun; nuliqsagutaa qetunrarkaanek-llu irniuq. Tau͡gaam
Una tukuulria amllernek kuluvangqertuq qusngiucirluni-llu,

tau͡gken arrsaulria tauna ataucirrarmek qusngiyagarluni, kiputellerminek. Aulukenqegcaarluku, angliluni-llu irniari ilagarluki. Ner'aqami-llu neqmi iliinek nerutaqluku, saskaminek-llu mercetaqluku, carliaqaqluku-llu. Elliin qusngiyagaq tauna panikellriatun ayuqulluku.

Erenret iliitni allaneq tekituq tukuulriim eniinun. Tukuulria nakmiin ungungssimi iliitnek tuquciyuumiituq neqkiurutkaminek taumun; tau͡gaam, taum arrsaulriim qusngiyagautii tegua neqkiurluku-llu allaneni.”
David-aaq cakneq qenqertuq taum tukuulriim tungiinun qanerluni-llu, “Piciulua qanertua unguvalriakun
Waten taqutellra nangteqnarqellriamek pitekluku, utercetnarqaa cetamarqunek akililluku tegutellni.”
“Tauna angun elpenguuq,” Nathan-aaq qanertuq David-aamun. “Waten-llu
Angayuqauvianek cikillruamken nulirrinek-llu; angayuqaurrluten-llu tamalkuanun Israel-aamun Judah-mun-llu. Man'a-llu ikgelkan, malrurqugnek amllerikanirluku cikillruyaramken.
Ciin-mi, tua-i, narurciki alerquutenka? Ciin mat'umek assiitqapiarmek taqucit? Uriah tuqutauvkallruan anguyagmi; Ammon-aarmiunun tuqutelluku, tuamtellu nulirra teguluku!
Tua-i-llu wani-wa, kinguveqellriani tamalkuitni kinguverpet ilait tuqularciqut cakneq nangteqerpagluteng narurtellruavnga Uriah-m-llu nulirra tegullruavgu.

Piciulua qanertua elpenun elpet nakmiin ilavet iliitnun arenqiallugutmun tekiucetarkauluten. Tangerciqan nuliaten teguluki allamun angutmun tunkumki; erenrungraan-llu tutegluteng nulirqellriit atulallratnek aturciqut.
Assiilngillruuten aassaqluten, tau͡gaam man'a waten pivkarciqaqa erenrani tamalkuan Israel-aamun tangertelluku.’”
“Wiinga assiilngillruunga
Nathan-aaq-llu qanertuq, “
Tau͡gaam elpenek maniavgu catkinritellren
Tua-i-llu Nathan-aaq uterrluni eneminun.
David-aaq piicagtuq Agayutmun mikelnguq assirisqumaluku. Neryuumiirulluni, unuut-llu tamalkuita qavarviminun agluni unugpak inangqaaqluni natermi.
Eniini-llu ciulirneret ullagluku makcesqelaryaaqaat, tau͡gaam niiteksaunani nerellguciryuumiitaqluki-llu carraungraan.

Malrunlegen erenret naangata mikelnguq tuquuq, David-aam-llu pistain alingluteng qanrucuumiitaat tuaten pillranek. Qanertut-llu, “Mikelnguq unguvallrani, David-aam kiuyuitellruakut camek qanrutengramten̄i. Qaillun qanrutqatarceta elliin irniara tuquniluku? Ellminek akngircessaagciqsugnarquq!”
David-aam tangrramiki qaneksuarautelluki ellmeggnun, taringaa mikelnguum tuqucia. Tua-i aptai, “Mikelnguq-qaa tuquuq?”
“Aa-ang, piuq,” kiugut.
David-aaq nangertuq natermek, ervuqertuq-llu, nuyuurluni, aturinqiggluni-llu. Tua-i-llu anluni agayuyarturluni
“Man'a taringenritaput,” atanerruarin piat. “Mikelnguq unguvallrani, qiatek'lallruan neryuumiitaqluten-llu; tau͡gken tuquciatun, nangertuten nerluten-llu!”
“Aa-ang,” David-aaq kiuguq, “Yallruunga aluviliuraqlua-llu unguvallrani. Umyuarteqlua
Tau͡gaam wani-wa tuquan, ciin yagyarcia? Mikelnguq-qaa unguvavkanqigcugngaaqa? Erenret iliitni ayagciqua uitavianun, tau͡gaam ellii tainqiggngaituq wangnun.”
Tua-llu David-aam qarutaa nuliani Bathsheba. Nulirqellriit-llu pilauciicetun aipaqngani, irniuq qetunrangluni, David-aam aciraa Solomon-aamek.
alerqurluku-llu prophet-aaq Nathan-aaq aciisqelluku tan'gaurluq Jedidiah-mek,
Tamatum-llu nalliini Joab-am taqeksaitaa piksagutengnaqlerminek Rabbah, nunarpak atanruvia Ammon-aam, wani-wa-llu teguaqniararluku.
Ayagceciuq kevganek David-aamun qaneryarturtelluki: “Curullruaqa Rabbah teguluku-llu mer'utii.
Kitaki quyureski anguyagtevvet nangenrit elpet-llu teguluku. Qanrutkesqumanritua wangnun teguaqniluku.”
Tua-i David-aam quyurtai anguyagten̄i, ayagluni-llu Rabbah-mun, curugluku, teguaqluku-llu.

Qamiqurranek agayutnguam Ammon-aat agayutiita Molech-aam David-aaq tegutuq suulutaamek nasqerrutmek usperkun yuinaat pingayun akimiarmek cipluku (75) uqamarluni qilkirtarluni-llu. David-aam-llu tegua qilkirtaq elliluku-llu nasqerrutminun. Tegutuq-llu cali amllernek tegukenganek nunarpagmek

yui-llu calivkarai, kegglatgun, ciklatgun, cavigteggun-llu piqertuutatgun, umyugaat-llu aturcetevkenaku calivkarluki teggalquliluki. Waten yuut tamalkuita pivkarai nunarrarni tamalkuitni Ammon-aami. Tua-i-llu ellii yun'i-llu uterrluteng Jerusalem-aamun.
David-aam qetunraa, Absalom-aaq, kenegnalriamek uingeksailngurmek nayagangqellruuq aterluni Tamar-amek. Amnon-aam, David-aam cali qetunrain iliita, kenegyagutaa.
Kenkessiyaallni-llu pitekluku naulluunguq, elliini caperrnariluni aipaqlerkaa; angutmek agtuumaksailami, angutnun ullagtaarucimanrituq.
Tau͡gaam yugnikek'ngangqertuq, umyuartuqapiarmek aterluni Jonadab-amek, qetunraanek David-aam amaqlian Shammah-m.
Jonadab-aq qanertuq Amnon-aamun, “Angayuqam qetunraqaaten, tau͡gken unuaquaqan tangerrnaamken tangellren angniinani. Qaillun pisit?”
“Kenkiunga Tamar-amek nayagaanek allamek atalgem anelgutma Absalom-aam,” ellii kiuguq.

Jonadab-aq qanertuq elliinun, “Naulluunguarluten kitak inarten. Atavet tailuni tangerrsartuqaten, qanrutniaran, ‘Kitak apteqerr'u nayagaqa Tamar-aq tailuku nereqsartuusqellua. Neqkiuresqumaaqa maani tangerrsugngakemni, tua-i-llu neqliurlua elliin.’”
Tua-i Amnon-aaq naulluunguarluni inartuq.
Angayuqam David-aam tangerrsarturaa, Amnon-aam-llu qanrutaa, “Tamar-aq tang taivkarluku kelipivkaqerr'u neqnirqellrianek tangvak'ngamni, elliinun-llu neqliurtellua.”
Tua-i David-aam Tamar-aq qanrucarturcetaa angayuqauvigmi: “Amnon-aam eniinun agluten neqkiuryarturru.”
Tuavet agngami pia inglerni inangqaluni. Keliparkamek tegutuq, uptaa, neqnirqellrianek-llu kelipiluni tangerrsugngakiini. Kelipiluki-llu neqnirqelriit kelipat
ipugluki-llu kelipissuutmek elliinun neresqelluki, tau͡gaam piyuumiituq. Qanertuq, “Tamalkuita yuut anevkarki” tamarmeng-llu an'ut.
Tua-llu qanrutaa arnaq, “Taiski wavet inglemnun kelipat elpet-llu neqliurutekluki.” Teguluki kelipat ullagaa.
Tunnginanrani-llu, teguleraa qanerluni-llu, “Tailuten canimnun inarten!”
“Qang'a,” arnaq qanertuq, “Qessange'rma waten pivkanrilnga mat'umek kasngunarqellriamek! Tamana cakneq assiituq!

Qaillun pilua yuut takuatni ciugcugngaciqsia mat'um kinguani? Elpet-llu, angtuamek-llu elpet kasngunaqciquten Israel-aami. Angayuqaq qalarusgu, wii nallunritaqa nallunailngurmek elliin tunciqaanga elpenun.”
Tau͡gaam niitenritaa; elliini-llu pininruami, cirlakaa agluku-llu.
Tua-llu Amnon-aaq eq'ukutmek imanguq elliinun; eq'ukaa kenkellmini arcaqanruluku ciungani. Qanrutaa, “Ani!”
“Qang'a,” arnaq kiuguq. “Waten ayagcetlerkan pinarqenruuq watnallerpeni wangnun!”
Tau͡gaam Amnon-aam pamatekenritaa;
qayagauraa-llu nakmiin kevgani qanerluni-llu, “Arnaq una ciuqamnek au͡g'arru! Elatmun eggluku kelucarru amiik!”
Pistem-llu antaa amik-llu kelucarluku.
Tamar-aq aturartullruuq taktuamek ulikutamek alirpalegmek, atutukiitnek kassuuteksailnguut neviarcaraat angayuqat paniita tamatum nalliini.
Kanvaa qamiquni qamllermek, allgurluku ulikutani, kegginani-llu unatminek patuluku ayagtuq qialuni.

Anngaan Absalom-aam tangrramiu, aptaa, “Amnon-aam-qaa kasngunarqellriamek pillruaten? Nayagamaa, mat'umun umyuan assiitessiyaagcetevkenaku pii, allamek aataluni anngaqan, kina mat'umek qanrucaqunaku.” Tua-i Tamar-aq uitaurtuq Absalom-aam eniini, angniinani aliayugluni-llu.
Angayuqam David-aam niitellermini qaillun pillra, cakneq qenertuq.
Absalom-aam-llu eq'uksiiyaagamiu Amnon-aaq agellra nayagani Tamar-aq pitekluku camek qanqaucuirutaa.
Allrakuk malruk kinguagni Absalom-aam qusngini asmegcetai Baal Hazor-ami, nunarraam Ephraim-aam yaaqsinrilkiini, kelgai-llu tamalkuita angayuqat qetunrait tamalkuita tuancesqelluki.
Ullagluku-llu Angayuqaq David-aaq qanrutaa, “Elpet Ucurnarqellriami, qusnginka asmegcetanka. Tailuten-qaa anguyagtevvet-llu atanerruarit ilaucuumiituten piciryaraput angnirluta atullemten̄i?”
“Qang'a, qetunramaa,” angayuqaq kiuguq. “Arenqiallugutnguciquq elpenun tamamta taikumta.” Absalom-aaq aguagtuq cakneq, tau͡gaam angayuqaq maligarutenrituq, Absalom-aaq-llu anesqaa.
Tau͡gaam Absalom-aaq qanertuq, “Kitaki tuaten pii, tau͡gaam-qaa anelgutka Amnon-aaq maligucecugngaan?”
“Ciin tuaten pinarqa?” angayuqaq aptuq.
Tau͡gaam Absalom-aaq taqsuarirtu'rtuq, David-aaq-llu niicaqlirluni Amnon-aaq, allat-llu tamalkuita qetunrai, maligutevkarvianun Absalom-aamun.
Absalom-aaq uptuq nerevkaritekamek pitaciluku angayuqat pilallrat;
alerqualuki-llu pisten̄i: “Murikekiciu Amnon-aam kemningllerkaa, tua-i-llu ellimerruskumku, tuqulluku. Alingyaqunaci. Wiinga avalitkevkarciqua. Cacetukici pinaciarpek'naci-llu!”
Tua-i pistet maligtaquat Absalom-aam alerquatii tuqulluku-llu Amnon-aaq. Ilai-llu tamak'acagarmeng David-aam qetunrai ekluteng ciulvameggnun qimagtut.
Uterrnginanratni, David-aaq qanrutaat: “Absalom-aam tuqutellrui tamalkuita qetunraten, iliit atauciunger'mi unegtevkenani!”
Angayuqaq nangertuq, aturani-llu allgurai angniitem pitaciani, nunamun-llu narullgulluni. Pistain-llu nayurtain aturateng allgurmiit.

Tau͡gaam Jonadab-aq, qetunraa Shammah-m David-aam anelgutiin, qanertuq, “Elpet Ucurnarqellriami, tuquteksaitait tamalkuita qetunraten. Kiimi Amnon-aaq tuquuq. Tangllermikun Absalom-aaq nallunaitellruuq umyuangellra waten piarkaurrluni ayagneqluku Amnon-aam agellra nayagani Tamar-aq.
Taumek ukveqsaqunaku qanemcillrat tamalkuita qetunraten tuquniluki; kiimi Amnon-aaq tuqutaullruuq.”
Taum nalliini Absalom-aaq ayakarluni qimallruuq.
Tua-llu piqerluni anguyagta nayulria tangertuq yugugarnek atralrianek qemikun Horonaim-amek tumyaraq aturluku. Angayuqaq ullagaa qanrutekluki-llu tangellni.
Jonadab-aq qanertuq David-aamun, “Tamakut qetunraqaten tailriit, qanellrucimtun waten piciqniluki.”
Taqeq'anrakun waten qanenermek, David-aam qetunrai tekilluteng itertut; qiagut-llu, David-aaq-llu anguyagtain-llu atanerruarit qiaqapigtut.
Absalom-aaq qimagtuq ayagluni-llu angayuqranun Geshur-aam, Talmai-amun qetunraanun Ammihud-aam, tuanlluni-llu allrakuni pingayuni. David-aam-llu angniilutkumallrua qetunrani Amnon-aaq;
tau͡gaam pelluamiu Amnon-aam tuqullranek tuaten pillni, umyuanguq tangerrsugluku qetunrani Absalom-aaq.
Joab-am nallunritaa Angayuqamun David-aamun yuarnakucia Absalom-aaq cakneq,

taumek taisqevkaraa umyuartulria arnaq Tekoa-rmiu. Tekican, qanrutaa, “Angniilnguara tuquillertun, all'uki tuquissuutet aturaten, nuyaten-llu nuyuuqsaunaki. Pinguarluten arnatun tuquiluni angniicimalriatun.
Tua-i-llu ullagluku angayuqaq qanrulluku-llu wii qanrucesqellemnek.” Nutaan qanrutaa qanerkaanek.
Tua-i arnam ullagaa angayuqaq, cikluni nunamun qigcikellni mania, qanerluni-llu, “Ikayurnga, Elpet Ucurnarqellriami!”
“Camek piyugcit?” aptaa.
“Wiinga arrsaagaulua aipainruunga,” elliin kiugaa. “Uika tuqullruuq.
Malrugnek qetunrangqellruunga, erenret iliitni kiutaarutellruuk naucirivigmi, kitumek avvucestekaunatek, aipaan-llu tua-i aipani tuqulluku.

Tua-i-llu wani-wa ilakutama tamarmeng eq'uyagullua taicesqu'urluku-llu qetunraqa ellmeggnun, tuqucugluku anelgutni tuqutellra pitekluku. Watnakata, qetunrairuciiqua. Ner­yu­niu­ru­tai­ru­cii­qua uika-llu qetunrairulluni at'mi maktacestekaanek.
“Uterten kingunerpenun,” angayuqaq kiuguq, “wiinga aulukciqaqa tauna pinarqellria.”
“Elpet Takarnarqellriami,” arnaq qanertuq, “qaillun ping'e'rpet, wiinga nakmiin-llu ilakutanka avalitnguyugtukut; elpet atanruviin-llu camek pinarqutaituci.”
Angayuqaq qanertuq, “Kia imum alingcira'arqaten, wangnun taiskiu, taum caaksuaranqiggngaitaaten.”
Arnaq qanertuq, “Elpet Takarnarqellriami, piicagvikqerru
“Akqamken unguvalriakun
“Kitaki, Elpet Ucurnarqelriami, cali ataucimek qanqerlii,” arnaq qanertuq.
“Kitaki,” ellii kiuguq.

Arnam qanrutaa, “Ciin picurlautmek taqucit Agayutem yuinun? Elpet pillerkamek cikiqsaitan nakmiin qetunraan utercesqelluku qimagaullranek, taumek elpenek akeqnerrlugutmun tekiututen waten qanllerpegun.

Tamamta tuquciqukut; mertun ayuqukut kuvumalriatun nunamun, ataam quyurtenqigcesciiganani. Agayutem-llu tuaten tuqulria unguircetenrilengraaku, tau͡gaam angayuqaq qaillun ut'rutellerkaanek nallunriryugngauq qimagaulria.
Tua-llu, Elpet Ucurnarqellriami, uumek avalitengqerrlua tailua qanellguteksullruamken yuut akeqnerrlugtellratnek, taumek umyuartequa qanellguteknaluten neryuniurlua piyulqa elpenun atuusqumaluku.
Umyuartequa niillua elpenun anirtuusqumayaaqlunuk qetunraqa-llu tuqutengnaqestem̄egnek au͡g'arlunuk nunamek Agayutem cikiutellranek yum'inun.
Wangnek qanrutua akqutevnun camun pivkarngaitnilua, angayuqaq Agayutem an'gilaatun ayuqngan taringyugngaluku assilria assiitellriamek.
Angayuqaq kiuguq, “Apteqataramken apyutmek, qanrutnarqavnga piciulriamek.”
“Apesnga piyullerpenek, Elpet Ucurnarqellriami,” arnaq kiuguq.
“Joab-am-qaa waten pisqaaten?” arnaq aptaa.

Kiuguq-llu, “Ukvernarcariunga qigcignarqellriakun, Elpet Ucurnarqellriami, kiunricesciigataqa apyuten. Ilumuuguq anguyagtevvet atanerruarata Joab-am qaillun pillerkamnek qanrutellruanga qaillun-llu qanllerkamnek.
Tau͡gaam waten pillruuq waten man'a pinarqellria kitugingnaqluku. Elpet Ucurnarqellriami, umyuartunek pikan an'gilaatun Agayutem nalluvkenaki-llu cauralriit tamalkuita.”
Atatakuan angayuqam Joab-aq qanrutaa “Piarkaurtaqa wani-wa piyullren. Ayagluten aqvau yun'erraq Absalom-aaq ut'rulluku-llu maavet.”
Joab-aq ciktaartuq nunamun ciuqerranun David-aam qigcigyugluni, qanerluni-llu, “Agayutem atawaqertelliten, Elpet Ucurnarqellriami! Wani-wa nallunriraqa quyakuciqa elpenun, unakicavgu kaigatka.”
Nangerrluni-llu ayagtuq Geshur-aamun ut'rulluku-llu Absalom-aaq Jerusalem-aamun.
Angayuqaq, tau͡gaam, alerquriuq Absalom-aaq atanruvigmi uitangaitniluku. “Tangerrsuumiitaqa,” angayuqaq qanertuq. Tua-i Absalom-aaq nakmiin enemini uitauq angayuqamun ageksaunani.
Allamek pitaituq Israel-aami tangkegcinartatailngurmek Absalom-aatun; camek canganarqutaunani kakangcaminek ayagluni kanavet it'gagminun.
Nuyai mamtupiarluteng, kep'arkauluki-llu allrakumi ataucirqumek; taklirissiyaagaqata uqamairulluteng-llu. Uqamangqerraqluteng uspernek tallimanek uqamaltassiarcuutai atanruviim aturluki.
Absalom-aaq pingayunek qetunrarluni atauciq-wa pania Tamar-amek aterluni, cakneq kenegnaqpiarluni arnaq.
Absalom-aaq uitallruuq Jerusalem-aami allrakugni malrugni tangeqsaunaku angayuqaq.
Tua-llu aqvavkaraa Joab-aq, ellimirrnaluku angayuqamun kevgartuusqelluni; tau͡gaam Joab-aq taiyuumiituq. Cali Absalom-aam taisqevkaraa, tuamtellu Joab-aq qessaluni taiyuumiinani.
Tua-i Absalom-aaq qanertuq pistem̄inun, “Tangerciu Joab-am naucirivia pima canianlluni, canegpagnek-llu naumalriartarluni. Ayagluci ekuavkaryarturciu.” Tua-i ayagluteng naucirivik ekuavkaraat.
Joab-aq agluni Absalom-aam eniinun aptaa, “Ciin pistevvet naucirivika ekuavkartatgu?”

Absalom-aam kiugaa, “Tua-i-wa taisqengramken taiyuumiitellruavet. Ayagluten angayuqamun apyucicartuusqumayaaqellruunga: ‘Geshur-aaq ciin unilluku maavet taisia? Wangnun assinrullruyartuq tamaantaurallrukuma.’” Absalom-aaq-llu cali qanerluni, “Arenqigcesqumaaqa elpenun wangnun tangllerkaa angayuqam, pinarqutengqerquma-llu elliin tuqutauvkarniaraanga.”
Tua-i Joab-am Angayuqaq David-aaq ullagaa qanrulluku-llu Absalom-aam qanellranek. Angayuqam taisqevkaraa Absalom-aaq, tailuni-llu ciuqerranun cikluni nunamun. Angayuqam-llu ciuniuraa cingarluku.
Mat'um kinguani, Absalom-aaq pikarciuq ellminek pekcessuutmek akalrialegmek horse-aanek-llu, yuinaak-llu malruk qulmek cipluku (50) angutnek maligcestekaminek.

Makcara'arluni-llu ayalartuq nangerngaurluni-llu tumyaram caniani nunarpiim ikirtuqaani. Kina tua-i tuavet tekitaqan apyuterluni arenqiallugutmek inglukucarakun angayuqamun ikayurluni arenqigisqelluku, Absalom-aam taisqelluku aptelaraa camiungucianek. Qanrucani-llu tua-i kinkunek ilakellrianek piciminek,
Absalom-aaq qanerluni, “Tangerrluku, alerquutet maliggluki ikayuumayugngauten, tau͡gaam qanertetaituq angayuqamek kingunelegmek niicugnistekarpenek.”
Iquliraqluku waten, “Qanercetaaristen͞guyularyaaqua! Nutaan kina imna arenqiallugutellek, wall'u teguarkalek, tailaryalria wangnun, wiinga-llu elluarrluku caliaqelaryaraqa.”
Kina yuk taigaqan Absalom-aam ciuqerranun palurcarturluni, Absalom-aam, yaggvikluku tegularaa, cingarluku-llu.
Absalom-aam Israel-aam yui waten pilarai tamalkuita tailriit angayuqamun cuqcimanaluteng pitekluku, tuaten-llu pillermikun unakai ellminun ilaksagutelluki.
Allrakut cetaman kinguatni Absalom-aaq qanertuq Angayuqamun David-aamun, “Ayagcetqernga Hebron-aamun akqutkelqa atuqernaurqa
Geshur-aarmiungullemni Syria-mi,
“Ayii uitanqegcitkun,” angayuqaq qanertuq. Tua-i Absalom-aaq ayagtuq Hebron-aamun.
Tau͡gaam kevgatgun qanrucarturcetai tamalkuita ilakellriartai Israel-aam qanertelluki waten, “Niiskuvciki cupu'uryarat qalrialriit, qayagpakici, ‘Absalom-aaq angayuqaqsagutaa Hebron-aam!’”
Yuinaat qulen (200) angutet Absalom-aam unayaqngateng ayallruut Jerusalem-aamun maliggluku; nalluluteng aassaqluni picirkiuraanek ayagluteng ukveqluku.

Elliinginanermini-llu ekuagarkanek, Absalom-aaq ayagceciuq nunarrarmun Gilo-mun taisqelluku Ahithophel-aaq, Angayuqam David-aam arenqiirturtain iliit. Aassaqluni picirkiuraa cukamek tukniriinartuq, Absalom-aam-llu maligcestai amlleriluteng.
Kevgam qanrutaa David-aaq, “Israel-aam yui akqiut piciuluteng kevgiurnaluku Absalom-aaq.”

Tua-i David-aam qanrutai tamalkuita anguyagtem̄i atanerruarit nayurten̄i Jerusalem-aami, “Wanirpak ayagnarqaakut qimagluku Absalom-aaq! Patagmek! Tekiarrluni tayima cirlakciqaakut tuqulluki-llu yuut tamalkuita nunarpagmi wani.”
“Aa-ang, Elpet Ucurnarqelriami,” taukut kiugut. “Wangkuta upingaukut qanellren aturarkauluku.”
Tua-i angayuqaq ayagtuq, maligluni nakmiin ilakutaminek atanerruaminek-llu, tau͡gaam qulen nulirruari pivkenateng, taukut unilluki atanruvik qaunqesqelluku.
Angayuqaq malini-llu annginanermeggni nunarpagmek, enemun nangneqlikacaarmun arulairtut.

Tamarmeng anguyagtain atanerruari nangertut canainun atanruviim murilkestai ciuqamegteggun kitullratni. Cali-llu tiissitsaam avga yuinarnek tallimanek cipluku (600) anguyagtet maligcestellri Gath-amek kiturluteng,
tua-llu angayuqaq qanertuq Ittai-amun, ciuliqagtem̄eggnun, “Ciin maligcikut? Uterrluten nayuryarturru nutaraq angayuqaq. Allanruuten, qimagauluten nakmiin nunavnek.
Makumiungurtellren akaurteksaituq, ciin wii malikluten ayagaciiqsia? Natmun-llu wii ayakatauciqa nalluluku. Uterrluten quyurcarturki nunalguteten
Tau͡gaam Ittai-aq kiuguq, “Elpet Ucurnarqelriami, ukvernarcariunga
“Assirpaalli!” David-aaq kiuguq. “Kiiki ciutmun ayii!” Tua-i Ittai-aq ayagtuq tamalkuita malini ilait-llu malikluki.
Yuut qastuluteng qiagut David-aam maligcestai ayallratni. Angayuqam qeraraa Kuicuar Kidron-aaq, yuin kingunrirturluku, malikluteng-llu ayagtut yuilqum tungiinun.

Zadok-aq agayulirta tuanlluni, Levi-am yuinek ilaluni, ayaulluku qigcignarqellria Akqutem Yaassiiga. Elliat-llu nunamun tegunqigtevkenaku-llu yuut tau͡gaam nangeng'ata anelriit nunarpagmek. Tuantellruuq-llu cali agayulirta Abiathar-aq.
Tua-llu angayuqaq qanertuq Zadok-aamun, “Ut'rusgu Akqutem Yaassiiga nunarpagnun.
Tau͡gaam umyugaa nall'artenrilkan tungemnun, elliin qaillun piyullmitun pikilia.”
Tuamtellu Zadok-aq qanrulluku, “Tangerrluku, malikluku qetunraan Ahimaaz-aq, Abiathar-am-llu qetunraa Jonathan-aaq uterten uitanqegcitkun nunarpagmun.
Wani-wa tau͡gaam, utaqaciqua kuigem qeraryaraini yuilqumi qanemcimek niitnatkamnun elpenek.”
Tua-i Zadok-aankuk Abiathar-aq-llu ut'rutaak Akqutem Yaassiiga Jerusalem-aamun tuantaurlutek-llu.
David-aaq mayurtuq Olive-aat Ingriatgun qialuni; kamilangqaluni qamiquni patumaluku angniitellni maniluku. Malii-llu tuaten qamiquteng patuluki ellait-llu qiagut.
Qanrucimallermini-llu David-aaq Ahithophel-aaq ilautniluku Absalom-aam inglukillranun, ellii piicagtuq, “Kitaki,
David-aam kangllicaku qemim kangra, agayularvigmek pitalek, piciuluni yugnikek'ngaan Hushai-am Arch-armium paiqeraa aturai allgurluteng qamiqua-llu marayirluni.
David-aam qanrutaa, “Maligeskuvnga wangnun ikayuutngungaituten,

tau͡gaam ikayurciqerpenga wani-wa ut'reskuvet nunarpagmun qanrulluku-llu Absalom-aaq kevgiurciqniluku piciuluten atii kevgiullrucirpetun. Pitacirpetun-llu akiurluki aturpek'naki picirkiutet Ahithophel-aam ellimerrutai.
Agayulirtek Zadok-aankuk Abiathar-aq-llu tuanciiquk; qanrutaqlukek piniagken canek tamalkuitnek niitellerpenek angayuqam atanruviani.
Tamarmek qetunratek Ahimaaz-aq Jonathan-aaq-llu nunaqliqakek, wangnun taicet'larniaten tamalkuita nallunrilten elkegnun.”
Tua-i Hushai-aq, David-aam yugnikek'ngaa, utertuq nunarpagnun Absalom-aaq tekiteqanrakun.

David-aam qemim kangra kituqanrakun, alqunaq Ziba-m pairtaa, pistiin Mephibosheth-aam, malrugnek ciulviignek maligluni atmaglutek yuinarnek qulnek (200) kelipanek, yuinarnek tallimanek (100) qillernernek issuumayagarnek, yuinarnek tallimanek (100) arunerra'arnek kiagmi naunranek, qecik-wa caqun wine-amek muirumaluni.
Angayuqam David-aam aptaa, “Cakqatarciki makut tamalkuita?”
Ziba-llu kiuguq, “Ciulviik, Elpet Ucurnarqellriami, nakmiin ilavet aturarkaqagket, kelipat-llu naunrat-llu anguyagtevvet neqkaqluki, wine-aq-llu merkaqluku mernukuneng yuilqumi.”
“Nauwa Mephibosheth-aaq, tutgarii atanerruarpet Saul-aam?” angayuqam aptaa.
“Jerusalem-aami uitauq,” Ziba kiuguq, “umyuamikun ukveqngamiu Israel-aam yuinun ellminun utercetqataryukluku angayuqauvia apa'urlumi Saul-aam.”
Angayuqaq Ziba-mun qanertuq, “Ca tamalkuan Mephibosheth-aamek pikestengqelleq elpet piksagutan.”
“Wiinga kevgaqerpenga,” Ziba kiuguq, “Umyuan-tuq wani-wa nall'arquralaqilaku, Elpet Ucurnarqellriami!”
Angayuqaq David-aaq tekitellrani Bahurim-aamun, Saul-aam ilakutain iliita, Shimei-am Gera-m qetunraan, anluni pairrsaagaa, aniqlaaluku-llu tekicarturaa.
Shimei-m teggalqunek miluqunga'artaa David-aaq anguyagtai-llu, David-aaq anguyagtain kassugusngangraatgu nakmiin-llu murilkestain.
Shimei-m-llu aniqlaagaa qanerluni-llu, “Ayii! Ayii! Tuqutarayulii! Caruyaak!
Saul-aam angayuqauvia tegullruan, taumek waniwa
Abishai-aq, aanalek Zeruiah-mek, qanertuq angayuqamun, “Elpet Ucurnarqelriami, ciin uumun qimugtem̄un aniqlaavkarcit? Wangnun ullagluku qamiqua kepevkarru!”
“Man'a elpetek caliarkaqenritatek,” angayuqaq qanertuq Abishai-amun anelgutiinun-llu Joab-amun. “Aniqlaakanga
Tua-i-llu David-aaq qanertuq Abishai-amun tamalkuitnun-llu anguyagtainun, “Wiinga nakmiin qetunrama tuquituraanga; ciin-mi tua-i alangaarutekseciu una Benjamin-aam yua?
elpekciqlia umyuamnek nangteqelqa atawaqertellua-llu man'a aniqlaatii enairluku.”
Tua-i David-aaq anguyagten̄i-llu ayagtu'rtut tumyarakun. Shimei-am angumaurarai, maligqurluki piyuagurluni qemim qacarnerakun; aniqlaaluni miluquluni teggalqunek urr'amek tuaten.
Angayuqaq anguyagten̄i-llu mernupiarluteng tekitellruut Jordan-aamun, tuani-llu mernuinercirluteng.
Absalom-aaq tamarmeng-llu Israel-aam yui malii itertut Jerusalem-aamun, Ahithophel-aam-llu ilagarluki.
Hushai-am, David-aam piciuluni yugnikek'ngaan, paircamiu Absalom-aaq, qayagpagtuq, “Unguvamali angayuqaq! Unguvamali angayuqaq!”
“Nauwa-mi imna takaquten yugnikek'ngarpenun David-aamun?” Absalom-aam aptaa. “Ciin maligtenriciu?”
Hushai-aq kiuguq, “Qaillun tuaten piyarcia? Wiinga piteklirtua cucukumalriamun
Tangerrluku, kina kevgiuqatarcia, ataniurtem̄a qetunraa pinrilkumku? Aatan kevgiullrucimtun, taumek wani-wa elpet wiinga kevgiurciqamken.”
Tua-llu Absalom-aaq cauluni Ahithophel-aamun qanertuq, “Kitak tua-i ilaksagucavkut, camek alerquryugcikut pisqelluta?”

Ahithophel-aaq-llu kiuguq, “Ullagluki atavet nulirruari atanruvigmek qaunqisqelluki unitellri akusraruteksarturki. Nallunrirniaraat yuut tamarmeng Israel-aami atavnun ingluksaguyucin, maligcesteten-llu cakneq eguaquumaniartut.”
Tua-i pelatekamek naparciut atanruviim pakmavet qainganun, yuut-llu tamarmeng takuatni Absalom-aam iterluni akusrarutekai atami nulirruari.
Tamalkuan alerquun Ahithophel-aam pisqumallra tamakuni ernerni ciuniurumalallruuq Agayutem qanellratun pitarrluku; tamarmek-llu David-aankuk Absalom-aaq-llu maligtellruluku.
Tamatum kinguani akaurpailgan, Ahithophel-aam qanrutaa Absalom-aaq, “Cucukliqatartua qula malrugnek cipluku tiissitsaanek (12,000) angutnek, tua-i-llu ataku ayagluta David-aaq kingunrirturluku.
Curugciqaqa mernullran cayuumiitellran-llu nalliini. Alingeciquq cakneq, anguyagtai-llu tamarmeng qimagciqut. Kiingan angayuqaq tuquciiqaqa
tailluki-llu tamalkuita anguyagtai elpenun, uingnerrartun arnatun utertellriatun uiminun. Tuqucugan atauciq angun; yuut ilai qaillun pimangaitut.”
Man'a assilriarungatuq alerquun Absalom-aamun tamalkuitnun-llu Israel-aam yuin ciuliqagtaitnun.
Absalom-aaq qanertuq, “Kitaki Hushai-aq qayagaurluku, niitniaput elliin qanerkaa.”
Hushai-aq tekican, Absalom-aam qanrutaa, “Uumek pisqutmek Ahithophel-aam cikiraakut; maligglaut-qaa? Pingailkan, elpet qanruskut qaillun pillerkamten̄ek.”
Hushai-aq kiuguq, “Watua Ahithophel-aam alerquutii elpecen̄un assinrituq.

Nallunritan elpet aatan, David-aaq, anguyagten̄i-llu tukniluteng callugten͞guciat alingnaqsugngaciat-llu taqukatun irniaminek teguimalriatun. Aatan elisngaqapiarluni anguyagten͞guuq unugmi-llu anguyagten̄i ilagayuunaki.
Wanirpak-llu tayima aipaagni tegalqum qerranquani iirumauq wall'u allami. Egmian David-aam curuuciatun anguyagteten, kinkut niitellriit qanerciqut anguyagteten ak'a cirlakumaniluki.

Tua-i-llu cacetulriarung'ermeng-llu anguyagtet, alingilnguunger'meng-llu yugtutulitun, alingeciqut tamarmeng Israel-aami nallunrilamegteggu atavet nangrunaunani anguyagten͞gucia anguyagtai-llu tukniluteng callugten͞guciat.

Wiinga pisqutkaqa elpenun quyurcesqelluki Israel-aam yui nunam uitavimta iquanek ayagluki akillilluku; amllertaluteng imarpiim cen̄iin qau͡gyaatun, elpenun-llu tungaunak ciuliqagcesqelluki anguyagmun.
Nataqeciqerput David-aaq nanlengraan, nalluani-llu curugluku. Ellii anguyagten̄i-llu anagngaitut.
Qimakan nunarpagmun, yup'ut ilavkugnek tailluteng qamurciqaat nunarpak atraulluku unavet kuignayugmun. Teggalqurrartairulluku qemim qainga.”
Absalom-aaq tamarmeng-llu Israel-aam yui qanertut, “Picirkiutii Hushai-am assinruuq Ahithophel-aam pillrani.”
Tua-llu Hushai-am qanrutak agayulirtek Zadok-ankuk Abiathar-aq-llu qaillun pisqellerminek Absalom-aaq Israel-aat-llu yuita ciuliqagtait, qaillun-llu Ahithophel-aam pisqellrinek cali.

Hushai-am-llu ilaluku, “Patagmek, wanirpak! Qanrucarturceciu David-aaq unugisqevkenaku kuiget qeraryaraitni yuilqumi, tau͡gaam egmian qeraasqelluku Jordan-aaq, ellii anguyagtai-llu teguluki tuqucimasqevkenaki.”

Abiathar-am qetunraa Jonathan-aaq, Zadok-aam-llu qetunraa Ahimaaz-aq, utaqauk Enrogel-aam ulevlaani, elatiini Jerusalem-aam, kitumun tangrresqumavkenatek itertellutek nunarpagmun. Kevgam arnam akultutaciqeggluni qanrucarturaqlukek qaillun pilrianek, tua-i-llu elkenka ayaglutek qanrucarturluku Angayuqaq David-aaq.

Tau͡gaam erenret iliitni tan'gaurluum tangerqerak, qanrulluku-llu Absalom-aaq; taumek cukangnaqlutek ayagtuk iiryarturlutek uum angutem eniinun Bahurim-aami. Elakarluni enemi canimelkiini, tuavet ek'uk.
Angutem nulirra patukamek piuq, saggluku-llu tauna elakam painganun mukaarkanek-llu saggvikluku, kitumun tangertiinun nallunariluku.
Absalom-aam anguyagtai tekitut enemun aptaat-llu arnaq, “Nauwa Ahimaaz-ankun Jonathan-aaq-llu?”
“Kuik qerallruak,” ellii kiuguq.
Anguyagtet yuaryaaqakek tau͡gaam nataqenritakek, tua-i-llu uterrluteng Jerusalem-aamun.

Ayaumariata, Ahimaaz-ankuk Jonathan-aaq-llu nuglutek elakamek, ayaglutek qanemciyarturtuk Angayuqamun David-aamun. Qanrutaak qaillun Ahithophel-aam pillerkiullranek elliin tungiinun qanerlutek-llu, “Cukangnaqluten qerarru kuik.”
Tua-i David-aaq anguyagten̄i-llu qerartut Jordan-aakun, erqaarallrani-llu nangluteng tamarmeng qeraumariluteng.
Ahithophel-aam tangrramiu picirkiutmi atuumanritellra, ciulvani aqumvilirluku utertuq nunaminun. Caliarkani elluarqaarluki, ellminek agartuq. Qunguutaat-llu nakmiin ilain qungurviatnun.
David-aaq tekitellruuq nunarriinun Mahanaim-am Absalom-aam Israel-aam-llu yuin qerallrata nalliini Jordan-aaq.

(Absalom-aam Amasa ellillrua ciuliqagcesqelluki anguyagtet Joab-aq enaiqertelluku. Amasa Jether-aam qetunraqluku Ishmaelite-am; aanii Abigail-auluni, Nahash-am panikluku Joab-am-llu aaniin Zeruiah-m nayagaqluku.)
Absalom-aaq anguyagten̄i-llu pelatekiurluteng qavartartut nunami Gilead-aami.

David-aaq tekitellrani Mahanaim-amun, Shobi-m Nahash-am qetunraan ciuniuraa, nunarpiinek Rabbah-m kingunerluni Ammon-aami, cali-llu Machir-aam Ammiel-aam qetunraan, Lodebar-armium, Barzillai-am-llu, Rogelim-aarmium Gilead-aami.

Taitut qantanek, egatnek qikunek, inarvigkaitnek-llu, neqkanek-llu David-aamun anguyagtainun-llu: mukaarkanek, barley-nek, meluyaarnek, kelipimalrianek grain-anek, papinek, peas-aanek, yuilqurmiutarmek paatakaamek, cheese-amek, milegmek, qusnginek-llu. Nalluvkenaku David-aaq anguyagten̄i-llu kaigarkauciat, meqsugluteng, mernuluteng-llu yuilqumi.
Angayuqam David-aam quyurtai anguyagten̄i tamalkuita, avegluki-llu quyungqalriit tiissitsaaruaqluki (1,000), ilait-llu yuinauluki talliman (100), atanerrualirluki-llu atanirturtekaitnek.

Tua-i-llu ayagtelluki pingasuinguluki quyungqalriit, Joab-aq, anelgutii-llu Abishai-aq, Ittai-aq-llu Gath-armiu, tamarmeng quyungqalrianek atanirturiluteng. Angayuqaq-llu anguyagtem̄inun qanertuq, “Maligciiqamci wangnek.”

“Maligcunaitarpekut,” ellait kiugut. “Cakaniutngungaituq inglumten̄un ilaput kingutmun qimakata, wall'u avput tuqucimangraata; elpet tau͡gaam wangkutni tiissitsaatun (1,000) pitauten. Assinruciquq maanelkuvet nunarpagmi taivkariluten-llu ikayurkamten̄ek.”

“Ca imna elpeci assiryuklerci aturciqaqa,” angayuqaq kiuguq. Tua-i-llu ikirtuqat mengliitni nangerngaurluni anguyagten̄i ayallratni quyungqalriaruaqluteng tiissitsaartaarluteng (1,000) yuinauluteng-llu tallimataarluteng (100).

Alerquutnek-llu cikirai Joab-aq, Abishai-aq, Ittai-aq-llu: “Wiinga piteklua akngircaqunaciu yun'erra'ar Absalom-aaq.” Tamarmeng-llu anguyagtet niitaat angayuqaq David-aaq waten picirkirivkarluku anguyagtem̄i atanerruaritnun.
David-aam anguyagtai ayagtut yuilqumun anguyagluki-llu Israel-aam yui Ephraim-aam Napalilriarani.
Israel-aam-llu yui cirlakumaut David-aam anguyagtaikun; assiitqapiaralriakun cirlakumaluteng, yuinaat tiissitsaat (20,000) anguyagtet tuqucimaluteng taumi ernermi.
Callullrat sagtuq tamiinun yuilqumun, amllenrit-llu anguyagtet tuquut napalilriami anguyautellratni amllenruluteng.

Alqunaq Absalom-aam David-aam-llu anguyagtai nall'arutut. Absalom-aaq ciulvagkun ayagluni, aciirinanrani-llu naparpak, Absalom-aam qamiqua nagtuq napam avayainun. Ciulvak ciutmun ayagartuq Absalom-aaq unilluku napami agaluku.
David-aam anguyagtain iliita tangrraa qanrutekluku-llu Joab-amun, “Absalom-aaq tangrraqa agavkarluku naparpagmi!”
Joab-aq kiuguq, “Tangellrukuvgu-mi, ciin tuani egmian tuqutenriciu? Wiinga wangnek cikillruyaramken qulnek qerrirlinek akinek naqugutmek-llu.”

Tau͡gaam anguyagta kiuguq, “Cikingerpenga tiissitsaanek (1,000) qerrirlinek, yuarama iliit yagcanritaqa angayuqam qetunraanun. Tamamta niitellruaput angayuqam alerqullrani elpet Abishai-aq Ittai-aq-llu, ‘Wiinga piteklua akngircaqunaku yun'erra'ar Absalom-aaq.’
Tau͡gaam-llu wiinga narurtellrukumku angayuqaq tuqulluku-llu Absalom-aaq, angayuqam niitellruyaraa, camek iirumalriartailan angayuqamek, elpet-llu anagyaaqutellrunricararpenga.”
“Qaritekngairutamken,” Joab-aq qanertuq. Pingayunek narulkautnek tegutuq narupaulluki-llu Absalom-aam qat'gainun unguvaluni againanrani naparpagmi.
Qulen-llu Joab-am anguyagtain quy'uqrulluku Absalom-aaq tuquvsiaraat.
Joab-am cupu'uryaraq cupevkaraa arulairesqelluku callullrat, anguyagtai-llu uterrluteng malirqallermeggnek Israel-aam yui.
Teguat-llu Absalom-aam temii, eggluku-llu petmigmun napat akuliitni, patuluku-llu teggalqurugarnek. Tamarmeng-llu Israel-aam yui qimagtut nakmiin nunameggnun.

Unguvallermini Absalom-aaq naucillruuq nallunailkutmek napalriamek teggalqumek ellminun Kuignayugmi King's Valley-mi, ellii qetunrailami at'mi agumacestekaanek. Tua-i tauna aciraa ellminek, man'a-llu erneq tekilluku nallunriumauq Absalom-aam Nallunailkutiinek.
Tua-llu Ahimaaz-aq Zadok-am qetunraa qanertuq Joab-amun, “Aqvaqurturlua ayaglii angayuqamun qanemcikegtaar ayaulluku
“Qang'a,” Joab-aq qanertuq, “Ernerpak elpet ayausngaituten camek qanemcikegtaarmek. Allami ernermi piarkauyaaquten, tau͡gaam ernerpak pingaituten, tua-i-wa angayuqam qetunraa tuquan.”
Tua-llu qanertuq Ethiopia-rmiumun pistem̄un, “Ayagluten qaneryartua angayuqamun camek tangllerpenek.” Pista-llu ciktaaqerraarluni aqvaqurluni ayakarluni.
Ahimaaz-aq aguagtuq, “Umyuarniunritua canek allanek piarkanek; wangnun-llu qanrutkarkaq ayaucetqerru.”
“Ciin tua-i piyugpakarciu, qetunramaa?” Joab-am aptaa. “Camek nunuliutengengaituten.”
“Ca qaillun pingraan,” Ahimaaz-aq qanenqigtuq, “Ayagyugtua.”
“Kitak tua-i ayii,” Joab-aq qanertuq. Tua-i Ahimaaz-aq ayakartuq aqvaqurturluni tumyaraq aturluku Jordan Valley-kun kuignayugkun, ak'anivkenani-llu anguluku kiturluku pista.

David-aaq aqumgallruuq carr'ilqami ilulirnerem elalirnerem-llu nunarpiim ikirtuqagken akuliigni; tarikesta-llu kangranun mayurtuq casgum nangerrluni-llu ikirtuqam qainganun; kiarcami tangertuq angutmek aqvaqurturalriamek kiimenani.
Kanavet qayagaurluku angayuqaq qanrutaa, angayuqaq-llu qanertuq, “Kiimelkuni, assilriamek qanemcimek taituq.” Aqvaqulria-llu maa-i canimelliinarluni.

Tua-llu tarikesta allamek cali angutmek aqvaqulriamek tangertuq kiimenani, kanavet-llu qanrutaa ikirtuqam qaunqestii, “Tangerrluku! Cali alla angun aqvaqurturalria!” Angayuqaq kiuguq, “Cali tamaa-i tamana taitellria assilriamek qanemcimek.”
Tarikesta qanertuq, “Ciuqliim tamatum angutem aqvaqullran Ahimaaz-aq ayuqaa.”
“Ellii yuk'egtarauguq,” angayuqaq qanertuq, “taituq-llu qanemciqegtaarmek.”
Ahimaaz-aq qayagaurtuq aryuqutmek angayuqamun, ciuqerranun-llu nunamun palurrluni, qanerluni-llu, “Nanraumali
“Yun'erraar-qaa Absalom-aaq assirtuq?” Angayuqaq aptuq.
Ahimaaz-aq kiuguq, “Anguyagtevvet atanerruarata Joab-am ayagcetellranga, tangellruunga cakneq nuniirluteng pilrianek, tau͡gaam wiinga camek piciitellruanka.”
“Yaavet nangerten,” angayuqam qanrutaa; agluni-llu tuavet nangertuq.
Tua-llu Ethiopia-rmiu pista tekituq qanerluni-llu angayuqamun, “Qanemcikegtaarmek taitamken, Elpet Ucurnarqellriami! Ernerpak

Angayuqam aptaa, “Yun'erraar-qaa Absalom-aaq assirtuq?” Pista kiuguq, “Wiinga piyuuteksaaqaqa qaillun elliinun pimallra tamalkuitnun ingluvnun tuaten-llu ellait pisqumayaaqluki, inglucitellrianun-llu elpenun.”

Angayuqaq tua-i angniitem naligaa. Mayurtuq enecuarmun ikirtuqam quliinelngurmun aluviliurluni-llu. Mayurluni tuaten qiaguq qanerluni, “Qetunramaa! Qetunramaa, Absalom-aaq! Absalom-aaq, qetunramaa! Wiinga-tuq tau͡gaam tuqullrulii enevni, qetunramaa! Absalom-aaq, qetunramaa!”
Qanrutaat Joab-aq Angayuqaq David-aaq aluviliurluku angniitniluku Absalom-aamek picirluku.
Tua-i-llu angnillrat cirlakillermeggnek picirluteng mumigtuq angniitmun tamarmeng David-aam anguyagtainun taumi ernermi, niicameng angayuqaq angniitniluku qetunrani pitekluku.
Utertut nunarpagnun nepaunateng, anguyagtet kasnguyulauciicetun anguyalrianek qimagaullret.
Angayuqam kegginani patuluku qiaguq qastuluni, “Qetunramaa! Qetunramaa, Absalom-aaq! Absalom-aaq, qetunramaa!”
Joab-aq ag'uq angayuqam eniinun qanrulluku-llu, “Ernerpak umyugait atrartaten anguyagtevvet, anguyagtet unguvavnek anirturillret, qetunrarpet panivet-llu unguvaitnek nuliarpet-llu nulirruarpet-llu.

Pairtaten kenkesteten ikayurluki-llu eq'ukesteten! Nallunairiuten anguyagtevvet atanerruarit anguyagteten-llu elpenun caunriluciat. Tangrraqa angniryaucin Absalom-aaq ernermi mat'umi unguvakan wangkuta tau͡gken tuqullruluta.
Taumek wanirpak ayii caceturrluki-llu anguyagteten. Nallunairiunga
Tua-llu angayuqaq nangertuq, anluni-llu aqumuq nunarpiim ikirtuqain yaaqsinrilkiitnun. Anguyagtain niitaat tuanetniluku, tamarmeng-llu quyurtut avatiinun.
Mat'um nalliini Israel-aam yui qimagallruut nakmiin nunameggnun.

Nunameggni tamarmeng kiutaagut'ngut ilameggnun. “Angayuqam David-aam aviutellruakut inglumten̄ek,” qanraqluteng ilameggnun. “Anirtullruakut Philistine-anek, tau͡gaam qimagtuq Absalom-aamek nunavut-llu unilluku.
Atawaqercetellruarput Absalom-aaq angayuqaqsagulluku, tau͡gaam tuqutaullruuq anguyagmi. Ciin-mi tua-i wani-wa kia ut'rutengnaqenritau Angayuqaq David-aaq?”

Qanemcim qaillun Israel-aam yuin qalartellratnek tekitaa Angayuqaq David-aaq. Tua-i ayagcetak agayulirtek Zadok-ankuk Abiathar-aq-llu apcesqelluki ciuliqagtai Judah-m, “Ciin kinguqlikacagaulutek ikayuucetek angayuqam ut'rutlerkaanun atanruvianun?
Elpeci wiinga ilakamci, nakmiin kemellgutekluci, aullgutekluci-llu; ciin kingumek ut'rutengnaqucetegnga?”
David-aam cali qanrutak waten qanresqellukek Amasa-mun, “Ilakutaqamken. Wak'nirnek ayagluten ataniumasqanka elpenun anguyagtenka Joab-aq enaiqerluku. Agayutem yaggviklua tuquskilia watnanrilkuma!”
David-aam qanellrin ukverrluki piciuluki tuigcetai tamalkuita Judah-m anguyagtai, qanrucarturcetaat-llu utercesqelluki, tamalkuita-llu atanerruari malikluki.
