Ellii ingluliurutellruuq Israel-aanun Solomon-aam unguvallran taktaciatun, inerciiganani Hadad-aam pillratun; inglukluku Israel-aaq, ataniurluku-llu Syria-q.
Alla cali angun Angayuqamun Solomon-aamun inglucitenglleq atanerruarin ilakellruat, Jeroboam-aaq qetunraa Nebat-aam, Zeredah-rmiu Ephraim-aami. Aanii aipainruluni atengqerrluni Zeruiah-mek.
Mat'umek-llu pitengqerrluni inglulitellruuq atanermun.
Solomon-aaq nuniriuq calaralirnerani Jerusalem-aam navguumalria-llu nunarpiim qacarnera kituggluku.

Jeroboam-aaq piumanaqluni ayagyuarluni tan'gaurluuguq, Solomon-aam-llu tangrramiu calirpagturalallra qaunqesten͞gurtaa calivkaumalrianun nunautiitni kinguveqellgutkellriarin Manasseh-m Ephraim-aam-llu.
Taum-llu nalliini, Jeroboam-aaq anngan Jerusalem-aamek, prophet-aam Ahijah-m Shiloh-rmium nall'artaa tumyarami. Wani-wa Ahijah aturangqertuq nutaramek; elkek-llu kiimenatek yuilqumi.
Tua-llu Ahijah-m yaggluku tegua aturaakun nutarakun atuqiikun, allgurluku-llu qula malrugnek cipluku (12) eliqneri amllertariluki.
Qanerluni-llu Jeroboam-aamun, “Teguten qulnek pikarpenek, waten qanran
Solomon-aam atauciin kinguveqellgutkellriit pikciqai, David-aaq pisteka Jerusalem-aaq-llu piteklukek, nunarpak cucukelqa wiinga piknaluku Israel-aam nunautiinek.

Tua-i-wa elliin pegcanga, ciktaarvikluku-llu Chemosh-aaq agayutiit Moab-armiut, Milcom-aaq-llu agayutiit Ammonite-at, pektenrirluni-llu piciryaramkun aturluki piciulriit pisqutenka alerquutenka-llu tangvallemni, atami David-aam pillracetun.
Tuaten pingraan tamalkuan angayuqauvik tegungaitaqa unatainek; tau͡gaam atanruvkarciqaqa erenrin taktaciicetun, pitekluku David-aaq, pisteka cucukelqa, aturtekellrat alerquutma picirkiutma-llu.
Tau͡gaam teguciqaqa angayuqauvik qetunraan unatainek, cikirciqamken-llu elpet qulnek kinguveqellgutkellrianek.

Tau͡gaam cali qetunraa cikirciqaqa atauciinek kinguveqellgutkellrianek, tauna David-aaq wii pisteka kesianek kenurrangqerrlainarniartuq ciuqamni Jerusalem-aami, nunarpagmi cucukellemni atqa ellinaluku.
Teguciqamken-llu elpet, ataniurciqaten-llu tamalkuita yuucirpet piyuumiutai, atanruarkauguten tamalkuitnun Israel-aami.

Niisngakuvki-llu tamalkuita alerquutenka elpenun, piyuakuvet-llu piciryaramtun, aturluku-llu elluaq iigemni, atullerpegun picirkiutenka alerquutenka-llu David-aam pistem̄a pillruciatun, nayurrlainarciqamken, David-aaq pillrucimtun, Israel-aaq-llu elpenun tunciqaqa.
Man'a pitekluku anucimirqecetaarciqanka kinguvri David-aam tau͡gaam qangvarpak pivkenaki.”
Solomon-aam taumek tuqungnaqsaaqaa Jeroboam-aaq; tau͡gaam Jeroboam-aaq makluni unuakumi qimagtuq Egypt-aamun, Shishak-aamun atanranun Egypt-aam, Egypt-aamenani-llu tuqunatkaanun Solomon-aaq.
Tua-llu tamarmeng caurallri Solomon-aam, tamarmeng-llu pillri elliin, elliin-llu elisngii igausnganritut-qaa kalikarni Solomon-aam caurallrini?
Tamarmeng-llu Solomon-aam ataniullri Jerusalem-aamek tamalkuitnun Israel-aanun yuinaak malruuguk (40) allrakut.
Solomon-aam qavallgucirai atani, tungmagcimaluni-llu nunarpiinun atami David-aam; Rehoboam-aaq-llu atanrurtuq eniini.
Rehoboam-aaq ayagtuq Shechem-aamun, tamarmeng yui neglirneranek Israel-aam quyurcata atanrurcarturluku.
Tua-llu Jeroboam-aam qetunraan Nebat-aam, ayallrem Egypt-aamun qimagluni Angayuqamek Solomon-aamek, niicamiu man'a, utertuq Egypt-aamek.
Yuin neglirnermi kinguveqellgutkellriit aqvavkaraat, tamarmeng-llu quyurmeng ullagaat Rehoboam-aaq elliinun-llu qanerluteng,
“Atavet Solomon-aam anagulluni assiinata pilallruakut cakviurtelluta-llu. Makut cakviurnarqellriit uqeglicaquvki yuullerput-llu qacignarikaniquvgu, piciuluta elpenun yuuciqukut.”
Ellii qanertuq, “Ataam taikici erenret pingayun kinguatni, tuani kiuciqamci.” Tua-i yuut ayagtut.
Tua-llu
Ellaita-llu qanrutaat, “Kevgaugarkaukuvet ukunun yugnun unuamek kevgiurluki, qalarutaqluki assilrianek aperyarirluten kiugaqavki, kevgiurciqaatgen qangvarpak.”
Tau͡gaam elliin ciuniunritai qanruyutiit angukara'urluut ellminun, qallatellgutekluki-llu ayagyuat anglillgutellni nangengqalriit ciuqermini.
Aptai-llu elliin, “Qaillun kiusqumaceciki ukut yuut qanellret wangnun, ‘Uqiglicarki atmagkaput atavet ellillri wangkutnun?’”

Tua-llu ayagyuat anglillgutellri qanertut elliinun, “Waten qanrarkauguten ukunun yugnun qanelrianun elpenun, ‘Elpet atavet uqamairillrui atmaput, tau͡gaam ataki, elpet uqiglicaqerki wangkutnun; elpet qanrutniaten, Wiinga iqelquqa ellenruuq atama qukaani.’
Watua, nauwa atama uqamairiluki atmagcet'lallruaci. Wii ilaciqanka atmagarkaci. Atama piqertualallruaci qenutatgun, tau͡gaam wii piqertualarciqamci uqamaillritgun.”
Tua-i Jeroboam-aaq tamarmeng-llu yuut taigut Rehoboam-aamun erenret pingayuatni.
Cali atanrem yuut kiucurlagaluki pii, niicugnivkenaki-llu qalaruyutait angukara'urluut ellminun.

Elliin qalarutai ayuqucirtuuciicetun ayagyuat qanerluni, “Atama atmaci uqamairilallrui, tau͡gaam wii ilaciqanka atmaci; atama piqertualallruaci qenutatgun, tau͡gaam wii piqertuarciqamci uqamaillritgun.”
Tua-i

Tua-llu tamarmi Israel-aam tangrramegteggu niicugninrilucirteng ellait, yuut kiugaat angayuqaq, “Camek pikangqerceta David-aamek? Wangkuta paitarkaitukut qetunraani Jesse-m. Uterci pelatekarpecen̄un Israel-aani! Rehoboam-aaq ellminek anagyaaqulli!”
Tua-i Israel-aat ayagtut nakmiin pelatekameggnun.
Tau͡gaam Rehoboam-aam ataniurai yui Israel-aam uitalriit nunarpaini Judah-m.

Tua-llu angayuqam ayagcetaa Adoram-aaq tarikestiit calivkaumalriit, tamarmeng-llu Israel-aat teggalqutgun tuqutaat. Tua-llu Angayuqaq Rehoboam-aaq cukamek ek'uq pekcessuutminun, qimagluni-llu Jerusalem-aamun.
Taumek Israel-aat ingluliurutut David-aam yuinun, man'a erneq engelkarrluku.

Tua-llu Israel-aat niicameng Jeroboam-aaq uterrniluku ayagceciut taisqelluku-llu quyurrvimeggnun, atanrurrluku-llu tamalkuitnun Israel-aanun. Kitumek maligcestairutut David-aam yui, Judah-m tau͡gaam kinguveqellgutkellriarin kiimeng.

Tuani Jeroboam-aaq tekicami Jerusalem-aamun, quyurcetai tamalkuita Judah-m yui, kinguveqellgutkellriari-llu Benjamin-aam, yuinaat qulngunritaraan tiitsitsaat cucukumalriit anguyagtet, calluusqelluki inglulirluki Israel-aam yui, piurtenqiggnaluku angayuqauvik Rehoboam-aamun, qetunraanun Solomon-aam.
Tau͡gaam qaneryaraa Agayutem taiguq Shemaiah-mun yuanun Agayutem.
Qanra Rehoboam-aamun, qetunraanun Solomon-aam, atanranun Judah-m, tamalkuitnun-llu yuinun Judah-m, Benjamin-aamun-llu, tamalkuitnun-llu allanun yugnun:
“Qanertuq
Tua-llu Angayuqam Jeroboam-aam Israel-aamek asvairqaa nunarrii Shechem-aam qemililriarani Ephraim-aam, tuani-llu uitauraqerluni. Tuaken-llu ayiimi cali asvairqaa nunarrii Penuel-aam.
Jeroboam-aaq-llu qanertuq ircaqumikun, “Waniwa angayuqauvik uterteqatartuq David-aamun.
Ukut yuut ekuagiyartuquneng eniini

Tua-llu angayuqaq arenqiirturluni, piliuq malrugnek kuluvayagaagnek suulutaagnek. Qanerluni-llu yugnun, “Ayaumamallruuci Jerusalem-aamun mululuci. Tangerrluku agayuceci, Israel-aani, anucesteklerci Egypt-aamek.”
Aipaa-llu elliluku Bethel-aamun, alla-llu Dan-amun elliluku.
Man'a-llu assiilnguurtuq yuut ayalameng agayuyarturluteng taukugnun Bethel-aami aipaanun-llu yaaqsingraan Dan-ami.
Ellii cali agayularvilillartuq qemit kangratni, agayulirciaqluni-llu tamaaken yuut ilaitnek, Levite-aunrilngurnek.

Jeroboam-aaq pillerkiurtuq nererpallerkamek akimiarunritariitni erenrin pingayunelgata iralut ayuqluku kalukallrat Judah-mi, elliiluni-llu ekuagiluni ekuavigmi; tuaten piuq Bethel-aami, ekuagiluni kuluvayaagaagnun elliin piliallregminun. Nunalgarciuq-llu Bethel-aamun agayulirten̄ek kevgiurarkanek agayularvigni piliallmini elliin.

Mayurluni-llu ekuavigmun elliin piliallerminun Bethel-aami akimiaratni erenret, pingayunelgatni iralut, iralumi elliin taqlermini piyaraqnaluku; piurciluni-llu kalukaryaramek yuinun Israel-aam, mayurluni-llu ekuagivigmun aruviarmek ekuaginaluni.
Maligtaquluku
Nallunailkutaliuq-llu taumi ernermi, qanerluni, Una nallunailkutnguuq
Angayuqam-llu niicamiu man'a, eniraa ellimerrulluku-llu, “Teguu tauna angun!” Egmian-llu angayuqam tallia nalauq, ataam ellminun cayugciigali'irrluki.
Ekuavik alqunaq navgurtuq qamlleq-llu kuvluni nunamun, prophet-aam piciqnillratun
Angayuqaq-llu Jeroboam-aaq qanertuq prophet-aamun, “Piicauteqernga
Prophet-aaq-llu piicagtuq
Angayuqaq-llu qanertuq prophet-aamun, “Maligglua enemnun neryartua. Nunulirciqamken caliallerpenek.”
Prophet-aaq kiuguq, “Cikingerpenga avganek tukuutvet, wiinga maligcanritamken wall'u nerngaunii merngauni-llu aipirluten.
Alerqullruanga
Taumek utertenrituq tumllermikun taillermini, tau͡gaam allakun tumyarakun.
Taum nalliini uitauq ak'allaq prophet-aaq Bethel-aami. Qetunraagken-llu ullagluku qanrutaak tamalkuitnek prophet-aam pillrinek taumi ernermi Bethel-aami; qanellrinek-llu angayuqamun.
Atiignek-llu qanrutak, “Natetmun ayagta?” Qetunraagken-llu apertuataak natetmun prophet-aam ayallrucianek, tekitelleq Judah-mek.
Ellii-llu qanertuq qetunraagminun, “Aqumgavilirtegu ciulvak.” Tua-i aqumgaviliraak ciulvak ellii-llu ekluni.
Kingunrirturaa-llu prophet-aaq, nalaqaa-llu aqumgallrani aciani napam; elliin-llu qanrutaa, “Elpet-qaa prophet-aaruuten tailleq Judah-mek?”
Qanertuq-llu, “Taunguunga.”
Tua-llu qanrutaa, “Maligesnga enemnun neryarturluten kelipamek.”
Ellii-llu qanertuq, “Maliggluten uterrngaitua, ciuniurngaunaku-llu allaniuruten. Nerellgutekngaitamken wall'u mellgutekluten maani,
tua-i-wa
Tua-llu angukaraurtellria prophet-aaq Bethel-aamek qanertuq elliinun, “Wiinga-llu, prophet-aaruunga elpetun, an'gilam-llu qalarutellruanga alerquuciatun
Tua-i taum maligtaa eniinun, nerluni-llu kelipamek eniini, merluni-llu mermek.
Aqumgauk-llu estuulumi, qaneryaraa-llu
Ellii-llu qanpagtuq prophet-aamun Judah-mek taillermun, “Waten qanertuq

tau͡gaam uterrluten, nerluten-llu kelipamek merluten-llu mermek nunami elpenun qanrutkellrani neresqevkenak kelipamek, mer'esqevkenak-llu mermek; elpet temen qungasngangaituq qunguitnun nakmiin ilavet.’”
Nerumariami-llu kelipamek, merluni-llu, aqumgaviliraa ciulvak prophet-aamun taitellerminun.
Ayainanrani-llu yugtutulim pairtaa tumyarami tuqulluku-llu. Temii-llu egingaluni tumyaramun, ciulvak-llu caniani nangengqaluni; yugtutuli-llu nangengqaluni caniani temiin.
Angutet-llu kiturtut tamaaggun tangerrluku-llu temii egcimaluni tumyaramun. Yugtutuli-llu nangengqaluni caniani temiin. Tekilluteng-llu nunarpagmun qanrutkaat angukara'urluum prophet-aam uitaviani.
Tua-llu prophet-aam ut'rutestellran tamaaken niicamiu qanertuq, “Taunguuq prophet-aaq narurcilleq qaneryaranek
Ellii-llu qanertuq qetunraagminun, “Aqumlliritegnga ciulvagmek.” Aqumlliriuk-llu.
Ayagluni-llu, nataqluku-llu temii egcimaluni tumyaramun, ciulvak yugtutuli-llu nangengqalutek caniani temiin. Yugtutulim nereksaunaku tema uitalluku-llu ciulvak.
Prophet-aam-llu tema tegua ut'rulluku-llu nunarpagmun angniilutekluku tungmaggnaluku-llu.
Ellia-llu tema nakmiin qunguminun; nangtequtekaat-llu qanerluteng, “Tangerrluku anelgutka!”
Tungmagcimariamiu-llu qetunraagminun qanertuq, “Tuqukuma tungmageskitegnga qungumun prophet-aam tungmagingavianun; elliluki enrenka enrin caniatnun.
Qallatellra qastuluni qanrutkesqellranek
Mat'um kinguani Jeroboam-aaq tuigtenrituq assiiluciminek, tau͡gaam cali agayulirciluni agayularvignun tamaaken yuut ilaitnek; kina tua-i piugngalria naaqitaqluku agayulirten͞gurrluku tamakunun.
Mat'um assiilnguum elliin caliallran taitaa iquklitlerkaa piunrirteqapiggluku elliin kinguvrin-llu angayuqaulallrat.
Taum nalliini Abijah qetunraa Jeroboam-aam naulluunguq.

Jeroboam-aaq-llu qanertuq nuliaminun, “Nangerrluten allaunguarluten aturaa elpenek, nallunaqniartuq nulirqucin Jeroboam-aamun, ayagluten-llu Shiloh-mun; Ahijah prophet-aaq tuantuq, qanlleq atanrunaqnilua ukunun yugnun.
Ang'aqluten qulnek kelipanek, cake-aanek-llu, putiilekaamek-llu paatakaarngalngurmek, ullagluku-llu; qanruciiqaaten-llu qaillun pillerkaanek mikelnguum.”
Jeroboam-aam nulirra tuaten piuq; nangerrluni ayagtuq Shiloh-mun. Tekilluni-llu eniinun Ahijah-m. Wani-wa Ahijah tangerciigatuq ak'allaurcami iik takvialiuk.
-llu qanrutaa Ahijah, “Tangerrluku nulirra Jeroboam-aam taiguq apqauryarturluten qetunrani pitekluku. Tauna naulluungan.”
Tekicami allaunguarluni piuq.
Tau͡gaam Ahijah-m niicamiu piyuallra, amiigmun tekican, ellii qanertuq, “Itra, Jeroboam-aam nulirra; ciin allaunguarcit? Niitnirqenrilngurmek qanerkangqertua elpenun.
Ayagluten qanrucarturru Jeroboam-aaq, Waten qanertuq

Teguluku-llu angayuqauvik kinguvrinek David-aam tunluku-llu elpenun; tau͡gaam ayuqenrituten pistemtun David-aatun, alerquutma aturtekellratun, maligtesteklemtun-llu ircaquni tamalkirrluku, caliaqluni elluakekemnek tangvallemni.
Tau͡gaam elpet caliuten, assiitellriamek anagvagluki ciuqliten ayagluten-llu elpenek agayut'liluten unatetgun taqumalrianek, qenngevkaraqlua, calligglua-llu kingunerpenun.

Taumek man'a pitekluku assiitellria pivkarciqaqa atanirturillranun Jeroboam-aam, au͡g'arciqanka-llu tamalkuita angutet, teguat teguarunrilnguut-llu Israel-aani, piunrirarkauluki-llu ilai Jeroboam-aam, carriumaciqut anatun.
Kina imna ilii Jeroboam-aam tuqukan nunarpagmi qimugtet ner'arkaugait; kina-llu tuqukan yuilqumi catailngurmi yaqulgin ellam ner'arkaugait; tua-i
“Nangerrluten taumek ayii enevnun, it'gagpet nunarpak itqatgu, mikelnguq tuquarkauguq.
Tamarmeng-llu Israel-aat nepliutekarkaugaat, tungmagciiqaat-llu; tauna kiimi qunguumaarkauguq, tua-i-wa elliini ilukegcinarqellriartangqerran
Tamana ilaluku

anucimirqecetaarciqaa Israel-aaq, qiiveciquq iitaruaq angalacimalauciatun mermi, qecuumaciquq-llu Israel-aaq naumavikegcillranek nunami cikiutekellrani ciuliaritnun, cekavcimaciqut-llu yaatiinun Kuigem Euphrates-aam, tua-i-wa agayutnguamegteggun Asherim-aakun
Elliin-llu pegciiqai Israel-aat tua-i-wa assiilngui pitekluki Jeroboam-aam.”
Tua-i Jeroboam-aam nulirra nangertuq, ayagluni-llu tekituq-llu Tirzah-mun. Tua-llu wani-wa tekilluku amiigem tuc'araa mikelnguq tuquuq.
Tamarmeng-llu Israel-aat tungmagtaat, nepliatekluku-llu, qanellruciatun
Wani-wa allat Jeroboam-aam pillri, anguyautelallri, atanirturillra, tangerrluku tamakut igausngaut igausngaviitni atanrullret Israel-aani.
Taktacia-llu atanirturillran Jeroboam-aam, allrakut yuinaq malrugnek cipluku (22); pillguciutuq-llu ciuliaminun qetunraan-llu Nadab-am enairluku atanrurtuq.

Wani-wa Rehoboam-aaq atanrullruuq Judah-mi qetunraa Solomon-aam. Rehoboam-aaq yuinaak malruk ataucimek ciplukek (41) allrakungellruuq atanrurtellermini, atanirturillruluni-llu akimiaq malrugnek cipluku (17) allrakuni Jerusalem-aami, nunarpak
Judah-llu assiinani pillruuq tangvallrani
Naucillruut ciktaalarvigkemeggnek, teggalqunek-llu qalliryagusngalrianek, Asherim-aam agayutnguameng nallunailkutainek qertulriani napat-llu talinilriit aciitni.
Tamaani cali pitangqertuq angutnek, arnanek-llu akissunek nunami. Tuatnalartut uuminarqeqapiggluteng ilakellgutkelriaruluteng piciryarallritnek anevkallrin
Allrakut tallimiitni atanrullran Rehoboam-aam, atanran Egypt-aam anguyagaa Jerusalem-aaq.
Ayautai-llu tukuutai eniin
Angayuqaq-llu Rehoboam-aaq tamakut cimirluki piliuq capkutanek punernernek, tunluki-llu atanerruaritnun tarikestet, qaunqilriit amiiginek angayuqam eniin.
Ayallra tamalkuan Agayuvigpagmun nayurtet tegumiaqelarait ataam-llu ut'rulluki nayurtet uitaviatnun.
Wani-wa caurallri Rehoboam-aam, caqallri-llu tamarmeng igausnganritut-qaa Kalikarni Caurallrita Atanrin Judah-m?
Anguyauqu'rtuk-llu Jeroboam-aankuk Rehoboam-aaq-llu taqsuunatek.
Tuqullgucirai-llu Rehoboam-aam atani tungmagcimallgutekluki-llu Nunarpiini David-aam. Aanii atengqerrluni Namah-mek Ammonite-auluni. Abijam-aaq-llu qetunraa enairluku atanrurtuq.
Wani-wa akimiaq pingayunek cipluku (18) allrakut pitarillratni ataniurillra atanrem Jeroboam-aam Israel-aami, qetunraan Nebat-aam, Abijah ayagnirtuq atanruluni Judah-mi.
Atanrullruuq Jerusalem-aami allrakuni pingayuni. Aanii atengqertuq Maacah-mek pania Abishalom-aam.
Piyuallruuq-llu assiilngurkun atami pillruciatun ciumini; ircaqrua-llu tamalkiringavkenani
Tuaten pingraan David-aaq pitekluku
waten pivkaraa David-aaq pillruan elluarrluni tangvallrani, tuigteksaunani-llu alerquutainek yuullmi taktaciatun, tau͡gaam ataucirqumek Uriah-mun Hittite-amun pillermikun.
Wani-wa anguyauqurallruuk ellmegnun Rehoboam-aaq Jeroboam-aaq-llu yuullmek taktaciatun.
Allat pilallri Abijah-m, tamarmeng-llu pillri igausnganritut-qaa kalikarni igausngaviatni Atanrin Judah-m? Anguyauqurallruuk-llu ellmegnun Abijah-nkuk Jeroboam-aaq-llu.
Abijah-m-llu tungmagcimallgutkai ciuliani; tungmagtaat Nunarpiinun David-aam, qetunraa-llu Asa enairluku angayuqrurtuq.
Yuinaurutiitni allrakut Jeroboam-aam atanirturillran Israel-aanek, Asa ayagnirtuq atanirturiluni Judah-mi,
Atanrullruuq-llu Jerusalem-aami yuinaak malruk ataucimek ciplukek (41). Aanii atengqertuq Maacah-mek pania Abishalom-aam.
Asa-llu caliuq elluarrluni tangvallrani
Piunrirtellrui angutet akissut, au͡g'arluki-llu agayutnguat atami piliallri.
Au͡g'armia-llu aanani Maacah queen-auluni aanaullranek, tua-i-wa uuminarqeqapigtellriamek pingqerran piliaqumalriamek Asherah-mun; Asa-m-llu kepaa agayutnguani ekualuku-llu Kuicuarmi Kidron-aami.
Tau͡gaam agayularviit agayutnguanun au͡gaumanritut. Tuaten pingraan Asa piciuguq
Elkartai-llu Agayuvigpagmun cat tamalkuita atami cikiutekellri Agayutmun, ilakluku suulutaaq, cat-llu qerrirlimek pilimalriit elliin cikiutni.
Kesianek-llu Asa Judah-m Angayuqra, Baasha-llu Israel-aam Angayuqra anguyauqurallruuk angayuqaullermek taktaciatun.
Baasha-m-llu atanran Israel-aam itraa Judah, cayailkuciraa-llu Ramah, arulairrnaluku yuut it'lallrat anlallrat-llu Asa-mun atanranun Judah-m.

Tua-llu Angayuqam Asa-m tegui tamalkuita suulutaat qerrirlit-llu uitaqallret Agayuvigpagmi angayuqam-llu eniini, tuyuqluki-llu atanerruamikun Damascus-aamun, Syria-m Angayuqranun Benhadad-aamun, Tabrimmon-aam qetunraanun tutgariinun Hezion-aam, waten qanercirluki:

“Ataki pillguteksagulluk wiinga elpet-llu, atapuk pillruciagtun; tuyuramken cikiutnek qerrirlimek suulutaamek-llu; ullagluku piunrircarturru ilakuyutsek Baasha-q-llu atanra Israel-aam, ayagnaurtuq anguyagten̄i malikluki nunamnek.”

Benhadad-aam-llu niitaa Angayuqaq Asa, ayagtelluki-llu alerquastait anguyagtem̄i anguyagtait-llu anguyagluki nunarpait Israel-aat, cirlakluki-llu Ijon-aaq, Dan-aq, Abel Beth Maacah-q, tamalkuan-llu Chinneroth-aaq, nunii-llu tamalkuan Naphtali-m.
Baasaha-m-llu niicamiu tuaten pillrat taqaa caliani Ramah-mi, ayagluni-llu Tirzah-mun.

Angayuqaq-llu Asa alerquiguq tamalkuan Judah-mun kina pinritevkenaku ikayuulluki ayaucesqelluki teggalqut Ramah-mi muragpiit-llu, Baasha-m atullri asvairqellermini Ramah. Aturluki-llu Baasha-m asvairqucirak Mizpah Geba-llu, nunarpak Benjamin-aam nunautiinelnguq.

Wani-wa tamarmeng caurallrin Asa-m, pinirtacimitun, tamarmeng-llu elliin pillri, nunarpiit-llu piliallri, igausnganritut-qaa tamarmeng kalikaitni igausngaviita caurallrit atanrin Judah-m? Tau͡gaam ak'allaurrluni naulluutengellruuq it'gamikun.
Asa-m-llu tungmagcimallgutkai atani Nunarpiini David-aam atami; Jehoshaphat-aq-llu atanrurtuq enairluku.
Nadab-aq qetunraa Jeroboam-aam ataniunguq Israel-aami aipaani allrakum ataniullran atanrem Asa-m Judah-mi; ellii-llu ataniullruuq Israel-aani allrakugni malrugni.
Ellii pillruuq assiinani tangvallrani

Baasha-q qetunraa Ahijah-m ilakellriarinek Issachar-am, uptuq nalluvkarluni inglukluku Nadab-aq; Baasha-m-llu tuqutaa Gibbethon-aami, Philistine-at nunautiitni; tuani Nadab-am tamarmeng-llu Israel-aat kassugusngallratni Gibbethon-aaq.
Tua-i Baasha-m tuqutaa pingayuatni allrakut ataniullran atanran Asa Judah-m, atanrurrluni-llu enairluku.
Tamaa atanrurcami tuqutai tamalkuita ilai Jeroboam-aam; uitaciinrituq iliinek Jeroboam-aam anernelegmek, maliggluku qanellra
Tamana piuq pitekluku assiilngua Jeroboam-aam, Israel-aat-llu elliin assiilngirtelluki, qenngevkallruaku
Wani-wa allat caurallri pillri-llu Nadab-am, igausnganritut-qaa igausngaviitni kalikarni atanrin Israel-aat?
Kesianek-llu Asa Judah-m Anga­yu­qra, Baasha-llu Israel-aam Anga­yu­qra anguyau­qu­rall­ruuk anga­yu­qau­ller­mek taktaciatun.
Pingayuatni allrakut Asa-m atanirturillran Judah-mi, Baasha qetunraa Ahijah-m atanirturinguq Israel-aani tamalkuita Tirzah-mek, atanrullruluni-llu allrakuni yuinaq cetamanek cipluku (24).
Ellii-llu piluni assiitellriamek tangvallrani
“Nalullruamken caunritlerpenek ciuliqagten͞gurrluten-llu yumnun Israel-aanun, piyuaguten-llu picillratun Jeroboam-aam, yuunka-llu Israel-aat assiilngirtelluki, eq'uqertellua assiilnguit pitekluki.
Taumek au͡g'arciqaqa Baasha ilai-llu, Jeroboam-aaq pillrucimtun qetunraa Nebat-aam.
Baasha-m ilakellriarin iliit nunarpagmi tuqukan qimugtet nerciqaat kina-llu imna ilii tuqukan yuilqumi yaqulgin ellam nerciqaat.”
Wani-wa caurallrin Baasha-m ilait, pillri-llu alingurarpek'nani-llu callri igausnganritut-qaa kalikaitni Igausngaviita Atanrin Israel-aam?
Baasha-m-llu tungmagcimallgutkai ciuliani tungmagcimaluni-llu Tirzah-mi; Elah-llu qetunraa atanrurtuq enairluku.
Tamana ilaluku
Yuinaq arvinlegnek cipluku (26) allrakungluku ataniullran Asa-m Judah-mi. Elah qetunraa Baasha-m ayagnirluni ataniungellruuq Tirzah-mi, atanruluni-llu allrakugni malrugni.
Tau͡gaam pistii Zimri-q, alerquastiit avgita ikamrartain, picirkiurtuq inglukluku Elah. Tirzah-metlermini merluni taangiqluni eniini Arza-m, angayuqam eniin tarikestiin Tirzah-mi.
Zimri iterluni iqutaa tuqulluku-llu, yuinaq malrunlegnek (27) cipnengqerluku ataniullra Asa-m atanran Judah-m, ataniurluni-llu enairluku.
Ayagniami ataniurluni, ellminek aqumngami aqumllermun, tuqurqai ilai Baasha-m; uitaciinrituq atauciungraan angutmek tungelqurranek wall'u yugnikekiinek.
Tua-i Zimri-m piunrirai ilai Baasha-m, qanellra
Agayutngualiulallermegnegun, Israel-aaq-llu maryarrluku assiilngurmun, Baasha-nkuk qetunrani-llu Elah eq'uqercetellruak
Wani-wa caurallrin ilait Elah-m, pillri-llu tamarmeng, igausnganritut-qaa kalikarni igausngaviitni atanrin Israel-aam?
Yuinaq malrunelgatni (27) allrakut Asa-m ataniullran Judah-mi Zimri-q atanrullruuq ernerni malrunlegni, Tirzah-mi. Wani-wa Israel-aat anguyagtet avatairumaat Gibbethon-aaq Philistine-at nuniit.
Anguyagtet-llu niicameng Zimri-m pillerkiullranek tuqulluku-llu angayuqaq, egmian Omri-q atanerruateng atanrurtaat Israel-aamun tuani ernermi.
Tua-i Omri-q mayurtuq Gibbethon-amek, Israel-aat-llu tamarmeng maligtaat, avatairluku-llu Tirzah-q.
Tuani-llu Zimri-m tangrramiu nunarpak tegumacia, itertuq iluqlikacagiinun atanruviim, ekuavkarluku-llu angayuqam enii, tuquluni-llu.
Man'a waten pivkaraat assiilnguin elliin, caarrluuluni pilallran tangerqiini
Wani-wa allat caurallri Zimri-m, aassaqluni-llu pillra igausnganritut-qaa Kalikarni igausngaviitni atanrin Israel-aam?
Tua-llu yui Israel-aam avegtut malruirrluteng; avgita maligtaat Tibni-q qetunraa Ginath-aam, ataneqnaluku, avgita-llu maliggluku Omri-q.
Tau͡gaam Omri-m maligcestain cirlakait maligcestai Tibni-m qetunraan Ginath-aam; tua-i Tibni-q tuquuq, Omri-llu atanrurtuq.
Yuinaq qula ataucimek (31) cipnengellrani atanrullran Asa atanran Judah-m, Omri-q ayagnirtuq ataniurluki Israel-aat, atanruuq-llu qula malrugnek (12) cipluku; arvinlegni-llu atanruluni Tirzah-mi.

Kiputaa-llu ingria Samaria-m Shemer-aamek tiissitsaanek arvinlegnek (6,000) akinek; pengegnairturluku-llu ingriq, acirluku-llu nunarpak piliallni, Samaria-mek, umyuaqluku Shemer-aam atra pikestellra ingrim.
Omri-llu piuq assiitellriamek tangvallrani
Piyuaguq tamalkuitgun pillrikun Jeroboam-aam qetunraan Nebat-aam, assiilngurteggun-llu pillermikun assiilngircetai Israel-aat, qenngevkaraqluku
Wani-wa allat caurallri Omri-m, piniq-llu elliin nasvallra, igausnganritut-qaa kalikarni igausngaviitni pillrita angayuqrin Israel-aam.
Omri-m-llu tungmagcimallgutkai ciuliani, tungmagcimaluni-llu Samaria-mun; Ahab-aq atanrurtuq enairluku.
Yuinaq akimiaq pingayunek cipluku (38) allrakut Asa-m ataniullran Judah-mi, Ahab-aq qetunraa Omri-m ayagnirtuq ataniurluki Israel-aat, Samaria-mi yuinaq malrugnek cipluku (22) allrakuni.
Ahab-aq-llu qetunraa Omri-m assiitellriamek pillruuq tangvallrani

Arcaqalriarunrilan ellmini piyualleq assiilnguikun Jeroboam-aam qetunraan Nebat-aam, nulirtullruuq Jezebel-aamek panianek Ethbaal-am atanrata Sidon-aarmiut, kevgiurluku-llu Baal-aq agayutnguaq ciktaarvikluku tuaten.
Pilillruuq-llu ekuavigmek Baal-amun eniini, Samaria-mi piliallmini.
Ahab-am arcaqanruluni qenngevkalallrua
Hiel-aam ataniullmi nalliini ataam nautellrua Jericho. Ciunguluku-llu
Prophet-aaq at'lek Elijah-mek, Tishbe-mek Gilead-aamelngurmek, qanertuq Angayuqamun Ahab-amun, “Atrakun
Tua-llu
“Ayii maaken caqirrluten-llu calaratmun, iirluten-llu mengliinun kuicuaraam Cherith Brook-am, calaralirnerani Jordan-aam.
Kuicuaraam pikiumaciqaaten merkavnek, alerqullruanka-llu tulukaruut neqkavnek taitelaasqelluten tuani.”
Elijah-m niitaa
Mel'artuq-llu kuicuarmek, tulukaruut-llu taitelaraat kelipanek kemegnek-llu unuakumi atakumi-llu.
Kinguqvaarni-llu kuicuar kinraa, tua-i-wa ellalliqsailan tamaani nunami.
Tua-llu
“Nangerrluten ayii Zarephath-amun, mallgeskiini Sidon-aam, uitaluten-llu tuani. Tangerrluku alerqullruaqa aipaineq tuani nerevkalaasqelluten.”
Tua-i ayagtuq Zarephath-aamun, tekicami-llu iteryaraanun nunarpiim, tangertuq aipainermek avuqiirluni muragnek. Elliin-llu qayagaurluku qanrutaa, “Taisnga merkamnek mermek.”
Arnam-llu tuaten piqataani, qayagauraa qanerluni, “Kelipamek-llu tegulluten taisnga.”
Arnam-llu kiugaa, “Unguvalriakun
Elijah-llu qanertuq arnamun, “Alingevkenak; ayagluten qanllerpetun pii; tau͡gaam ciumek cake-aaliqarraarnga iliinek tailluku-llu wangnun, kingumek piliniartuten pikarpetegnek qetunraan-llu.
Waten qanran
Arnaq-llu piuq Elijah-m qanruciatun; ellii arnaq angun-llu, enelgutkek-llu tamarmeng nerumaluteng ernerni amllerni.
Qantaq imairutevkenani, uquq-llu nangevkenani qanellratun
Mat'um kinguakun qetunraa arnam aipainrem naulluuguq; naulluutii-llu arcaqaami aneryaarciigataqluni.
Arnaq-llu qanertuq Elijah-mun, “Camek inglukutengqercit wangnun, elpet Agayutem yuani? Taiguten umyuaqevkarnaluki ataam assiilnguunka, tuquvkarnaluku-llu qetunraqa!”
Ellii-llu qanertuq arnamun, “Taisgu qetunraan.” Tegua-llu manuanek, mayuutaa-llu qullirmun, inarrviminun, elliluku-llu nakmiin ingleminun.
Qayagaluni-llu
Ellminek-llu nengtaqluni qainganun tan'gaurluum pingayurqunek, qayagaluni
-llu niitaa erinii Elijah-m; yuucia mikelnguum utertuq elliinun ataam, canrirluni-llu ataam.
Elijah-m-llu mikelnguq teguluku atrautaa qullirmek eniinun tunluku-llu tauna aaniinun; Elijah-llu qanertuq, “Tangrru qetunraan unguvauq.”
Arnaq-llu qanertuq Elijah-mun, “Watua nallunri'rqa elpet Agayutmun yuk'ucin, qaneryaraa-llu
Kinguqvaurrnerakun, allrakut pingayuatni ellalliyuitellran,
Tua-i Elijah ayagtuq.
Wani-wa piitnaq arcaqangluni Samaria-mi,
taumek Ahab-am-llu qayagauraa Obadiah, enemelnguut angayuqam eniin ciuqliqngatgu. (Wani-wa Obadiah-m qigcikaa cakneq
Jezebel-aam-llu tuqurqellraki prophet-aari

Ahab-aq-llu qanertuq Obadiah-mun, “Ayaglunuk yuvrirlauk tamalkuita ulevlat kuiggaaraat-llu nunami can'get-llu amllertassiarluki horse-at ciulviit-llu unguvatkait. Tuqucimayunaqngaiciiqelliut ungungssimta ilait.”
Tua-llu nuna avgaak ellmegnun pektellerkartek; Ahab-aq-llu kiirrarmi ayagluni tuatmun, Obadiah-llu ayagluni allatmun kiirrarmi.
Obadiah-llu ayainanrani tangerrluku Elijah-m pairtaa; Obadiah-m-llu elitaqaa, cikluni-llu ciuqerranun, qanerluni-llu, “Elpenguuten-qaa, atanemaa, Elijah?”
Elliin-llu kiugaa, “Wanguunga. Ayagluten qanrucarturru atanren, ‘Tangerrluku, Elijah maantuq.’”
Tauna-llu qanertuq, “Camek assiilngircia, tun'arkauluku pisten unatainun Ahab-am tuqucesqellua?

Agayuten unguvaluku, angayuqauvillgutkellriartaituq wall'u atanruvigtaituq atanema ayagcecivikeksailkiinek yuarluten; qanraqata-llu waten, ‘Cataituq maani,’ angayuqat akqivkalarai piciulriamek qanerniluki nataqeksaitaatniluten.
Wani-wa-llu qanerluten, ‘Atanren qanrucarturru, “Tangerrluku, Elijah maantuq.”’
Tamaa-llu uniskumken, Anerneran
Niiteksaituten-qaa Jezebel-aam tuqurqellrani prophet-aari
Ciin taumek ellimercia qanrucartuusqelluku ataneq maanetniluten? Elliin tuquciiqanga!”
Elijah-llu kiuguq, “
Tua-i Obadiah ullautuq Angayuqamun Ahab-amun qanrulluku-llu, Ahab-am-llu pairrsaagaa Elijah.
Tuani-llu Ahab-am tangrramiu Elijah, qanertuq elliinun, “Elpenguuten-qaa, elpet uitacurlagcecestiit Israel-aat?”
Elliin-llu kiugaa, “Uitacurlagcetenritanka Israel-aat; tau͡gaam elpet piaten, atavet-llu, tua-i-wa elpet cakaaravki alerquutai

Wani-wa ayagceciluten quyurceski tamalkuita Israel-aat wangnun Ingrimi Carmel-aami, yuinaat-llu yuinaat, yuinaak-llu malruk qulmek cipluku (450) prophet-aari Baal-am agayutnguam, yuinaat-llu yuinaat (400) prophet-aari Agayutnguam Asherah-m, nerlalriit estuuluani Jezebel-aam.”
Tua-i Ahab-am ayagcetai yui Israel-aam, quyurtelluki-llu prophet-aat Ingrimi Carmel-aami.
Elijah-llu malkaniutuq yugnun, qanerluni-llu, “Qakurpak nalirugteqatarceci malrugnek piyarangqerrluci?
Tua-llu Elijah qanertuq yugnun, “Wiinga, kiima wiinga, unicimaunga prophet-aarulua
Ataki malruk angucaluk cikiutnguqerlik wangkutnun; cucuklirlit taukut ataucimek angucalumek ellmeggnun, itumlluku-llu mikliriluku, elliluku-llu muriit qaingatnun.
Qayagaurniarci-llu atra agayutevci, wiinga-llu qayagaurciqaqa atra
Tamarmeng-llu yuut kiugut, “Elluarrluni qanertuq.”
Tua-llu Elijah qanertuq prophet-aarinun Baal-am, “Cucuklirci elpecen̄ek angucalumek upluku-llu ciumek, elpeci amllerravci; qayagaurluku-llu atra agayutevci, tau͡gaam kumarcaqunaciu.”

Teguat-llu angucaluq ellmeggnun taicimalria, upluku-llu ciumek, qayagaurluku-llu atra Baal-am unuakumek ayagnirluteng erenrem qukallranun, qanerluteng, “Baal-aaq, kiugikut!” Tau͡gaam erinatangeksaunani, kina-llu kiuksaunani. Pektut-llu tussilluteng avatiini ekuaviim piliaqellermeng.
Erenrem-llu qukallrani Elijah-m picingssautekluki qanertuq, “Qastuluci qayagaciu, qavaralliuq, wall'u nanteqalliuq, wall'u-qaa ayallruuq natmun, wall'u-qaa qavartuq tupaggnaqluni.”
Qastuluteng-llu qayagaut, kilirturluteng-llu ellmeggnek piciryararteng maliggluku, kapurluteng tuaten auk maqnatkaanun qaimeggnun.
Erenrem-llu qukallra kitungluku, cali qayagpagaut elliiyaraq ekuagiluni tekilluku, tau͡gaam erinatangeksaunani; kina kiuksaunani, kitumek-llu niitestaunateng.
Tua-llu Elijah qanertuq tamalkuitnun yugnun, “Taikanirluci wangnun,” yuut-llu tamarmeng elliinun malkaniutut. Elliin-llu kitugtaa ekuavia
Elijah-llu tegutuq qula malrugnek teggalqunek naataciluki kinguvellgullgutkellriartai qetunrain Jacob-aam, elliinun tekitellrulria qaneryaraa
Taukunek-llu teggalqunek aturluni ekuaviliuq atrakun
Muriit-llu elliluki picirkaicetun, itumlluku-llu angucaluq mikliriluku elliluki-llu muriit qaingatnun. Qanerluni-llu, “Imirciki cetaman caqut mermek, kuvluki-llu ekuagarkat qaingatnun.”
Qanertuq-llu, “Piciu cali aipiriluku”; aipiriluku-llu piat; ataam qanertuq, “Pingayiriluku piciu”; pingayiriluku-llu piat.
Meq-llu ellngartuq mengliinun elaneq-llu imangluni mermek.
Sass'ami erenrem qukallran kinguani Elijah prophet-aaq piicagtuq, malkaniulluni-llu qanertuq, “
Kiugia
Tua-llu kenra
Yuut-llu tangrramegteggu tamana, put'ut kegginameggnun; qanerluteng-llu, “
Elijah-llu qanertuq ellaitnun, “Teguciki prophet-aari Baal-am; atauciungraan-llu ayagcetevkenaku.” Ellaita-llu teguit; Elijah-m-llu atrautai Kuicuarmun Kishon-aamun, tuqulluki-llu tuani.
Elijah-m-llu qanrutaa Ahab-aq, “Mayurluci nerici merluci-llu; tua-i ellarviim nepii niitnarian.”
Tua-i Ahab-aq mayurluni ner'uq merluni-llu; Elijah-llu mayurluni kangranun Carmel-aam; put'uq nunamun, kegginani-llu elliluku ciisqugmi akuliignun.
Ellii-llu qanertuq pistem̄inun, “Mayurluten watua kiarten tungiinun imarpiim.”
Mayurluni-llu kiartuq, qanerluni-llu, “Cataituq.” Ellii qanertuq, “Mayunqigtaqluten malrunlerqunek.”
Malrunelgatni-llu qanertuq, “Tangerrluku, amirlucuar, tuar yuum unatii, mayurtuq imarpigmek.”
Elliin-llu qanrutaa, “Mayurluten qanrusgu Ahab-aq, ‘Upeski pekcessuuteten atrarluten-llu ellalluum pisciigali'irceciiqaaten.’”
Cukamek-llu qilak tunguriuq amirlungluni anuqengluni-llu, tua-i-llu ellarvangluni. Ahab-aq-llu pekluni ayagtuq Jezreel-amun.
Pinia-llu
Angayuqam Ahab-am qanrutaa nuliani Jezebel-aaq tamalkuitnek Elijah-m pillrinek elliin-llu qaillun tuqutellrinek tamalkuita prophet-aat nuussirpagkun.
Tua-llu Jezebel-aaq ayagceciuq kevgamek Elijah-mun qanerluni, “Agayutet agturlua tuquskilitnga unuaqu uum nalliini prophet-aat pillerpetun pinrilkumken.”
Elijah alinguq unguvani-llu qimautaa; malikluku pisten̄i ayagtuq Beersheba-mun Judah-mi. Pista tuavet unilluku,
Elijah ernerpak piyuaguq yuilqumun. Arulairami aqumuq kagitngalnguum napam talinranun tuquyugyaaqluni-llu. “Amllerriuq; watua,
Inarrluni-llu qavartuq, aciani kagitngalnguum napam, tangerrluku-llu an'gilam agturaa qanrulluku-llu, “Makluten neri.”
Kiartuq-llu tangerrluku-llu kelipaq qamiqumi caniani assigtaq-llu mermek imalek. Ner'uq merluni-llu, ataam-llu inarrluni.
An'gilaa-llu
Elijah-llu makluni ner'uq merluni-llu, neqem-llu piniria yuinaagni malrugni (40) ernerni unugni-llu Sinai-am ingrianun piyuayugngariluku tanqilriamun ingrimun.
Tuani qerranermun itertuq inarrnaluni tuavet. Alqunaq
Ellii kiuguq, “
“Ani ciuqamnun-llu nangerrluten ingrim kangranun,”
Nunam-llu pektellran kinguakun ekuaguq, tau͡gaam
Elijah-m niicamiu, nemraa kegginani ulikutaminek anluni-llu nangertuq iteryaraanun qerranrem. Tangerrluku-llu, erina elliinun qanertuq, “Calisit maani, Elijah?”
Ellii kiuguq, “
Jehu-llu qetunraa Nimshi-m uqumek mingugniaran atanrurrluku Israel-aanun, Elisha-llu, qetunraa Shaphat-aam Abelmeholah-rmiu, mingugniaran prophet-aarurrluku elpet enairtekaqluku.
Kina-llu analria nuussirpiinek Hazael-aam, Jehu-m tuquciiqaa; kina-llu analria Jehu-m nuussirpiinek Elisha-m tuquciiqaa.
Tau͡gaam cali uitaciiciqua unguvalrianek tiissitsaanek malrunlegnek (7,000) Israel-aami—kinkut imkut piciulriit wangnun, ciktaaqsailnguut-llu Baal-amun wall'u cingartekeksailkai agayutnguaran.”
Elijah ayagtuq nataqluku-llu Elisha nunamek itumcilria angucalunek kuluvagnek qamurterluni, kinguqlikaca'ar aturluku itumciluni. Elijah-m ulikutani yuuluku ac'etaa taumun.
Taum-llu angucaluq kuluvani unilluku malirqeraa Elijah, qanerluni-llu, “Ataki tua-i-ngunrituuryarturraaqerlakek ataka, aanaka-llu, nutaan maliggniamken.”
Elijah kiuguq, “Aa-ang, uterten. Qunukngaitamken!”

Tua-llu Elijah utertuq qamurtem̄inun kuluvagnun angucalunun, tuqutai, kenirluki-llu kemgit, atmagcuutiit murakluku. Cikiutekai kemgit yugnun, ellaita-llu nerait. Nangerrluni-llu maligtaa Elijah, kevgiurturnaluku.

Angayuqam Benhadad-aam Syria-mek quyurtai tamalkuita anguyagten̄i; yuinaq-llu qula malrugnek cipluku (32) angayuqat pillgutkaat, horse-at, ekumassuutet-llu akalrialget, mayurluni-llu kassugutaa Samaria-q, curugluku-llu.
Qanerten̄ek-llu ayagceciuq nunarpagmun Angayuqamun Ahab-amun, Israel-aarmiumun qanrutesqelluku, “Angayuqaq Benhadad-aaq piteklirtuq,
pegcesqelluki ellminun qerrirliuteten suulutaaruteten-llu, arnauteten pininqurrait-llu mikelnguvet.”
“Qanrusgu ataneqa, Angayuqaq Benhadad-aaq, wiinga maligutua; piksugnganga piutenka-llu tamalkuita,” Ahab-aq kiuguq.
Wanikuan kevgat ataam taigut Ahab-amun allamek piyuuterluteng Benhadad-aamek: “Ayagcecillruunga qanermek elpenun taicesqelluki qerrirliuteten suulutaaruteten-llu, arnauteten mikelnguuteten-llu.

Tuaten pingraan ayagceciciqua pisten̄ek elpenun unuaqu mat'um nalliini, ellaita-llu yuarciqaat elpet enen enait-llu pistevvet, teguciqait-llu cat ellmeggni qelegnarqelriit. Unuaqu tamaanciiqut waten erenrem pitarillran nalliini.”

Angayuqam-llu Ahab-am taisqai tamalkuita ciulirneri nunam, qanerluni-llu, “Tangerciu una angun wangkutnek navguriyulria. Qanermek taicetaanga teguiyuglua nuliamnek irniamnek-llu, qerrirliutenka suulutaarutenka-llu, wiinga-llu maligtaquaqa.”
Ciuliqagtet yuut-llu kiugut, “Niicugninrilgu; maligarcaqunaku.”
Tua-i Ahab-aq qanertuq kevgainun Benhadad-aam, “Qanruciu ataneqa angayuqaq ‘Tamalkuan ciuqliq kaigatellren pistevgun piciqaqa; kinguqlia tau͡gaam maligcesciigataqa.’”
Kevgat-llu ayagtut ataam-llu utertut allamek qanerkarluteng
Benhadad-aamek: “Taiciciqua navgurtekaanek uum nunarpagpet ayauciiqait-llu teggalqut navguumalriit. Agayutet nirlua tuquskilitnga pinrilkuma!”
Angayuqaq Ahab-aq kiuguq, “Qanrusgu Angayuqaq Benhadad-aaq anguyagtepiaq-gguq tang tau͡gaam ucuryagtaalalria anguyanriraqata, ciungani pivkenani.”
Benhadad-aam niitaa Ahab-am kiutii ilini-llu, allat-llu ataniurtet, merainanermeggni pelatekameggni. Anguyagten̄i ellimerrai upcesqelluki curullerkaatnun nunarpak, taumek uitallerkameggnun uptut.
Taum nalliini, prophet-aam ullagluku Angayuqaq Ahab-aq qanrutaa, “
“Kia ciuliqagciiqaki curulriit?” Ahab-aq aptuq.
Prophet-aaq kiuguq, “
“Kia ayagnirciqau callullrat?” angayuqaq aptuq.
“Elpet,” prophet-aaq kiuguq.

Tua-i angayuqam qayagaurai ayagyuat anguyagtet nunat avgumalriit atanerruaritnek ataniumalriit, yuinaat qulen yuinaq qulmek cipluku malruk-wa (232). Tua-i-llu cali kinguatgun quyurtai tamalkuita Israel-aam anguyagtai, quyurmeng tiissitsaaruluteng malrunlegen (7,000).
Curullrat ayagnirtuq erenrem qukallrani, Benhadad-aankut iliini-llu yuinaq qulmek cipluku malruk-wa (32) taangiq'ngellratni pelatekameggni.
Ayagyuat anguyagtet ciumek ayagtut. Ciunrirturtait ayagcetellri Benhadad-aam qaneryarturtut quyurmeng anguyagten̄ek anelrianek Samaria-mek.
Ellimerrutai, “Unguvaita tegukiciki, callugyarturluteng taingraata wall'u nepaitmek iliirangraata.”
Ayagyuat anguyagtet ciuliqagtaat curullrat, kinguqlirluteng Israel-aat anguyagtaitnek,
tamarmeng callukengateng tuqurqait. Syrian-aat qimagtut, Israel-aat kingunrirtuqait, tau͡gaam Benhadad-aaq qimagtuq horse-akun, maligluni anguyagtet ilaitnek.
Angayuqaq Ahab-aq ayakartuq naucirivigmun, tegui-llu horse-at anguyagcuutet-llu akalrialget, anucimirqecetaarluki-llu tuknilriamek cirlakai Syrian-aat.
Tua-llu prophet-aam ullagluku Angayuqaq Ahab-aq qanrutaa, “Uterrluten pinircarki anguyaten picirkiunqegcaarluten-llu, up'nerkanqigeskan atanra Syria-m curunqigciiqngan.”
Angayuqam Benhadad-aam atanerruarin qanrutaat ellii, “Agayutait Israel-aam ingrit agayutkait, taumek Israelite-at cirlakekaitkut. Tau͡gaam cirlakenrilngaitaput callukumteki manigcetellriami.
Wanirpak kitak, au͡g'arciki yuinaq qulmek cipluku malruk-wa (32) ataniurtet elkaringallratnek cimirluki-llu yuilqumi ataniurten̄ek.
Quyurciluci-llu anguyagten̄ek amllertataitnek cagmallerpeci, amllertataitnek-llu horse-at ekumassuutet-llu akalrialget. Callugciqaput Israelite-at manigcetellriami, nutaan-llu tuani cirlakciqaput.”
Angayuqaq Benhadad-aaq umyuallguciutuq maliggluku-llu picirkiuraat.
Up'nerkanqigcan quyurtai anguyagten̄i arulaiqsaunateng-llu ayallratni maligtai nunarpiinun Aphek-aam curugyarturluki Israelite-at.

Israelite-at qayagaurumaut anguyagcuutait upingaluteng; quyurmeng ayagtut arulaiqsaunateng, quyurmeng-llu malruirrluteng elkartut caumaluki Syrian-aat. Israelite-at tangellrat ayuqluni malruuluteng quyungqakuinalriatun qusngirngalngurcetun mumiggluku Syrian-aat tangellrat, ellait tamalkuan manigcetellriami sagingaluteng.
Prophet-aam ullagaa Angayuqaq Ahab-aq qanerluni-llu, “Waten qanertuq

Ernerni malrunlegni Syrian-aat Israelite-at-llu uitaurtut elkarrvillermeggni, caumauraulluteng. Erenret malrunelgatni callulteng ayagniraat, Israelite-at-llu tuquciut yuinarnek tallimanek tiissitsaanek (100,000) Syrian-aanek.
Tuqutenritqallrit qimagaugut nunarpiinun Aphek-aam, tuani-llu qacarnerem ayaluqerrvikai yuinaq malrunlegnek tiissitsaat (27,000) angutet uitaqallret.
Benhadad-aaq-llu qimagtuq nunarpagnun iirluni-llu iluqlikacagiinun enem.

Atanerruarin ullagluku qanrutaat, “Niitellruukut atanrit Israel-aat takumcutarniluki. Piunarqucimek cikirkut ayagniartukut atanratnun Israel-aat missuullernek all'uta qukamteggun uyaquput-llu ilavkugnek nemerluki, aipaagni unguvavkaryuaraten.”
Tua-i missuullernek nemertut qukamegteggun, uyaquteng-llu ilavkugnek nemerluki, ayagluteng-llu Ahab-amun qanertut, “Elpet pistevvet Benhadad-aam takumcuca'arvikaaten unguvaminek.”

Benhadad-aam atanerruari murilku'rtut assilriamek piunarqucimek, Ahab-aq-llu waten qanellrani “anelguun,” egmian quyaqertut, qanerluteng-llu, “Ilumun qanrucirpetun, Benhadad-aaq anelgutkan!” “Taiciu wangnun,” Ahab-aq ellimerriuq. Tua-i-llu Benhadad-aaq tekican, Ahab-am unayaqaa ekumassuutmi akalrialegmi pillguciisqelluni.
Benhadad-aam-llu qanrutaa, “Nunarpiit atama tegullri atavnek wii kitugciiqanka ayuqucillricetun, elpet-llu tuneniarvignek piurciniartuten Damascus-aami, pillruciatun atama Samaria-mi.”
Ahab-aq-llu qanertuq, “Tuaten piarkaurcavet, kitaki, wiinga pegciiqamken.” Akqut'lirraarluni tua-i elliinun ayagcetaa.
taumek qanrutaa, “Waniwa elpet narurcavgu
Tua-i-llu taum im'um prophet-aam alla angun ullagluku pia, “Tenglugnga!” Angutem-llu tuaten pia; tengelpagluku akngirrluku-llu.
Prophet-aam kegginani nemraa 'lumarrarmek, nallunarcarluni ellminek, ayagluni-llu nangerngaurtuq tumyaram mengliini, kitullerkaa Israel-aam atanran utaqaluku.

Tua-llu ataneq kituan, prophet-aam qayagauraa qanerluni-llu, “Elpet Ucurnarqellriami, calluinanemni anguyautellriani anguyagtem taitaanga angutmek teguaminek inglumten̄ek qanerluni-llu, ‘Murilkiu una angun; ayakaqan akilirciqan unguvavnek wall'u akiliciluten pingayunek tiissitsaanek (3,000) qerrirlinek.’
Tau͡gaam allanek-llu yagarcelama tauna angun ayakalliniuq.”
Angayuqaq kiuguq, “Elpenek tua-i picirkirtuten, akiliutii-llu aturarkaurtan.”
Prophet-aam au͡g'artaa 'lumarraq kegginaminek, egmian-llu atanrem elitaqaa prophet-aanun ilakucia.
Prophet-aaq-llu nutaan qanertuq atanermun, “Man'a qanelqaa
Angayuqaq-llu utertuq nunaminun Samaria-mun, umyuarrlugcarluni angniinani-llu.
Jezreel-ami mallgeskiini Angayuqam Ahab-am atanruvian naucetaarvigtangqertuq wine-arkanek pikesterluni angutmek Naboth-aamek at'legmek.

Erenret iliitni Ahab-am pia Naboth-aaq, “Cikirnga wine-arkanek naucetaarvigpenek, canimetuq atanruvimnek, aturniarqa naunrarnek nauceciivikluku. Cikirniamken assinranek wine-arkanek naucetaarvigmek, wall'u assikenrukuvgu, akilirluten pitalqeggiluku akia.”
“Paiciutekellruaqa una wine-arkanek naucetaarvik ciuliamnek,” Naboth-aaq kiuga'rtuq. “
Ahab-aq-llu eneminun utertuq angniinani qenerrluni-llu pitekluku qanellra Naboth-aam ellminun. Inartuq ingleminun, qacarneq cauluku, neryuumiinani-llu.
Tau͡gaam Jezebel-aam nulirran ullagaa, qanrulluku-llu, “Ciin anerneren kanevvlugpakarta? Ciin neryuumiicit?”

Elliin-llu kiugaa, “Tua-i-wa qanellra Naboth-aam wangnun pitekluku. Qanrucaaqaqa kipucugluku wine-arkanek naucetaarvia wall'u, assikenrukaku, allamek naucetaarvigmek cikirluku, tau͡gaam pianga wangnun pikngaitniluku!”
“Atanruuten-qaa wall'u piuvkenak?” Jezebel-aaq piuq. “Makluten inglernek, angniringnaqluten neri. Wiinga unanguciiqamken Naboth-aam naucetaarvianek wine-arkanek!”
Arnaq-llu igartuq iganek Ahab-am atranek sign-araqluki, takarnarqucirluki-llu takarnarcautiinek, ayagtelluki-llu atanerruarinun ciulirnerinun-llu Jezreel-am.
Igai qanerluteng: “Nallunairici ernermek yagyaramek, yuut-llu quyurceqaarluki nasvagici Naboth-aamun takarnarqutmek.
Elgarciluci-llu angutegnek malrugnek umyuarrliqellriignek picilirtelluku takuani aniqlaallruniluku Agayun angayuqaq-llu. Tua-i-llu anulluku nunarpagnek teggalqutgun-llu tuqulluku.”
Atanerruari-llu ciulirneri-llu Jezreel-am qanruciatun Jezebel-aam ellmeggnun piut.
Apertuigut ernermek yagyaramek, yuut-llu quyurtelluki, Naboth-aamun-llu takarnarqutmek nasvagiluteng.
Malruk-llu umyuarrliqellriik yuut takuatni piciliraak aniqlaallruniluku Agayun angayuqaq-llu, tua-i anutaat elatiinun nunarpiim, tuqulluku-llu teggalqutgun.
Tua-llu ayagceciut Jezebel-aamun qanerluteng, “Naboth-aaq tuqucimauq.”
Tamaa Jezebel-aam niicamiu qanrucesten̄i, qanertuq Ahab-amun, “Naboth-aaq tuquuq. Kitaki ayagluten piksagucarturru wine-arkanek naucetaarvik elpenun tuneniaqsuumiitellra.”
Ahab-aq egmian ayagtuq wine-anek naucetaarvigmun piksagucarturluku.
Tua-llu
“Angayuqamun Ahab-amun ayii Samaria-mi. Naboth-aam wine-arkanek naucetaarviani nalaqeciqan, piksaguteqatarluku.
Qanrutniaran Wiinga-gguq,
Ahab-am tangrramiu Elijah, qanertuq, “Anguavnga-qaa, inglumaa?”
“Aa-ang”, kiuguq Elijah, “Elpet cumigtuten assiitellriamek calinaluten
Taumek

Ilaten ayuqliriciqut ilaitun Angayuqam Jeroboam-aam qetunraan Nebat-aam, ilaitun-llu Angayuqam Baasha-m qetunraan Ahijah-m, ayagnercavgu qenertelqa ciuliqagtellerpegun Israel-aam yui assiilngillerkaatnun.’
Jezebel-aamun-llu cali piuq,
Ilakutarpet iliit tuqulria nunarpagmi qimugtet nerciqaat, iliit-llu tuqulria yuilngurmi nunami yugtutulit yaqulget-llu nerciqaat.’”
(Kitumek cumigtellriartaituq assiilngurmek aturnaluni tangvallrani
Ellii atullruuq kasngunarqeqapigtellriamek assiilngurmek agayulallermikun agayutnguanun, Amorite-at pilallracetun,
Elijah qanenermek taqngan, Ahab-am aturani allgurai, missuullernek-llu all'uni. Neqmek qessakiluni, qavaraqluni-llu aturluni missuullernek, pektaqluni-llu angniinani kanavirrluni.
“Tangrran-qaa Ahab-aq ellmikutuurtellria ciuqamni? Waten pian, assiitellria tuc'essngaitaqa elliinun unguvaqallrani, tau͡gaam qetunraan unguvallrani tuc'eciiqaqa cangerlak Ahab-am ilainun.”
Uitanqegcitangqellruuq Israel-aam Syria-m-llu akuliik malrugni allrakugni,
tau͡gaam allrakut pingayuatni Angayuqam Jehoshaphat-am Judah-rmium ullagaa tangerrsarturluku Angayuqaq Ahab-aq Israel-aarmiu.
Ahab-am aptai atanerruani, “Ciin tua-i wangkuta tegunqigtellerkaa qaillukuaqsaiceta Ramoth-aaq Gilead-aami angayuqaanek Syria-m? Wangkuta pikarput!”
Ahab-am tua-i Jehoshaphat-aq aptaa, “Maligcugngaarpenga-qaa curugyarturluku Ramoth-aaq?”
“Upingaunga piyugngarikuvet,” Jehoshaphat-aq kiuguq, “tamarmeng-llu anguyagtenka kuunitgun-llu callutulit.
Tau͡gaam ciumek
Tua-i Ahab-am qayagaurluki itercetai prophet-aat, nuniini yuinaq yuinaq (400) amllertalriit, apluki-llu, “Ayaglua-qaa curuglaku Ramoth-aaq, wall'u-qaa pinrillaku?”
“Curuggu,” taukut kiugut. “
Tau͡gaam Jehoshaphat-aaq aptuq, “Allamek-qaa prophet-aartangqertuq elliikun apelciryugngastiinek
Ahab-aq kiuguq, “Ataucimek pitangqertuq, Micaiah-mek qetunraanek Imla-m. Tau͡gaam wii cakneq eq'ukaqa assilriamek ciunerkamnek ap'ricuilanga; assiitellriarrlainautuuq.”
“Tuaten qanernarqenritaaten!” Jehoshaphat-aq qanlertuq.
Ahab-aq tua-i itresqiuq qanercetaarviim atanerruaranek qanrulluku-llu ayagluku Micaiah-q wanirpak aqvasqelluku.

Malruk angayuqak, aturiumalutek ucurnarqellrianek ulikutamegnek, aqumgauk atanruvigni aqumllemegni kepliarivigmi elakariini ikirtuqaan Samaria-m, prophet-aat-wa tamarmeng ciuqerragni nallunairiqulriik.
Iliit, Zedekiah-m qetunraa Chenaanah, piliuq caviignek cirunregnek qanerluni-llu Ahab-amun, “Waten
Allat-llu tamarmeng-llu prophet-aat qanertut tuaten. “Ayagci pairrluku Ramoth-aaq anagciquci,” ellait qanertut. “
Taum nalliini, atanerruam Micaiah-m aqvastiin qanrutaa, “Allat tamarmeng prophet-aat ap'ritaat elluamek angayuqaq, elpet-llu tuaten pimikina.”
Tau͡gaam Micaiah-q kiuguq, “Unguvalriakun
Igvaan Angayuqam Ahab-am ciuqerranun, angayuqam aptaa, “Micaiah, wangkuk-qaa Angayuqaq-llu Jehoshaphat-aaq ayaglunuk curuglauk Ramoth-aaq, wall'u-qaa pinrilluk?”
“Curugtek!” Micaiah kiuguq. “Anagkengciqutek.
Tau͡gaam Ahab-aq qanertuq, “Qanrutaqavnga
Micaiah kiuguq, “Tangerrsugngaanka anguyagtai Israel-aam sagingaluteng qemit qaingatni qusngitun qusngiliurtailngurtun.
Ahab-am qanrutaa Jehoshaphat-aq, “Qanrutellrunritamken-qaa ciunerkamek ap'ricuitnilua assilriamek? Assiiterrlainatuut!”
Micaiah-llu cali qanertuq, “Kitaki niicugniu
aptuq, ‘Kia iqluuryartau Ahab-aq ayagluni tuqutaullerkaanun Ramoth-aami?’ Ilait an'gilat camek qanertut, ilait-llu cali camek allamek qanerluteng,
piqerluni anerneq ciuqerratnun amllirtuq, ullakanirluku
‘Qaillun?’
Micaiah-llu nangnermek qanertuq: “Waten pillruuq.
Tua-i-llu prophet-aam Zedekiah-m ullagaa Micaiah, qacarrluku-llu kegginaakun, apluni-llu, “Qangvanirnek
“Nallunrirciqan nani enem kiaqlianun iiryartuquvet,” Micaiah qanertuq.
Tua-i-llu Angayuqam Ahab-am ellimerraa narurcunailngurmek atanerruami iliit, “Teguu Micaiah ayaulluku-llu Amon-aamun, nunarpiim angayuqauvianun, Angayuqam-llu qetunraanun Joash-amun.
Qanrulluki itercesqelluku itercivigmun kiingan kelipamek mermek-llu neqirluku cavkenii uterrnatkamnun.”
“Cavkenak-wa ut'reskuvet,” Micaiah-llu qanlertuq, “
Tua-i-llu Angayuqaq Ahab-aq Israel-aanek, Angayuqaq-llu Jehoshaphat-aq Judah-mek ayagtuk curugyarturluku nunarpii Ramoth-aam Gilead-aami.

Ahab-aq qanertuq Jehoshaphat-aamun, “Anguyagmun ullautellmegni, nallunarcarciqua, tau͡gaam elpet aturaten angayuqaussuutet aturciqaten.” Tua-i angayuqrat Israel-aat anguyagmun ullautuq nallunarcaumaluni.
Angayuqran Syria-m alerqullrui yuinaq qulmek cipluku malruk-wa (32) akalrialget anguyagcuutet atanerruarit alla curuusqevkenaki angayuqra tau͡gaam Israel-aam.
Tua-i tangllermeggni Angayuqaq Jehoshaphat-aq, tamarmeng umyuartequt angayuqaqsukluku Israel-aamun, caqirtut-llu curugnaluku. Tau͡gaam qayagpallrani,
taringaat angayuqaqenrilucia Israel-aamun, curulteng-llu arulairaat.

Naspaaluni Syria-rmiu anguyagta pitgartuq pitegcautmek nall'arrluku Angayuqaq Ahab-aq akngircailkutiin arivnerakun. “Akngirtua!” qayagpagtuq anguyagcuutmi akalrialgek alulartiignun. “Uterrluten anguyagmek ani!”

Anguyak tamalkisngallrani, Angayuqaq Ahab-aq nangerngaurtuq anguyagcuutegmi iluagni, Syria-rmiut caumaluki. Auga-llu ekianek qurrlurtu'rluni natra patua anguyagcuutek akalrialgek, atakuyartullrani-llu tuquuq.
Akertem teviryartullrani ellimerrun ayagtuq Israel-aat anguyagtaitgun: “Tamarpeci nakmiin nunavcen̄un nunarpavcen̄un-llu uterci!”
Tua-i Angayuqaq Ahab-aq tuquuq. Temii-llu ayaucimauq Samaria-mun tungmagcimaluni-llu.
Anguyagcuutek-llu akalrialgek eruragket nanvarrariini Samaria-m, tuani qimugtet auga pairaat akissut-llu tuavet erurluteng,
Cat tamalkuita allat Angayuqam Ahab-am callri, ilakluku-llu igausngaluni elliin atanruvia tangnircaumallra tulunek, tamalkuita-llu nunarpiit nautellri, igauquraumaut
Tuqullran nalliini qetunraan Ahaziah-m cimillrua angayuqrurrluni.
Allrakut cetamaurtellratni ataniurillran Angayuqam Ahab-am Israel-aami, Jehoshaphat-aq qetunraa Asa-m angayuqrurtuq Judah-mi
allrakungluni yuinaq akimiarmek cipluku (35), atanirturiluni-llu allrakuni yuinaq tallimanek cipluku (25). Aanii Azubah-uluni, pania Shilhu-m.
Atami pillratun Asa-m ciumini, piciuluni calillruuq
Jehoshaphat-aaq uitanqegcinarqellruuq angayuqranun Israel-aam.
Cat tamalkurmeng Jehoshaphat-am callri, cacetullra anguyallri-llu, igauquraumaut
Au͡g'allrui-llu tamalkuita angutet arnat-llu akissut agayumanrilnguut ekuaviatni kevgiulalriit atani Asa angayuqaullrani cali tamaantelallret.
Nunii Edom-aam angayuqritellruuq; angayuqran Judah-m ellimellranek atanirturisqelluku ataniurterluni.

Angayuqaq Jehoshaphat-aaq imarpigtaatulinek sun'anek pingqellruuq piliaqumaluteng tengalralararkauluteng nuniinun Ophir-aam suulutaassaagluteng; tau͡gaam picurlagluni navgullruluni Eziongeber-aami tua-i-llu tengalranqigtevkenani.
Tua-llu Angayuqam Ahaziah-m Israel-aani tunyaaqai anguyagten̄i tengalrallguciisqelluki Jehoshaphat-m anguyagtai, tau͡gaam ciuniunritaa piyullra.
Jehoshaphat-aq tuquuq qunguucimaluni-llu atanruviim qungurviinun David-aam Nunarpiini, qetunraan-llu cimiraa angayuqrurrluni.

Allrakut akimiaq malrugnek (17) cipluku nalliitni atanirturillran Angayuqam Jehoshaphat-am Judah-mi, Ahaziah Ahab-am qetunraa angayuqrurtuq Israel-aami, atanirturiluni-llu Samaria-mi allrakugni malrugni.
Assiilngirtuq
Agayuvikaqluku kevgiullrua Baal-aq, atami-llu pillratun ciumini, eq'uqercetaa
Israel-aat Angayuqrat Ahab-aq tuqurraartelluku Moab-armiut inglulitut Israel-aamun.

Israel-aat Angayuqrat Ahaziah igtuq akervigmek qiliinelngurmek atanruvimi Samaria-mi cakneq-llu akngirrluni. Tua-i kevganek ayagceciuq ellatessurvikesqelluku Baalzebub-aaq, Philistine-at nunarpiita Ekron-aam agayutii, nallunrirnaluku assiriarkaucini wall'u assiringailucini.
Tau͡gaam an'gilaa
Qanrusgu angayuqaq
kevgat-llu utertut angayuqamun, aptai-llu, “Ciin uterceci?”
Taukut-llu kiugut, “Angutem pairrsaallruakut qanrulluta-llu, Uterci angayuqamun ayagcecestevcen̄un qanrulluku-llu, waten qanertuq
Angayuqam-llu aptai, “Qaillun tauna angun pairrsaagcesteci makunek-llu qanrulluci ayuqa?”
Taukut-llu kiugaat, “Ulikutangqertuq ungungssit amiitnek pilimalriamek, qecigmek naquguterluni.”
Angayuqaq-llu qanlertuq, “Elijah-uguq Tishbite-aq!”

Tua-i ayagceciuq atanerruamek yuinaak malruk qulmek ciplukek (50) malilirluku angutnek aqvaluku Elijah. Taum atanerruam ullagaa Elijah, aqumgallrani qemim qaingani qanrulluku-llu, “Agayutem yuani, angayuqam picirkiraaten atraasqelluten.”
Tau͡gaam Elijah-m kiugaa, “Wiinga Agayutem yuk'ekanga, keneq atrarli qilagmek ekualuten-llu maliten-llu angucet.” Egmian-llu keneq atrartuq qilagmek piunrirluku tauna atanerruaq malii-llu.

Ataam angayuqaq allamek atanerruamek ayagceciuq angutnek yuinaak malruk qulmek ciplukek (50) malilirluku, tauna ayagtuq qanerluni-llu Elijah-mun, “Agayutem yuani, angayuqam picirkiraaten egmian waniwa atraasqelluten!”
Elijah kiuguq, “Agayutem yuk'ekanga, keneq atrarli qilagmek ekualuten-llu maliten-llu angucet.” Egmian-llu kenra Agayutem atrartuq qilagmek piunrirluku-llu tauna atanerruaq malii-llu.

Cali ataam angayuqaq ayagceciuq atanerruamek yuinaak malruk qulmek ciplukek (50) angutnek malilirluku. Tauna mayurtuq qemimun, ciisqumiggluni-llu ciuqerranun Elijah-m aguagulluku, “Agayutem yuani, kaigavikamken takumcukesqellua ukut-llu maliinka. Unguvavkarkut!
Allak malruk atanerruak malikek-llu angucet kenrem qilagmek tuqutellrui; wiinga tau͡gaam takumcukekia.”
Tua-i-llu an'gilaa
qanerluni-llu elliinun, “Waten qanertuq
Tua-i Ahaziah yuunrirtuq,
Allat pillri Angayuqam Ahaziah-m igausngallruut
tumemegni Elijah-m qanrutaa Elisha, “Wani uitaqaa;
Tau͡gaam Elisha-m kiugaa, “
Prophet-aat-llu Bethel-aamelnguut anvikluku Elisha aptaat, “Nallunritan-qaa unuamek
Elisha-m kiugaa, “Aa-ang, nallunritaqa. Tau͡gaam qalaruteksuumiitaqa.”
Elijah-llu qanertuq Elisha-mun, “Wantauraa,
Tau͡gaam Elisha kiuguq, “
Prophet-aat-llu Jericho-melnguut ullagluku Elisha aptaat, “Nallunritan-qaa unuamek
Elisha kiuguq, “Aa-ang, nallunritua; tau͡gaam qalaruteksuumiitaqa.”
Tua-llu Elijah-m qanrutaa Elisha, “Wantauraa,
Tau͡gaam Elisha kiuguq, “

yuinaak-llu malruk qulnek ciplukek (50) prophet-aat maligtagkek Jordan-aamun. Elijah-nkuk Elisha-llu arulairtuk kuigem canianun, taukut-llu yuinaak malruk qulmek ciplukek prophet-aat nangertut yaaqvaarilukek.
Tuani Elijah-m ulikutani yuugaa imegluku-llu, piqerturaa-llu meq ulikutaminek; meq-llu avegtuq, qerartuk-llu kuigem akianun nunakun kinreskiikun.
Qeraumariamek Elijah qanertuq Elisha-mun, “Qanrusnga camek wangnun pisqumallerpenek tegumavailegma.”
Elisha-m-llu kiugaa, “Kaigavikamken, paitangqerceskia malrurqugnek tapluku anernerpenek.”
Elijah-m-llu kiugaa, “Caperrnarqellriamek piteklirtuten; tau͡gaam akurturciqan tangvakuvnga elpenek tegumallemni; tangvanrilkuvnga akurturngaitan.”
Qalaruqu'urtuk-llu piyuanginanermegni; alqunaq-llu keneq pekcessuun akalrialek elussitangqerrluni kenernek akuliignun piuq, ull'uyam-llu Elijah qilagmun ayautaa!
Elisha-m tangvagaa qayagpagluni-llu Elijah-mun, “Atamaa, atamaa! Pinilria ingluliurutestii Israel-aam! Ayagtuten!” Tangenqigtenritaa-llu Elijah.
Angniinani-llu ulikutani allgaa avegluku.
Elijah-m-llu ulikutaa tegua qainganek igtelleq, uterrluni-llu nangertuq Jordan-aam cen̄iinun.
Meq-llu piqerturaa Elijah-m ulikutaanek qanerluni, “Nauwa
Prophet-aat yuinaak malruk qulmek cipluku Jericho-mek tangrraat qanerluteng-llu, “Pinia Elijah-m tut'uq Elisha-mun!” Pairrsaagaat-llu, ciuqerranun-llu pull'uteng nunamun,
qanerluteng, “Yuinaak malruk qulmek ciplukek watua amllertaukut, tamamta pinilriaruluta. Ayagceskut yuaryarturluku angayuqan. Pingatuq anerneran
Elisha-m kiugai, “Qang'a, ayagyaqunaci.”
Tau͡gaam aguagutellratni kiaruciirutnatkaanun ayagcetai. Ayagtut taukut yuinaak malruk qulmek ciplukek angucet, tamiini-llu yuarayaaqut Elijah-mek ernerni pingayuni, tau͡gaam nataqevkenaku.
Utertut-llu Elisha-mun Jericho-mi utaqallrani, ellaitnun-llu qanertuq, “Qanrutellrunritamci-qaa ayaasqevkenaci?”
Angutet-llu Jericho-mek Elisha ullagaat qanerluteng, “Nallunrilucirpetun, Elisha, una nunarpak assilriaruuq, tau͡gaam mer'a assinrituq irnicuarceciaqluni-llu.”
Ellimerrai-llu, “Qantaq nutaraq taryumek imirluku taiciu.” Tua-i taitaat elliinun,
ayagluni-llu carvamun, eggluku-llu taryuq mermun, qanertuq-llu, “Waten qanertuq
Tua-i meq menuirutellruuq una erneq engelkarrluku, Elisha qanellruciatun tuaten piciqniluku.
Elisha Jericho-mek ayagtuq Bethel-aamun; ayainanrani tan'gaurlucuaraat an'ut nunanek anglamiqutekluku-llu. Qayagpagaluteng, “Ayii maaken, qamiqulegmi mequmalriamek!”
Elisha-llu tuigtuq, tangvanerrlugtai-llu, aniqlaaluki-llu
Tuaken-llu ayagtuq egmirluni Ingrimun Carmel-aamun, tuaken-llu uterrluni Samaria-mun.

Jehoshaphat-aam Judah-m angayuqran atanirturillra amllertariqerluki allrakut akimiaq pingayunek cipluku (18), Jehoram-aaq Ahab-am qetunraa angayuqrurtuq Israel-aami, Samaria-mi-llu atanirturiluni allrakuni qula malrugnek cipluku.
Assiitellriamek calillruuq
Tau͡gken ciuqlirmitun Angayuqatun Jeroboam-aatun Nebat-aam qetunraatun, ciuliqagtellrua Israel-aaq assiilngurmun taqsugpek'nani-llu.

Tamaani Mesha angayuqra Moab-am qusnginek anglicarilartuq; allamiaqan-llu taitelaraa Israel-aam angayuqra tallimanek tiissitsaanek (100,000) qusngiyagarnek, melqurritnek-llu yuinaat talliman tiissitsaat (100,000) angucalut qusngit.
Tau͡gaam Ahab-aq tuquan, angayuqra Moab-am inglulituq Israel-aamun.
Egmianun-llu Angayuqaq Jehoram-aaq ayagtuq Samaria-mek quyurrluki-llu tamalkuita anguyagten̄i.
Qanermek-llu ayagceciuq Jehoshaphat-aamun Judah-m angayuqranun; “Angayuqra Moab-am inglulituq wangnun; maligciiqerpenga-qaa Moab-aq anguyakumku?”
Angayuqam Jehoshaphat-aam kiugaa, “Camek pisqumakuvnga piqainaugua, anguyagtenka-llu tuaten piut elussitanka-llu.”
Qanerluni-llu, “Nau͡gg'un ayagciqseta?” Jehoram-aam kiugaa, “Yaaqsinrakun ayagciqukut yuilqurtaa Edom-aam tumekluku.”

Tua-i angayuqra Israel-aam ayagtuq maligluni Judah-m angayuqranek Edom-aam-llu angayuqranek. Pektellerteng nalkuirpek'nateng ernengluku malrunlegni meriutut, merkairulluteng anguyagtet ungungssiit-llu akluitnek atmalget.
Tua-llu angayuqra Israel-aam qanertuq, “Qaillun pisciigaliukut!
Jehoshaphat-aaq-llu qanertuq, “Prophet-aamek-qaa pitaituq man'a tumekluku kangiituryaqput
Tua-llu Israel-aam angayuqran pistain iliita kiugaa, “Elisha Shaphat-aam qetunraa maantuq. Elijah-m ikayuqellrua.”
Jehoshaphat-aaq-llu qanertuq, “Tauna piciuluni prophet-aaruuq.” Tua-i angayuqra Israel-aam, Jehoshaphat-aaq, Edom-aam-llu angayuqra ayagtut Elisha-mun.
Elisha-llu qanertuq angayuqranun Israel-aam, “Ciin wiinga ikayuryarciken? Ayagluten kangiiturviksarturki prophet-aat atavet aanavet-llu kangiiturvik'lalkek.”
Tau͡gaam angayuqran Israel-aam kiugaa, “Qang'a;
Elisha-llu qanertuq, “
Tau͡gaam watua aturcetaartem̄ek taicia.”
Aturcetaarta-llu aturcetaarinanrani
qanertuq-llu, “Waten qanertuq
Tangerrngaituci anuqmek ellallugmek-llu, tau͡gaam kinreskii kuik imangeciquq mermek, elpeci-llu, kuluvaci, ungungssit-llu akluvcen̄ek atmalget merkarpecen̄ek nuryugcingaituci.’”
Cali Elisha qanertuq, “Man'a-llu cali caperrnarqenrituq

Cirlakciqaci-llu tamalkuita cayailkuciumalriit tangkegcinarqelriit nunarpait; iquciiqaci atsangtulit napautait, arulairrluki carvat mer'et, naungignarqellriit-llu naucetaarviit atuunrirluki patuluki teggalqunek.”
Unuaquan, ekuagiyaram elliitnek nalliini, meq carvuq Edom-aam tungiinek nuna-llu patuluku.

Moabite-at niicameng angayuqanun anguyagyartuucirmeggnek, tamalkuita angucet caskunek tegumiaryugngalriit, ayagyuankacagameggnek ak'allaunkacagameggnun, qayagaurumaut nunalgarcimaluteng-llu manuqliuluteng.
Unuaquan makcameng, akertem meq ciqinqaumaluku, Moabite-at tangrraat akilirnemeggni kavircen̄ani augtun ayuqluni.
Qanertut-llu, “Man'a auguuq! Pingayun inglukutellriit anguyagtet callullrungatut tuqurqulluteng! Ayagluta uayaryarturnaurarput pelateka'arviit!”
Tau͡gaam tekicatgu pelatekarvik, Israelite-at curukarait kaiyimluki kingutmun. Israelite-at maligtait, tumemeggni tuqutaqluki Moabite-at

nunarpait-llu tamalkuita piunrirrluki. Kituraqamegteki nunakeggneret, tamarmeng Israelite-at teggalqunek eggvik'larait naucetaarviit tamarmeng patunatkaatnun; arulairtaqluki-llu carvat mer'et, iqulluki-llu tamalkuita assilriit atsanek naugitulit napat; kiituani nunarpak Kir Heres-aaq angayuqam uitavia kiimi ellirtuq, elluqustet-llu kassugulluku teguat.

Tuani Moab-am angayuqran tangrramiu cirlakumaqatallni, tiissitsaam avga yuinarnek qulnek cipluku (700) anguyagten̄ek nuussirpalegnek malilirluni pellungnaqsaaqai ingluni qimagnaluni angayuqranun Edom-aam; tau͡gaam pisciigatut.

Tua-i tegua yum'i amaqliat, atanirturiarkauyaaqelleq kingumikun, ekualuku-llu nunarpiim qacarneran qaingani elliitekluku agayutiinun Moab-am. Israelite-at-llu cakneq alingenga'artut; tua-i kingupiartut nunarpagmek uterrluteng-llu nakmiin nunameggnun.

Wani nulirra iliita quyungqalriit prophet-aat ayagtuq Elisha-mun qanerluni-llu, “Uika tuquuq! Nallunrilucirpetun, Agayun qigcikluku yuullruuq, tau͡gaam watua angun akiilngungqerrvia taiguq teguyarturlukek qetunraagka pisteknalukek akiliuteklukek uima akiilnguanun.”
Elisha-m-llu qanrutaa, “Camek piciqsiken? Qanrusnga, camek pingqercit enevni?”
Arnaq kiuguq, “Camek piitua, angenrilngurmek tau͡gaam assigtamek uqumek imalegmek.”
Tua-llu Elisha-m qanrutaa, “Elaqlirpenun agluten navraa imailngurnek assigtanek piugngatacirpetun.
Qetunraagken-llu iterci enemun, patuluku amiik, uqumek-llu imirluki assigtat; una muiraqan calligtaqluku.”
Tua-i arnam unilluku itertuq eneminun qetunraagni maliklukek, amiik-llu patuluku, teguluku-llu angenrilnguq assigtaq uqumek imalek kuvluku-llu caqutnun qetunraagmi taitaqagneki.
Tamarmeng imangata assigtat, aptuq allamek cali pitangqerrucianek. Aipaagnek-llu kiugaa, “Tauna nangenruuq.” Uquq taq'uq maqnermek.
Arnam-llu uterrvikluku Elisha, prophet-aaq qanrutaa, taum qanrutaa, “Ayagluten tunyarturki uqut akililluki-llu tamalkuita akiilnguten, ilakuarit qetunraagken-llu yuutekniaci.”
Erenret iliitni Elisha ayagtuq Shunem-aamun, tuani tukuulria arnaq uitauq. Kelgaa-llu neresqelluku, tuakenirnek-llu ayallni tamalkuan Shunem-aamun nerlartuq taum arnam eniini.
Arnaq-llu qanertuq uiminun, “Taringaqa una maavet taiguralalria Agayutmun yuk'ucia tanqilriaruluni.
Ataki angenrilngurmek eneliqaalta enem qaingani inglercirluku, estuulumek, aqumllermek, kenurralirluku-llu, nani taigaqami tuantelarniartuq.”
Erenret iliitni Elisha utertuq Shunem-aamun mayurluni-llu tuavet enecuarmun mernuinercirnaluni.
Pisten̄i-llu Gehazi qanrutaa, “Taisqiu Shunammite-aq.” Taingan,
qanertuq Gehazi-mun, “Qanrusgu, tangrriu yagarutkellruan man'a wangkuk piteklunuk: akiluku camek wangnun pisqumasit? Angayuqamun-qaa wall'u anguyagtet atanirturtiitnun camek qanrucicesqumauten?”
Arnam-llu kiugaa, “Kepqutaitua maani nakmiin yuunka ilagarluki uitiima.”
Elisha-m Gehazi aptaa, “Camek-mi tua-i wii piciqsia elliinun?”
Gehazi kiuguq, “Atam-wa arnaq qetunraituq, uinga-llu ak'allaurrluni.”
Elisha-llu ellimeqlirtuq, “Qanrusgu wavet taisqelluku.” Tailuni-llu nangertuq amiigmi.
Elisha-m-llu qanrutaa, “Uum nalliini allamiku qetunramek tegumiarciquten.”
Arnaq qanlertuq, “Ala-i! Nakleklua iqluunrilnga. Agayutem yukaaten!”
Tau͡gaam arnaq qingartuq, qetunrangluni-llu tuani up'nerkaan, Elisha-m qanrutellruciatun.
Allrakut qavcin kinguatni, quyurciyaram nalliini, unuakut iliitni tan'gaurluq an'uq atani ullagluku, calillrani naucetaarvigmi calilriit quyurciluteng ilagarluki.
Piqatarraarpek'nani qanertuq ataminun, “Qamiquqa akngirnarquq! Qamiquqa akngirnarquq!”
“Kevegluku agusgu aaniinun,” atii qanertuq pistem̄un.
Tua-i kevegluku aaniinun agutaa, aaniin-llu tegumiaqaa mikelnguq erenrem qukallra tekilluku, taum-llu nalliini tuquluni.
Arnam-llu mayuulluku ellia Elisha-m ingelrinun, amiik-llu patuluku an'uq.
Uini-llu qayagaurluku qanrutaa, “Taivkari pistet iliitnek ciulvagmek malilirluku. Prophet-aaq Elisha ullagnarqaqa. Piugngaritemni uterciiqua.”
Uingan-llu aptaa, “Ciin unuamek ayakatarcit? Sabbath-aarunrituq wall'u Nutaram Iralum Nerevkaritekevkenaku.” Arnaq qanertuq, “Canrituq.”
Arnam-llu aqumviliraa ciulvak, qanerluni-llu pistem̄un, “Ayagcessgu ciulvak cukataciatun, cukailcaryaqunaku-llu pisqevvailemken.”
Tua-i ayagtuq tekilluni-llu Elisha-m uitavianun Mount Carmel-aami.
Elisha-m-llu tangrramiu agiirtellrani qanertuq Gehazi-mun pistem̄inun, “Atam man'a, arnaq Shunammite-aq tailria!
Aqvaqurluten pairrsaaggu apniaran canriluciitnek ellii, uinga, qetunraa-llu.”
Arnam-llu Gehazi qanrutaa qaillun pinritniluteng,
tau͡gaam tekicami Elisha-mun, put'uq ciuqerranun it'gaakun-llu teguluku. Gehazi-m ullagluku tuaken cingqataryaaqaa. Tau͡gaam Elisha qanertuq, “Uitasgu, tangenrritan-qaa cakviuqapigtellra?
Tua-llu arnaq qanertuq, “Kaigavikellruamken-qaa qetunrarkamnek? Qanrutellrunritamken-qaa ellmikun neryuniurutkamnek pisqevkenii?”

Elisha-m tuiggvikluku Gehazi qanrutaa, “Naquggluten, ayaruqa aturluku ayii. Pairkengkuvet kitumek arulairluten aryuqutmek piyaqunaku; kia-llu aryuqutmek pikaten akiyaqunaku; cumiggluten enemun agkina ayaruqa-llu kegginaanun mikelnguum elliluku.”
Tua-llu aanii mikelnguum qanertuq, “

Gehazi-llu ayagtuq ciungagnegun elliluku-llu ayaruq kegginaanun mikelnguum, tau͡gaam nepaituq tangellra-llu tuqumalriatun ayuquq. Tua-i utertuq Elisha pairrsaagluku qanerluni-llu, “Mikelnguq tupanrituq.”
Elisha itrami enemun tangrraa mikelnguq inglerni tuqumaluku.
Elisha iterluni amiik patuluku, allamek ilaunatek, piicagtuq
Qainganun-llu mikelnguum inartuq, qaneni qanranun elliluku, iigni-llu iigkenun, unatni-llu unatainun; qainganun Elisha nengcan mikelnguum kemga puqlanguq.
Ataam makluni Elisha utertaartuq, ataam-llu mayurluni nengtuq mikelnguum qainganun; mikelnguq-llu aqestuq malrunlerqunek, iigni-llu uillukek.
Elisha-m Gehazi taisqelluku qanrutaa mikelnguum aanii taisqesqelluku. Itran Elisha-m qanrutaa, “Waniwa qetunraan.”
Arnam put'uq Elisha-m it'gainun, nuna agturluku; qetunrani-llu teguluku an'uq.

Elisha ataam tekituq Gilgal-aamun piitnaq tusngallrani tamiini nunami. Elitnauriinanermini quyungqalrianek prophet-aanek, qanrutaa pisten̄i, “Kenermun egalvagmek maniiluten, soup-amek keniuski prophet-aat.”
Iliit an'uq naucetaarvigmun avurnaluni naumalrianek, nataqulluni-llu wine-at avayaatnek avurluni-llu manuni imiraa nakacuguaruluki, uterrluni-llu ingqiluki keniramun avulluki, nalluluki cauciit.
Neqliurluki-llu angutet neresqelluki. Tau͡gaam uigutmeggni qanertut Elisha-mun, “Agayutem yuani, man'a keniraq tuqunarqelriamek avungqertuq!” Neryuumiinaku-llu.
Elisha qanertuq. “Taicia mukaarkamek miilimalriamek.” Egatmun-llu kuvaa, qanerluni-llu, “Cali neqliurciki.” Tamana-llu neqiit camek canganarqellriamek pitaituq.

Cat iliitni angun taiguq Baalshalishah-mek, tailluku Elisha yuinarnek barley-nek kelipanek, tuani allrakumi qecukarraallernek, nutaranek-llu miilimanrilngurnek mukaarkanek. Elisha-m kevgani ellimerraa taukut prophet-aat nerevkaasqelluki tamakunek,
tau͡gaam pistem kiugaa, “Qaillun ukut neqkiutekqatarcia yuinarnun tallimanun (100) angutnun?” Elisha-llu ataam qanenqigtuq, “Tuniki nernaurtut, waten qanran
Tua-i pistem neqkat ellii ciuqerratnun. Tamarmeng-llu ner'ut ilakuiluteng-llu,
Naaman-aaq, atanirturtiit anguyagtain Syria-m, quyilriamek pirpakellrua pivakluku angayuqran Syria-m, Naaman-aaq-wa tumekluku
Tamaani Israel-aat iliitni anguyallermegteki ayautellruut nasaurlucuarmek Israelite-amek, nulirran-llu Naaman-aam pisteksagulluku.
Erenret iliitni qanertuq arnamun pikestem̄inun, “Angayuqama-tuq tangerrsarturliu prophet-aaq Samaria-mi! Canrircecaraa mamyuilnguanek.”
Naaman-aam man'a niicamiu ullagluku angayuqaq qanrutaa nasaurluum qanellranek.
Angayuqaq-llu qanertuq, “Ayii wanirpak, igamek ayagceciciqua angayuqratnun Israel-aat.”
Tua-i ayagtuq, ayaulluni tiissitsaanek qulnek (30,000) qerrlimek, arvinlegnek tiissitsaanek (6,000) suulutaanek, qulnek-llu aturaqegtaarnek.
Igaq-llu angayuqratnun Israel-aat tunyarturaa, qanrumalria, “Uum igam tekiskaten, nallunritniaran Naaman-aaq pisteka elpenun ayagcessuciqa, canrircecesqelluku mamyuilnguanek.”

Angayuqran-llu Israel-aam naaqngamiu igaq, aturani allgurai qanerluni-llu, “Agayutnguunga-qaa tuquciyugngalua unguvavkariyugngalua-llu, taumek-qaa uum angutem igaqiinga canrircecesqelluku angun mamyuilnguanek? Nallunaituq qanemyuugautmek ayagniringnaquq ingluklua.”

Tau͡gaam prophet-aaq Elisha niicami angayuqratnun Israel-aat allgurniluki aturani, qanrucarturcetaa angayuqaq qanerluni, “Ciin allgurciki aturaten? Taivkarru watua wangnun, nallunrirnauraa prophet-aartangqerrucia Israel-aami.”
Naaman-aaq taiguq elussitamikun pekcessuutetgun-llu, arulairluni-llu amiiganun Elisha-m eniin.
Elisha-m pista anevkaraa qanrutesqelluku, “Ayagluten eruryartua Jordan-aamun malrunlerqunek, qain assiriarkauguq ciungani ayuqucillermitun, menuiruciiquten-llu.”
Tau͡gaam Naaman-aaq qenertuq, ayagluni-llu qanerluni, “Umyuarteqsaaqua ilumun tungaunaku anenayukluku wangnun piicagluni-llu
Abana-qaa Pharpar-aq-llu, Damascus-aami kuigek, assinrunrituk tamarmeng kuigini Israel-aam? Eruryunaitua-qaa taukugnun, carriullua-llu?” Tua-i tuigtuq ayagluni-llu qenerteqapiggluni.
Tau͡gaam pistain ullagluku qanertut elliinun, “Prophet-aam-qaa pisqekaten camek angelriamek, tuaten piyanrituten? Qaillun pitanruyarta waten qanqan elpenun, ‘Erua, carriulluten-llu?’”
Tua-i atrarluni akurtuq malrunlerqunek Jordan-aamun, Elisha-m alerqullruciatun, qainga-llu canrirtuq mikelnguyagaam kemgatun ayuqliriluni, carriulluni-llu.

Tua-i utertuq Elisha-mun, maligugani malikluki, nangerrluni-llu ciuqerranun; qanertuq, “Nutaan waniwa nallunriraqa agayucetailucia tamalkuan nunam qaingani, Israel-aam tau͡gaam Agayutiinek; taumek akurturru cikiuteka elpenun.”
Tau͡gaam Elisha qanertuq, “

Tua-llu Naaman-aaq qanertuq, “Ciuniuqatanrilkuvgu, malruk ciulviik ucikanragnek nunamek pilii kingunemnun ut'rutarkamnek, wani-wa wak'nirnek ayaglua elliingaitua ekualuki elliitnek allanun agayutnun kiingan tau͡gaam
Taumek neryuniurtua
Elisha-m-llu qanrutaa, “Ayii uitanqegciluten.” Tua-i Naaman-aaq ayagtuq.
Ayakanrakun yaaqsigivailgan,
Gehazi, pistii Elisha-m, qanertuq, “Angayuqama ayagceskii Naaman-aaq Syrian-aaq, ciuniurpek'naki cikiutai taitellri.
Tua-i Gehazi ayagtuq Naaman-aaq maliggluku. Naaman-aam-llu tangrramiu aqvaqulria kingunermikun, yuuguq pekcessuutegminek ciuniurnaluku, apluni-llu, “Ca-qaa imna qaillun piuq?”

Tauna-llu qanertuq, “Tamarmeng assirtut. Angayuqama ayagcetaanga elpenun qanrutesqelluten, ‘Waniwa watua tekitellriartangqertuq ingrilegtaanek Ephraim-aam malrugnek ilagketnek quyungqalriit prophet-aat; elliin-llu cikiisqumaak elpenun tiissitsaanek pingayunek (3,000) qerrirlinek yuutekagnek-llu malrugnek aturaqegtaaraagnek.’”

Naaman-aaq-llu qanertuq, “Kitaki teguten arvinlegnek tiissitsaanek (6,000) qerrirlinek.” Aguagutaa-llu, qillrulluki-llu qerrirlit malrugnun kalngaagnun, malrugnun-llu pistegminun tunlukek ilaklukek malrugnek yuutekagnek aturaqegtaaraagnek, ayagtellukek-llu Gehazi-m ciungakun.
Tekicameng-llu pengumun Elisha-m uitavianun, Gehazi-m teguak kalngaak itrullukek-llu enemun. Naaman-aam-llu pistek utercetak.
Itertuq-llu enemun nangerrluni-llu angayuqami ciuqerrani, Elisha-llu qanertuq elliinun, “Naken pisit, Gehazi?” Ellii-llu qanertuq, “Natmun ayaksaitua.”

Tau͡gaam Elisha-m qanrutaa, “Pillgucinritamken-qaa anernerkun angutem yuuluni pekcessuutminek pairrsaallraten? Akurturnariuq-qaa akinek aturanek-llu, olive-aat napaitnek, wine-at naucetaarviitnek, qusnginek, kuluvagnek, angutnek pisten̄ek, arnanek-llu pisten̄ek?
Watua-llu mamyuilngua Naaman-aam tuciiquq elpenun, kinguverpenun-llu akwarpak.” Tua-i Gehazi an'uq Elisha-m uitallranek mamyuilngurluni, qatertaluni qanikcartun.
Erenret iliitni quyungqalriit prophet-aat Elisha-m ataniuqengai qanemyuugartut elliinun, “Uitavigput angayuqaqluten piviitessiyaagtuq.
Ataki ayagceskut Jordan-aamun muragnek aqvalluta, enelinaurtukut uitavigkamten̄ek.” Elisha-llu kiuguq, “Ayagci.”
Tua-llu iliita aguagutaa maligtesqelluteng. Elisha-m kiugaa, “Ayagciqua.”
Tua-i ayagtuq maliggluki. Tekicameng-llu Jordan-aamun kepuriut napanek.
Iliit iqurqiinanermini piqertuutaan kegginaa igtuq mermun; qayagpagluni-llu, “Elisha, qaillun piqatarcia? Piqertuutaq navrauguq.”
Elisha-llu aptuq, “Natmun igta?”
Apertuucani iggvillranek, keputuq muragmek, eggluku-llu tuavet, piqertuutaam-llu qamiqurra cavik pugtercelluku.
Ellii-llu qanertuq, “Mayuresgu.” Tua-i angutem yaggluni tegua.
Angayuqran Syria-m anguyallerminiu Israel-aaq, qanellgutkai atanerruani nakmikiluni-llu nani pelatekaumavigkaminek.
Tau͡gaam Elisha ayagceciuq qanermek angayuqranun Israel-aam aarcirturluku taum nunam mallgeskiikun ayaasqevkenaku, Syrian-aat tuanetniluki curugyukaarluki.
Angayuqran-llu Israel-aam aarcirturai yuut tuani uitalriit, taukut-llu keltut. Waten Elisha-m aarcirtularaa, tua-i Israel-aam angayuqra ellminek aviutaqluni qavcirqunek.
Umyugaa-llu angayuqran Syria-m cakneq nuniituq man'a pitekluku; anguyagtem̄i-llu atanerruarit taivkarluki apluki, “Nalirpeci ingluarvikau angayuqra Israel-aam?”
Iliit-llu kiuguq, “Kia ingluarvikenritaa, atanemaa, angayuqaq; Elisha-m prophet-aam qanrut'laraa Israel-aam angayuqra qanllerpenek enevni-llu kitumek niitestaunak qanllerpenek.”
Qanertuq-llu, “Ayagluci yuarciu nanlucia, wiinga teguniarqa.” Qanrutaat, “Dothan-aametuq.”
Tua-i tuavet ayagceciuq elussitalegnek, pekcessuutelegnek anguyagterugarnek-llu; tekitut-llu tuavet unugmi kassugulluku-llu nunarpak.
Pistai-llu Elisha-m makcameng unuakuarmi anluteng tangrrait, anguyagtet elussitalget pekcessuutelget-llu kassugusngakiit nunarpak. Pista-llu qanertuq, “Arenqiapaa, angayuqamaa, qaillun piciqseta?”
Elisha qanertuq, “Alingevkenaci, pingqertukut amllenritnek ellaita piitni.”
Tua-llu piicagtuq, qanerluni, “
Syrian-aat-llu atrarluteng curullratni, Elisha piicagtuq, “
Tua-llu Elisha-m ullagluki qanrutai, “Iqlukun tumyarakun ayagtuci; una nunarpak yuaqengaqenritarci. Maligcia, ayauciiqamci-llu angutmun yuaqengarpecen̄un.” Ayautai-llu Samaria-mun.
Tamaa-llu itrameng Samaria-mun, Elisha qanertuq. “
Angayuqran Israel-aam tangrramiki Syrian-aat, Elisha aptaa, “Tuqullaki-qaa? Tuqullaki-qaa?”

Elisha-m kiugaa, “Tuqusngaitaten. Tuqucugngaaten-qaa teguaqelten nuussirpagpegun urluverpegun-llu? Cikirki tau͡gaam kelipanek mermek-llu nerniartut merluteng-llu, nutaan-llu utertelluki angayuqratnun.”
Tua-i upyutai nererpallerkaat; nerumariata-llu merluteng-llu, ayagcetai utertelluki Syria-m angayuqranun. Tuakenirnek-llu Syrian-aat taqluku Israel-aat nuniitnun anguyalallerteng.
Kinguqvaarni Benhadad-am angayuqran Syria-m quyurtai tamalkuita anguyagten̄i, mayurluteng-llu kassugutaat Samaria.
Angelriamek-llu kainiqut Samaria-mi kassugusngallratni, kiituani ciulviim qamiqurran kiputellerkaa akinguq yuinarnek cetamanek (80) qerrirlinek, usperem-llu avga yaqulget dove-at anait
Tuani angayuqra Israel-aam kitullrani mengliikun nunarpiim qacarneran, arnaq qayagpagtuq, “Ikayurkut, atanemaa, angayuqaaq!”
Elliin-llu kiugaa, “
Camek arenqiallugutengqercit?”
Arnam kiugaa, “Una arnaq qanertuq wangnun, ‘Qetunraan cikiutekiu nerniarput unuamek, unuaqu wii qetunraqa nerniarput.’
Tua-i kenirarput qetunraqa nerluku-llu. Unuaquan-llu qanertua arnamun, ‘Cikiutekiu qetunraan, nerniarput’; tau͡gaam iillrullinia qetunrani.”
Angayuqam niicamiu arnam qanellra aturani allgurai, yuut-llu qacarnerem mallgeskiini uitalriit tangrraat missuullernek atullinicia iluqliqluki aturaminun.
Qanerluni-llu, “Agayutem kaugtuqilia tuqullua Elisha, Shaphat-aam qetunraan, qamiquirumanrilkan unugpailgan.”
Ayagceciuq-llu pistem̄ek aqvavkarluku Elisha.

Taum nalliini Elisha enemini uitallruuq ilaluni ciulirnernek sen̄ircestem̄inek. Angayuqam-llu kevgaa tekipailgan Elisha qanertuq ciulirnernun, “Tauna tuqutarayuli taivkariuq tuqucestekamnek. Tauna tekiskan amiik patukiciu, itercecaqunaciu-llu. Angayuqaq tungaunani kingunrakun iterciqngan.”
Qallatellguteknginanrani-llu, angayuqaq tekituq qanerluni-llu, “Man'a pinerrlugun
Tau͡gaam Elisha qanertuq, “Niisgu qanellra
Tua-llu angayuqam aipirturtii, qanertuq Elisha-mun, “Tamana tuaten pingaituq,
Elisha-m kiugaa, “Nakmiin iigpegun tangerciqan, tau͡gaam nerngaituten neqkam iliinek.”
Angucetangqellruuq cetamanek mamyuilngulegnek iteryarain Samaria-m elatiini, qanruyutut-llu ellmeggnun, “Ciin wani aqumgaceta tuqunatkamten̄un?
Iteryaaqengramta nunarpagmun paluciqukut; wani tau͡gken uitakumta, cali tua-i tuquciqukut. Ataki, ayalta Syrian-aat pelatekaumaviatnun; uitaskatkut unguvaciqukut, tuquskatkut-llu tua-i tuquciqukut.”
Tua-i tan'geriarallrani ayagtut Syrian-aat pelatekaumaviatnun; tau͡gaam tekicameng elatiinun piut yugtaunani.

Syrian-aat niicetellruaki nepiitnek agiirtellriit anguyagterugaat horse-aalget ekumassuutelget-llu akalrialegnek, Syrian-aat-llu umyuartequt angayuqratnun Israel-aat akilillruyukluki Hittite-at, Egytian-aat-llu angayuqat anguyagtait-llu curuusqelluteng.
Taumek qimallrulliniut atakuarallrani pelatekateng, horse-aateng, ciulvateng pelatekaumavigteng-llu ayuquciatun unilluki.

Taukut-llu cetaman angucet tekicameng pelatekaumallrata elatiinun, itertut pelatekamun, nerluteng-llu merluteng-llu tamaanelngurnek, tegulluteng-llu qerrirlinek, suulutaanek, aturanek, ayaulluki-llu iirait; ataam-llu uterrluteng itertut allamun pelatekamun, tuaten-llu cali piluteng.

Tua-llu ellmeggnun qanruyutut, “Wangkuta elluamek pinritukut. Niitekegcinarqellriamek pingqellriakut, wangkuta kiimta nallunritnarqenritarput. Ertellerkaa utaqakumteggu qanrutkevkenaku, nallunailngurmek anucimirqecetaarumaciqukut. Ataki ayagluta wanirpak qanrucarturlaut angayuqam atanerruari.”

Tua-i unitaat Syrian-aat pelatekaumaviat, uterrluteng-llu Samaria-mun, qayagaurluki-llu iteryaram tarikestai qanrulluki, “Ayallruukut Syrian-aat pelatekaumaviatnun, kitumek-llu tangerpek'nata niitevkenata-llu; horse-aarit ciulvait-llu petuirumavkenateng, pelatekat-llu ayuqucimegcetun uitaluteng Syrian-aat uniyuciicetun.”
Tua-i iteryarat tarikestaita tamana qanrutkaat, qanrutekluku-llu eniini angayuqam.

Cali erteksaunani, tau͡gaam angayuqaq maktuq qanerluni-llu atanerruaminun, “Qanrutnaamci Syrian-aat pillerkiuraatnek. Nallunritaat kaigucirput; taumek pelatekaumauvigteng uniskait iirluteng-llu yuilqumun, umyuarteqluteng, ‘Ankata nunarpagmek unguvaita teguciqaput, iterluta-llu nunarpagmun.’”

Iliit-llu atanerruarin qanertuq, “Yuut-wa tua-i maanelnguut nunarpagmi qaillun anagngailnguut, au͡gkucetun amllertun ak'a tuqullertun. Taumek ayagcecilta angutnek talliman elussitat uitaqalriit aturtelluki, nallunrirniarput qaillun piciitnek.”
Tua-i nakmiut malrugnek angutegnek horse-aalgegnek, angayuqam-llu ayagcetak tungairtelluki Syrian-aat anguyagtet, qanrullukek, “Ayaglutek paqteki.”
Tua-i ayagtuk kingunrirturluki tekilluku Jordan-aaq; tumyarami-llu tangrrait aturat saskut-llu Syrian-aat unitellrit qimallermeggni. Uterrlutek-llu qanemciuk angayuqamun.
Tua-llu Samaria-m yuin anluteng uayaaraat pelatekaumaviat Syrian-aat.

Wani-wa angayuqran Israel-aam elkartellruluku atanerruaq, elliin nakmiin aipirturten̄i, murilkesten͞guluku nunarpiim ikirtuqaanun. Tauna yuut tutmaulluku tuqutaat, Elisha-m qanellruciatun angayuqam tangerrsartullrani.
Tua-i Elisha qanellruan angayuqamun, “Qulen usperet barley-mek, yuinaat-llu usperet miilimalria mukaarkaq tunumaciquq ataucimun qerrirlimun, uum nalliini iteryaraini Samaria-mi.”
Atanerruam kiullrukii Elisha, “Tamana tuaten pingaituq
Tua-i tamana elliinun piciurtuq, nunarpiim iteryaraani yuut tutmarluku tuqulluku.
Wani-wa Elisha qanellruluni arnamun Shunem-aami uitalriamun, nauwa qetunraa elliin Elisha-m canrircetellrukii, “Upluten ayii tamalkuita ilaten malikluki, arulairniartuci natmun piyugngallerpecen̄un;
Tua-i arnaq nangerrluni tuaten piuq qanruciatun Elisha-m: ayagluni malikluki ilani uitaluni-llu Philistine-at nuniitni malrunlegni allrakuni.
Allrakut-llu malrunelgen kinguatni, arnaq utertuq Israel-aamun, ullagluku-llu angayuqaq takumcuca'arviksarturaa eneni nunautni-llu ataam ellminun utercecesqelluki.
Tuani angayuqam qanellgutkellrua Gehazi, Elisha-m pistii, qanerluni, “Qanrusnga tamaitnek irr'inarqelrianek Elisha-m caliallrinek.”

Qanemcisnginanrani-llu angayuqaq Elisha-m unguircecillranek tuqumalriamek, arnam takumcuca'arvikaa angayuqaq. Gehazi-llu qanertuq, “Angayuqaaq, wani-wa tang arnaq, waniwa-llu qetunraa Elisha-m unguircetellra!”
