Angayuqam arnaq apcani qanrutaa Gehazi-m qanruciatun tuaten pillruniluku. Angayuqaq-llu atanerruamek nallunairiuq arnam ikayurtekaanek, qanerluni, “Ataam uterteski arnamun tamalkuita piutai, tapeqluki akillrata amllertaciit naucetaarviit naugillrit ayaggaanranek una erneq tekilluku.”
Elisha-llu ayagtuq Damascus-aamun Syria-m Angayuqra Benhadad-aaq naulluullran nalliini. Qanrucatni-llu Elisha tamaavet tekitniluku,
qanertuq Hazael-aamun, “Ayaulluten cikiutmek pairrsaaggu Elisha, piniaran kangiituutekesqelluku

Tua-i Hazael-aaq ayagtuq pairrsaagluku, cikiutnek ang'aqluni ayuqenrilngurnek assinqurraitnek Damascus-aarmiutarnek, yuinaak malruk (40) ungungssit qulugtellriit atmirluki. Tekicamiu-llu nangerrluni ciuqerranun, qanertuq, “Kevgarpet Benhadad-am, Angayuqran Syria-m, taivkaraanga aptesqelluten assiriarkaucirminek wall'u assiriarkaunrilucirminek naulluutminek?”
Elisha-llu kiuguq, “
Elisha-m-llu meciknauqanirluku tangrraa, uluqsaunaku-llu tangvagluku, kiituani Hazael-aaq uitacurlanguq. Alqunaq-llu Elisha qiaguq.
Hazael-aam aptaa, “Ciin qiasit?”

Elisha kiuguq, “Nallunrilamki arcaqalriit assiitellriit pillerkaten Israel-aam yuinun. Ekuavkarciqaten asvairqumalriarit, tuqurqeciqaten-llu angutait ayagyuat nuussirpagkun, piqertuulluki-llu navgurluki mikelnguit tuqulluki, pilagluki-llu ikirrluki arnait qingalriit.”
Hazael-aaq-llu qanertuq, “Qaillun pilua tuaten pitalriamek piningqerciqsia? Wiinga-wa yuunginaulrianga!”
Elisha-m kiugaa, “
Hazael-aaq-llu utertuq Benhadad-amun, taum-llu aptaa, “Camek Elisha-m qanrutaten?”
Hazael-aam kiugaa, “Qanrutaanga pinritevkenak assiriciqniluten.”
Tau͡gaam unuaquani Hazael-aaq uligmek tegutuq, akurrluku-llu mermun, angayuqaq-llu epluku tuqutaa.
Hazael-aaq-llu Benhadad-am eniini angayuqrurtuq Syria-mi.
Tallimiitni allrakuin Joram-aam, Ahab-aam qetunraan Israel-aami angayuqrullran, Jehoram-aaq Jehoshaphat-aam qetunraa, ayagnirluni angayuqrurtuq Judah-mi
allrakungluni yuinaq akimiarmek malrugnek cipluku (32), atanirturillruuq-llu Jerusalem-aami pingayunlegni allrakuni.
Nuliangqellruuq Ahab-am panianek, Ahab-am-llu ilakuralriarin pillracetun maligtellrui Israel-aam angayuqrin assiitellriit piciryarait.
tau͡gaam
Jehoram-aam atanirturillran nalliini Edom-aaq inglulituq Judah-mun, allakarluni-llu angayuqauviurrluni.

Tua-llu Jehoram-aaq ayagtuq Zair-amun akalrialget pekcessuutni tamalkuita ayaulluki, tuani-llu Edomite-at anguyagcet avatairait. Unugmi-llu makluni, pekcessuutmi atanirturtait tuqutait Edomite-at avatairumasteteng; tau͡gaam anguyagtai saggluteng qimagtut kingunermeggnun.
Tuakenirnek Edom-aaq Judah-mek avtellruuq una erneq tekilluku. Libnah-llu inglulitellruuq tamatum nalliini.
Jehoram-aam allat caurallri igausngaut
Jehoram-aaq-llu yuunrirtuq tungmagcimaluni-llu angayuqat tungmaggviatnun David-aam nunarpiini, qetunraa-llu eniini angayuqrurtuq.
Allrakuini qula malrugnek cipluku Israel-aami angayuqaullran Joram-aam Ahab-am qetunraa, Ahaziah, Jehoram-aam qetunraa, angayuqrurtellruuq Judah-mi

allrakungluni yuinaq malrugnek cipluku (22), angayuqaullruuq-llu ataucimi allrakumi Jerusalem-aami. Aanii atengqerrluni Athaliah-mek, Angayuqam Ahab-am panikluku, Israel-aam Angayuqran Omri-m tutgaqluku.
Pektellrumiuq-llu Ahab-am ilani-llu piciryarallratgun, assiitellriamek caliluni tangvallrani
Angayuqam Ahaziah-m pillgucillrua Angayuqaq Joram-aaq anguyallrani Syria-m Angayuqra Hazael-aaq. Calluutut-llu Ramoth-aami Gilead-aamelngurmi, tuani-llu Joram-aaq akngirrluku anguyallermeggni.
Uterrluni-llu Jezreel-amun mamciriyarturluki ekini, Ahaziah-m-llu tuani tangerrsarturaa.
Tua-llu prophet-aam Elisha-m taisqaa ayagyuat prophet-aat iliit qanrulluku-llu, “Upluten Ramoth-aamun Gilead-aamelngurmun ayii. Una caqun uqumek imalek malikluku,
tekiskuvet yuarniaran Jehu, Jehoshaphat-aam qetunraa Nimshi-m tutgarii. Itruskiu kiingan enem iluqlianun yuilngurmun,
teguluku-llu caqun uqumek imalek kuvniaran qamiqurranun qanerluten, ‘Waten qanertuq
Tua-i ayagyuaq prophet-aaq ayagtuq Ramoth-aamun.
Tekicami piuq anguyagtet atanerruarit arenqiirturluteng quyungqalriit; qanertuq-llu, “Qanerkangqertua elpenun, atanirturtaa.”
Jehu-llu aptuq, “Nalimten̄un qalarcit?”
Kiugaa, “Elpenun.”
Tua-i nangertuq, maliklutek-llu enemun iterlutek, taum-llu ayagyuam prophet-aam kuvaa olive-aat uquat Jehu-m qamiqurranun qanrulluku, “Waten qanertuq
Tuqutarkaugan angayuqan ataneq, Ahab-am qetunraa, anucimirqecetaarniarqa Jezebel-aaq tuqutellri pistenka prophet-aat allat-llu pistenka pitekluki.
Tamarmeng Ahab-am ilakuralriari kinguvri-llu tuqucimaarkaugut; tamalkuita angucet ilakuralriarini piunrirciqanka, ayagyuat ak'allaurtellriit-llu ayuqluki.
Wiinga piciqanka ilakuralriari Israel-aam Angayuqran Jeroboam-aam, Israel-aam-llu Angayuqran Baasha-m pillrucimtun.
Jezebel-aaq-llu tungmagcimangaituq; temii qimugtet nerciqaat Jezreel-am nuniini.” Mat'umek-llu qanrraarluni ayagyuaq prophet-aaq an'uq enemek qimagluni-llu.
An'uq-llu Jehu atanerruarullgutminun, taukut aptaat, “Assirtuten-qaa? Camek picirluni au͡g'um usviilnguum angutem tangerrsugtaten?”
Jehu kiuguq, “Nallunritarci camek piyuucia.”
Taukut kiugaat, “Qang'a, nalluarput! Qanruskut camek qanerta!”
Jehu-llu qanertuq, “Qanrutaanga
Egmian-llu Jehu-m atanerruarutngullgutain sagtait aturateng akret qaingatnun Jehu-m nangerngavigkiurluku, cupu'uryarat-llu cupait, qayagpagluteng-llu, “Jehu angayuqauguq!”

Tua-llu Jehu, qetunraa Jehoshaphat-aam Nimshi-m qetunraan, aassaqluni picirkiurtuq Angayuqaq Joram-aaq piluku, tauna Jezreel-ami uitauq, tuavet ayallruluni mamcirnaluki ekini anguyallermeggni Syria-m Angayuqra Hazael-aaq Ramoth-aami ekiliumallni. Tua-i Jehu qanertuq atanerruarullgutminun, “Pillguciquvcia, kina Ramoth-aamek anevkaryaqunaciu aarcirturyarturluki Jezreel-amelnguut yuut.”
Ekluni-llu ayagassuutminun akalrialgegnun ayagtuq Jezreel-amun. Tuani Joram-aaq cali assiriksaitellruluni, Judah-m-llu Angayuqra Ahaziah tuantellruuq tangerrsartuumaluku Joram-aaq.
Jezreel-ami tarikestem qertulriami nacessvigmi tangrrai Jehu malii-llu agiirtellratni. Qayagpagtuq-llu, “Angutnek agiirtellrianek tangertua.”
Joram-aaq-llu kiuguq, “Horse-aalegmun paqceski yugnikek'ngaqucirput wall'u inglukucirput.”
Tua-i kevgam horse-aarluni pairrsaagaa Jehu qanrulluku-llu, “Angayuqaq nallunricugtuq yugnikutekun taicirpenek.”
Jehu kiuguq, “Tamana umyuarniurutkaqenritan! Kingunemkun maligesnga.”
Nayurta-llu nacessvigmelnguq qanertuq, “Kevgam tekicaaqai, tau͡gaam utertenrituq.”
Allamek cali horse-aalegmek ayagceciuq, taum-llu aptaa Jehu ciuqlirmi apyutellranek. Ataam Jehu kiuguq, “Tamana umyuarniurutkarkaqenritan! Kingunemkun maligesnga.”
Ataam nayurta qanertuq, “Tekicaaqai, tau͡gaam utertenrituq. Ciuliqagtiita akalrialgek ayagcuutegni ayautak picuqcarpek'nani, Jehu-m pilauciatun!”

Joram-aaq qanertuq, “Ayagassuuteka upciu.” Tua-i tuaten piut, an'uq-llu Angayuqamek Ahaziah-mek maligluni, allakarmek ayagassuuterlutek, Jehu pairrsaagluku. Pairtaak-llu Naboth-aam Jezreelite-am nunautiini.
Joram-aam-llu aptaa, “Uitanqegcitkun-qaa taiguten, Jehu?”
Jehu-m kiugaa, “Qaillun uitanqegcicetangqerciqa, cali pingqerrluta angalkut caliaritnek, agayutnguanun-llu agayuyaramek aanavet Jezebel-aam ayagnillrinek?”
“Inglulitnguuq, Ahaziah!” Joram-aaq qayagpagtuq, kingutmun caulluku ayagassuutni qimagluni-llu.
Jehu-m urluvni amua, pinirtacimitun-llu pakigluku pitgaraa Joram-aaq tunuakun ircaqrua kapluku. Joram-aaq iquuq ayagassuutegmini tuquluni.

Jehu-llu qanertuq Bidkar-amun ikayuminun, “Aqvaluku temii egesgu Naboth-aam Jezreelite-am nunautiinun. Neqkaqkiu pektellmegni mengleqliqlunuk horse-aatgun kingunrakun Ahab-am Angayuqam Joram-aam atiin,

‘Akwauvaq tangellruaqa tuqucimallra Naboth-aam qetunraagken-llu. Akqillruunga-llu anucimirqecetaarciqniluten wani uumi yuilqumi taukut tuquvillratni.’ Jehu-m alerquraa ikayuni, taumek Joram-aam temii teguluku egesgu Naboth-aam nunautiinun, piciurrluku

Judah-m angayuqran Ahaziah-m tangrramiu man'a, qimagtuq Beth Haggan-aam tungiinun, Jehu-m-llu kingunrakun maligtaa. Anguyagten̄i-llu alerqurai, “Ellii-llu tuquciu!” taukut-llu akngirtaat ayagassuutegni ayautellrani Gur-amun mayuryaram tumyaraakun, canimelkiinun nunarraam Ibleam-aam. Tau͡gaam ayagtu'rtuq akngiringang'e'rmi tekisviminun nunarpak Megiddo, tuani-llu tuquluni.
Pistain-llu ayautaat ayagassuutegken'gun temii ut'rulluku Jerusalem-aamun tungmaggluku-llu angayuqat qungurviatnun David-aam Nunarpiini.
Qula ataucimek cipluku allrakuani Joram-aam, Ahab-aam qetunraan, Ahaziah ayagnirtuq ataniurluni Judah-mi.
Jehu-llu tekituq Jezreel-amun. Jezebel-aaq, niitellruami qaillun pillratnek, iigni mingugak, nuyani-llu kenuggluki, nangerrluni-llu unavet pekcaraq tangvagluku angayuqam eniin egalrakun.
Jehu-llu itellrani ikirtuqakun qayagpagtuq “Zimri-q!
Jehu ciuggluni qayagpagtuq, “Kia pillgucirtanga?” Malruk wall'u pingayun angayuqam eniini atanerruarat kanavet tangvagaat egalerkun,
Jehu-m-llu qanrutai, “Igceciu!” Tua-i igcetaat, auga-llu qecvallerrluni enem qacarneranun, horse-aat-llu qaingatnun. Jehu-m-llu ayagassuutni ayagcetaa temii qaingirluku,
iterluni-llu angayuqam eniinun, nerluni-llu. Nerumariami qanertuq, “Ayaulluku arnaq tauna aniqlaamalria tungmagciu; angayuqam-wa tua-i panikngaku.”
Tau͡gaam tungmagcarturtai anngameng camek nataqutenritut nerrlainarmek tau͡gaam qamiqurranek, enritnek-llu unatain it'gainek-llu.
Uterrluteng-llu Jehu qanrucatni, qanertuq, “Man'a
Temii-llu peksagingaciquq tamaani anatun, kia-llu nallunairciigaciiqai temiin aklui.’”

Ahab-aq yuinaat pingayun qulmek (70) cipluku kinguvengqertuq Samaria-m nunarpiini uitaluteng. Jehu-llu igartuq igamek ayuqai ayagcelluki nunarpiim atanerruarinun, ciulirnernun, aulukestaitnun-llu Ahab-am kinguvrin. Waten qanertuq igaq:
“Qaunqestekaaci angayuqam kinguvrin, ayagassuutet-llu akalrialget, horse-aat, caskut, asvairqumalriit-llu nunarpiit teguqainaugut elpecen̄un. Taumek, una igaq akurtuucirpecetun,
angayuqam kinguvrin kemyunanqurraatnek cucukliqici angayuqrurrluku, ingluliuruskiciu-llu.”
Atanirturtai-llu Samaria-m alingqapigtut, qanerluteng-llu, “Qaillun-mi wangkuta Jehu inglulirciqseta, Angayuqak Joram-aankuk Ahaziah-llu inglulirciigatellrukiik?”

Tua-i atanerruaq qaunqestii angayuqam eniin nunarpiim-llu atanerruara, ilakluki ciuliqagtet, aulukilriit-llu, ayagceciut Jehu-mun qanerluteng: “Pisten͞guukut elpenun, upingaluta-llu caungraan pisquten aturarkauluku. Tau͡gaam kina angayuqrurrngaitarput; piniartuten tua-i assikekevnek tangllerpeni.”
Jehu-m aipiriluni igarai: “Pillguciquvcia upingaluci-llu alerquutenka maligtarkauluki, Angayuqam Ahab-am kinguvrin ciuliqagtait taiskiciki Jezreel-amun unuaqu waten pitarikan.”
Angayuqam Ahab-am kinguvri, yuinaat pingayun qulmek cipluki (70) amllertalriit, Samaria-m yuin atanerruarin qaunqellruit, ellaita-llu ayauciiqluki Jehu-mun.
Igaq-llu akurtuamegteggu, ciuliqagtaita Samaria-m, tuqutait yuinaat pingayun qulmek cipluki (70) Ahab-am kinguvri, qamiqurrit-llu issratnun ekluki, tuyuqait Jehu-mun Jezreel-ami.
Kevgam ullagluku Jehu qanrucani, “Taitait qamiqurrit Ahab-am kinguvrin,” Jehu qanertuq, “Elliciki qalliqluki malruirrluki iteryaramun unuakurnatkaanun.”
Tua-llu unuaquan an'uq ikirtuqamun tuanelnguut-llu yuut qanrutai, “Elpeci pinarqutaituci. Wanguuq aassaqluni picirkiulleq inglukluku Angayuqaq Joram-aaq, tuqulluku-llu. Tau͡gaam kia tuqutaki ukut?
Mat'um asguranairaa tamalkuan
Jehu-m-llu tuqurqai uitaqalriartai Ahab-am nakmiin ilain Jezreel-ami uitalriit, tamalkuita-llu atanerruari, malleggluki-llu yugnikek'ngai, agayulirten͞gunri-llu; atauciungraan unguvalriartairulluku.
Jehu ayagtuq Jezreel-amek Samaria-mun. Tumemi, aprumalriami “Shepherds’ Camp,”
nall'artai Judah-m Angayuqran Ahaziah-m ilait tungelqurrin aptai-llu, “Kinkuuceci?”
Kiugaat, “Ahaziah-m tungelquqaakut. Jezreel-amun ayagtukut Queen Jezebel-aam irniari ilai-llu qaruyutmek piyarturluku.”

Jehu-m-llu alerqurai anguyagten̄i, “Unguvaita teguciki!” Teguit-llu, Jehu-m-llu tuqutai petmiim tuanelnguum mallgeskiini. Amllertaluteng yuinaak malruk malrugnek cipluku (42), atauciungraan unguvalriartairulluku.
Ataam-llu Jehu ayagtuq, ayainanrani Jehonadab-am Rechab-am qetunraan pairrsaagaa. Jehu-m aryuqutmek piluku qanertuq, “Ayuqlunuk umyuangqertukuk. Ikayurciqerpenga-qaa?”
Jonadab-am kiugaa, “Ikayurciqamken.”
Jehu-m-llu kiugaa, “Kitak unaten wangnun yagesgu.” Unatmegnegun tegutuk, Jehu-m-llu ikayurluku ayagassuutminun ekevkaraa,
qanerluni, “Maligesnga tungaunaku tangerrnauran qaillun pitalriamek
Tekicamek Samaria-mun, Jehu-m tuqurqai tamalkuita uitaqalriartait tungelqu͡rrin Ahab-am nangqapiarluki. Man'a waten piciqniluku
Jehu-m quyurcetai Samaria-m yui qanrulluki-llu “Angayuqam Ahab-am kevgiullrua Baal-aq carrarmek; wiinga tau͡gaam kevgiurciqaqa kevgiullran amllenerpiinek.

Taisqiciki wangnun prophet-aari Baal-am, tamalkuita-llu ciktaarvik'lartai, tamalkuita-llu agayulirtai; kina cataitenrilkili, angelriamek ekualuku elliitekangqerrama Baal-amun; kina iluvanrilnguq tuqucimaciquq.” Jehu tuatnauq usvituyagulluki piunrirrnaluki ciktaalalriit Baal-amun.
Jehu-llu pisqiuq, “Apertuici ernermek agayullerkamek Baal-amun!” Tua-i apertuigut ernermek,

Jehu-llu qanermek ayagceciuq tamiinun Israel-aamun. Tamarmeng-llu agayulalriit Baal-amun taigut; yugmek kitumek uitalriartaunani tainrilngurmek. Tamarmeng-llu itertut Baal-am agayuvianun, imirluku iquanek iquanun.
Jehu-m-llu ellimerraa agayulirten͞guneq kencignarqelrianun aturanun qaunqesten͞gulria anutesqelluki aturat tunluki-llu agayulrianun.

Taum kinguakun, ellii Jehu itertuq agayuvianun Baal-am maligluni Jehonadab-amek Rechab-am qetunraanek; yugnun-llu tuanelngurnun qanertuq, “Kitak nallunaiqerciki Baal-amun tau͡gaam agayulalriit maanluciit kina

Taum kinguakun Jonadab-aq-llu itertuk elliiyarturlutek ekuagiyarturlutek-llu elliitnek Baal-amun. Wani-wa Jehu nunalgarcillruluni elatiinun agayuviim yuinarnek cetamanek (80) angutnek alerqullruluki-llu: “Tamalkuita ukut yuut tuqutarkaugaci; kina iliitnek anagcecilria unguvaminek akilirciqaa!”

Taqucirmitun elliillerminek ekuagiluni, Jehu qanertuq tarikesten̄un atanerruanun-llu, “Iterluci tuqurqiciki; atauciungraan anagcecaqunaciu!” Tua-i itertut nuussiteng amuluki tuqulluki-llu yuut tamalkuita, nayurtem atanerruat-llu temait ellamun qamurluki anutaqluki. Iterluteng-llu iluqlianun agayuviim,
anulluku-llu kenciknarqelria napalria tuani uitalria, ekuavkarluku-llu.
Piunriraat-llu napalria Baal-aq agayuvik-llu, yuqerrviurrluku-llu agayuvik, cali maa-i tuaten piuluni.
Tuaten tua-i Jehu-m perrillrua agayulallrat Baal-amun Israel-aami.

Tau͡gaam Jehu tuigtenrituq assiilnguinek Angayuqam Jeroboam-aam, Nebat-aam qetunraan, taum ciuligaqtellrukii Israel-aaq assiilngurmun agayuyaramun suulutaanun kuluvayagarnun napartellminun Bethel-aami Dan-ami-llu.
qanertuq Jehu-mun, “Elluarrluten piavet caliaqluku piciulria tangvallemni, kinguvrinun-llu Ahab-am pisqumalqa piciurrluku, akqamken kinguveten cetamiit tekilluku angayuqauciqut Israel-aami.”
Tau͡gaam Jehu-m ircaquni tamalkirrluku maligtenritaa Alerquutii
Tamatum nalliini

Jordan-aam calaralirnerani, nunarraq Aroer-aaq tekilluku Arnon River-aami uitalria, Gilead-aam Bashan-aam-llu nunautekek ilaklukek, tuani uitalalriit Gad-am, Reuben-aam yuullgutkelriakek East Manasseh-m-llu.
Tamarmeng allat Jehu-m caurallri, alingura'arpek'nani-llu callri ilakluki, igausngaut ukuni:
Tua-i Jehu yuunrirtuq tungmagcimaluni-llu Samaria-mi, qetunraa-llu Jehoahaz-aq angayuqrurtuq eniini.
Jehu atanirturillruuq Samaria-mi angayuqruluni Israel-aamun allrakuni yuinaq pingayunlegnek cipluku (28) allrakuni.
Angayuqam Ahaziah-m aaniin, Athaliah-m, nallunriamiu qetunrami tuqutaullra, alerquutai tamalkuita angayuqam ilakuralriartai tuqucesqelluki.

Tau͡gaam Jehosheba-m, Angayuqam Joram-aam panian, Ahaziah-m anelgutiin, tegua Joash-aq Ahaziah-m qetunraa, qimaulluku-llu akuliitnek angayuqam yuin tuqucimaqatalriit. Agutak-llu aulukestii-llu qavarvigmun Agayuvigpagmi iirluku Athaliah-mek, tua-i tuqucimallruvkenani.
Allrakuni-llu arvinlegni Jehosheba-m aulukaa tan'gaurluq iirumaluku Agayuvigpagmi, Athaliah atanirturillrani queen-auluni.

Tau͡gaam allrakut malrunelgatni Jehoiada-m, agayulirtem, taisqai atanerruarit angayuqam ilain nayurtaita, eniin-llu nayurtain, qanrulluki-llu Agayuvigpagmun taisqelluki, tuani-llu umyuallguciutevkarai akqivkarluki picirkiuraminun. Nasvitai-llu Angayuqam Ahaziah-m qetunraanek Joash-amek
alerqurluki-llu makunek: “Sabbath-aami caliarci ayagniquvciu, pingasuivci murilkarkaugaat angayuqam enii;
allat-llu pingasuici nayurarkaugut Iteryaraani Sur-am, cali pingasuici nayurarkauluteng iteryarami allat nayurtet tunuatni.
Malruin-llu caliameggnek taqellriit Sabbath-aami nayurarkaugut Agayuvigpagmi angayuqaq nayurluku.
Nayurarkaugarci Angayuqaq Joash-aq nuussirpaci tegumiaqluki natmun-llu ayallra tamalkuan maligtelararkaugaci. Kina-llu mallegceci tuqutarkaugaci.”
Atanerruat-llu, maliggluki Jehoiada-m agayulirten͞gunrem alerquutai, taitaqluki elliinun angutet ataniuqengateng Sabbath-aami caliameggnek taqellriit, cali caliateng ayagniqataqait.
Cikirluki-llu atanerruat pananek capkutanek-llu Angayuqam David-aam pillrinek Agayuvigpagmi uitalrianek,
nayurtet-llu elkartai caskuit tegumiaqluki ungalalirneranek Agayuvigpiim negeqvalirneranun, ekuaviim-llu, enem-llu avatiignun.

Tua-llu Jehoiada-m Joash-aq anutaa, nasqerrun-llu elliiluku qamiquanun, cikirluku-llu ayuqaitnek alerquutain angayuqauyaram. Tua-llu Joash-aq uqumek minguumauq, qanrutkumaluni-llu nallunairumaluni angayuqauluku. Yuut-llu qacguuruciluteng qayagpagtut, “Angayuqaq unguvamali!”
Queen Athaliah-m niicamiki nepiit tarikestet yuut-llu, cukangnaqluni Agayuvigpagmun ag'uq, yuut tuavet quyurtellruata.

Tuani tangrraa nutaraq angayuqaq nangengqalria napalriim caniani iteryaraani Agayuvigpiim, piciryaraq aturluku. Quyurusngaluku atanerruat cupu'uryaralget-llu, tamarmeng-llu yuut angnirluteng qayagpagaut cupu'uryarateng-llu qalriavkarluki. Athaliah-m-llu allgurai aturani nuniirluni qayagpagluni-llu, “Inglukiuci, inglukiuci!”
Jehoiada-m agayulirtem alerqurai anguyagtet atanerruarit, “Anuciu nayurten̄un qukaqmigtelluku, kia-llu ikayungnaqkaku tuquskiciu.” Tua-i agayulirta qanellruan, “Tuqucimanrilli
Teguluku-llu ayautaat angayuqam eniinun, tuani-llu Horse Gate-ami tuqutaat.
Agayulirtem Jehoiada-m Angayuqaq Joash-aq yuut-llu akqut'livkarai
Tua-llu yuut ayagtut Baal-am agayuvianun imlluku-llu; navgurluki-llu ekuavii, agayutnguat-llu, tuqulluku-llu Mattan-aaq, agayulirtii Baal-am, ciuqerratni ekuaviit.
Jehoiada-llu nunalgarciuq nayurten̄ek Agayuvigpagmi,

tua-llu elliin, atanerruat, angayuqam nayurtain, eniin-llu nayurtain, maligtaat angayuqaq Agayuvigpagmek eniinun, yuut-llu kingunratgun maligtait. Joash-aq itertuq Guard Gate-akun aqumluni-llu atanruvigmun aqumllermun.
Yuut-llu tamarmeng angniqapigtut; nunarpak-llu qinuituq, Athaliah tuqucimallruan angayuqam eniini.
Jehoash-aaq allrakungqellruuq malrunlegnek ayagnillermini ataniurluni.
Malrunelgatni allrakuin Angayuqam Jehu-m angayuqrullran Israel-aami, Joash-aq
Unguvallmi taktaciatun calillruuq piciulriamek tangvallrani
Tau͡gaam agayutnguanun agayularviit piunriumallrunritut, yuut-llu elliilallerteng aruviarnek-llu ekuagilallerteng tamakutgun taqevkenaku ciumurulluku.
Joash-am taisqai agayulirtet alerqurluki-llu qemagtesqelluki akit akiliutellret ekuagilallrata Agayuvigpagmi, tamarkenka akiliutellret ekuagilallrata cikiutellrit-llu yuut piugteqelteng maliggluku.
Agayulirtet qemangqalararkauluki taitellrit kevgiuqengameng,
Tau͡gaam yuinaq pingayunek (23) ciptellrat allrakut tekilluki Joash-aq atanirturillrani agayulirtet cali kitugciksaitellruut Agayuvigpagmi.

Taumek Angayuqam Joash-am taisqaa Jehoiada agayulirta, allat-llu agayulirtet apluki-llu, “Ciin kitugcunriceciu Agayuvigpak? Wak'nirnek ayagluci qemangqangairutaci akit akurtulci; taitnarqaci, kituggnarqelriit kitugcimanaurtut.”
Agayulirtet-llu mat'umun umyuallguciutut akinek tegusngairulluteng yugnek, cali umyuallguciulluteng kitugcingaunateng Agayuvigpagmi.

Tua-llu Jehoiada yaassiigmek tegutuq, ukilluku-llu patua, ekuaviim-llu canianun elliluku, itellriim Agayuvigpagmun tallirpilirnerani uitaarkauluni. Iteryarami-llu calilriit agayulirtet ek'larait yaassiigmun tamalkuita akit agayuyartulriit cikiutait.
Amlleriaqata akit angayuqam igartii, Agayulirten͞guneq-llu tailartuk, naaqerraarluki-llu qillrulluki missuucuarnun.
Igauqaarluki-llu amllertaciit, tunlaragkek atanirturtaitnun Agayuvigpagmi calistet, taukut-llu akit aturluki akililarait muraliurtet, enelistet,
teggalquliurtet, teggalqunek kepuristet, kiputellrit muriit teggalqut-llu tumarutkat, allat-llu pinarqelriit akilitarkat.
Tau͡gaam akit akiliutekeksaitait piliaqumallritnun qerrirlit saskat, qantat, cupu'uryarat, kenurriurcuutet caskut, wall'u allanun qerrirlinek suulutaanek pilimalrianun.
Tamalkuan atularait akikaatnun calistet kipuyutkaitnun-llu cat aturyulriit kitugutkat.
Caliamek atanirturilriit tamarmirrluteng piciugut, taumek qaillun akit atullrit apqauruteknarqeksailnguut.
Akit-llu akiliutngullret anucimirqecetaarutnguluteng, elliitet-llu assiilnguut pitekluki yaassiigmun ekumaksaitut; agayulirtet pikngatki.
Tamatum nalliini Syria-m Angayuqran Hazael-aam anguyagaa nunarpak Gath-aq teguluku-llu; tua-llu umyuamikun taqutuq Jerusalem-aaq anguyagnaluku.
Judah-m Angayuqran Joash-am tamalkuita tegui elliitellret ciuqlirmi Judah-m angayuqrin Jehoshaphat-aam, Jehoram-aam, Ahaziah-m-llu cikiutekellrit
Ilait callrin Angayuqam Joash-am, caliallri-llu tamarmeng igausngaut ukuni:

Angayuqam Joash-am atanerruari picirkiurtut elliinun, malruulutek-llu, Jozacar-aq Shimeath-aam qetunraan, Jehozabad-aam-llu Shomer-aam qetunraan, tuqutaak enemi uitalriami nunami calaralirnerani Jerusalem-aam, Silla-mun ayalriami tumyarami. Joash-aq tungmagcimauq angayuqat qungurviatni David-aam Nunarpiini, qetunraa-llu Amaziah angayuqrurtuq enairluku.

Allrakut yuinaq pingayunek (23) cipnengluku Joash-am, Ahaziah-m qetunraan, angayuqrullran Judah-mi, Jehoahaz-aaq, Jehu-m qetunraa, ayagnirtuq angayuqruluni Israel-aamun Samaria-mi, akimiaq-llu malrugnek cipluku (17) allrakuni angayuqrullruluni.
Ciuqlirmitun Angayuqatun Jeroboam-aatun assiitellriamek calillruuq
Taumek
Tua-llu Jehoahaz-aaq piicagtuq
-llu cikiraa Israel-aaq anirturtekaanek, taum-llu petuirai Syrian-aanek; Israel-aat-llu qinuilngurmi yuugu'rtut, ciungani pillrucimegcetun.
Cali tau͡gaam pegtenritait Angayuqam Jeroboam-aam assiilnguut maryarutellri Israel-aamun, agayutnguaq-llu Asherah-m ayuqii uitaurluni Samaria-mi.

Jehoahaz-aam anguyagtai nang'ut, yuinaak tau͡gaam malruk qulmek ciplukek (50) horse-aalget uitaqallruluteng, qulen-llu pekcessuutelget, qulen-llu tiissitsaat (10,000) piyualuteng pitulit; angayuqran Syria-m ilait piunrillruaki tutmaulluki urr'atun.
Wani-wa ilait caliallri Jehoahaz-aam tamalkuita-llu alingura'arpek'nani callri, igausngaut ukuni:
Jehoahaz-aaq-llu tuquuq tungmagcimaluni-llu Samaria-mi; Jehoash-aaq-llu qetunraa angayuqrurtuq enairluku.

Yuinaq akimiaq malrunlegnek (37) cipnengluku Joash-am angayuqrullra Judah-mi, Jehoash-aaq, Jehoahaz-aam qetunraa, angayuqrurtellruuq Israel-aamun Samaria-mi, angayuqauluni-llu allrakuni akimiaq ataucimek cipluku (16).
Jehoash-aaq calimillruuq assiitellriamek
Ilait callri Joash-am, ilakluku alingura'arpek'nani anguyallra Judah-m Angayuqra Amaziah inglukluku, igausngaut ukuni:
Joash-aq-llu tuquuq tungmagcimaluni-llu angayuqat qungurviatni Samaria-mi, qetunraa-llu Jeroboam II-aaq angayuqrurtuq enairluku.

Prophet-aaq Elisha naulluunguq tuqutekaminek, tuquqatarluni-llu inangqallrani, Israel-aam Angayuqran Jehoash-aam tangerrsarturaa, ciuqerrani-llu qialuni-llu qanertuq, “Atamaa! Atamaa! Ingluliurutellruan Israel-aaq pinilriaruluten!”
Elisha-m-llu ellimerraa, “Aqvaten urluvermek pitegcautnek-llu”; Jehoash-aaq-llu aqvatuq,
Elisha-m-llu qanrutaa, “Pakiggu urluveq”; angayuqaq-llu tuaten piuq, Elisha-m-llu unatni ellii angayuqam unatainun.
Qanerluni-llu, “Ikiresgu egaleq Syria-m tungiinelnguq”; elliin-llu ikirtaa. Tua-llu Elisha qanertuq, “Pitgaa”; pitgartuq-llu. Pitgautiini prophet-aaq ilungluni qanertuq, “
Cali qanertuq, “Teguki pitegcautet”; tegui-llu. Qanertuq-llu, “Kaugturru nuna”, kaugturaa-llu pingayurqunek, taqluni-llu.

Tuatnallran Elisha-m umyugaa assiircetaa, qanerluni-llu angayuqamun, “Kaugturarkauyaaquten tallimarqunek wall'u arvinlerqunek; tuatnallrukuvet kaugturyaran Syria piunrirvigpenun; wani-wa cirlakarkaurtan Syria pingayurqunek.”
Tua-i Elisha tuquuq, tungmagtaat-llu.
Quyuqetaarluteng-llu Moabite-at itervik'laraat Israel-aam nunii up'nerkarqan.

Caqerluteng angutmek tungmagciinanratni, tamakut ilait quyurmeng uayaarissaagalriit tangrruugut, yuut-llu tauna tema tuqumalria egtaat Elisha-m qunguanun qimagluteng-llu. Egmianun-llu enri Elisha-m temem agtuaki tauna angun unguirtuq, nangerrluni-llu.
Wani-wa Angayuqam Hazael-aam caknercetaarturallrui Israel-aat Jehoahaz-aam angayuqrullran taktaciatun,
tau͡gaam
Syria-m Angayuqra Hazael-aaq tuquan, qetunraa Benhadad-aaq angayuqrurtuq enairluku.
Israel-aam-llu Angayuqran Jehoash-aam cirlakaa Benhadad-aaq pingayurqunek tegunqiggluki-llu nunarpiit Benhadad-aam tegullri Jehoash-aam atiin Jehoahaz-aam angayuqaullran nalliini.
Aipaani allrakuan Jehoash-aam, Joahaz-aam qetunraan, angayuqrullran Israel-aami, Amaziah, Joash-am qetunraa, angayuqrurtuq Judah-mi.

Allrakungqellruuq yuinaq tallimanek cipluku (25) ayagnillermini angayuqauluni, angayuqrullruuq-llu yuinaq qulngunrita'arnek cipluku (29) Jerusalem-aami. Aanii atengqertuq Jehoaddin-aamek Jerusalem-aarmiunguluni.
Calillruuq assilriamek tangvallrani
Agayutnguanun-llu agayularviit piunrirtellrunritai; tua-i yuut cali ekuagilartut, tepkegcilrianek-llu aruviararaqluteng tamakutgun.
Egmian-llu Amaziah-m piksagucamiu angayuqauluni piningqellni, tuqutai atanerruat tuqucestellri atami, angayuqrulriim.
Irniarit tau͡gaam tuqutenritai tuqucillret; maliggluku igausngalria
Amaziah tuqucillruuq tiissitsaanek qulnek (10,000) Edomite-anek anguyagten̄ek Salt Valley-mi; teguluku-llu nunarpak Sela anguyagkun acirluku-llu Joktheel-amek, tauna-llu ateqluku una erneq tekilluku.
Tua-llu Amaziah ayagceciuq kevganek qaneryartulrianek Israel-aam Angayuqranun Jehoash-amun tungaunatek qalarucugluku.

Tau͡gaam Angayuqam Jehoash-aam kiugaa qanerluni: “Caqerluni cukilanaq Lebanon-aami qanermek ayagceciuq napamun cedar-aamun: ‘Paniin qetunramnun tuniu nuliqsagutnauraa.’ Yuilqurmiutaq-llu ungungssiq tamaagguirtuq cukilanaq-llu tutmarluku ayalurrluku.
Amaziah, cirlakellruan Edom-aaq, umyuan-llu quyigtuq. Elarakevkenaku niitnaullren kingunerpeni uitauraa. Ciin picurlak ayagniryarciu arenqiallugutmek tau͡gaam taitarkaq elpenun yugpenun-llu?”
Tau͡gaam Amaziah niicuumiituq. Tua-i Angayuqaq Jehoash-aaq an'uq malikluki anguyagten̄i, anguyagluku-llu Beth Shemesh-aami, Judah-melngurmi.
Anguyagtai-llu Amaziah-m cirlakluki, tamarmeng-llu anguyagtai qimagtut kingunermeggnun.
Jehoash-aam-llu teguaqaa Amaziah, Jerusalem-aaq-llu curugluku, navgurluku-llu nunarpiim qacarnera Ephraim Gate-amek Corner Gate-aq tekilluku, tamana yaaqsigtauq yuinarnek qulnek (200) yaaltanek.
Tegui-llu tamalkuita suulutaat qerrirlit-llu, tamalkuita-llu Agayuvigpiim aklui, angayuqam-llu eniin akitulriarutai, teguanek-llu tegulluni, ayaulluki-llu ut'rulluki Samaria-mun.
Tamarmeng Jehoash-aam caliallri, alingura'arpek'nani-llu anguyallra Judah-m Angayuqra Amaziah, igausngaut ukuni:
Jehoash-aaq-llu tuquuq tungmagcimaluni-llu Samaria-mi Israel-aam angayuqrin tungmaggviatnun, qetunraa-llu Jeroboam-aaq angayuqrurtuq eniini.
Judah-m Angayuqra Amaziah unguvallruuq akimiarni allrakuni Israel-aam angayuqran Joash-am tuqullran kinguani.
Ilait piurallrin Amaziah-m, igausngaut ukuni:
Jerusalem-aami-llu picirkiulriartangqertuq Amaziah tuqutnaluku, tua-i qimagtuq nunarpagmun Lachish-aamun, tau͡gaam inglukestain maligtaat tuavet tuqulluku-llu.
Temii-llu horse-aamun elliluku ut'rutaat Jerusalem-aamun tungmagcimaluni-llu angayuqat tungmaggviatnun David-aam Nunarpiini.
Qetunraa-llu Azariah, allrakungelria akimiaq ataucimek cipluku (16), Judah-m yuin nasqerruciraat angayuqrurrluku.
Azariah-m-llu tegunqigtaa Elath-aq nautenqiggluku-llu atami tuqullran kinguani.

Akimiaratni allrakuin atanirturillran Judah-mi Amaziah-m, Joash-am qetunraan, Jeroboam-aaq Jehoash-aam qetunraa angayuqaqsagutellrua Israel-aam, atanirturillruuq-llu Samaria-mi yuinaak malruk ataucimek ciplukek (41) allrakuni.
Calillruuq assiitellriamek tangvallrani
Ataam-llu tegunqigtaa tamalkuan Israel-aam nunautellra Hamath Pass-amek negeqvamelngurmek, Dead Sea-q tekilluku. Man'a akqutkelqaa
Tau͡gaam
Wani-wa Jeroboam II-aam caliallri, alingura'arpek'nani anguyalallra, ataam-llu utercetellrak Damascus-aankuk Hamath-aaq-llu Israel-aamun, igausngaut ukuni:
Jeroboam-aaq-llu tuquuq tungmagcimaluni-llu angayuqat qunguumaviatni, Zachariah-llu qetunraa angayuqrurtuq eniini.
Allrakut yuinaq malrunelgatni (27) Angayuqam Jeroboam II-aam Israel-aami angayuqrullran, Azariah, Amaziah-m qetunraa, ayagnillruuq angayuqruluni Judah-mi
allrakungluni akimiaq ataucimek cipluku (16), angayuqrullruluni-llu Jerusalem-aami allrakuni yuinaak malruk qula malrugnek cipluku (52). Aanii atengqertuq Jecoliah-mek Jerusalem-aarmiunguluni.
Calillruuq ellualriamek
Tau͡gaam agayutnguanun agayularviit piunriumallrunritut, tua-i yuut cali ekuagilartut elliitnek, aruviararaqluteng-llu tamakuni.

-llu tuc'etaa Azariah mamyuilngurmun apqucimun, tamana-llu assirivkenani unguvallran taktaciatun, enemi-llu allakarmi uitaluni. Qetunraan-llu Jotham-aam angayuqirai ilani, atanirturluki-llu nunam yui.
Wani-wa ilait callrin Azariah-m caliallri-llu tamarmeng igausngaut ukuni:
Azariah-llu tuquuq tungmacimaluni-llu angayuqat tungmaggviatni David-aam Nunarpiini, Jotham-aaq-llu qetunraa angayuqrurtuq enairluku.

Allrakut yuinaq akimiaq pingayunek cipluku (38) Azariah-m, Judah-m angayuqran, atanirturillran, Zachariah Jeroboam-II-aam qetunraa, angayuqrurtellruuq Israel-aamun, angayuqrullruuq-llu Samaria-mi arvinlegni iraluni.
Calillruuq-llu assiitellriamek tangvallrani
Shallum-aaq-llu, Jabesh-aam qetunraa, picirkiurtuq Angayuqam Zechariah-m tungiinun, tuqutaa-llu Ibleam-aami, ellii-llu angayuqrurrluni enairluku.
Wani-wa Zachariah-m callri, igausngaut ukuni:
Tua-i akqun piciurtuq
Shallum-aq, Jabesh-aam qetunraa, ayagnillruuq ataniurluni allrakuin yuinaak malruunritariitni (39) Uzziah-m angayuqrullran Judah-mi, atanrullruuq-llu iralumi ataucimi Samaria-mi.
Tua-llu Menahem-aaq, Gadi-m qetunraa, ayagtuq Tirzah-mek Samaria-mun, tuqulluku-llu Shallum-aq, ellii-llu angayuqrurrluni eniini.
Wani-wa callri Shallum-aam, picirkiullra-llu assinrilnguq ilakluku, igausngaut ukuni:

Taum nalliini Menahem-aaq ayallermini Tizrah-mek, piunrirteqapigtaa nunarpak Tappuah yugtuumaan, nuna-llu avatiinelnguq, nunarpak elliinun tunenrilan. Tuaten-llu arnat qingalriit aqsait allegluki ikirtelarai.
Allrakuini yuinaak malruunritariitni (39) Azariah-m angayuqran Judah-m, Menahem-aaq, Gadi-m qetunraa angayuqrurtellruuq Israel-aami, ataniullruuq-llu Samaria-mi qulni allrakuni.
Calillruuq-llu assiitellriamek tangvallrani

Pul-am-llu, angayuqran Assyria-m, anguyagaa Israel-aaq, Menahem-aam-llu qerrirlinek cuqnek yuinaq akimiarmek cipluku pingayunelgen-wa (38 tons) cikiraa, elliinun ikayuusqelluku pinimi tuknikanillerkaa angayuqaullermini tamaani nunami.

Menahem-aam pitekliutekellruluki akit Israel-aam tukuulriartainek umyugait aturpek'naki cikiqengevkarluki, yuk atauciq elliivkaraqluku yuinaak malruk qulnek cipluki (50) qerrirlinek. Tua-i angayuqra Assyria-m nakmiin nunaminun utertuq.
Menahem-aam tamarmeng caliallri igausngaut ukuni:
Menahem-aaq-llu tuquuq tungmagcimaluni-llu, qetunraa-llu Pekahiah angayuqrurtuq eniini.

Judah-m Angayuqran Azariah-m atanirturillran yuinaak malruk qulmek cipluku (50) allrakuani, Pekahiah, Menahem-aam qetunraa, angayuqrurtuq Israel-aami, Samaria-mi-llu atanirturiluni allrakugni malrugni.
Assiitellriamek-llu calillruuq

Pekahiah-m-llu anguyagtaini atanerruarulria Pekah, Remaliah-m qetunraa, picirkiurtuq Pekahiah inglukluku ilaluni yuinaak malruk qulmek cipnelegnek (50) angutnek Gilead-aarmiunek, tuqutaat-llu Pekahiah Samaria-mi iluqlirmi asvairqumalriartaani angayuqam eniin; ellii-llu ataniurluni enairluku.
Wani-wa callri Pekahiah-m tamarmeng igausngaut ukuni:

Allrakuin yuinaak malruk qula malrugnek cipnengutiigni (52) Azariah-m, Judah-m angayuqran ataniullran, Pekah, Remaliah-m qetunraa, Israel-aami angayuqrurtuq, ataniurluni-llu Samaria-mi yuinarni (20) allrakuni.
Ellii-llu assiitellriamek calillruuq

Pekah-m angayuqrullrani Israel-aami, Tiglath Pileser-aam, Assyria-m angayuqran, tailuni tegui nunarpiit Ijon, Abel Beth Maacah, Janoah, Kadesh, Hazor-aaq, Gilead-aam nunai, Galilee, Naphtali-llu; yuut-llu ayaulluki teguaqluki Assyria-mun.

Yuinaurutiitni-llu allrakuin Jotham-aam, Uzziah-m qetunraan, ataniullran, Hoshea, Elah-m qetunraa, picirkiurtuq inglukluku Pekah, Remaliah-m qetunraa, tuqulluku-llu, ellii-llu angayuqrurrluni enairluku.
Wani-wa pillri Pekah-m, callri-llu tamarmeng, igausngaut ukuni:
Allrakuan aipaani ataniullran Pekah-m, Remaliah-m qetunraan, angayuqruluni Israel-aami, Jotham-aaq, Uzziah-m qetunraa, ayagnirtuq ataniurluni Judah-mi
yuinaq tallimanek cipluku (25) allrakungluni, ataniullruuq-llu Jerusalem-aami allrakuni akimiaq ataucimek cipluku (16). Aanii atenqertuq Jerusha-amek, Zadok-am panikluku.
Jotham-aaq-llu calillruuq ellualriamek tangvallrani
Tau͡gaam agayutnguanun agayularviit piunriumallrunritut; cali tua-i yuut elliilartut ekuagiluteng, aruviarluteng-llu tamakuni. Jotham-aam piliaqellrua Neglirnermi Iteryaraa Agayuvigpiim.
Wani-wa tamarmeng cat pillri Jotham-aam, tamarmeng-llu caliallri, igausngaut ukuni:
Jotham-aam angayuqrullran nalliini
Jotham-aaq-llu tuquuq tungmagcimaluni-llu angayuqat qungurviatnun David-aam Nunarpiini; qetunraa-llu Ahaz-aq angayuqrurtuq eniini.
Akimiaq malrugnek cipnengutiini (17) Pekah-m Remaliah-m qetunraan ataniullran Israel-aami, Ahaz Jotham-aam qetunraa angayuqrurtuq Judah-mi
allrakungluni yuinarnek (20), atanrullruuq-llu akimiaq ataucimek cipluku (16) allrakuni Jerusalem-aami.
maliggluki Israel-aam angayuqrin ayuqucillrat. Ekuallruluku-llu qetunrani elliitekluku agayutnguanun, maliggluku uuminarqeqapigtellria piciryaraat angayuqauvillgutkelriit
Ahaz-aq-llu ekuagilartuq aruviarluni-llu agayutnguanun agayularvigni, qemini, aciitni-llu cuyangqellriit napat.
Tua-llu Rezin-aam angayuqran Syria-m, Remaliah-m-llu qetunraan Pekah-m, Israel-aam angayuqran, anguyagaak Jerusalem-aaq, kassugulluku-llu, tau͡gaam Ahaz-aq cirlakesciiganaku.

(Taum-llu nalliini Edom-aam angayuqran tegunqigtaa nunarpak Elath-aaq anlluki-llu Judah-m yui Elath-aami uitalriit. Edomite-at-llu elkartut Elath-aamun cali maa-i una erneq engelkarrluku tamaanlluteng.)

Tua-i-llu Ahaz-aq ayagceciuq kevganek Tiglath Pileser-aamun, Assyria-m angayuqranun, qanerluni, “Wiinga pistekarpenga qetunraqlua-llu. Tailuten aviucarturnga angayuqranek Syria-m Israel-aam-llu angayuqranek, taukuk anguyakiignga.”
Ahaz-am tegui qevlercetellriit suulutaat-llu Agayuvigpagmek, angayuqam-llu eniin akivianek, tuyuqluki-llu cikiutnguluki Assyria-m angayuqranun.
Assyria-m-llu angayuqran niilluku; an'uq anguyagyarturluku Damascus-aaq, teguluku-llu, yui-llu ayaulluki teguaqluki Kir-amun, Rezin-aaq-llu tuqulluku.

Tuani Angayuqaq Ahaz-aq ayagtuq Damascus-aamun, tangerrsarturluku Angayuqaq Tiglath Pileser-aaq, tangrraa-llu ekuavik tuani, Uriah-mun-llu agayulirten͞gunermun ayuqeqapiarii ekuaviim tuyuqaa, elucia, taqenqegcaarluku tautun ayuqeqapiarluku.
Uriah-llu agayulirta ekuavigmek piliuq tautun ayuqelriamek taqluku-llu Ahaz-aq uterpailgan.
Tekicami Damascus-aamek Ahaz-am tangrraa ekuavik. Malkaniraa-llu ekuavik, mayurluni-llu qainganun,
ekuagiluni-llu elliiguq ungungssimek mukaarkamek-llu, kuvluku-llu wine-aq elliitni, auk-llu ilakuyutem elliitii ciqrulluku elliiviim qainganun.
Punerneq-llu ekuavik

Angayuqam-llu Ahaz-am alerquraa Uriah-q agayulirta qanerluni, “Qaingani angtuam ekuagikina unuakum ekualuku elliitiinek, atakuqlim-llu elliitiinek mukaarkamek, angayuqam-llu ekualuku elliitnek; ilakluki tamarmeng nunam yuin ekualuki elliitait, mukaarkaq-llu elliitiit, wine-aq-llu elliitiit; ciqrulluku-llu qaingatnun tamalkuan augat ekualuki elliitet; tau͡gaam punerneq ekuavik wii kangiiturvik'larciqaqa.”
Uriah-m agayulirtem makut tamalkuita caliaqai Angayuqam Ahaz-am alerquuciatun.

Angayuqam-llu Ahaz-am au͡g'arai punerneret akalrialget atulaqait Agayuvigpagmi ermigcuucet-llu au͡g'arluku qainganelnguut. Punerneq-llu mervik au͡g'araa qula malrugnek cipluku punerneret kuluviit angucalut qaingatni uitalleq, elliluku-llu qainganun teggalqum tusnganrem.
Assyrian-aam-llu angayuqam ilukegcillerkaa pitekluku cali au͡g'araa Agayuvigpagmek angayuqam aqumlleran tusngallra capluku-llu angayuqam iteryaraa Agayuvigpagmun.
Wani-wa ilait caurallrin Ahaz-am, caliallri-llu, tamakut-qaa igausnganritut
Tua-i Ahaz-am qavallgutkai atani, tungmagcimaluni-llu pillgutekluki atani Nunarpiini David-aam; Hezekiah-llu ataniurtuq enairluku.
Allrakuin qula malrugnek cipnengluku (12) Ahaz-am Judah-m angayuqran, Hoshea Elah-m qetunraa, ayagnirtuq ataniurluni Israel-aamun Samaria-mi, ataniurluni-llu qulngunrita'arni allrakuni.
Assiitellriamek-llu calillruuq tangvallrani
Shalmaneser-aam Assyria-m angayuqran anguyagaa; Hosea-llu nunaliurteksagutaa, allamiaqan-llu akililaraa Shalmaneser-aaq.

Tau͡gaam Angayuqran Assyria-m taringaa Hoshea-m aarnarqucia; tua-i-wa ayagcecillruan kevganek So-mun angayuqranun Egypt-aam, akiliutmek-llu cikinrirluku angayuqra Assyria-m pilaucirmitun allamiaquaqan; taumek angayuqran Assyria-m teguvkaraa, qillerqelluku-llu itertaa.
Tua-llu angayuqran Assyria-m itervikaa nuna tamalkuan tekilluni-llu Samaria-mun, allrakut-llu pingayun aturluki kassugusngaluku.

Allrakuin qulngunritariitni Hoshea-m atanirturillran Assyria-m angayuqran tegua Samaria, ayautai-llu Israelite-at Assyria-mun, nunalgarrluki-llu Halah-mun, Habor-aamun, kuiganun Gozan-aam, nunarpainun-llu Medes-aam.
Man'a waten piuq, tua-i-wa Israel-aam yui assiilngillruata
piyualallratnek-llu piciryaraicetun taukumiut
Israel-aam-llu yui aassaqluteng canek pilartut atawakenrilkainek
tamaitni qemini napat-llu aciatni naparciluteng teggalqunek ekuavignek ayuqainek-llu agayutnguam Asherim-aam,
ekuagilartut-llu aruviarnek agayutnguat ekuaviitni, maliggluki tamakut yuut piciryarait
Kevgiurluki agayutnguat, tamakut piluki
Tua-i cali
Tau͡gaam niicugniyuumiitut, asvaunateng ciuliameng pillruciicetun, taukut

Maligcuumiitait alerquutai, akqun-llu piurtellra pillgutekluki ciuliarit, aarcirtuutai-llu ellaitnun cakevkenaki. Maliggluki agayutnguat, piciunrirluteng, maligtengluki-llu avatmeggni uitalriit angayuqauvillgutkelriit, tamakut piluki
Pegtait-llu tamalkuita alerquutai
Ekualarait-llu qetunrateng, paniteng-llu elliitekluki, ellangcarvikaqluki tuqumalrianun qalarcetulit ciunerkarcutulit-llu, ellmeggnek-llu tunumaluteng assiitellriamek calillerkameggnun tangvallrani
Taumek
Judah-m-llu cali maligtenritai alerquutai
-llu qessayagutellrui tamalkuita kinguvri Israel-aam, nangteqevkarluki-llu, kiituani tunai inglukestaitnun, ayagtelluki tangerqem̄inek.
Kinguani
Yui-llu Israel-aam pektut assiilngurkun Jeroboam-aam pillrakun; unitevkenaki-llu,
au͡g'arnatkaanek Israel-aaq tangerqem̄inek, qanellrucimitun prophet-aatgun pistem̄ikun. Tua-i Israel-aaq ayagcecimauq nakmiin nunaminek Assyria-mun una erneq tekilluku.

Angayuqran-llu Assyria-m yuut ayautai Babylon-aamek, Cuthah-mek, Avva-mek, Hamath-aamek, Sepharvaim-aamek-llu, elliluki-llu nunarpainun Samaria-m, yuinun Israel-aam pivkenaki; teguit-llu avalii Samaria-m, uitaluteng-llu nunarpaini.
Uitangqerraallermeggni-llu tuani qigcikellrunritaat

Tua-i angayuqra Assyria-m qanrucimauq, “Yuut ayautellerpet uitavkarluki-llu nunarpaini Samaria-m nalluit alerquutai nunam agayutiin; taumek ayagcecillruuq yugtutulinek akuliitnun, tangerrluku-llu tamakut tuqurqait, tua-i-wa nalluatki alerquutai nunam agayutiin.”
Tua-llu angayuqra Assyria-m alerquriuq, “Uterceci ataucimek agayulirtem̄ek taitellemten̄ek teguaruluku; utertelluku tuani uitavkarciu, elitnaurnaurai yuut alerquutainek agayutiin nunam.”
Tua-i agayulirtet iliit ayautellrat Samaria-mek tailuni uitauq Bethel-aami, elitnaurluki-llu qaillun qigciklerkaatnek

Tau͡gaam tamarmeng angayuqauvillgutkelriit cali agayut'lilartut pikameggnek, elliaqluki agayutnguat ekuaviitnun Samaria-rmiut piliallritnun. Tamarmeng yuut quyungqalriit agayutnguanek pililartut nunarpagni uitavimeggni:
Babylon-aam yui piliut ayuqainek agayutem Succothbenoth-aam, Cuth-am-llu yui piliut Nergal-aamek, Hamath-aam yui piliut Ashima-mek,
Avvite-at-llu pililuteng Nibhaz-amek, Tartak-aamek-llu; Sepharvite-at-llu ekualuki irniateng elliitekait Adrammelech-aamun, Anammelech-aamun-llu, agayutegkenun Sepharvaim.
Ukut yuut cali agayulartut
Tua-i agayuvikelaraat
Una erneq tekilluku cali tuaten pilartut ciungani pilallermegcetun. Agayuviksuitaat
akqut'lillruuq pillgutekluki ellait, alerqurluki-llu, “Agayuvikeksaunaki allat agayutet; ciktaarvikeksaunaki wall'u kevgiuqsaunaki ekuagiksaunaci-llu tamakunun.
Tau͡gaam qigcikarkaugarci
Picirkiutet, alerquutet, elpecen̄un igautekellri, kesianek mulngakluci atulararkaugaci. Niisngaarkaunritaci allat agayutet.
Nalluyagutarkaunritarci-llu akqun taqelqa pillgutekluci. Niisngaarkaunritaci allat agayutet.
Tau͡gaam niisngaarkaugarci
Tau͡gaam taukut yuut niicuumiitut, taqevkenaki-llu piciryarateng maligtait.
Tua-i makut angayuqauvillgutkelriit qigcikaat
Pingayuatni allrakuin Hoshea-m qetunraan Elah-m angayuqran Israel-aam, Hezekiah-q qetunraa Ahaz-am, angayuqra Judah-m, ayagnirtuq ataniurluni.

Yuinaq tallimanek cipluku (25) allrakungellruuq ayagnillermini ataniurluni, ataniullruuq-llu allrakuni yuinaq qulngunrita'arnek cipluku Jerusalem-aami. Aanii atengqellruuq Abi-amek panikluku Zachariah-m.
Ellualriamek pillruuq tangvallrani

Au͡g'arai agayutnguanun elliiviit, navgurluki-llu napartet tegalqut, kepurluku-llu Asherah. Atrartaa-llu navgurluku mikliriluki punerneq ciissirpaguaq Moses-aam piliaqellra. Tauna erneq tekilluku Israel-aam ekuavik'lallrua aruviarnek; aterpagcimauq Nehushtan-aamek.
Ukverumallruuq
Tua-i-wa tegumiaqellruamiu asvaunani
-llu nayullrua; natmun aya'agqami piluaqalartuq. Inglulitellruuq angayuqranun Assyria-m, kevgiuryugpek'naku-llu.
Piunrirtai Philistine-at tekilluku Gaza nunatuumaan, nacessngaviitnek ayagnirluki cayailkuciumalrianun nunarpaitnun.
Cetamiitni allrakuin Angayuqam Hezekiah-m, malrunelgatni allrakuin Hoshea-m qetunraan Elah-m, angayuqran Israel-aam, Shalmaneser-aam angayuqran Assyria-m anguyagaa Samaria-q avatairluku-llu.
Iquatni-llu allrakut pingayun tegullrua. Arvinelgatni-llu allrakuin Hezekiah-m, qulngunritariitni allrakuin Hoshea-m angayuqran Israel-aam, Samaria-q tegumallruuq.
Angayuqran Assyria-m ayautai Israelite-at Assyria-mun, elliluki-llu Halah-mun, Habor-aamun-llu, kuiganun Gozan-aam, nunarpaini-llu Medes-aam.
Tua-i-wa niisnganrilatgu qanellra
Akimiarunritariitni allrakuin angayuqam Hezekiah-m, Sennacherib-aam angayuqran Assyria-m anguyagai tamalkuita cayailkutalget nunarpai Judah-m teguluki-llu.

Hezekiah-llu angayuqra Judah-m ayagceciuq angayuqranun Assyria-m Lachish-aami, qanerluni, “Wii alartellruunga; anguyallren arulairesgu, ca piyullren akilirciqaqa.” Angayuqran-llu Assyria-m kiugaa Hezekiah, Judah-m angayuqra, tiissitsaanek cetamanek (4,000) uspernek qerrirlinek, yuinarnek-llu yuinarnek (400) uspernek suulutaamek tuyuusqelluni.
Hezekiah-m-llu cikiraa tamalkuitnek qerrirlinek Agayuvigpagmi uitalrianek, akiviini-llu angayuqam eniini uitalrianek.
Taum nalliini Hezekiah-m au͡g'arterai suulutaat amiiginek Agayuvigpiini

Angayuqra-llu Assyria-m ayagceciuq Tartan-aanek, Rabsaris-aanek, Rabshakeh-nek-llu malilirluki amllernek anguyagten̄ek Lachish-aamek Angayuqamun Hezekiah-mun Jerusalem-aami. Taukut-llu mayurtut tekilluteng-llu Jerusalem-aamun. Tekicameng-llu uitaut qurrluryaraani qulliim mer'em, tumyaraanelngurmi 'lumarralistet caliviatni.
Pitekliata-llu angayuqamek an'ut Eliakim-aaq qetunraa Hilkiah-m, enem tamarmi tarikestii, Shebnah-llu igarta, Joah-llu qetunraa Asaph-aam, cat pilriit igautestiit.
Rabshakeh-llu qanertuq ellaitnun, “Hezekiah-mun qanqici, ‘Waten qanertuq angelria angayuqaq, Assyria-m angayuqra: Cam nalirugtevkenak waten pivkartaten?
Umyuartequten-qaa qanengssaggaat elisngaaqsukluki piniutnguyukluki-llu anguyagmun! Kitumek watua cacetuqutengqercit, ingluliuravnga wii?
Neryuniurutkan-qaa Egypt-aamun ikayullerkan, tuaten pikuvet cuplulegmek ayarungqellriatun ayuquq, navegluni unaten kapsugngaa. Tuaten Pharaoh-q, angayuqra Egypt-aam, ayuquq kia imum cacetuqutekekani.
“‘Tau͡gaam qanquvet wangnun, “Wangkuta cacetuqutekarput
Tailuten watua, pillerkiurtek angayuqaqa-llu Assyria-m angayuqra; cikirciqamken tiissitsaagnek malrugnek (2,000) elussitanek, ugingavikestekaitnek angutnek tuaten pitalrianek piyugngakuvet!
Pitacirturciigataten Assyrian-aat atanerruat aciqsikacaaqengraatgu, tau͡gken neryuniurtuten Egyptian-aat taivkarinayukluki elpenun akalrialegnek ayagassuutnek anguyagten̄ek-llu.
Cali-llu, cakaarluku-qaa

Tua-llu Eliakim-aaq qetunraa Hilkiah-m, Shebnah-llu, Joah-llu, qanertut Rabshakeh-nun, “Qalaruski pisteten Aramaic-aatun qaneryaraicetun, taringetuamteggu; qalarutenrilkut Judah-m qaneryaraatun yuut niitevkarluki qacarnermelnguut.”

Tau͡gaam Rabshakeh-m qanrutai, “Atanema-qaa ayagcetellruanga makunek qallacesqellua atanirturtevcen̄un elpecen̄un-llu, qacarnermi aqumgalriit yuut pivkenaki, ner'arkaurcecimalriit anameggnek mer'arkaurcecimalriit-llu teq'umeggnek?”
Tua-llu Rabshakeh-q nangertuq qayagpagluni-llu qastuluni Judah-m qaneryaraatun: “Niiciu qanellra angelriim angayuqam, Assyria-m angayuqran!
Waten qanertuq angayuqaq, ‘Hezekiah-mun iqlutmurucecaqunaci, elliin aviucugngangailaci wii unatemnek.
Hezekiah-mun cacetuqutengevkarcecaqunaci

Niicugninriciu Hezekiah. Angayuqran Assyria-m picirkiraaci anluci nunarpagmek tunesqelluci ellminun. Nutaan tamarpeci nerniartuci nakmiin pivcen̄ek wine-arkanek naucetaanek, figs-aanek-llu nakmiin napautevcen̄ek, merluci-llu nakmiin mervigpecen̄ek.

Tainatkamnun ayaulluci-llu nunamun nunavci ayuqiinun, nunamun mukaarkartalegmun wine-artalegmun-llu, nunamun kelipartalegmun wine-arkanek-llu naucetaartalegnun, nunamun olive-aat napaitnek pitalegmun paatakaartalegmun-llu, unguvasqelluci, tuqusqevkenaci-llu. Niicugniyaqunaciu-llu Hezekiah iqlutmurutessaangraaci qanerluni,
Agayutaita-qaa allat angayuqauvillgutkellriit aviutelarait nunait angayuqranek Assyria-m?
Nauwa-mi agayutait Hamath-aam, Arpad-aam-llu? Nauwa-llu agayutai Sepharvaim, Hena-m, Ivvah-m-llu? Aviutellruat-qaa Samaria-q unatemnek?
Naliata agayutain nunam aviutellruaki nunautait unatemnek? Tua-llu cam umyuarteqevkartaci
Tau͡gaam yuut nepaitut kiuvkenaku-llu aperyararraungraan, tua-i Angayuqam Hezekial-aam qanrutellruateng, “Kiuyaqunaciu.”

Tua-llu Eliakim-aaq qetunraa Hilkiah-m, murilkesta eniini, Shebna-llu igarta, Joah-llu qetunraa Asaph-aam cat igaucestiit, taigut Hezekiah-mun aturateng allgumaluki, qanrulluku-llu qanellrinek Rabshakeh-m.
Tuani Angayuqam Hezekiah-m niicamiu, aturani allgurai, ellminek-llu all'uni missuullernek, iterluni-llu
Ayagcelluki-llu Eliakim-aaq qaunqesten͞gulria enemini, Shebna igarta, ak'allaurtellriit-llu agayulirtet, aturarluteng missuullernek prophet-aamun Isaiah-mun qetunraanun Amoz-aam.

Qanertuq-llu elliinun, “Waten qanertuq Hezekiah-q, Man'a erneq erneqaa uitacurlautem qanleryaucimallrem, qessakumallrem-llu; mikelnguut yuurtellerkameggnun tekiutelaryaaqut, tau͡gaam pinirtaituq anglicaumallerkaitnun.
Tua-i-llu pingatuq Atanrem Agayutvet niisngatai qanellri Rabshakeh-m, atanermi atanran Assyria-m ayagcetellri piciliutekluku unguvalria Agayun, qessakluki-llu qaneryaraat
Tuani pistii Angayuqam Hezekiah-m tekicami Isaiah-mun.
Isaiah-m qanrutai, “Qanerniartuci atanerpecen̄un, ‘Waten qanertuq
Tangerrluku elliiciqua anernermek elliinun, tua-i niiciquq qannguamek uterrluni-llu nunaminun; wiinga-llu iquvkarciqaqa nuussirpagkun elliin nakmiin nuniini.’”
Rabshakeh-q-llu utercami tangrraa atanra Assyria-m callulria inglulirluku Libnah-q; niituq-llu ataneq ayallrucianek unilluku Lachish-aaq.
Ataneq-llu niituq taumek Tirhakah-mek atanranek Ethiopia-m, “Tangerrluku, tauna ayagtuq callugyarturluten inglukluten,” ayagceciuq-llu qanerten̄ek ataam Hezekiah-mun, qanerluni,
“Waten qanrutarkaugarci Hezekiah-q atanra Judah-m; ‘Agu Agayutevnun atavikekevnun iqluvkaryaqunak akqellrakun Jerusalem-aaq tunumangaitniluku unatainun atanran Assyria-m.
Tangerrluku elpet niitellruan qaillun atanran Assyria-m pillra tamalkuitnun nunanun, piunrirluki tamakut cakneq. Cali-llu elpet tegumaciqngatuten?
Agayutaita-qaa taungullgutkellriit anirtullruit tamakut, taungullgutkellriit atama piunrillrin, Gozan-aaq, Haran, Rezeph-aaq-llu, yuut-llu Eden-aarmiut Telassar-amelnguut?
Nauwa atanra Hamath-aam, atanra Arpad-aam, atanra-llu nunarpiim Sepharvaim-aam, atanra-llu Hena-m, wall'u atanra Ivvah-m?’”
Hezekiah-q-llu akurturtuq igamek unataitnek qaneryarturtet, naaqaa-llu; Hezekiah-llu mayurtuq eniinun
Hezekiah-llu piicagtuq ciuqerrani
Maniluku ciuten
Piciulriaruuq
eggluki-llu agayutait kenermun; tua-i agayutngunrilata, tau͡gaam piliaqait yuut unataita, muriit teggalqut-llu; taumek caunriumaut.
Taumek watua,
Tua-llu Isaiah-q, qetunraa Amoz-aam, ayagceciuq Hezekiah-mun qanerluni, Waten qanertuq
Maa-inguuq qaneryaraa
Kina iqluqusiu picilirluku-llu assiitellrianek? Inglulirluku kina qatguurasit ucuryaggluten-llu iigken naluumalukek? Inglukluku Tauna Tanqilriara Israel-aam?
Kevgarpegun iqluqutekan
Elaglua-llu elakanek merlua-llu yaaqvarmiutarmek mermek, kinercetanka it'gama aluitnek tamalkuita kuiggaarai Egypt-aam.’
“Niiteksaitarpenga-qaa picirkiurumarillruaqa man'a ak'arpak? Uptellruaqa ciuqvanek maa-i piciureskeka, elpenun piunriisqelluki cayailkuciumalriit nunarpiit caunrirluki.
Yirtuumastait cirlaurtut qacuvallaumaluteng ayuquciinateng, ayuqliriluteng-llu yuilqum naunraitun, evesraartun, canegtun enet qaingitni; qakikaitun nauvailegmeng.
“Tau͡gaam nallunritaqa elpet aqumgacin, anucin, itrucin-llu, eqmalluggluten-llu ingluklua.

Tua-i-wa eqmallugtellruavet ingluklua ucuryagtellren-llu taiguq ciutegemnun, wiinga elliciqaqa negcika qengagpenun nallunricesqumakeka-llu qanerpenun, tuigciiqamken-llu utetmun tumllerpegun taillerpeni.

“Man'a-llu nallunailkutaugarkauguq elpenun; mat'umi allrakumi; nerlararkauguten naunrarnek ellmeggnek naullernek, aipaani-llu allrakum naulrianek cali ayuqaitnek; pingayuatni nauceciiciquten quyurciluten-llu, naucetaarvililuten-llu ner'aqluten-llu naugillritnek.
Uitaqalriari-llu eniin Judah-m acilqunglarciqut acitmun naugiluteng-llu qulmun;
tua-i anciqut Jerusalem-aamek ilakuarraat, Ingrimek-llu Zion-aamek quyungqalriit anakallret. Takumcutaucian
Taumek qanertuq
Taillermikun tumyarakun, ataam aturluku utertarkauluni, ellii-llu iterngaunani nunarpagmun, qanertuq
Tua-i piyailkuciumaarkaungamku una nunarpak anirturnaluku, wangnek piteklua pitekluku-llu pisteka David-aaq.”
Taumi-llu unugmi an'gilaa
Tua-llu Sennacherib-aaq angayuqra Assyria-m ayagtuq, uterrluni nunaminun, uitaluni-llu Nineveh-mi.

Agayuinanrani-llu eniini Nisroch-am agayutmi, Adrammelech-aam Sharezer-aam-llu qetunraagken, tuqutaak nuussirpagkun, qimaglutek-llu Ararat-am nuniinun. Esarhaddon-aaq-llu qetunraa ataniurtuq enairluku.
Tamakuni ernerni Hezekiah naulluungenguq tuquciqngariluni-llu. Isaiah-llu prophet-aaq qetunraa Amoz-aam ullagaa, qanrulluku-llu, “Waten qanertuq
Tua-llu Hezekiah-m kegginani tuiggluku qacarneq cauluku piicagtuq
“Umyuaqiu watua,
Anvailgan-llu Isaiah qukaqlirmek carr'ilngurmek enet akuliitni, qaneryaraa
“Uterrluten, qanrucarturru Hezekiah ataniurtiit yum'a, waten qanertuq
Ilaciqanka-llu akimiarnek allrakunek unguvan. Aviuciiqamken una-llu nunarpak unatainek Assyria-m angayuqran, cayailkuciumaciqaqa-llu, una-llu nunarpak wii piteklua pisteka-llu pitekluku David-aaq.”
Isaiah-llu qanertuq, “Taici cake-aamek atsanek figs-aanek pilimalriamek. Teguluku ellaita elliniaraat aninguat qaingatnun, assiriniartuq.”
Hezekiah-llu qanertuq Isaiah-mun, “Cauciqa nallunailkutaa
Isaiah-llu qanertuq, “Man'a nallunailkutauciquq elpenun
Hezekiah-q-llu kiuguq, “Qacignarqessiyaagtuq talinrem taklirillerkaa qulnek it'ganernek; ataki talineq utetmun amlliqili qulnek it'ganernek.”
Isaiah-llu prophet-aaq qayagauq
Tamatum nalliini Medrodach Baladan-aaq, qetunraa Baladan-aam angayuqran Babylon-aam, ayagceciuq kevganek malilirluki iganek cikiutnek-llu Hezekiah-mun; tua-i niitellruamiu Hezekiah-m naulluullra.

Hezekiah-m-llu ciuniurai, nasvitai-llu tamalkuitnek pirpaku'urqem̄inek, qerrirlinek, suulutaanek, naunrarnek tepkegcilrianek, uquqegtaarnek, anguyaucessuutminek, tamalkuitnek-llu qemangqalrianek qemaggvimini; canek enemini wall'u angayuqauvimini Hezekiah-m pitaitellruuq nasvanritellrinek.

Tua-llu Isaiah prophet-aaq taiguq Angayuqamun Hezekiah-mun, qanrulluku-llu, “Camek ukut angutet qanertat? Qangvaq-llu taillruat elpenun?” Hezekiah-llu qanertuq, “Taillruut yaaqvanek nunamek, Babylon-aamek.”
Ellii kiuguq, “Camek tangellruat enevni?” Hezekiah-llu kiuguq, “Tangellruit cat tamalkuita enemni uitalriit; camek pitaituq qemaggvimni nasvanritlemnek ellaitnun.”
Isaiah-llu qanertuq, Hezekiah-mun, “Niisgu qanellra
Tangerrluku, erenret agiirtut, tamarmeng enevni uitalriit, atavet-llu qemagtellrit una erneq tekilluku, ayaucimaarkaugut Babylon-aamun; ca unicimangaituq, qanertuq
Ilait nakmiin kinguliaten ayaucimaarkaugut; pisten͞guciqluteng atanruviani angayuqran Babyon-aam.”
Tua-llu Hezekiah qanertuq Isaiah-mun, “Qaneryaraa
Ilait caliallrin Hezekiah-m alingura'arpek'nani-llu piniucia, qaillun-llu mervilillra, nayugluku nuna meq tumyariluku nunarpagmun, igausnganritut-qaa
Hezekiah-m-llu qavallgutkai atani; Manasseh-m-llu qetunraa ataniurtuq enairluku atani.
Manasseh qula malrugnek cipluku (12) allrakungellruuq ayagnillermini ataniurluni, ataniullruuq-llu yuinaak malruk akimiarmek ciplukek (55) Jerusalem-aami. Aanii atengqertuq Hephzibah-mek.
Calillruuq assiitellriamek tangvallrani

Tua-i-wa nautenqigtellruamiki agayutnguanun ekuaviit Hezekiah-m atami piunrirtellri; ekuavililuni-llu Baal-amun, agayutngualiluni-llu Asherah-mek, kevgiurluki-llu Ahab-aam, angayuqran Israel-aam pillruciatun, agayuaqluni-llu agyanun qilagmelngurnun.
Ekuavililuni Agayuvigpagmi,
Ekuaviliuq-llu malrugni Agayuvigpiim elatiinelnguugnun carr'ilnguugni agayularvigkagnek agyanun.
Ekualuku-llu qetunrani elliitekluku, qalartaqluni ciunerkamek canek-llu piarkanek, calillgutkaqluki-llu tuqumalriit qanellgutketukait angalkut-llu. Angelriamek assiilngillruuq
Agayutngualiallni-llu Asherah-m ayuqii ellia Agayuvigpagmun tuavet
Israel-aam yuin niisngakatgu tamalkuan Alerquun Moses-aam kevgama cikiutekellra ellaitnun, antessngaitanka nunamek ciuliaritnun cikiuteklemnek.”
Tau͡gaam Judah-m yuin maligtaqutenritut

“Manasseh-m, angayuqran Judah-m, atuaki makut uuminarqeqapigtellriit, arcaqanruqapigtellriit Amorite-at pillritni ciunermini uitallret, agayutnguamikun-llu ciuliqagtellruaki Judah-m yui assiilngirtelluki.
Taumek waten qanertuq

Anucimirqecetaarciqaqa Jerusalem-aaq Samaria anucimirqecetaallemtun, Israel-aam-llu Angayuqra Ahab-aq kinguvri-llu pillrucimtun; perrirciqaqa-llu Jerusalem-aaq yuum perrilauciatun qantaq, perrirraarluku palurrluku-llu elliluku.
Pegciiqanka-llu ilakuarrait unguvaqalriit, tunluki-llu ingluitnun, pitarkaurciiqut inglumeggnun uayaarautulriatun-llu ayuqeciqut,
tua-i-wa caliangqellruata assiitellriamek tangvallemni, eq'uqertevkarlua-llu, ernermek tuaken ayagluteng atait anrraanratnek Egypt-aamek.”
Manasseh-m pinarqutailnguut augat amlleq kuvaa, kiituani Jerusalem-aam tumyarai qurrlurtu'rtut augmek, man'a-llu ilallrukii maryarrluku Judah agayutnguanun, assiilngircelluki
Wani-wa caliallrin ilait Manasseh-m, tamalkurmeng-llu callri, assiilnguq-llu atullra, tamakut-qaa igausnganritut kalikarni
Manasseh-m-llu qavallgutkai atani, tungmagcimaluni-llu naucetaarvianun angayuqat eniita, naucetaarviani Uzza-m; Amon-aaq-llu qetunraa ataniurtuq enairluku.

Amon-aaq allrakungellruuq yuinaq malrugnek (22) cipluku ayagnillermini ataniurluni, ataniullruuq-llu Jerusalem-aami malrugni allrakugni. Aanii atengqellruuq Meshullemeth-aamek panikluku Haruz-aam Jothbah-rmium.
Calillruuq-llu assiitellriamek tangvallrani
tamalkuita ayuqeliluki atami caliallri, kevgiurluki-llu agayutnguat atami kevgiullri, agayuaqluni-llu tamakunun.
Cakaallrua
Pistai-llu Amon-aam picirkiurtut inglukluku, tuqutaat-llu angayuqaq eniini.
Tau͡gaam Judah-m yuin tuqutait taukut tamalkuita Angayuqam Amon-aam tuqucestellri, Josiah-llu qetunraa angayuqrurtaat enairluku.
Amon-aam pillrin ilait callri, igausnganritut-qaa
Tungmagcimauq qungurvianun naucetaarvianun Uzza-m; Josiah-llu qetunraa ataniurtuq enairluku.

Josiah-q pingayunlegnek allrakungellruuq ayagnillermini ataniurluni Judah-mi, ataniullruuq-llu yuinaq qula ataucimek (31) cipluku Jerusalem-aami. Aanii atengqellruuq Jedidah-mek panikluku Adaiah-m Bozkath-armium.
Calillruuq ellualriamek tangvallrani
Akimiaq pingayunek cipluku (18) allrakungluki ataniullran Angayuqam Josiah-m ayagcetaa Shaphan-aaq qetunraa Azaliah-m, qetunraan Meshullam-aam igartem, Agayuvigpagmun qanerluni:
“Ayii Agayulirten͞gunermun Hilkiah-mun, qanrutekniarai amllertaciit akit agayulirten͞gunret quyurtellrit yugnek Agayuvigpiim iteryaraani.
Qanrutniaran akit tunesqelluki calistainun Agayuvigpiim kitugutain. Akilirarkaugait
muraliurtet, enelistet, teggalqiurtet-llu, akikluki-llu kiputellritnun muragnun teggalqunun-llu, tumarutkainun enem.
Cikiumallret akinek naaqillgutken̄arqinritut tunumallernek ellaitnun, assirluki auluk'laitki.”
Hilkiah-llu agayulirten͞guneq qanertuq Shaphan-aamun igartem̄un, “Nataqellruanka
Shaphan-aaq-llu utertuq angayuqamun, qanemciluni-llu, “Pistevvet teguit akit Agayuvigpagmi uitallret tunluki-llu atanerruaritnun kitugcilalriit.”
Tua-llu qanertuq, “Hilkiah-m agayulirtem cikillruanga kalikarnek.” Naaqitaa-llu angayuqaq qastuluni.
Angayuqam-llu niicamiu naaqumallrat alerquutem kalikain, aturani allgurai civuuraluni.
Mat'umek-llu alerquraa Hilkiah-q agayulirta, Ahikam-aaq-llu qetunraa Shaphan-aam, Achbor-aq-llu qetunraa Micaiah-m, Shaphan-aaq igarta, Asaiah-q-llu angayuqam nayurtii, qanerluni:
“Ayagluci apqaurucicarturcia

Tua-i Hilkiah agayulirta, Ahikam-aaq, Achbor-aq, Shaphan-aaq, Asaiah-llu ayagtut Huldah-mun arnamun prophet-aamun, nulirranun Shallum-aam qetunraan Tikvah-m, qetunraan Harhas-aam, murilkestiin aturarviim, (watua uitaluni Jerusalem-aami Second Quarter-aami) qanrutaat-llu tamatumek.
Arnam-llu qanrutai uterrluki angayuqamun qanrutesqelluku,
mat'umek qaneryaramek
Ellaita cakaallruatnga ekuagiaqluteng-llu aruviarnek allanun agayutnun, eq'urtelqa kumarcatgu caliamegteggun tamalkuitgun. Eq'utelqa kumanguq Jerusalem-aam tungiinun, nipcimangaunani-llu.
Tau͡gaam angayuqranun Judah-m, ayagcecestellerpeci apqaurucicesqelluni

umyualinqigcavet ircaqurpegun, ellmikutuurrluten-llu ciuqamni, niitellerpeni aniqlaateka uumun nunamun, yuinun-llu, nunakarniiruciiqniluku yui-llu aniqlaatngurciiqniluki, allgullruavki-llu aturaten qialuten ciuqamni, wiinga-llu niitellruaqa piicauten, qanertuq
taumek quyurciiqamci atavcen̄un, yuunrirciquci-llu nepaitmi, iigpeci-llu tangerrngaitaat assiitellria taitarkaqa maavet nunamun.”
Taukut-llu angutet utertut Angayuqamun Josiah-mun mat'umek qanerkarluteng.
Tua-llu Angayuqam Josiah-m taisqai tamalkuita ciuliqagtai Judah-m Jerusalem-aam-llu.

Angayuqaq-llu ag'uq Agayuvigpagmun, tamarmeng-llu Judah-m Jerusalem-aam-llu yuin, agayulirtet prophet-aat-llu, tamarmeng-llu yuut, ayuqluteng tukuulriit arrsaulriit-llu maligtaat. Ciuqerratni-llu qastuluni naaqitai iquklilluki kalikai akqutem nalaqellrit Agayuvigpagmi.
Angayuqaq-llu nangengqaluni naparyam mengliini akqiuq

Angayuqam-llu picirkiraa Hilkiah, agayulirten͞guneq, agayulirtet-llu tunglii, amiigem-llu tarikestai, anucesqelluki Agayuvigpagmek cat tamalkuita atuulalriit agayuaqata Baal-amun, Asherah-mun, agyanun; ekuagai-llu elatiini Jerusalem-aam canimelkiini Kidron-aam, ayaulluki-llu qamllerit Bethel-aamun.

Au͡g'arai-llu agayutnguanun calilalriit agayulirtet angayuqrita Judah-m elkartellrit aruviaralararkauluki agayutnguat ekuaviitni nunarpaini Judah-m avatiini-llu Jerusalem-aam; imkut-llu aruviaralallret Baal-amun, akertem̄un, iralumun, agyanun, qilagmelngurnun-llu.
Au͡g'araa-llu agayutnguaq Asherah Agayuvigpagmek, anulluku-llu nunarpagmek Kidron Valley-mun, ekualuku-llu, itumtaa-llu urraurrluku kanevvluku-llu urraa yuunginaulriit qunguitnun.
Imlluki-llu enet Agayuvigpiim iluanelnguut uitaviketukait agayuvigpagmi akissut. Tuani arnat pililartut ulikutanek atulaqaitnek agayuaqameng Asherah-mun.

Anutai-llu tamalkuita agayulirtet nunarpainek Judah-m, tamiini-llu nunami menuurtai agayutnguanun ekuaviit aruviarvik'lallrit agayulirtet, Geba-mek ayagluni Beersheba-mun; itumtai-llu ekuaviit iteryarat uitalriit iteryarturyaraani amiiganun Joshua-m angayuqran nunarpiim, nunarpagmun itellriani iqsulirnermi uitalria.
Taukut agayulirtet umgusngauq kevgiullerkaat Agayuvigpagmi Jerusalem-aami, tau͡gaam neryugngaluteng quuleciriyarailngurnek kelipanek pillgucirluki agayulirten͞gullguteteng.
Ilakluku-llu menuurtaa Topheth-aaq, agayularvik agayutnguanun Hinnon Valley-mi, kitumun ekuangairutelluku qetunrani wall'u panini elliitekluku Molech-aamun.

Au͡g'arai-llu elussitat angayuqrin Judah-m elliitek'lallrit agayuaqameng akertem̄un, ekualuki-llu akalrialget ayagassuutet atulaqait tuaten agayuaqameng. (Makut uitavkalallruit carr'ilngurmi agayuvigpiim caniani, yaaqsinrilkiini Nathan Melech-aam uitavian, quyilriaruluni atanerruam.)

Ekuaviit-llu qainganelnguut qulliim uitauvian Ahaz-am, angayuqrin Judah-m piliallrit, ekuaviit-llu Manasseh-m piliallri malrugni carr'ilnguugni elatiinelnguugni Agayuvigpiim, atrartai navgurluki-llu cakneq, eggluki-llu urrait kuicuarmun Kidron-aamun.

Angayuqam-llu menuurtai agayutnguanun ekuaviit calaralirneranelnguut Jerusalem-aam, ungalalirneranelnguut-llu ingrian arumanarqelriim, Solomon-aam angayuqran Israel-aam piliallri Ashtoreth-aamun pellernarqellriartaanun Sidonian-aat, Chemosh-aamun-llu pellernarqellriartaanun Moab-am, Milcom-aamun-llu pellernarqellriartaatnun Ammonite-at.
Navguqapiggluki-llu naparyat, kepurluku-llu Asherim-aaq, nuna-llu uitavillrat patuluku imirluki-llu enritnek yuut.

Cali-llu ilakluku ekuavik Bethel-aami, agayutnguanun agayularvik piliallra Jeroboam-aam qetunraan Nebat-aam, taum Israel-aaq assiilngircetellrukai, tauna ekuavik agayutnguanun navguraa itumteqapiggluki-llu teggalqurri, passilluki urraurrluki; ekualuku-llu Asherah-q.
Josiah-m avatni kiarcamiu tangertuq qungunek ingrim qaingani; enret-llu iluitni uitalriit ancetai ekualuki-llu ekuavigmi, menuurrluku ekuavik, maliggluku qanellra
Qanertuq-llu, “Cauga mistulria nallunailkutaq yaani tangelqa?”
Bethel-aam-llu yuin qanrutaat, “Agayutem yuan qunguqaa taillruuq Judah-mek qanrutkellrui-llu makut pilten ekuavianun Bethel-aam.”
Josiah-llu qanertuq, “Uitaciu; ataki yuum pekcetenrilliki enri.” Tua-i enri uitatait, enri-llu prophet-aam taillrem Samaria-mek tuaten uitalluki.
Tamalkuita-llu agayutnguanun ekuaviit Samaria-m nunarpaini uitalriit, angayuqrin Israel-aam piliallrit eq'urtelluku
Tuqutai-llu tamalkuita agayulirtait agayutnguat tamaanelnguut, qaingatni ekuaviit, ekualuki-llu yuut enrit qaingatni. Tua-i-llu uterrluni Jerusalem-aamun.
Angayuqam-llu alerqurai tamalkuita yuut, “Aturciu kituun
Tua-i waten ayuqellria kituun atuumaksaituq avakenirnek cuqcistet ataniurraanratnek Israel-aaq, iliita-llu angayuqrin Israel-aam angayuqrin-llu Judah-m atuqsaitellruat;
tau͡gaam akimiaq pingayunek cipluku (18) Josiah-m ataniullran allrakuani kituun atuumalallruuq

Cali Josiah-m au͡g'arai qalaruciyugngangualriit tangvaumanrilngurnek, angalkut, eneni agayutnguat, allat-llu agayutnguat, tamalkuita-llu pellernarqellriit tangrruulalriit nuniini Judah-m Jerusalem-aami-llu, waten piuq cingluki alerquutet igausngalriit kalikarni Hilkiah-m nataqellrini Agayuvigpagmi.
Ciungani elliitun ayuqellriamek angayuqertaitellruuq, kevgiuqiinek
Tau͡gaam cali
-llu qanertuq, “Au͡g'arciqmiaqa-llu Judah tangerqemnek, au͡g'allrucimtun Israel-aaq, qessayaguciiqaqa-llu una nunarpak cucukelqa, Jerusalem-aaq, Agayuvigpak-llu qanrutkelqa, Atqa tuanciiquq.”
Wani-wa ilait pillrin Josiah-m, tamalkurmeng-llu caliallri, igausnganritut-qaa

Josiah-m angayuqaullran nalliini Pharaoh Neco-m Egypt-aam angayuqran, ciuliqagtellrui anguyagten̄i Euphrates-aamun angayuqra Assyria-m ikayuryarturluku. Angayuqam Josiah-m arulaircetengnaqsaaqai Egyptian-aat anguyagtet Megiddo-mi Pharaoh Neco-m-llu tuqutaa tuani.

Pistain-llu ayautellruat tuqumaluku ayassuutekun akalrialegkun Megiddo-mek, tailluku-llu Jerusalem-aamun, tungmaggluku-llu nakmiin qunguanun. Judah-m-llu yuin cucukellruat Josiah-m qetunraa Joahaz mingugluku-llu angayuqaurrluku atii enairluku.

Jehoahaz-aaq allrakungellruuq yuinaq pingayunek cipluku (23) ayagnillermini ataniurluni, ataniullruuq-llu pingayuni iraluni Jerusalem-aami. Aanii atengqertuq Hamutal-aamek panikluku Jeremiah-m Libnah-rmium.
Jehoahaz-aq calillruuq assiitellriamek tangvallrani

Pharaoh Neco-m-llu teguaqaa Riblah-mi nuniini Hamath-aam, ataniurngairulluku Jerusalem-aami, Judah-llu akilirtelluku elliin cayailkuciumaarkauluku tiissitsaat pingayunelgat avguluku (7,500) uspernek qerrirlinek yuinaat-llu pingayun akimiarmek cipluki (75) uspernek suulutaanek.
Pharaoh Neco-m-llu Eliakim-aaq, qetunraa Josiah-m, angayuqrurtaa enairluku atii Josiah, acinqiggluku-llu Jehoiakim-aamek. Angayuqam-llu Neco Jehoahaz-aaq ayautaa Egypt-aamun, tuani-llu tuquluni.
Angayuqam Jehoiakim-aam nunam yui akiliqurautnek akilircet'larai qerrlinek suulutaanek-llu, ciptevkenaku piugngallrat tukuutait tangerrluki, tun'arkaminek Egypt-aam angayuqranun Pharaoh Neco-mun.

Jehoiakim-aaq yuinaq tallimanek cipluku (25) allrakungellruuq ayagnillermini ataniurluni, ataniullruuq-llu qula ataucimek cipluku (11) Jerusalem-aami. Aanii atengqertuq Zebidah-mek panikluku Pedaiah-m Rumah-rmium.
Jehoiakim-aaq assiitellriamek calillruuq tangvallrani
Jehoiakim-aam angayuqrullran nalliini Nebuchadnezzar-aam, angayuqran Babylon-aam, anguyagaa Judah, Jehoiakim-aaq-llu pisteksagutaa pingayuni allrakuni; tua-llu ingluliurutuq Nebuchadnezzar-aamun.
ayagceciuq anguyagten̄ek Chaldean-aanek, Syrian-aanek, Moabite-anek, Ammonite-anek-llu anguyagluku Jehoiakim-aaq piunrirrnaluku Judah,
Man'a waten piuq alerquuciatun
pinarqutailnguut-llu augit pitekluki aunrarcetellri; tua-i imillruaku Jerusalem-aaq pinarqutailnguut augitnek,
Wani-wa caliallrin Jehoiakim-aam, tamarmeng-llu pillri, igausnganritut-qaa
Jehoiakim-aam-llu qavallgutkai atani, Jehoiachin-aaq-llu qetunraa ataniurtuq enairluku.
Angayuqra-llu Egypt-aam anenqigtenrituq Egypt-aamek, tua-i-wa angayuqran Babylon-aam tegullruaku tamalkuan angayuqran Egypt-aam pikillra ayagluku Brook of Egypt-aamek tekilluku Euphrates River-aaq.

Jehoiachin-aaq akimiaq pingayunek cipluku (18) allrakungellruuq angayuqrurtellermini, ataniullruuq-llu iraluni pingayuni Jerusalem-aami. Aanii atengqertuq Nehushta-mek panikluku Elnathan-aam Jerusalem-aarmium.
Assiitellriamek calillruuq tangvallrani
Angayuqrullran nalliini Babylonian-aat anguyagcet, ciuliqagterluteng Angayuqam Nebuchadnezzar-aam atanerruarinek, ullallruat Jerusalem-aaq kassugulluku-llu.
Nebuchadnezzar-aaq-llu angayuqra Babylon-aam taiguq Jerusalem-aamun pistem̄i kassugusngainanrani;

Jehoiachin-aaq-llu angayuqra Judah-m tun'uq ellminek angayuqranun Babylon-aam, ellii, aanii, pistai, atanruvigmi-llu atanerruari. Angayuqran-llu Babylon-aam teguaqsagutaa pingayunelgatni allrakut ataniullrin,
ayaulluki-llu tamalkuita akitulriit Agayuvigpagmi, angayuqam-llu eniinelnguut, navgurluki-llu tamalkuita suulutaat assigtat Solomon-aam Israel-aam angayuqran piliallri,

Ayautai-llu tamalkuita Jerusalem-aam yui, tamalkuita angutet alingura'arpek'nateng pinilriit, qulen tiissitsaat (10,000) amllertaluteng quyurrluteng, tamalkuita-llu elisngalriit calianek, ilakluki caviliurtet; kina uitavkenani, kiingita tua-i yuut arrsaunkacagai unilluki Judah-mi.
Nebuchadnezzar-aam ayautaa Jehoiachin-aaq Babylon-aamun, aanii, nulirri, atanerruari, angutet-llu ciuliqagtai Judah-m.

Angayuqran-llu Babylon-aam ayautai angutet alingura'arpek'nateng pinilriit amllertaluteng tiissitsaat malrunelgen (7,000), tiissitsaat (1,000) elisngalriit calianek ilakluki caviliurtet, tamarmeng pinirluteng anguyautmun engelqerruluteng.
Angayuqran-llu Babylon-aam, Mattaniah Jehoiachin-aam angii, angayuqrurtaa Judah-mun Jehoiachin-aaq enairluku atra-llu cimirluku Zedekiah-mek.

Zedekiah allrakungellruuq yuinaq ataucimek cipluku (21) angayuqrurtellermini, atanrullruuq-llu qula ataucimek cipluku (11) allrakuni Jerusalem-aami. Aanii atengqertuq Hamutal-aamek panianek Jeremiah-m Libnah-rmium.
Angayuqaq-llu Zedekiah calillruuq assiitellriamek tangvallrani
-llu eq'urteqapigcami Jerusalem-aam Judah-m-llu yuinun au͡g'allrui tangerqem̄inek.
Zedekiah-llu inglulituq angayuqranun Babylon-aam.

Qulngunritariitni allrakut ataniullmi, qulngurutiitni iralut, qulngurutiitni iralum erenrin, Nebuchadnezzar-aaq Babylon-aam angayuqra taiguq malikluki tamalkuita anguyagten̄i; kassugulluku-llu; avatiikun-llu qacarneq naparrluku.
Nunarpak-llu kassugusngallruat Angayuqam Zedekiah-m atanirturillra qula ataucimek allrakungellranun.
Erenrin qulngurutiitni iralut cetamiita piitnaq arcaqassiyaagan nunarpagmi neqkairutut yui.

Tua-llu navgutut nunarpiim qacarnerakun; Babylonian-aat-llu kassugusngangraatgu nunarpak tamarmeng anguyagcet qimagtut unugmi. Tumekluku atanruviim naucetaarvia, anluteng-llu iteryarakun akuliignelngurkun qacarnerek, qimagluteng-llu Arabah-m tungiinun.
Tau͡gaam Babylonian-aat anguyagtaita kingunrirturluku Angayuqaq Zedekiah, anguluku teguat manigcetellriami yaaqsinrilkiini Jericho-m; tamarmeng-llu anguyagtain unitaat.
Ayautaat-llu Angayuqamun Nebuchadnezzar-aamun Riblah-mun uitavianun, tuani-llu Nebuchadnezzar-aam itengqallerkiuraa.
Zedekiah-mun-llu tangvagcelluki qetunrai tuqutait, Nebuchadnezzar-aam-llu Zedekiah-m iik qagercetak, kalivnercirluku-llu ayaulluku Babylon-aamun.

Iralut tallimiitni, malrunelgatni iralum erenrin yuinaunritariitni allrakuin Angayuqam Nebuchadnezzar-aam, Babylon-aam angayuqran, Nebuzaradan-aaq, ciuqliat angayuqam murilkestain, anguyagtain-llu atanirturtiit tekituq Jerusalem-aamun.
Ekuavkarluki-llu enii Agayuvigpak, angayuqam enii, tamalkuita-llu Jerusalem-aami piuranrita enait.
Anguyagtain-llu Chaldean-aat pillgutain ciuliqagtiita qaunqestet, itumtait qacarneret avatiinelnguut Jerusalem-aam.
Tamalkuita-llu yuut uitaqallret nunarpagmi Nebuzaradan-aam ayautai Babylon-aamun, uitaqallret elisngalriit calianek, ilautellret-llu Babylonian-aanun.
Tau͡gaam unitai Judah-mun ilait arrsaunkacagait yuut, nunautailnguut, wine-aliurten͞gusqelluki naucetaarvigni-llu calisqelluki.
Naparyat-llu punerneret Agayuvigpagmi uitallret, akalrialget-llu atuulalriit Agayuvigpagmi, angtuaq-llu punerneq mervik navguqapigtait, ayaulluki-llu punerneret Babylon-aamun.
Ayaulluki-llu egatet, qanikciurutet, nipcissuutet, qantat aruviarcuutet, tamalkuita-llu assigtat punerneret atuulallret agayuvigpagmi agayuaqata,
kenercissuutet-llu qantat uivluaraat. Tamalkuita ayaulluki cat pilimalriit suulutaat wall'u qerrirlit.
Taukuk-llu punernerek malruk naparyak, angelria-llu mervik, Solomon-aam piliallri Agayuvigpagmun, uqamaicessiyaagameng qaillun uqamaltassiarciiganateng.

Naparyak ayuqlutek: tamarmek yuinaq malrunlegnek (27) it'ganernek quyigtalutek, qulirnerkun-llu kangliumaluni punernermek sugtutaluni tallimiit avguluku it'ganernek. Tamarmek kassutmun kuvyangalngurmek qaralirlutek pomegranates-aanek punernernek.
Ilakluku-llu, Nebuzaradan-aam, ciuqliata qaunqestet tegua Seraiah agayulirtet ciuqliat, Zephaniah-llu tungliq agayulirta, pingayun-llu iteryaram tarikestai.

Nunarpagmek-llu tegutuq ciuliqagtiitnek anguyagtet, tallimanek-llu angutnek angayuqam ayuqucirturtainek nunarpagmi cali uitalrianek; igartiinek-llu ciuliqagtiita anguyagtet, taum ataniumai anguyagtaat kalikaat, allanek-llu yuinarnek pingayunek (60) quyilrianek angutnek.
Nebuzaradan-aam-llu ayautai angayuqranun Babylon-aam, Riblah-m nunarpiini.
Angayuqran-llu Babylon-aam nangcetai tuqulluki-llu Riblah-mi nunami Hamath-aami. Tua-i Judah ayaucimauq nunaminek.
Taukunun-llu uitaqalrianun nuniini Judah-m, Nebuchadnezzar-aam angayuqran Babylon-aam unitellrinun, angayuqaurtaa Gedaliah Ahikam-aam qetunraa, Shaphan-aam qetunraan, nunam angayuqran.

Waniwa ciuliqagtaita anguyagtet yuilqumelnguut anguyagteteng ilakluki niitaat angayuqranun Babylon-aam Gedaliah nunamun angayuqrurrniluku, ayagtut-llu malikluki anguyagteteng Gedaliah-mun Mizpah-mi, ukuuluteng: atanerruarat Ishmael-aaq qetunraa Nethaniah-m, Johanan-aaq qetunraa Kareah-m, Seraiah qetunraa Tanhumeth-aam Netophathite-am, Jaazaniah-llu qetunraa Maacathite-am.
Gedaliah-m-llu qanrutai, “Alingyaqunaci Chaldean-aat atanerruaritnek; uitaurci nunami, kevgiurluku angayuqra Babylon-aam, cat assirluteng pinaurtut elpecen̄un.”

Tau͡gaam malrunelgatni iralut, Ishmael-aaq qetunraa Nethaniah-m, qetunraan Elishama-m, angayuqam ilakuralriartaan iliit, taiguq maligluni qulnek angutnek, yaggluku-llu tuqutaat Gedaliah, Israelite-at-llu Chaldean-aat-llu uitallgutai Mizpah-mi.
Tua-llu tamarmeng yuut, arrsaulriit tukuulriit-llu, ciuliqagtait-llu anguyagtet nangertut, ayagluteng-llu Egypt-aamun; tua-i-wa alingameng Chalean-aanek.

Yuinaq akimiaq malrugnek (37) allrakungellrani teguarullran Jehoiachin-aaq angayuqra Judah-m, qula malruurteqerluki allrakut, yuinaq malrunlegnek cipluku ernengqerluku iraluq, Evilmerodach-aaq angayuqra Babylon-aam, allrakumi ayagnillermini ataniurluni, takumcuyukapiggluni angitaa Jehoiachin-aaq angayuqra Judah-m itercivigmek;
assirluku pia quyinratnek-llu takarnarqutmek piluku, pillmi ilainun allanun angayuqat teguarumilriit elliitun Babylon-aami.
Tua-i Jehoiachin-aam aturani itengqallermini atullni yuugai. Unguvami-llu taktaciatun unuaquaqan nerlartuq angayuqam estuuluani.
Erenret-llu tamalkuita, unguvami taktaciatun, cikiumalartuq angayuqamek canun aturyuk'ngaminun atu'urkaminek.
Adam-aaq atakellrua Seth-am, Seth-aq-llu atakluku Enosh-aam, Enosh-aaq atakluku Kenan-aam,
Kenan-aaq atakluku Mahalalel-aam, Mahalalel-aaq atakluku Jared-aam.
Jared-aaq atakellrua Enoch-aam, ellii-llu atakluku Methuselah-m; Methuselah-llu atakluku Lamech-aam,
ellii-llu atakluku Noah. Noah qetunrangqellruuq pingayunek: Shem-aq, Ham-aq, Japheth-aaq-llu.
Qetunrai Japheth-aam; Gomer-aaq, Magog-aq, Madai-aq, Javan-aaq, Tubal-aq, Meshech-aq, Tiras-aaq-llu.
Kinguvri Gomer-aam yuk'ellrui Ashkenaz-aam, Riphath-aam, Togarmah-m-llu.
Kinguvri Javan-aam yuk'ellrui Elishah-m, Spain-am, Cyprus-aam, Rhodes-aam-llu.
Qetunrai Ham-am: Cush-aq, Egypt-aaq, Libya, Canaan-aaq-llu, ciuliaqellruit yuut ellaita atritnek aterpagcimalriit.
Kinguvri Cush-am yuk'ellrui Seba-m, Havilah-m, Sabtah-m, Raamah-m, Sabteca-m-llu. Kinguvri Raamah-m yuk'ellrui Sheba-m Dedan-aam-llu.
(Cush-aq qetunrangqellruuq at'legmek Nimrod-amek, ciuqliuluni tukniluni anguyagtengulleq ellarpiim iluani.)
Egypt-aam kinguvri yuk'ellrui Lydia-m, Anam-aam, Lehab-am, Naphtuh-m-llu,
Pathrus-aam, Casluh-m, Crete-am-llu (tuaken nek'vut Philistine-at).
Canaan-aam qetunrai: Sidon-aaq, ciuqlikacaaq, Heth-aq-wa, ciuliaqellruit yuut ellaita atritnek aterpagcimalriit.
Canaan-aaq-llu cali ciuliaqellruat Jebusite-at, Amorite-at, Girgashite-at,
Hivite-at, Arkite-at, Sinite-at,
Arvadite-at, Zemarite-at, Hamathite-at-llu.
Shem-am qetunrai: Elam-aaq Asshur-aaq, Arpachshad-aaq, Lud-aq, Aram-aq, Uz-aq, Hul-aq, Gether-aaq, Meshek-aaq-llu.
Arpachshad-aaq atakellrua Shelah-m; Shelah-llu atakellruluku Eber-aam.
Eber-aaq malrugnek qetunrangellruuq; aipaa aciraat Peleg-a-mek,
Kinguvri Joktan-aam yuk'ellrui Almodad-am, Sheleph-am, Hazarmaveth-am, Jerah-m,
Hadoram-aam, Uzal-am, Diklah-m,
Ebal-aam, Abimael-am, Sheba-m,
Ophir-aam, Havilah-m, Jobab-aq-llu.
Ilakutellrata kinguvarturallra Shem-amek Abram-aamun waten ayuqluni: Shem-aq, Arpachshad-aaq, Shelah,
Eber-aaq, Peleg-aq, Reu-aq,
Serug-aaq, Nahor-aq, Terah;
Abram-aaq-wa, (cali Abraham-aamek piaqluku).
Abraham-aaq malrugnek qetunrangqellruuq, Isaac-aankugnek Ishmael-aaq-llu.
Qetunrai Ishmael-aam ciuliqagten͞gurtellruut qula malrugnek (12) cipluku ilakutellrianun: Nebaioth-aaq (atranek Ishmael-aam qetunrain amaqlikacagiitnek) Kedar-aaq, Adbeel-aq, Mibsam-aaq,
Mishma, Dumah, Massa, Hadad-aq, Tema,
Jetur-aaq, Naphish-aaq, Kedemah-llu.

Abraham-aaq nulirruangqellruuq at'legmek Kiturah-mek, tuaggun arvinlegnek qetunrangellruuq: Zimran-aamek, Jokshan-aamek, Medan-aamek, Midian-aamek, Ishbak-aamek, Shuah-mek-llu. Jokshan-aaq malrugnek qetunrangqellruuq Sheba-mek Dedan-aamek-llu.
Midian-aaq tallimanek qetunrangqellruuq: Ephah-mek, Epher-aamek, Hanoch-aamek, Abida-mek, Eldaah-wa.
Abraham-aam qetunraa Isaac-aaq malrugnek qetunrangqellruuq, Esau-nkugnek Jacob-aaq-llu.
Qetunrai Esau-m ukuullruut, Eliphaz-aq, Reuel-aaq, Jeush-aaq, Jalam-aq, Korah-wa.
Eliphaz-aq ciuliaqsagutellruat ukut ilakutellriit: Teman-aam, Omar-am, Zephi-am, Gatam-aam, Kenaz-aam, Timna-m, Amalek-aam-llu.
Reuel-aaq-llu ciuliaqsagutellruat ilakutellriartain Nahath-am, Zerah-m, Shammah-m, Mizzah-m-llu.
Nutem uitavikestai Edom-aam kinguvallruut ukunek qetunrainek Seir-am:
Lotan-aaq, ciuliaqellruat ilakutellriarin Hori-m Homam-am-llu. (Lotan-aaq arnaunengqellruuq aterluni Timna-mek.)
Shobal-aq, ciuliarullruuq ilakutellriarinun Alvan-aam, Manahath-am, Ebal-aam, Shephi-m, Onam-aam-llu.
Zibeon-aaq, qetunrangqellruuq malrugnek, Aiah-nkugnek Anah-llu. Anah atakluku Dishon-aam, Dishon-aaq-llu ciuliaqluku ilakutellriarin Hamran-aam, Eshban-aam, Ithran-aam Cheran-aam-llu.
Ezer-aaq, ciuliaqluku ilakutellriarin Bilhan-aam, Zaavan-aam, Jaakan-aam-llu.
Dishan-aaq, ciuliaqluku ilakutellriarin Uz-am Aran-aam-llu.
Ukut angayuqat ataniullruat Edom-aam nunii kinguqliqluteng, angayuqertangvailgan Israel-aami:
Bela qetunraa Beor-am Dinhabah-mek
Joab-aq qetunraa Zerah-m Bozrah-mek
Husham-aq nuniinek Teman-aam
Hadad-aq qetunraa Bedad-am Avith-aamek (uum cirlakellrui Midianite-at anguyagmi nunautiini Moab-am)
Samlah Masrekah-mek
Shaul Rehoboth-aamek-Kuigmelngurmek
Baal Hanan-aaq qetunraa Achbor-am
Hadad-aq Pau-amek (nulirra Mehetabel-auluni, pania Matred-aam tutgarii-llu Mezahab-am)
Yui Edom-aam avgumallruut ukunun ilakellgutkellrianun: Timna, Alvah, Jetheth-aq,
Oholibamah, Elah, Pinon-aaq,
Kenaz-aaq, Teman-aaq, Mibzar-aq,
Magdiel-aaq, Iram-aaq-llu.
Jacob-aaq qetunrangqellruuq qula malrugnek cipluku: Reuben-aaq, Simeon-aaq, Levi-aq, Judah, Issachar-aq, Zebulun-aaq,
Dan-aq, Joseph-aaq, Benjamin-aaq, Naphtali, Gad-aq, Asher-aaq-wa.
Judah tallimanek qetunrangqellruuq. Nuliamikun Bathshua-kun, Canaanite-akun, pingayunek qetunrangellruuq: Er-aq, Onan-aaq, Shelah-wa. Anngaat qetunrain, Er-aq, umyuarrliqsiyaagan
Ukurramikun-llu Tamar-akun Judah cali qetunrangellruuq malrugnek, Perez-ankugnek, Zerah-llu.
Perez-aq qetunrangqellruuq malrugnek, Hezron-aamek, Hamul-aamek-llu.
Anelgutii Zerah-m tallimanek qetunrangqellruuq: Zimri, Ethan-aaq, Heman-aaq, Calcol-aq, Darda-wa.
Achan-aaq
Ethan-aaq ataucimek qetunrangqellruuq, Azariah-mek.
Hezron-aaq pingayunek qetunrangqellruuq: Jerahmeel-aq, Ram-aq, Chelubai-aq-wa.
Ilakutaqellriit kinguvallrat Ram-amek Jesse-mun waten ayuquq: Ram-aq, Amminadab-aaq, Nahshon-aaq, (Judah-m yuin ilakellriit quyilria ciuliqagtiit),
Salmon-aaq, Boaz-aq,
Obed-aaq, Jesse-llu.
Jesse malrunlegnek qetunrangqellruuq. Kinguqliqutacirmegcetun waten ayuqluteng: Eliab-aaq, Abinadab-aq, Shammah,
Nethanel-aaq, Raddai-aq,
Ozem-aaq, David-aaq-wa.
Cali malrugnek panigluni, Zeruiah-nkugnek Abigail-aq-llu.
Jesse-m pania Zeruiah pingayunek qetunrangqertuq: Abishai-aq, Joab-aq, Asahel-aaq-wa.
Panian aipaa Abigail-aq uinguq Jether-aamek, kinguvranek Ishmael-aam, qetunrangamek-llu aciraak Amasa-mek.
Hezron-aam qetunraa Caleb-aaq nulirturtuq Azubah-mek paningamek-llu aciraak Jerioth-amek. Pingayunek-llu qetunrangluni: Jesher-aamek, Shobab-amek, Ardon-aaq-wa.
Uzubah-m-llu tuqullran kinguani, Caleb-aaq nulirturtuq Ephrath-aamek, qetunranglutek-llu aterluni Hur-amek.
Hur-am qetunraa Uri-aullruuq, tutgarii-wa tan'gaurluq Bezalel-aam.
Hezron-aaq yuinarnek pingayunek (60) allrakungluni, Machir-aam pania nuliqsagutaa, arnaunra Gilead-aam Qetunranguq aterluni Segub-aamek,
Segub-aaq-llu qetunrangluni Jair-amek. Jair-am ataniullrui yuinaq pingayunek cipluku (23) nunarpiit nunautiini Gilead-aam.
