Tau͡gaam angayuqauvikek Geshur-aankuk Aram-aaq-llu cirlakillruuk yuinaat pingayun cipluki (60) nunacuarnek, nunarrait-llu ilakluki Jair-am Kenath-am-llu, nunacuaraat-llu avatiitni uitalriit. Yuut tamarmeng tamaanelnguut kinguveqluki Machir-aam, Gilead-aam atiin.
Hezron-aam tuqullran kinguani, qetunraa Caleb-aaq nulianguq Ephrath-amek, atami aipainranek. Qetunrangellruuq aterluni Ashhur-aamek, nunacuaraam Tekoa-m yiq'erraartellranek.
Jerahmeel-aq, qetunrain Hezron-aam amaqlikacagiit, tallimanek qetunrangqellruuq: Ram-aq, ciuqlikaca'ar, Bunah, Oren-aaq, Ozem-aaq, Ahijah-llu.
Ram-aq pingayunek qetunrangqellruuq: Maaz-aq, Jamin-aq, Eker-aaq-llu. Jerahmeel-aq cali allamek nuliangqellruuq, arnaq aterluni Atarah-mek, cali-llu qetunrarlutek, Onam-aamek.
Onam-aaq malrugnek qetunrangqellruuq, Shammai-ankugnek Jada-llu, Shammai-aq-llu cali malrugnek qetunrarluni, Nadab-ankugnek Abishur-aq-llu.
Abishur-aq nulianguq arnamek aterluni Abihail-amek, malrugnek-llu qetunranglutek, Ahban-aamek, Molid-aamek-llu.
Abishur-am anelgutii Nadab-aq malrugnek qetunrangqellruuq, Seled-ankugnek Appaim-aaq-llu, tau͡gaam Seled-aaq-llu tuqullruuq qetunrangevkenani.
Appaim-aaq atakellrua Ishi-m, Ishi atakellrua Sheshan-am, Sheshan-aaq-llu atakluku Ahlai-am.
Jada, anelgutii Shammai-am, malrugnek qetunrangqellruuq, Jether-ankugnek, Jonathan-aaq-llu, tau͡gaam Jether-aaq tuqullruuq qetunraunani.
Jonathan-aaq qetunrangqellruuq malrugnek, Peleth-ankugnek, Zaza-llu. Ukut tamalkuita kinguveqellrui Jerahmeel-am.
Sheshan-aq qetunraitellruuq, kiingan tau͡gaam panigluni. Egypt-aarmiumek pistengqellruuq aterluni Jarha-mek,
tuavet tunellrua panimi iliit kassuutelluku. Qetunranguk-llu Attai-amek-llu acirluku.
Ilakellriit kinguvallrat Attai-amek ayagluni Elishama-mun waten ayuquq: Attai-aq, Nathan-aaq, Zabad-aq,
Ephlal-aaq, Obed-aaq,
Jehu, Azariah,
Helez-aaq, Eleasah,
Sismai-aq, Shallum-aaq,
Jekamiah-nkuk-wa Elishama-llu.
Amaqlikacagiit qetunrain Caleb-aam, Jerahmeel-am anelgutii atengqertuq Mesha-mek. Mesha atakellrua Ziph-am, tauna-llu atakluku Mareshah-m, ellii-llu Hebron-aam atakluku.
Hebron-aaq qetunrangqellruuq cetamanek: Korah, Tapuah, Rekem-aaq, Shema-llu.
Shema atakaa Raham-aam apa'urluqluku-llu Jorkeam-aam. Rekem-aaq Shema-m anelgutii, atakellrua Shammai-am,
ellii atakluku Maon-am, ellii-llu una atakluku Bethzur-aam.
Caleb-aaq nuliaruangqellruuq Ephah-mek, elliikun-llu pingayunek cali qetunrangellruluni: Haran-aaq, Moza, Gazez-aaq-llu. Haran-aaq-llu cali qetunrangqellruuq Gazez-amek.
(Angun at'lek Jahdai-amek arvinlegnek qetunrangqellruuq: Regem-aaq, Jotham-aaq, Geshan-aaq, Pelet-aaq, Ephah, Shaaph-a-llu.)
Caleb-aaq cali allamek nuliaruangqellruuq, Maacah-mek, irniluni-llu malrugnek qetunrangevkarluku, Sheber-aakugnek Tihanah-llu.
Kinguani cali tamatum malrugnek qetunrangellruuq: Shaaph-aamek, ayagnirtellranek nunacuaraam Madmannah-m; Sheva-mek-llu, ayagnirtellragnek nunacuaraak Machbenah-nkuk Gibea-m-llu.
Ilanglutek-llu, Caleb-aaq paningluni aterluni Achsah-mek.
Makut kinguveqai Caleb-aam.
Qetunrai Hur-am yung'eqaarraarutiin Ephrathah-m; Shobal-aaq atii Kiriathjearim-aam,
Salma-q atii Bethelehem-aam, Hareph-aaq-llu atii Bethgader-am.
Shobal-aaq atii Kirathjearim-aam allanek qetunrangqertuq; Haroeh-q avekluku Menuhoth-am.
Ilai-llu Kiriathjearim-aam; Ithrite-at, Puthite-at, Shumathite-at, Mishraite-at-llu; makunek taigut Zorathite-at Eshtaolite-at-llu.
Qetunrani Salma-m; Bethlehem-aaq, Netophatite-aaq, Atroth Beth Joab-aaq, avgit-llu Manahathite-at, Zorite-at.
(Ilait-llu igatulit uitalriit Jabez-aami; Tirathite-at, Shimeathite-at, Sucathite-at-llu. Makut Kenite-augut taillret Hammath-aamek, atiitnek enelgutkellriartain Rechab-am.)
Makut qetunraqai David-aam yuurtellret elliinun Hebron-aamun; yung'eqarraarutii Amnon-aaq, Ahioam-aakun Jezreelite-akun; tunglia Daniel-aaq, Abigail-akun Carmelite-auluni.
Pingayuak Absalom-aaq, aanangqerrluni Maacah-mek, panianek Talmai-am, angayuqran Geshur-aam; cetamiit Adonijah-q, aanangqerrluni Haggith-aamek;
tallimiit Shephatiah-q, Abital-aakun; arvinelgat Ithream-aaq, nuliamikun Eglah-kun.
Arvinelgen yuurtellruut elliinun Hebron-aami, tua-i ataniullruluni malrunlegni allrakuni arvinelgen-wa iralut. Angayuqrullruuq-llu yuinaq qula pingayunek cipluku (33) allrakuni Jerusalem-aami.
Makut yuurtellruut elliinun Jerusalem-aami; Shimea, Shobab, Nathan, Solomon-aaq-wa, cetaman Bathsheba-kun, paniakun Ammiel-aam.
Tua-i-llu Ibharaq, Elishama, Eliphelet,
Nogah, Nepheg, Japhia,
Elishama, Eliada, Eliphelet-aaq-wa qulngunritarauluteng.
Tamalkuita makut David-aam qetunraqai, avatiitgun qetunrami nuliaruamikun; Tamar-aq tamakut nayagaqluku.
Kinguvri Solomon-aam; Rehoboam, Abijah elliin qetunraak, Asa elliin qetunraa, Jehoshaphat elliin qetunraa,
Joram, elliin qetunraa, Ahaziah elliin qetunraa,
Amaziah elliin qetunraa, Hezekia, elliin qetunraa, Manasseh elliin qetunraa,
Ahaz, elliin qetunraa, Hezekiah, elliin qetunraa, Manasseh elliin qetunraa,
Amon elliin qetunraa, Josiah elliin qetunraa.
Josiah-m qetunrai: Johanan yung'eqarraarutii, tunglia Jehoiakem; pingayuak Zedekiah, cetamiit-wa Shallum.
Kinguvra Jehoiakim; Jeconiah elliin qetunraa, Zedekiah elliin qetunraa.
Qetunrai-llu Jehoiachin-aam, teguam; Shealtiel elliin qetunraa,
Malchir-aam Pedaiah, Sheazzar, Jekamiah, Hoshama, Nebadiah-q-wa;
qetunrai-wa Pedaiah-m; Zerubbabel Shimei; qetunrai-llu Zerubbabel;
Hashubah-q, Ohel, Berechiah, Hasadiah, Jushabhesed, tallimauluteng.
Qetunrai Hananiah-m; Pelatiah, Jeshaiah-llu qetunraak, Rephiah, qetunraa Arnan, Obadiah qetunraa, Shecaniah-llu.
Qetunrai Shecaniah-m; Hattush, Igal, Bariah, Neariah, Shaphat-aaq-llu, arvinelguluteng.
Qetunrai Neariah-m; Elioenai, Hizkiah, Azrikam-aaq-wa, pingayuluteng.
Qetunrai Elioeniah-m; Hodaviah, Eliashib, Pelaiah, Akkup, Johanan, Delaiah, Anani-llu malrunelguluteng.
Qetunrai Judah-m; Pedrez, Hezron, Carmai, Hur, Shobal-aq-wa.
Reaiah qetunraa Shobal-am, atakluku Jahatham, Jahath-aaq-llu atakluku Ahumai-m, Lahadam-llu. Makut yuungnaqellriartaqait Zoathite-at.
Makut-llu qetunraqai Eam-am; Jezreel, Ishma, Idbash-aaq-llu; nayagiit-llu atengqerrluni Hazzelelponi-mek,
Panuel-aaq-llu atakluku, Gedor-am Eser-aaq-llu atakluku Hushah-m.
Ashur-aaq, atii Tekoa-m, malrugnek nuliarluni, Helah-mek Naarah-mek-llu;
Naraah-mi qetunrangqellruuq Ahuzzam, Hepher, Temeni, Haahashtari-llu. Makut qetunraqai Naarah-m.
Qetunrai Helah-m; Zereth, Izhar, Ethan-aaq-llu.
Kozaq atakaa Anub-aam, Zobebah, yuungnaqellgutai-llu Aharhel-aam qetunraan Harum-aam.
Jabez-aaq takarnarqenrullruuq anellgutmini; aaniin-llu aterpagtalaraa Jabez-aamek, qanerluni, “Irniangellruama nangteqlua.”

Jabez-aam qayagauraa Agayutiit Israel-aat, qanerluni, “Ataki elpet atawaqercessnga nunauteka-llu angtucarluku, unatvet-llu pillguciumalitnga, camun-llu pivkaryaqunii akngircuaraanga!” Agayutem-llu niitaa kaigatiinek.
Chelub-aaq, anelgutii Shuhah-m, atakellrua Mehir-am, tauna atakellruluku Eshton-aam.
Eshton-aaq-llu atakluku Bethrapha-m, Paseah, Tehinnah-llu ataklukek Irnahash-am. Makut angutekai Recah-m.
Qetunrai Kenaz-aam; Othniel, Seraiah-llu; qetunrai-llu Othniel-aam; Hathath, Meonathai-aq-llu.
Meonathai-aq atakellrua Ophrah-m.
Seraiah-llu atakluku Joab-am, atiin Geharashim-aam, tuaten aterpagcimaluteng munalriaruata.
Qetunrai Caleb-aam qetunraan Jephuuneh; Iru, Elah, Naam-aq-wa; qetunraa-llu Elah-m; Kenaz-aaq.
Qetunrai Jehallelel-aam; Ziph, Ziphah, Tiria, Asarel-aaq-llu.

Qetunrai Ezrah-m; Jether, Mered, Epher, Jalon-aaq-llu. Makut qetunraqai Bithiah-m, panian Pharaoh-m, Merek-aam nuliqsagutellran; tauna qingarluni qetunrangellruuq Miriam-aamek, Shammai, Ishbah-mek-llu, atiinek Eshtemoa-m.
Nulirra Jews-aaq qetunrangellruuq Jered-aamek, atiinek Gedor-am, Heber-aaq atii Soco-m, Jekuthiel-aam-llu atiin Zanoah-m.
Qetunrai nulirran Hodiah-m, nayagaan-llu Nahum-aam, atakait Keilah-m, Garmite-am, Eshtemoa-m-llu Maacathite-am.
Qetunrai Shimon-am; Amnon, Rinnah, Benhanan, Tilon-aaq-llu. Qetunrai Ishi; Zoheth, Benzoheth-aaq-llu.
Qetunrai Shelah-m qetunraan Judah-m; Er-aq atii Lecah-m, Laadah-q atii Mareshah-m, ilakuralriarit-llu eniita 'lumarralistet Bethashbea-mi;
Jokim-aaq angutai-llu Cozeba-m, Joash-nkuk-llu, Saraph-aaq-llu, ataniullrek Moab-ami uterrlutek-llu Lehem-aamun (watua igausngalriit ak'allaurtut).
Makut qikuliurten͞guut uitavikestekluki Netaim Gederah-m-llu; uitaut tuani ilakluku angayuqaq caliara pitekluku.
Qetunrai Simeon-aam; Nemuel, Jamin, Jarid, Zerah, Shaul;
Shallum-aaq qetunraa, Mebsam-aam qetunraa, Misham qetunraa.
Qetunrai Mishma-m: Hammuel-aaq qetunraa, Zaccur-aaq qetunraa, Shemei-aq qetunraa.
Shimei-aq akimiaq ataucimek cipluku qetunrangqertuq arvinlegnek-llu panigluni; tau͡gaam anelgutai irnialinritut, wall'u ilakuralriartait amllerillrunritut angutaitun Judah-m.
Taukut uitallruut Beersheba-mi Moladah, Hazarshual,
Bilhah, Ezem, Tolad.
Bethuel, Hormah, Ziglak,
Beth Marcaboth, Hazarsusim, Bethviri, Shaaraim-llu. Makut taukut nunarpakellruit David-aaq angayuqaurrnatkaanun.
Nunarrait-llu makuugut, Etam, Ain, Rimmon, Tochen, Ashan-aaq-llu, tallimauluteng nunarpiit.
Ilakluki nunarraat avatiitnelnguut makut nunarpiit tekilluku Baal-aq. Makut nunaksagutelqait, calteng-llu tamalkuita igausngaluki kalikarnun.
Mesobab, Jamlech, Josiah qetunraa Amaziah-m,
Joel-aaq, Jehu qetunraa Joshbiah, qetunraa Seraiah-m, qetunraa Asiel-aam,
Elioenai, Jaalobah, Jeshohaiah, Asaiah, Adiel, Jesimiel, Benaiah,
Ziza qetunraa Shiphi-m qetunraa Allon-aam, qetunraa Jedaiah, qetunraa Shemaiah—
makut aterpagtaumalriit takarnarqellriartaqait enelgutaita, ataita-llu enait angliriut cakneq.
Ayagtut-llu iteryaraanun Gedor-am, calaralirneranun kuignayuum yuarluteng maranek katngauteteng pitekluki.
Tamaani nataqutut canlilriamek assilriamek maramek, nuna cakneq iqtuluni, nepaunani qinuunani; ciungani uitavikestellri Ham-amun pillguciusngallruut.

Makut igaucimalriit at'megteggun, taillruut erenrini Hezekiah-m angayuqran Judah-m, piunrillruit pelatekateng eneteng-llu tamaani uitaqallret, qimagtelluki-llu anevkarluki man'a erneq tekilluku, nunaliluteng-llu kingunratnun, tua-i-wa marartangqerran tamana uitavigkaitnek katngautaita.
Ilait-llu, tiissitsaam avga (500) angutet Simeonite-at, ayagtut ingrimun Seir-amun, ciuliqagtengqerrluteng Pelatiah, Neariah, Rephaiah, Uzziel-aaq-llu qetunrai Ishi-m.
Piunrirtait-llu uitaqallret ilait Amalekite-at qimakallret, tamaani-llu uitaluteng man'a erneq engelkarrluku.

Qetunrai Reuben-aam yung'eqaarraarutiin Israel-aam (tua-i yung'eqarraarutnguuq; taugaam atami arnautain iliit akusrarutekellruamiu, paitarkaa tunumallruuq qetunraanun Joseph-aam qetunraan Israel-aam, taumek ellii igausnganrituq igausngaviitni pitekluku paitarkaa;
ping'e'rmi Judah pininrurtuq anelgutmini takarnarqut'lek-llu elliinek pimaluni, tau͡gaam paitarkaa Joseph-aamun pimaluni),
qetunrai Reuben-aam, yung'eqaarraarutiin Israel-aam; Hanoch, Pallu, Heron, Carmi-llu.
Qetunrai Joel-aam; Shemaiah, qetunraa, Gog-aq qetunraa, Shimei,
Micah, Reaiah, Baal,
Beerah-wa, taum Tilgath-pilneser-aam atanerruara Assyria-m ayautellrukii pektaullerkaanun; ellii atanekuyugtaqellruat Reubenite-at.
Ilain-llu angayuqamegteggun, igausngallrat kinguveqlermegteggu naaqumarian; ciulirnerulria Jeiel-aaq, Zachariah-llu,
Bela-llu qetunraa Azaz-aam, qetunraa Shema-m qetunraa Joel-aam, tauna uitallruluni Aroer-aami, tekilluku Nebo-q Baalmeon-aaq-llu.
Ellii-llu uitalartuq calaralirneqvani tekilluku iteryaraa carr'ilqam ukalirnerani Kuigem Euphrates-aam, tua-i-wa kuluvautait amllerillruameng nuniini Gilead-aam.
Erenrini-llu Saul-aam anguyautellruut Hagrite-anun tamakut tuqurqellruit unatmegteggun; uitaluteng-llu pelatekaitni tamalkuan nunami calaralirnerani Gilead-aam.
Qetunrai Gad-am uitaut akmatiitni inglukluki nunami Bashan-aami tekilluku Salecah-q;
Joel-aaq ciulirneq, Shapham-aq-wa tunglia, Janai-aq Shaphat-aaq-llu Bashan-aami.
Tungelqurrit-llu atamegteggun; Michael, Meshullam, Sheba, Jori, Jacan, Zia, Eber-aaq-llu malrunelguluteng.
Makut qetunraqai Abihail-aam qetunraan Hurim, qetunraan Jaroah-m, qetunraan Jahdom, qetunraan Buz-am.
Ahi-aq qetunraa Abdiel-aam, qetunraan Guni-m ciulirneruuq atami enaini;
Uitaut-llu Gilead-aami, Bashan-aami nunarpaini-llu, tamalkuitni-llu maralegtaini Sharon-aam ellaita engeleksukmeggnun.
(Tamarmeng makut naaqutnguut ciuliamegteggun erenrini Jotham-aam angayuqran Judah-m, erenrini-llu Jeroboam-aam angayuqrata Israel-aat.)

Ilakellgutkellriarini Reuben-aam, Gad-am, East Manasseh-m-llu pinilrianek angutengqertut, tegumialegnek capkutanek nuussirpagnek-llu, pitgaraqluteng-llu urluverteggun, piqayulriit anguyautmi, yuinaak malruk cetamanek cipluku tiissitsaat tiissitsaam-llu avga yuinarnek qula arvinlegnek-llu tiissitsaam-llu avga yuinarnek qula arvinlegnek-llu cipluku (44,760), upingalrianek anguyautellerkameggnun.
Anguyautut-llu Hagrites-aanun, Jetur-aamun, Naphish-aamun, Nodab-amun-llu;

ikayunga'artellermeggni-llu inglulirluki tamakut, Hagrite-at tamarmeng-llu pillgucirtait tunumallruut unataitnun, tua-i qayagiimeng Agayutmun callullermeggni, piyullratnek-llu niitai kaigataitnek tua-i-wa cacetuqutekngatni ellii.

Ayautait-llu ungungssiutait: yuinaak malruk qulmek cipluku tiissitsaat (50,000) qulugnelget, yuinaat-llu qulen yuinaak-llu malruk qulnek cipluku tiissitsaat (250,000) qusngiyagaat, tiissitsaak-llu malruk (2,000) ciulviit, yuinaat-llu talliman tiissitsaat (100,000) angutet unguvaluteng.
Tua-i amlleret iqullruut tuquluteng, tua-i-wa anguyautellrat Agayutmek pian. Uitaut-llu nunaitni pektaullerkameggnun.
Yui East Manasseh-m nunalgartut nunautiini. Bashan-aam yaaqvaq neglirneq tekilluku Baal Hermon-aaq, Senir-aaq, Ingriq-llu Mount Hermon-aaq, yui-llu cukamek amllerriut.
Makut ataita enaita ciulirneqait: Epher, Ishi, Eliel, Azriel, Jeremiah, Hodaviah, Jahdiel-aaq-llu, anguyagturnilriit, tangluaqaumalriit, ciulirnerit ataita enaita.
Tau͡gaam assiilngirtut Agayutiitnun atameng, agturalluteng akissunun agayutaitnun-llu nunam yuin, Agayutem piunrillrin ciuqameggni.

Tua-i Agayutiita Israel-aat akutaa anernera Pul-am angayuqran Assyria-m (cali atran aipaakun piaqluku Tilgath-pilneser-aamek) curuusqelluku nuniit. Ayautai-llu ilakellgutkellriari Reuben-aam, Gad-am, East Manasseh-m-llu nunalgartelluki-llu upanqiggngaunaki Hala-mun, Habor-aamun, Hara-mun-llu, canianun-llu Gozan-aam kuigan.
Qetunrai Levi-am: Gershon-aaq, Kohath-aq, Merari-llu.
Qetunrai Kohath-am; Amram-aaq, Izhar-aq, Hebron-aaq, Uzziel-aaq-llu.
Irniari Amram-aam: Aaron, Moses, Miriam-aaq-wa.
Qetunrai Aaron-aam: Nadab-aq, Abihu, Eleazar-aaq, Ithamar-aq-llu.
Eleazar-aaq atakaa Phinehas-aam, Phinehas-aaq-llu Abishua-m,
Abishua-llu Bukki-m, Bukki-llu Uzzi-m,
Uzzi-llu Zerahiah-m, Zerahiah-llu Meraioth-aam.
Meraioth-aaq-llu Amariah-m, Amariah-llu Ahitub-aam,
Ahitub-aaq-llu Zadok-am, Zadok-aaq-llu Ahimaaz-am,
Ahimaaz-aq-llu Azariah-m, Azariah-q-llu Johanan-aam,
Johanan-aaq-llu Azariah-m, (taunguuq kevgiulleq agayulirten͞guluni eniini Solomon-aam piliaqumalriami Jerusalem-aami).
Azariah-q qetunraqaa Amariah-m Amariah-q-llu Ahitub-aam,
Ahitub-aaq Zadok-am, Zadok-aaq-llu Shallum-aam,
Shallum-aaq-llu Hilkiah-m, Hilkiah-q-llu Azariah-m,
Azariah-q-llu Seraiah-m, Seriah-q-llu Jehozadak-aam,
Jehozadak-aaq-llu ayallruuq pektaurrluni
Levi-aq pingayunek qetunrangqellruuq: Gershon-aaq, Kohath-aq, Merari-llu.
Tamarmeng-llu qetunrangqellruluteng. Gershon-aaq atakluku Libni-nkuk Shimei-llu;
Kohath-am atakluku Amram, Izhar-am, Hebron-aam, Uzziel-aam;
Merari-llu atakluku Mahli-nkuk Mushi-llu.
Ukut kinguveqai Gershon-aam kinguvalriit: Libna, Jahath-aq, Zimmah,
Joah, Iddo, Zerah, Jeatherai-aq.
Ukut kinguveqai Kohath-am kinguvalriit: Amminadab-aaq, Korah, Assir-aaq,
Elkanah, Ebiasaph-aq, Assir-aaq,
Tahath, Uriel-aaq, Uzziah, Shaul-aaq.
Elkanah malrugnek qetunrangqellruuq, Amasai-ankugnek Ahimoth-aaq-llu.
Ukut Ahimoth-aam kinguveqai kinguvalriit: Elkanah, Zophai-aq, Nahath-aaq,
Eliab-aaq, Jeroham-aq, Elkanah-llu.
Samuel-aaq malrugnek qetunrangqellruuq: Joel-aaq, anngaqliq, Abijah-llu, uyuraa.
Ukut kinguveqai Merari-m kinguvalriit: Mahli, Libni, Shimei-aq, Uzzah-llu.
Shimea, Haggiah, Asaiah-llu.
Ukut angutet Atanrem David-aam ellillrui ciuliqagten͞gusqelluki aturcetaanun agayuvigmi Jerusalem-aami kinguani Akqutem Yaassiigan tuavet taicimallran kinguani.
Pitaarluteng kevgiulartut Pelatekami
Ilakellriit kinguvalriit tuani calillret waten ayuqut:

Tungayakellriarinek Kohath-am: Heman-aaq, ciuliqagtiit ciumek aturtet, qetunraqellrua Joel-aam. Nakmiin ilain tungliqutaciat ak'a avaken Jacob-aamek ayagnillruut waten: Heman-aaq, Joel-aaq, Samuel-aaq,
Elkanah, Jeroham-aq, Eliel-aaq, Toah,
Zuph-aq, Elkanah, Mahath-aq, Amasai-aq,
Elkanah, Joel-aaq, Azariah, Zephaniah,
Tahath-aaq, Assir-aaq, Ebiasaph-aq, Korah,
Izhar-aq, Kohath-aq, Levi-aq, Jacob-aaq.
Asaph-aaq ciuliqagtekellruat aipaingita aturtet. Nakmiin ilai ak'a avaken Levi-amek ayagnirluteng waten ayuqut: Asaph-aaq, Berechiah, Shimea,
Michael-aaq, Baaseiah, Malchijah.
Ethni, Zerah, Adaiah,
Ethan-aaq, Zimmah, Shimei,
Jahath-aq, Gershon-aaq, Levi-aq.
Ethan-aaq ilakellriarinek Merari-m ciuliqagtekellruat pingasuingita aturtet. Nakmiin ilai ak'a avaken Levi-amek ayagnirluteng waten ayuqut: Ethan-aaq, Kishi, Abdi, Malluch-aaq,
Hashabiah, Amaziah, Hilkiah,
Amzi, Bani, Shemer-aaq,
Mahli, Mushi, Merari, Levi-aq.
Allat Levite-at cikiumaluteng allanek caliarkanek agayuvikelallratni.

Aaron-aankut kinguveni-llu ellilallruit elliitet puyiaraat elliitet-llu ekuagarkat ekuavigmi. Ellaita caliarkaqluku tamalkuan agayullrat Tanqinrulriami ekuagarkat-llu Agayutem aturluki Israel-aam assiilnguirutkai ilakluki. Makut atulallruit tamalkuita piciryarat alerquamacimegcetun Moses-aakun, Agayutem kevgaakun.
Wani-wa ukut kinguvallrat Aaron-aam kinguvrin: Eleazar-aaq, Phinehas-aaq, Abishua.
Bukki, Uzzi, Zerahiah,
Meraioth-aaq, Amariah, Ahitub-aaq,
Zadok-aq, Ahimaaz-aq.
Una waniwa nuna allakaumalria kinguvrinun Aaron-aam tungayakellriarinek Kohath-am. Akurtullruut ciumek nunamek cikiutekumallermek Levite-anun.
Mat'um ilakaa Hebron-aaq nunautiini Judah-m maraq-llu nuna avatiini.
Tau͡gaam nauciriviit nunarraat-llu, nunarpiim pii cikiutekumallruut Caleb-aamun Jephunneh-m qetunraanun.
Qetunrainun Aaron-aam ellaitnun tunait nunarpiit cayailkuciumalriit; Hebron, Libnah marartuumaan, Jatir, Eshtemoa-llu marartuumaan.
Hilen-aaq marartuumaan, Debir-aaq-llu marartuumaan,
Ashan-aaq-llu marartuumaan, Bethshemesh-aaq-llu marartuumaan;

kinguvellgutkellriartainek-llu Benjamin-aam, Geba-q marartuumaan, Alemeth-aaq marartuumaan, Anathoth-aaq-llu marartuumaan. Tamalkuita-llu nunarpait tamalkuan tamaaken ilakuralriartait quyurmeng amllertaut qula pingayunek cipluku.
Allanun-llu ilaitnun Kohathite-at tunumaut nall'arcetaarluki ilakuralriartait kinguvellgutkellriit avmegteggun-llu ilausngalriit avga Manasseh-m, qulen nunarpiit.
Gershomite-anun-llu ilakuralriartainun nall'arcetaarutkumaut qula pingayunek cipluku nunarpiit kinguvellgutkellriartainek Issachar-am, Asher, Naphtali, Manasseh-llu Bashan-aamelnguq.
Merarite-amun-llu cuqluki ilakuralriartait nall'arcetaarutkumaut qula malrugnek nunarpiit kinguvellgutkelriartainek Reuben-aam, Gad-aq Zebulun-aaq-llu.
Tua-i yuin Israel-aam cikirait Levite-at nunarpagnek marartuumaita.
Cikirmiit-llu cali nall'arcetaarluki kinguvellgutkellriartainek Judah-m, Simeon, Benjamin-aamek-llu makut nunarpiit aterteggun nallunairumaluteng.
Ilait-llu ilakuralriartai qetunrai Kohath-am nunarpautengqertut nunameggni kinguvellgutkellriartainek Ephraim-aam.
Cikiumallruut nunarpagnek cayailkuciumalrianek; Shechem-aamek marartuumaan ingringqellrani Ephraim-aam, Gezer-aamek-llu marartuumaan.
Jokmeam-aamek marartuumaan, Bethoron-aamek-llu marartuumaan,
Aijalon-aamek marartuumaan, Gathrimmon-aamek-llu marartuumaan,
Avmegteggun-llu kinguvellgutkellriartainek Manasseh-m, Aner-aamek marartuumaan, Bileam-aamek marartuumaan, ilatiinun kinguvellgutkellriartain Kohathite-at.
Gershomite-at-llu cikiumaut waken avmegteggun ilausngalriartainek Manasseh-m; Golan-aamek Bashan-aamelngurmek marartuumaan Astaroth-aamek-llu marartuumaan.
Kinguvellgutkellriartainek-llu Issachar-am; Kadesh-aamek marartuumaan, Daberath-aamek-llu marartuumaan,
Ramoth-aamek marartuumaan, Anem-aamek-llu marartuumaan.
Kinguvellgutkellriartainek-llu Asher-aam, Mashal-aamek marartuumaan, Abdon-aamek marartuumaan,
Hukok-aamek marartuumaan Rehob-amek-llu marartuumaan.
Kinguvellgutkellriartainek-llu Naphtali-m; Kedesh-aamek Galilee-amelngurmek marartuumaan, Hammon-aamek-llu marartuumaan, Kiriathaim-amek-llu marartuumaan.
Allanun-llu Merarite-anun nall'arcetaarutkumaut waken kinguvellgutkellriartainek Zebulun-aam; Rimmon-aaq marartuumaan, Tabor-aaq marartuumaan.
Yaatiini-llu Jordan-aam Jericho-q, calaralirnerani Jordan-aam, kinguvellgutkellriartai Reuben-aam; Bezer-aaq manikapiaralriami marami neqkautellegmi tamalkuan, Jahzah-q-llu marartuumaan,
Kedemoth-aaq marartuumaan, Mephaatha-q-llu marartuumaan.
Kinguvellgutkellriarinek-llu Gad-am; Ramoth-aaq Gilead-aamelnguq marartuumaan, Mahanaim-aq marartuumaan,
Heshbon-aaq marartuumaan, Jazer-aaq-llu marartuumaan.
Qetunrai Issachar-am; Tola, Puah, Jashub, Shimron-aaq-llu cetamauluteng.

Qetunrai Tola-m; Uzzi, Rephaiah, Jeriel, Jahmai, Ibsam, Shemuel-aaq-llu, ciuligaqten͞gulriit-llu atameng eniini, aterpaggluki Tola-mek, pinilriamek anguyautellermikun kinguvemeggnek-llu, naaqumallrat erenrini David-aam pitauq yuinaq malrugnek tiissitsaam-llu avga yuinarnek tallimanek cipluku (22,600).
Qetunrai Uzzi-m; Izrahiah. Qetunrai-llu Izrahiah-m; Michael, Obadiah, Joel, Isshiah-q-llu tallimauluteng, tamarmeng atanerruaruluteng;
Ilakluki-llu kinguveqlermegteggun, cuqekluki atameng enait, quyuqetaarluteng anguyauteqainauluteng, yuinaq akimiaq ataucimek cipluku tiissitsaat (36,000), tua-i nulialirtut qetunralirluteng-llu.
Tungelqurrit ilakait yuungnaqellriarin Issachar-am quyurmeng pitaut yuinaat cetaman malrunlegnek cipluku tiissitsaat (87,000) naaqumaluteng taungucimegteggun.
Qetunrai Benjamin-aam; Bela, Becher, Jediael-aaq-llu, pingayuluteng (3).

Qetunrai Bela-m; Ezbon, Uzzi, Uzziel, Jerimoth, Iri-q-llu, talliman, ciulirneruluteng atameng eniini, pinilriit anguyautmi; naaqumallrat-llu ciuliaritgun pitauq yuinaq malrugnek cipluku tiissitsaat yuinaq-llu akimiarunrita'armek cipluku (22,034).
Qetunrai Becher-aam; Zemirah, Joash, Eliezer, Elioenai, Omri, Kerimoth, Abijah, Anathoth, Alemeth-aaq-llu.

Tamalkuita makut qetunraqai Becher-aam; naaqumallrat-llu ciuliamegteggun maliggluku kinguvequciat, ciuqliuluteng atameng eniini, pinirluteng anguyaucarami, pitaut yuinaat tiissitsaat yuinaat-wa qulen (20,200).
Jediael-aam atauciq qetunraa, Bilhan-aaq. Qetunrangqellruuq Bilhan-aaq malrunlegnek: Jeush-aq, Benjamin-aaq, Ehud-aaq, Chenaanah, Zethan-aaq, Tarshish-aaq, Ahishahar-aq-llu.

Tamalkuita makut qetunraqai Jediael-aam maliggluki ciulirnerit atiita enait pinilriit anguyaucarami, akimiaq malrugnek cipluku tiissitsaat yuinaat-llu qulen (17,200) upingalriit anguyautellerkameggnun.
Shuppim-aaq Huppim-aaq qetunraqak Ir-am, Hushim-aaq qetunraqluku Aher-am.
Qetunrai Naphtali-m; Jahziel, Guni, Jezer, Shallum-aaq-llu yua Bilhah-m.
Qetunrai Manasseh-m; Asriel, Aramean-aam nuliaruaran yua, Machir-aamek-llu atiinek Gilead-aam.
Machir-aam-llu nulirturcetaa Huppim-aaq Shuppim-aaq-llu. Atra alqaan Maachaul-auluni. Atra-llu aipaan Zelophehadaul-auluni; Zelophehad-aaq paningqerrluni.
Maach-llu nulirra Machir-aam qetunranguq, aciraa-llu Peresh-aamek; anelgutiin-llu atra Sheresh-aaruuq; qetunrai-llu ukuugut; Ulam-aaq Rakem-aaq-llu.
Qetunrai Ulam-aam; Bedan-aaq. Makut qetunraqai Gilead-aam qetunraan Machir-aam, qetunraan Manasseh-m.
Nayagaa-llu Hammolecheth-aaq qetunranguq Ishod-aamek,
qetunrai Shemida-m ukuugut Ahian, Shechem, Likhi, Ahiam-aaq-llu.
Qetunrai Ephraim-aam; Shuthelah, Bered, Tahath-aaq, Eliadah, Tahath.
Zabad qetunraa, Shuthelah qetunraa, Ezer-aaq Elead-aaq-llu, taukuk angutaita Gath-armiut tamaani nunami yuurtellret, tuqutellruagkek, tua-i-wa tekilluteng kuluvautmeggnek teglengnaqngagnek.
Ephraim-aam-llu atiita amllernek ernerrluni nangtequtekellruluki, anelgutain-llu ullagluku qarutellruat.
Ephraim-aam-llu nuliani nayurluku, qingarluni-llu qetunranguq; aciraa-llu Beriah-mek, tua-i-wa tuunrangayiim tusvikellruaku eneni.
Pania Sheerah-ruuq, taum piliaqellruak tamarkenka atliq qulliq-llu Bethhoron-aaq, Uzzensheerah-q-llu.
Ephraim-aaq qetunrangellruuq Rephah-mek. Waniwa kinguvri: Resheph, Telah, Tahan,
Ladan, Ammihud, Elishama,
Nun-aq, Joshua-llu.
Avaliit nunalgarrvikekait-llu Bethel-aaruuq nunarpaggautai-llu, calaratmun-llu Naaman-aaq, kanavatmun-llu Gezer-aaq nunarpaggautai-llu, Shechem-aaq nunarpaggartuumaan, Ayyah-llu nunarpaggartuumaan.
Ilakluki-llu engeliinelnguut, Bethshean-aaq nunarpaggai-llu, Taanach-llu nunarpaggai-llu, Megiddo-llu nunarpaggartuumaan Dor-aq-llu nunarpaggartuumaan. Makuni uitaut qetunrai Joseph-aam.
Qetunrai Asher-aam; Imnah, Ishvah, Ishvi, Beriah, nayagiit-llu Serah.
Qetunrai Beriah-m; Heber, Malchiel-aaq-llu, atakekii Birzaith-aam.
Heber-aaq atakekii Japhlet-aam, Shomer-aaq, Hotham, nayagiit-llu Shua-q.
Qetunrai Japhlet-aam; Pasach, Bimhal, Ashvath-aaq-llu. Makut-llu qetunraqai Japhlet-aam.
Qetunrai Shemer-aam anelgutiin; Rohgah, Jehubbah, Aram-aaq-llu.
Qetunrai Heler-aam anelgutiin; Zophah, Imna, Shelesh, Amal-aaq-llu.
Qetunrai Zophah-m; Suah, Harnepher, Shual, Beri, Imrah,
Bezer, Hod, Shamma, Shilsa, Ithran, Beera-llu.
Qetunrai Jether-aam; Jephunneh, Pispa, Ara-llu.
Qetunrai Ull-am; Arah, Hanniel, Rizia-llu.

Tamalkuita makut angutngutkai Asher-aam, ciuqlirrauluteng atameng eniini, nallunairumallret pinirluteng anguyaucarami, ciulirnerit takarnarqutellget. Naaqutait igausngaluni ciuliaritgun, kevgaullerkaatnun anguyagmi, amllertaut yuinaq arvinlegnek cipluku tiissitsaat angutet (26,000).
Benjamin-aaq atakaa Bela-m yung'eqarraarutekluku, tungii Ashbel, pingayuak Aharah,
cetamiit Nohah, tallimiit-llu Rapha.
Bel-aq-llu qetunrangqertuq; Adder, Gera, Abihud,
Abishua, Naaman, Ahoah,
Gera, Shephuphan, Huram-aaq-llu.
Makut qetunraqai Ehud-aam (ciuqliuluteng atameng eniini uitavikestain Geba-mi, ayaucimallruut pektaullerkameggnun Manahath-amun);
Naaman, Ahijah, Gera, imna Heglam-aaq, atakekiit Uzza-m, Ahihud-aam-llu.
Shaharaim-aaq-llu qetunrangqertuq nunami Moab-ami kinguakun ayagcetellmi Hushim-aaq, Baara-llu nuliakek-llu.
Qetunrangellruuq Hodeshaakun nuliamikun; Jobab, Zibia, Mesha, Malcam,
Jeuz, Sachia, Mirmah-llu. Makut elliin qetunraqai, ciuqliuluteng atameng eniini.
Allanek-llu qetunrangqertuq Hushim-aakun; Abitub, Elpaal-amek-llu.
Qetunrai Elpaal-am; Eber, Misham, Shemed-aaq-llu, taum piurtellrukii Ono-q Lod-aaq-llu nunarpagtuumakenka.
Beriah Shema-q-llu (taukuk ciuqliullruuk atamek enain nayurtaitni Aijalon-aami, taukuk callungarcetellrukekek nayurtait Gath-ami).
Ahio-llu, Shashak, Jeremoth-aaq-llu,
Zebadiah, Arad, Eder,
Michael, Ishpah, Joha-llu qetunraqai Beriah-m.
Zebadiah, Meshullam, Hizki, Heber,
Ishnerai, Izliah, Jobab-aq-llu qetunraqai Elpaal-am.
Jakim, Zichri, Zabdi,
Elienai, Zillethai, Eliel,
Adaiah, Beraiah, Shimrath-aaq-llu qetunraqai Shimei.
Ishpan, Eber, Eliel,
Abdon, Zichri, Hanan,
Hananiah, Elam, Anthothijah,
Iphdeiah, Penuel-aaq-llu qetunraqai Shashak-aam.
Shamsherai, Shehariah, Athaliah,
Jaareshiah, Elijah, Zichri-llu qetunraqai Jeroham-am.
Makut ciulirneruut atameng enaini, maliggluku kinguvequcirteng, ciuliqagten͞guluteng. Makut uitaut Jerusalem-aami.
Jeiel-aaq atii Gibeon-aam uitaluni Gibeon-aami, nulirran-llu atra Maacah-ruuq.
Qetunrangqerraarutii; Abdon, tua-llu Zur-aq, Kish, Baal, Nadab,
Geder, Ahio, Zecger.
Mikloth-aaq-llu (una atakaa Shimeah-m). Wani-wa makut uitamiut amatiitni tungelqumeng Jerusalem-aami, ilakluki tungelquteng.
Ner-aq atakaa Kish-am, Kish-aaq-llu Saul-aam, Saul-aaq-llu Jonathan-aam, Malchishua, Abinadab, Eshbaal-aaq-llu.
Qetunrai-llu Jonathan-aam makuugut Meribbaal; Meribbaal-aaq-llu atakluku Micah-m.
Qetunrai Micah-m; Pithon, Melech, Tarea, Ahaz-aaq-llu.
Ahaz-aaq-llu atakaat Jehoaddah-m; Jehoaddah-llu atakluku Alemeth-aam, Azmaveth, Zimri-m-llu; Zimri-llu atakluku Moza-m.
Moza-llu atakluku Binea-m; Raphah-llu elliin qetunraqluku, Eleasah elliin qetunraa, Azel elliin qetunraa.
Azel-aaq arvinlegnek qetunrangqertuq, maa-i-llu atrit; Azrikam, Bocheru, Ishmael, Sheariah, Obadiah, Hanan-aaq-llu. Tamalkuita makut qetunraqai Azel-aam.
Qetunrai Eshek-aam anelgutiin; Ulam, yung'eqarraarutekluku, Jeush, tunglia, Eliphelet-aaq-llu pingayuak.

Qetunrai Ulam angutnguut pinilriaruluteng anguyaucarami, urluvlegtauluteng amllernek qetunrangqerrluteng tutgarangqerrluteng-llu yuinaat arvinelgen qulmek cipluku amllertaluteng (130). Tamarmeng Benjaminite-augut.
Tua-i tamarmeng Israel-aat naaqumaut nauvimegteggun; makut-llu igausngaluteng Kalikaitni Atanrita Israel-aat.
Judah-llu tegumallruluni pektaullerkaanun Babylon-aami tua-i-wa pektayiitenriluciat pitekluku.
Wani-wa ataam uitaqarraallret cautmeggni nunameggni-llu Israel-aaruut, agayulirtet, Levite-at, agayuvigmi-llu pistet.
Ilait yukluki Judah-m, Benjamin-aam, Ephraim-aam, Manasseh-m-llu uitallret Jerusalem-aami.
Uthai-aq qetunraa Ammihud-aam, qetunraa Omri-m, qetunraan Imri-m, qetunraan Bani-m, tuaken qetunrainek Perez-aam qetunraan Judah-m.
Shilonite-anek-llu; Asiah yung'eqarraarutii, qetunraqluku.
Qetunrainek-llu Zerah-m, Jeuel tungelqurrit-llu, yuinaat talliman yuinaat-llu qulngunritaraat qulmek cipluku (690).
Benjaminite-anek-llu; Sallu qetunraa Meshullam-aam, qetunraan Hodaviah-m, qetunraan Hassenuah-m.
Ibneiah qetunraa Jeroham-am, Elah qetunraa Uzzi-m, qetunraan Michri-m, qetunraan Mesgullam-aaq-llu qetunraa Shephatiah-m, qetunraan Reuel-aam, qetunraa Ibanijah-m.
Tungelqurrit-llu maliggluku kinguvequciat, tiissitsaam avga yuinaat-wa yuinaq akimiaq ataucimek cipluku (956). Tamarmeng makut ciuqliugut atameng enaitni cuqekluki atameng enait.
Ukut agayulirtet Jerusalem-aarmiungullruut: Jediah, Jehoiarib, Jachin,
Azeriah-llu qetunraa Hilkiah-m, qetunraan Meshullam-aam, qetunraan Zadok-am, qetunraan Meraioth-aam qetunraan Ahitub-aam, atanerruat atanerruarata eniini Agayutem;

Adaiah-llu qetunraa Jeroham-aam, qetunraan Pashhur-aam, qetunraan Malchijah-m, Maasai qetunraa Adiel-aam, qetunraan Jahzerah-m, qetunraan Meshullam-aam, qetunraan Meshillemith-aam; qetunraan Immer-aam.

Avatiitgun tungelqumeng, ciulirnerita-llu enain atameng, atauciq tiissitsaaq tiissitsaam-wa avga yuinaat-llu qula pingayunek cipluku (1,760), cakneq piyugngalriit angutet calillerkameggnun eniini Agayutem.
Ukut-llu Levite-at Jerusalem-aarmiungullruut: Shemaiah, qetunraa Hasshubaam-aam, qetunraan Azrikam-aam, qetunraan Hashabiah-m, qetunrainek Merari-m
Bakbakkar-aaq-llu, Haresh, Galal, Mattaniah-aaq-llu, qetunraa Mica-m, qetunraa Zichri-m, qetunraan Asaph-aam
Obadiah-llu qetunraa Shemaiah-m, qetunraan Halal-am, qetunraa Jeduthun-aam, Berechiah-q-llu qetunraa Asa-m, qetunraan Elkanah-m, uitallret nunarraitni Netophathites-aat.
Iteryarat qaunqestait makuugut; Shullam-aaq, Akkub, Talmon, Ahiman, tungelqurrit-llu (Shullam-aaq ciuqliuluni).
Elkarcimaluteng angayuqam iteryaraanun calaralirnermi. Makut iteryarat qaunqestekait uitaviata Levite-at.

Shullam-aaq qetunraa Korem, qetunraan Ebiaseph-aam, qetunraan Korah-m, tungelqurri-llu atiin enainek, Korathite-at murilkesten͞gulteng calistaitnun iteryaraita pelatekat, atameng pilallruciicetun murilkesten͞guluteng uitauviani
Phinehas-aaq-llu qetunraa Eleazar-aam picirkiristen͞guluni tamakunun pellullermi;
Zachariah qetunraa Meshelemiah-m qaunqesten͞guluni iteryaraanun pelatekam quyurrviim.

Tamarmeng makut cucukumalriit tarikesten͞guluteng iteryaraanun. Pitaut yuinaat qulen qula-llu malrugnek cipluku (212). Naaqumaluteng-llu ciuliamegteggun nunarraitni. David-aankuk Samuel-aaq-llu murilkestem elkartellrukek calivimeggnun nallunritesten͞gusqellukek.
Tua-i ellait elkarcimaut qaunqesten͞guluteng iteryarainun eniin
Iteryarat qaunqestait uitaluteng cetamani avataini, calaralirnermi, kanavalirnermi, neglirnermi, ungalalirnermi-llu.
Tungelqurrit-llu nunaitni uitalriit tailararkauluteng tamalkuitni ernerni malrunlegni pirrlainarpek'nateng, uitallgutkeqeryarturluki makut.
Ukut-llu cetaman quyinrulriit iteryarat qaunqestait murilkelarait uitaviit akiutai-llu eniin Agayutem.
Inartelartut-llu avatiinun eniin Agayutem; ellaitnun-wa tusngavkaumiimi murilkurallerkaat, ellaita-llu caliarkaqluku ikirtelallerkaa unuakut tamalkuita.
Ilait caliarkicimaut murilkesqelluki qantat atulaqait agayuaqameng, pisqumiimeng naaqelararkauluki anutaqateki itrutaqatki-llu.
Allat ilait elkaringaut calissuutnun, tamalkuitnun-llu tanqilrianun calissuutnun, mukaamun-llu, wine-anun, uqunun, aruvagkanun, avukucimalrianun-llu.
Allat qetunrait agayulirtet upcilartut avukutarkanek ayuqenrilngurnek.
Mattithiah-llu, iliit Levite-at, yung'eqarraarutii Shallum-aam Korahite-aq, qaunqesten͞guuq mamcartellrianek assaliisten̄un.
Cali-llu ilait tungelqurrita Korathite-at qaunqesten͞guut tangrrutnek kelipanek upcisten͞guluteng tamalkuita agayunret.
Wani-wa ukut aturten͞guut, atameng enaitni Levite-at, uitaluteng uitaviini agayuviim calingaunateng allanek caliarkanek, calivkaumalaameng unugtuumaan.
Makut ciuqliugut atameng enaini Levite-at, maligluki kinguveqellriit ciuliqagtait, uitallret Jerusalem-aami.
Gebeon-aami uitallruuq atii Gibeon-aam, Jeiel-aaq, nulirra-llu atengqerrluni Maacah-mek.
Yung'eqarraarutii atengqertuq Abdon, tua-llu Zur, Kish, Baal, Ner, Nadab,
Gedor, Ahio, Zachariah, Mikloth-aaq-llu;
Mikloth-aaq-llu atakluku Shimean-aam, makut-llu uitallruut amatiitni tungelqumeng Jerusalem-aami, tungelquteng ilakluki.
Ner-aq atakaa Kish-am, Kish-aaq-llu Saul-aam, Saul-aaq-llu Jonathan-aam, Malchishua-m, Abinadab-am, Eshbaal-am-llu.
Qetunraa-llu Jonathan-aam Meribbaal-auguq; Meribbaal-aaq-llu atakluku Micah-m.
Qetunrai Micah-m; Pithon, Melech, Tahrea, Ahaz-aaq-llu;
Ahaz-aaq-llu atakluku Jarah-m, Jarah-m-llu Alemath-aaq, Azmaveth-aaq, Zimri-llu; Zivri-llu atakluku Moza-m.
Moza-llu atakluku Binea-m; Rephaiah-llu qetunraqluku elliin, Eleash-aq elliin qetunraa, Azel-aaq qetunraa.
Azel-aaq arvinlegnek qetunrangqertuq maa-i-llu atrit; Azrikam, Bocheru, Ishmael, Sheariah, Obadiah, Hanan-aaq-llu; makut qetunraqai Azel-aam.
Wani Philistine-at callugait Israel-aat; angutait-llu Israel-aat qimagtut ciunratnek Philistine-at, iqumalartut-llu tuqucimaluteng Ingrimi Gilboa-mi.
Philistine-at-llu anguluku Saul-aaq qetunrai-llu tuqutaat Jonathan-aaq Abinadab-aq-llu Malchishua-q-llu, qetunrai Saul-aam.
Callullrat-llu cagniuq inglulirluku Saul-aaq, urluvelget-llu nataqaat akngircimaluni-llu pitgaqutulitgun.

Tua-llu Saul-aaq qanertuq anguyaucessuutmi tegumiaqestiitnun, “Amuluku nuussirpiin, kapia-llu tamatumek, makut nuugiumanrilnguut tailuteng anglaniteksuaraatnga.” Tau͡gaam tegumiaqucestiin piyuumiitaa tua-i-wa cakneq alingami. Taumek Saul-aam elliin teguluku nuussini iquvikaa.
Tegumiaqucicestiin-llu tangrramiu Saul-aaq tuqucia, ellii-llu iqumiuq nuussiminun, tuquluni-llu.
Wani-wa Saul-aaq tuquuq; pingayun-llu qetunrai, tamarmeng-llu ilai tuquut quyurmeng.
Tamarmeng-llu angutain Israel-aam tamaanelnguut tangrrait anguyagtet qimalriit Saul-aaq-llu qetunrani-llu tuqumaciat, peggluki-llu nunateng qimagtut; Philistine-at-llu ullagluki uitavikait.
Unuaquan-llu Philistine-at tailuteng uayarnaluki tuqumalriit, nataqait Saul-aaq qetunrani-llu iqumaluteng Ingrimi Giboa-mi.
Uayaaraat-llu teguluku-llu qamiqurra akngircailkutai-llu, ayagceciluteng-llu qanerten̄ek qaqilluku nuniit Philistine-at, qanrutkesqelluku niitekegcinarqellria agayutnguanun yugnun-llu.
Elliit-llu akngircailkutai agayuviitnun agayutnguameng, qillruluku-llu qamiqurra agayuvianun Dagon-aam.
Tau͡gaam yuut tamarmeng Jabesh-gilead-aat niicamegteki tamalkuita Philistine-at pillrit Saul-aamun,

tamarmeng alinguraranrilnguut angutet nangerrluteng, teguluku ayautaat temii Saul-aam temait-llu qetunrain, tailluku-llu Jabesh-aamun. Qunguutait-llu naparpiim oak-am acianun yagluteng-llu ernerni malrunlegni.
Tua-i Saul-aaq tuquuq pektayiitenritlerminun; ellii-wa ukvenrituq
Ayuqucirturcetaarpek'nani-llu
Tua-llu tamarmeng Israel-aat quyurtut pillgutekluteng David-aamun Hebron-aami, qanerluteng-llu, “Tangerrluku wangkuta elpet enqerpekut kemekluta-llu.
Avani pellullermi, Saul-aam-llu atanrullran nalliini, elpengullruuq anulluki Israel-aat;
Tua-i tamarmeng ciulirnerit Israel-aat taigut atanermun David-aamun Hebron-aami. David-aaq-llu akqutmek taqutuq ellait ilakluki, uqumek-llu mingugaat, angayuqrurtuq-llu Israel-aamun,
Angayuqaq David-aaq tamarmeng-llu Israelite-at ayagtut curugluku-llu Jerusalem-aaq. Tamaani Jebus-aamek piaqluku, Jebusite-at-llu nutem tamatum nunam yui, cali tamakumiunguluteng.
Jebusite-at qanrutaat David-aaq watqapik iterngaitniluku nunarpiim iluanun, ilangcivkenaki David-aam tegua asvailngua Zion-aam, pilangaat-llu “David-aam Nunarpiinek,”
David-aaq qanertuq, “Kina imna ciumek tuqucikuni Jebusite-amek atanruarkauguq alerquasten͞guluni-llu.” Joab-aq-llu qetunraa Zeruiah-m mayurtuq ciumek, tua-i ellii atanirturtengurtuq.
David-aaq-llu uitaluni asvailngurmi; taumek aterpagcimauq David-aam Nunarpiinek.
Ellii-llu nunarpaliuq uivetmun avatiikun ayagnirluku Millo-mek qaqilluku kassutmun; Koab-am-llu kituggluku ilii nunarpiim.
David-aaq-llu angliurtuq pingiinarluni, tua-i
Wani-wa makut David-aam neq'ayarat anguyagtai, capkuciumastain angayuqauviani, pillgucirluki tamalkuita Israel-aat, atanrusqelluku, maliggluku qaneryaraa
Man'a igausngalqaat David-aam pinilriarin angutet; Jashobeam-aaq Hachmonite-aq ciuqliqluku pingayun; elliin narulkarcuutmikun tuqutellruluki yuinaat akimiaq (300), ataucikun.
Tungliuluni-llu elliinun “Pinga­yuni” Eleazar-aaq, qetunraa Dodo-m, Ahohite-am.

Elliin pillguciumallrua David-aaq Pasdammim-aami Philistine-at quyurtellratni callugnaluteng. Tamaani cuqtangqertuq nunamek nauvikumaluni amllernek mukaarkanek, angutet-llu qimagluteng Philistine-anek.
Tau͡gaam ellii nangengqallruuq qukaani carr'ilqam, callugluki, tuqurqelluki-llu Philistine-at;
Pingayun atanerruat yuinaq qulmek (30) ilait angutet, atrartut teggalqumun David-aamun nayunermi Adullam-aami, anguyagtait Philistine-at qavartaumallratni Kuignayuani Rephaim-aam.
David-aaq uitallruuq cayailkuciumalriami; quyungqalriit-llu Philistine-at tuani Bethlehem-aametellruut.
David-aaq qanertuq nerinitellriatun, “Waniwa-tuq kia imum cikiqerlia merr'illua mermek elakaanek Bethlehem-aam, iteryaram canianelngurmek.”

Tua-llu pingayun neq'ayarat anguyagtet itertut uitaviatnun Philistine-at, mertarluteng-llu elakaanek Bethlehem-aam iteryaram canianelngurmek, ut'rulluku-llu David-aamun. Tau͡gaam meryunritaa; merpek'naku kuvaa elliitekluku

qanerluni-llu, “Yaaqsigli wangnek ciuqerrani Agayutma waten piarkaukumku man'a. Merlaku-qaa unguviita augat makut angutet? Tua-i ellait unguvaseng qevvluku taicatgu tamana.” Taumek elliin meryunritaa. Makut pilqait pingayun neq'ayarat anguyagtet.

Wani-wa Abishai anelgutii Joab-am, ciuliqagtiit yuinaq qulmek cipluku (30) angutet. Narulkarcuutmikun inglulirluki yuinaat akimiaq (300) angutet tuqulluki-llu, qakvaqengluni at'nguq avatiitgun pingayun.
Ellii arcaqerluni neq'ayarauguq taukuni yuinaq qulmek cipluku (30), alerquasteksagutellruat-llu. Tau͡gaam pitacirtullrunritai taukut “Neq'­a­ya­rat Pinga­yun”.

Benaiah-llu qetunraa Jehoiad-aam pinilriaruuq angun Kabzeal-aamek, angelriatgun ikayuakengtuli; Iqutellruak-llu malruk anguteluaqak Moab-armiuk. Ellii-llu cali ekluni elanermun qanillrani tuqutellrua yugtutuli.

Elliin-llu cali tuqutellrua angun Egypt-aarmiu, angun cakneq angelria, it'ganret pingayunelgat avguluku sugtutalria. Egypt-aarmiu unatmikun tegumiangqertuq narulkarcuutmek cakneq angelriamek; tau͡gaam Benaiah-m atrarvikluku ayarungqerrluni, allurtaa-llu Egypt-aarmiu narulkarcuutiinek, tuqulluku-llu elliin nakmiin narulkarcuutiikun.
Makunek pillruuq Benaiah qetunraa Jehoiad-aam, tuqluutengluni-llu atermek avatiitgun pingayun pinilriit angutet.
Pivakumalriarurtuq ilakluki yuinaq qulmek cipluku (30) tau͡gaam elliin pita­cir­tull­run­ri­tai pingayun. David-aam-llu ellminun tarikesteksagutaa.
Pinilriartait angutet anguyagtet ukuugut:
Asahel anelgutii Joab-am, Elhanan qetunraa Dodo-m Bethlehem-aarmiu,
Shammoth Harod-aamek Helez-aaq Pelonite-aq,
Ira qetunraa Ikkesh-aam Tekoa-mek, Abiel-aaq Anathoth-aamek,
Sibbecai Hushathite-aq, Ilaia Ahohite-aq,
Maharaia-q Netophah-mek Heled-aaq qetunraa Baanah-m Netophah-mek,
Ithai-aq qetunraa Ribai-am Gebeah-mek Benjaminite-auluni, Beniah Pirathon-aamek,
Hurai-aq kuiggaarainek Gaash-am, Abiel-aaq Arbathite-aq,
Azmaveth-aaq Baharum-ek, Elliahba Shaalbon-aamek,
Hashem-aaq Gizonite-aq, Jonathan-aaq qetunraa Shagee-m Hararite-am,
Ahiam-aaq qetunraa Sacher-aam Hararite-am, Eliphal-aaq qetunraa Ur-am,
Hepher-aaq Mecherathite-aq, Ahijah Pelonite-aq,
Hezro Carmel-aamek, Naarai-aq qetunraa Ezbai-am,
Joel-aaq anelgutii Nathan-aam, Mibhar-aq qetunraa Hagri-m,
Zelek-aaq Ammonite-aq, Naharai-aq Beeroth-aamek, tegumiaqucicestii Joab-am qetunraan Zeruiah-m,
Ira Ithrite-aq, Gareb-aaq Ithrite-aq,
Uriah Hittite-aq, Zabad-aaq qetunraa Ahlai-am,
Adin-aaq qetunraa Shiz-am Reubenite-am, ciuliqagtiita Reubenite-at, yuinaat-llu qulen cipluku (30) ilakluki,
Hanan-aaq qetunraa Maacah-m, Joshaphat aaq-llu Mithnite-aq,
Uzzi-aq Ashterathite-aq, Shama Jeiel-aaq-llu qetunraak Hotham-aam Aroerite-am,
Jediael-aaq qetunraa Shimrim, Joha-llu anelgutii, Tizite-aq,
Eliel-aaq Mahavite-aq, Jeribai, Joshaviah-q-llu, qetunraa Elnaam, Ithmah-llu Moabite-aq,
Eliel, Obed, Jaaziel-aaq-llu Mezobaite-aq.

Wani-wa makut angutet taillret David-aamun Ziklag-aami, nalliini piyugtacimitun ayagasciigatellran tua-i-wa pitekluku Saul-aaq qetunraa Kish-am; ilagausngaut-llu pinilrianun angutnun ikayuastem̄inun anguyautellrani.
Tamakut pitgaqusten͞guut, pitgaryugngalriaruut elluqutengqerrluteng-llu elluquyugngaluteng atunem iqsumegteggun tallirpimegteggun-llu; tamakut Benjaminite-augut, Saul-aam tungelqurri.
Ciulirneruuq Ahiezer-aaq, tua-llu Joash-aq, tamarkenka qetunraqlukek Shemah-m Gebeah-rmium, cali-llu Jeziel-aaq Pelet-aaq-llu qetunraak Azmaveth-aam; Beracah, Jehu Anathoth-aamek,
Ismaiah Gibean-aamek, pinilria angun iliit yuinaq qulmek cipluku (30); Jeremiah, Jahaziel, Johanan, Jozabad Gederah-mek,
Eluzai, Jerimoth, Bealiah, Shenariah, Shephatiah, Haruphite-aq;
Elkanah, Isshiah, Azarel, Joezer, Jashobeam-aaq-llu, Korahite-aq;
Joelah-llu, Zebadiah-llu, qetunraak Jeroham-aam Gedora-mek.

Gadite-anek agelriartangqellruuq David-aamun cayailkuciumalriami yuilqumi, pinilriit elisngalriit anguyagtet, piqaqunqellriit capkutatgun narulkarcuutetgun-llu, taukut kegginait ayuqut kegginaicetun yugtutulit, taukut cukalialuteng tuntuyagarcetun ingritgun pektelartut.
Ezer-aaq ciuqliq, Obadiah tunglia, Eliab-aaq pingayuak,
Mishmanah cetamiit, Jeremiah tallimiit,
Attai arvinelgat, Eliel malrunelgat,
Johanan, pingayunelgat, Elzabad qulngunritariit,
Jeremiah qulngurutiit, Machbannai-a qula ataucimek cipnerat.
Makut Gadite-at atanerruaqait anguyagtet, ikgellrulria yuinaat talliman cipluku (100) amllenrulria-llu tiissitsaaq cipluku (1,000).
Makut angutet taukuugut qerallret Jordan-aakun ciuqlirmi iralumi, uryuumallragni cen̄aq, callugluki-llu tamalkuita tamaani kuignayugmelnguut, calaratmun kanavatmun-llu.
Ilait-llu angutekenka Benjamin-aankuk Judah-llu taigut asvaiqcaumalriamun David-aamun.

David-aaq an'uq pairrsaagluki qanrulluki-llu, “Elpeci taikuvci yugniqluci ikayurnalua, ircaquqa nuvutarkauguq elpecen̄un; tau͡gaam tun'arkaukuvcia inglumnun, alarngalriartaicaaqengraan unatemni, kitaki Agayutiita atamta tangerrlici kituggluci-llu.”

Tua-llu Anerneq taiguq Amasai-amun, ciuqliatnun yuinaq qulnek cipluku (12), qanerluni-llu, “Wangkuta pikarpekut, David-aaq; elpenun ataki qetunraan Jesse-m! Uitanqegcin, uitanqegci elpenun, uitanqegci-llu ikayurtevnun! Tua-i Agayutvet ikayuaten.” Nutaan David-aam ciuniurai, atanerruarurrluki-llu anguyagtem̄inun.

Ilaita angutain Manasseh-m unitellruat David-aamun ayallrani pillgutekluki Philistine-at callugyarturluku Saul-aaq. (Tau͡gaam ikayunritai, tua-i picirkiristait Philistine-at arenqiirturluteng ayagcecatgu qanerluteng, Aarnarquq qamiqumten̄un uniskakut Saul-aamun).
Ellii ayallrani Ziglag-aamun makut angutai Manasseh-m unitellruat elliinun: Adnah, Jozabad, Jediael, Michael, Jozabad, Elihu, Zillethai-aq-llu, ciuqliulriit tiissitsaanun Manasseh-mi.
Tamakut ikayullruat David-aaq inglulirluki quyuqetaarluteng curulalriit; tua-i tamakut tamarmeng pinilriaruluteng piugngalriaruluteng angutet, alerquasten͞gluteng-llu anguyagten̄i.
Wani-wa unuaquaqan angutet taiguralartut David-aamun ikayurnaluku.
Makut naaqutkait avverqumallrata saskutgun anguyagtet, taillret David-aamun Hebron-aami, nugtarrnaluku angayuqauvia Saul-aam elliinun, maliggluku qaneryaraa
Angutai Judah-m tegumiarluteng capkutanek narulkarcuutnek-llu amllertaut tiissitsaat arvinelgen tiissitsaam-llu avga yuinaat-llu akimiaq (6,800) saskulget anguyagtet.
Simeonite-anek-llu pinilriit angutet piyugnarqellriit anguyagmun, tiissitsaat malrunelgen yuinaat-llu talliman (7,100).
Kevite-anek-llu, tiissitsaat cetaman tiissitsaam-llu avga yuinaat-llu talliman (4,600).
Takarnarqut'lek Jehoiada, eniinek Aaron-aam, pillguterluni-llu tiissitsaanek pingayunek tiissitsaam-llu avga yuinaat-llu qulen (3,700).
Zodak-aq, ayagyuaq pinilria piyugnarluni, ilaluni yuinaq malrugnek cipluku (22) alerquasten̄ek elliin nakmiin atami eniinek.
Benjaminite-anek-llu tungelqurrinek Saul-aam, tiissitsaat pingayun (3,000), tamakut ilaita man'a tekilluku aturaat takaqutseng eniinun Saul-aam.
Ephraimite-anek tiissitsaat yuinaat tiissitsaam-llu avga yuinaat-llu akimiaq (20,800), pinilriit angutet piyugngalriit nallunailnguut atameng eniini.
Avmegteggun-llu kinguvellgutkellriartai Manasseh-m akimiaq pingayunek tiissitsaat (18,000), tamakut tugerluteng aprumalriit tailuki David-aaq atanrurcartuusqelluku.
Issachar-amek-llu angutet taringumalriit pilrianek, nalluvkenaku qaillun Israel-aat pillerkaat, yuinaat qulen ciulirneret (200), ilakluku tamalkuita tungelquteng acimeggni alerquakengateng.

Zebulun-aamek yuinaak malruk tiissitsaat qulmek cipluku (50,000) pinariaqan pitulit anguyagtet, akluliumaluteng tamalkuitnek saskuinek anguyaucaram, ikayurarkauluku David-aaq atauciurrluteng picirkiuramegteggun.
Naphtali-mek tiissitsaat (1,000) alerquastet pillguterluteng yuinaq qula malrunlegnek tiissitsaanek (37,000) angutnek, saskungqerrluteng capkutanek narulkarcuutnek-llu.
Danite-anek, yuinaq pingayunlegnek tiissitsaanek tiissitsaam-llu avga yuinaat-wa talliman (28,600) saskuliumaluteng anguyautellerkameggnun.
Asher-aamek, yuinaak malruk tiissitsaat (40,000) pinariaqan pitulit anguyagtet upingalriit anguyautellerkameggnun.
Reubenite-at Gadite-at-llu avmegteggun-llu Manasseh-m yaatiinek Jordan-aam, yuinaat arvinelgen tiissitsaat (120,000) angutet saskulget tamalkuitnek anguyaucessuutnek.

Tamarmeng makut anguyiit, upingaluteng callullerkameggnun, taigut Hebron-aamun tamalkirrluteng piurcarturluku David-aaq atanrurrnaluku Israel-aanun; ayuqluteng-llu tamarmeng Israel-aat umyuangqertut ataucimek David-aam atanrurtellerkaanek.
Tamaantellruluteng-llu pillgucirluku David-aaq ernerni pingayuni, nerluteng merluteng, anelgutaita upyutellruiceteng ellait.

Cali-llu-wa nunalgutaita, Zebulun-aamek Issachar-amek, Naphtali-mek-llu taitellruameng neqkanek donkey-tgun, qulugtellriatgun, ciulvagteggun, angucalutgun-llu amllernek atu'urkameggnek neqkanek, cake-aanek, issuumanek, wine-anek uqunek, kuluviit angucaluitnek, qusngiyagarnek-llu, tua-i angnirpiimeng Israel-aani.
David-aam qanellgutkai alerquastait tiissitsaat (1,000s) yuinaat-llu tallimauqaqluten (100s) tamalkuita ciuliqagtet.
David-aaq-llu qanertuq tamalkuitnun quyungqalrianun Israel-aanun, “Elpecen̄un assirngalkan, piyulqekaku-llu
Nutaan cali ataam taiteqerlaut Akqutem Yaassiiga wangkutnun; cakaarturalallruarput erenrini Saul-aam.”
Tamarmeng-llu quyungqalriit umyuallguciutut tuaten piyugluteng, tua-i cat assirluteng piata tangellratni tamarmeng yuut.
Tua-i David-aam quyurtai tamalkuita Israel-aat Shihor-amek Egypt-aamelngurmek iteryaraanun Hamath-aam, taicesqelluku Akqutem Yaassiiga, Kiriath Jearim-aamek.
David-aaq tamarmeng-llu Israel-aat mayurtut Baalah-mun, uumun-wa Kiriath Jearim tauna Judah-m pikaa, taitnaluteng tuaken Akqutem Yaassiiganek, aterpagcimalriim atrakun
Ayautagket-llu Akqutem Yaassiigek nutaragnegun pekcessuuksuaraagnegun eniinek Abinadab-am, Uzzah-m-llu, Ahiom-llu taukut auluklukek pekcessuutek.
David-aaq tamarmeng-llu Israel-aat angnirpagtut ciuqerrani Agayutem tamalkirrluteng, yuarutetgun, qelutelegteggun, cupu'uryaratgun-llu ayuqenrilngurteggun.
Tekitellermeggni-llu iteryaraan natranun Childon-aam, Uzzah yagtuq nayumiqanaluku Akqutem Yaassiiga, kuluviit angucalut iquata.
Alqunaq-llu
David-aaq-llu qenertuq tua-i-wa
David-aaq-llu alinguq Agayutmek taumi ernermi; qanerluni-llu, “Qaillun taiciiqsia Akqutem Yaassiiga enemnun?”
Tua-i David-aam taitenritaa Akqutem Yaassiiga eneminun nunamini, tau͡gaam tailluku allamun eniinun Obededom-aam Gittite-am.
Akqutem Yaassiiga tua-i uitauq pingayuni iraluni;
Hiram-aaq-llu atanra Tyre-am ayagceciuq qanerten̄ek David-aamun, murakegtaarnek-llu, teggalqulisten̄ek-llu enelitulinek-llu enelisqelluku ellii.
David-aaq-llu taringuq
David-aam-llu ilai nuliani Jerusalem-aami, qetunrangluni-llu allanek paningluni tuaten.
Makut atqait irniangutain Jerusalem-aami; Shammua, Shobab, Nathan, Solomon,
Ibhar, Elishua, Elpelet,
Nogah, Nepheg, Japhia,
Elishama, Beeliada, Eliphelet.

Tuani Philistine-at niicamegteggu David-aam minguumacia atanrurrluku tamalkuitnun Israel-aanun, tamarmeng Philistine-at mayurtut yuarluku David-aaq; David-aaq-llu niicami tamatumek an'uq pairrsaagluki.
Tuani Philistine-at tailuteng calluallruut kuignayuani Rephaim-aam.
David-aam-llu kangiiturvikaa Agayun, “Mayurlua-qaa inglulirlaki Philistine-at?”

Mayurtuq-llu ellii Baal Perazim-aamun, tuani David-aam cirlakai taukut; David-aaq-llu qanertuq, “Agayun navguutuq inglumni unatmikun, cukamek ulelriatun.” Taumek aciraat tauna nuna Baal-perazim-aamek.
Unitait-llu ellaita agayuteteng tuavet, David-aaq-llu alerquingan tamakut ekuagait.
Philistine-at cali ataam calluanqigtut kuignayugmi.
David-aam-llu ataam kangiiturvikenqigcani, Agayun, Agayutem kiugaa, “Elpet mayurviksaqunaki; amatairluki iluvarvikluki-llu amatiitnek napat.
Niiskuvkii-llu nepait piyuallrita kangritnek napat, anvikluki callugniaten; tua-i Agayun anellruan ciunerpeggun elpenun iqutesqelluki anguyagtait Philistine-at.”
David-aaq-llu tuaten piuq alerquucimitun Agayutmek, ellaita-llu iqurqait Philistine-at anguyagtait Gibeon-aamek tekilluku Gezer-aaq.
Piqayucia-llu David-aam ayagtuq tamalkuan nunanun,
David-aaq eneliuq Nunarpiini David-aam.
Tua-llu David-aaq qanertuq, “Kinkut allat pivkenateng Levite-at tau͡gaam ayauciiqaat Akqutem Yaassiiga, tua-i
David-aam-llu quyurtai tamalkuita Israel-aat Jerusalem-aamun, taicesqelluku Yaassiiga
David-aam-llu quyurtai qetunrai Aaron-aam Levite-at-llu.
Qetunrainek Kohath-am, Uriel-aaq ciulirnerat, yuinaat-llu arvinelgen anelgutni;
anelgutainek-llu Merari-m, Asaiah-q ciulirnerat, yuinaat-llu qulen yuinarnek-llu cipluki (120) anelgutni.
Qetunrainek-llu Gershom-aam, Joel-aaq ciulirnerat, yuinaat-llu arvinelgen qulnek cipluku (130) anelgutni;
qetunrainek-llu Elizaphan-aam, Shemaiah ciulirnerat, yuinaat-llu qulen (200) anelgutni.
Qetunrainek-llu Hebron-aam, Eliel-aaq ciulirnerat, yuinaat-llu cetaman anelgutni.
Qetunrainek-llu Uzziel-aam, Amminadab-aaq ciulirnerat, yuinaat-llu talliman qula malrugnek cipnelget (112) anelgutni.
David-aam-llu quyurcesqai agayulirtet Zadok-aq Abiathar-aaq-llu, Levite-at-llu Uriel-aaq, Asaiah, Joel, Shemaiah, Eliel, Amminadab-aaq-llu.

Qanrulluki-llu, “Elpeci ciuqliqaiceci ataita eniitni Levite-at, menuircarci elpecen̄ek, elpeci-llu anelguceci, tua-i elpeci taitniararci Akqutem Yaassiiga, Agayutiita Israel-aat, uitavigkaanun uptellemnun.
Tua-i-wa elpeci ayautellrunrilavciu ciuqlirmi,
Tua-i agayulirtet Levite-at-llu menuircartut ellmeggnek taitnaluku
Levite-at-llu ayautaat Akqutem Yaassiiga tusmegteggun muragteggun, Moses-aam alerquutellruciatun maliggluku qaneryaraa
David-aam cali alerquagai ciulirnerit Levite-at ellimerresqelluki anelgutait aturten͞gusqelluki qastuluki aturcetaaresqelluki, aturcetaatgun ayuqenrilngurteggun angnirnariluku.
Tua-i Levite-at ellimerraat Heman-aaq, qetunraa Joel-aam; ilakutai-llu, Asaph-aaq qetunraa Berechiah-m; qetunrainek-llu Merari-m anelgutmeng, Ethan-aaq-llu qetunraa Kushaiah-m.

Ikayuusqelluteng-llu nakmikait Levite-at harp-atgun quyilrianek erinalegteggun aturcetaaresqelluki, Zachariah, Jaaziel, Shemiramoth, Jehiel, Unni, Eliab, Benaiah, Maaseiah, Mattithiah, Eliphelehu, Mikneiah-llu, iteryarat-llu tarikestegket Obededom Jeiel-aaq-llu.
Aturtet-llu, Heman, Asaph, Ethan-aaq-llu neplircetarkauluki punerneret qantarngalnguut;
Zachariah, Aziel, Shemiramoth, Jehiel, Unni, Eliab, Maaseiah, Benaiah-llu qelutviararkauluteng pillratun Alamoth-am.
Tau͡gaam Mattithiah, Eliphelehu, Mikneiah, Obededom, Jeiel, Azaziah-llu ciuliqagtarkauluteng qerrsilrianek qelutviarluteng maliggluku Sheminith-aaq.
Chenaniah, ciuliqagtiit Levite-at aturcetaatgun, ciuliqaggnarqai aturcetaalriit, taringumiiki tamakut.
Berechiah Elkanah-llu murilkestekarkaulukek iteryaraan Akqutem Yaassiigem.

Shebaniah, Joshaphat, Nethanel, Amasai, Zachariah, Benaiah, Eliezer-aaq-llu agayulirta, cup'arkaugait cupu'uryarat ciunrani Akqutem Yaassiigan. Obededom-aaq Jehiah-llu tarikesten͞guciquk iteryaraanun Akqutem Yassiigem.
Tua-i David-aam ciulirnerit-llu Israel-aat atanerruarit-llu tiissitsaat (1,000s), ayagtut taicarturluku
Tua-i-llu cali Agayutem ikayuaki Levite-at tegumiaqestellregket

David-aaq aturangqertuq 'lumarraqegtaarmek, tamarmeng-llu-wa Levite-at tegumiaqestegket Akqutem Yaassiigegken, aturtet-llu, Chenaniah-q-llu ciuliqagtiit aturcetaartet, aturtet-llu; David-aaq-llu qat'gailitartuumaluni.
Tua-i tamarmeng Israel-aat taitaat
Yaassiiga-llu Akqutiin
Itrutaat-llu Akqutem Yaassiiga elliluku-llu iluanun pelatekam nautellran David-aam tauna pitekluku. Elliigut-llu ekuagiluteng ilakuyutem-llu elliitiinek Agayutmun.
David-aaq-llu qaqiucami elliillerminek ekuagiluteng, atawaqercetai yuut atrakun
Aruqait-llu tamalkuita neqnek. Cikirai angutet arnat-llu Israel-aami ataucimek kelipamek, ilaluku kemgem iliinek kelipimalriim, issuumanek-llu.
David-aaq nakmikiuq ilaitnek Levite-at ciuliqagcesqelluku agayullrat

Asaph-aaq cucukumauq ciuliqagten͞guluni, tungliqluku-llu Zachariah, Jeiel-aankut-llu, Shemiramoth-aaq, Jehiel-aaq, Maatithiah, Eliab-aaq, Benaiah, Obededom-aaq, Jeiel-aaq-llu, aturcetaararkauluteng tengtengaatgun; Asaph-aam-llu qasiarcetarkaulukek qantarngalnguuk,
malruk-llu agayulirtek, Benaiah-nkuk Jahaziel-aaq-llu, cup'arkauluki cupu'uryarat akultutaciqegglutek, ciuqerrani Yaassiigan Akqutem.
Tua-llu tuani David-aaq ciuqlirmek cucuklirtuq quyatmek atuusqelluku
Quyavikiciu
Aturci elliinun
Angnirci elliin pikngakut; tamarmeng elliinun agayulriit angnirpaglit!
Ikayuusqelluci
Neq'akiciki assilriit irr'inarqellriit-llu caliaqellri, cuqcillra-llu yugnek.
Yuini Abraham-aam pistaini elliin, qetunraini Jacob-aam, elliin cucukek'ngaini!
Ellii
Nalluyagusngaitaa akqutni akwarpak, qaneryaraq alerquutekellni, tiissitsaanun (1,000) kinguveqellrianun.
Akqun taqellni pillgutekluku Abraham-aaq, elliin naaqicimalria akqutni Isaac-aamun.
Ilumuurtellni piciryaraurrluku Jacob-aamun, iquklicuilnguurrluku akqun Israel-aamun.
Qanerluni, “Elpecen̄un cikiutekciqaqa nunii Canaan-aam, ilakluku paitaqevkarluku.”
Agayutem yui amllerivailgata allanruluteng nuniini Canaan-aam.
Calligtaarluteng nunalinqigtaarluteng, atanruvilinqigtaarluteng.
Tau͡gaam allanun Agayutem caknaavkarceteksaitellrui; camun pivkaasqumavkenaki; atanret aarcirtulallrui:
“Akngircaqunaciki cucukek'nganka; prophet-aanka agturyaqunaciki!”
Aturli
Qanrutkiciu ucurnarqucia kinguveqellrianun, irr'inarqellriit caliari tamalkuitni yugni!
Tua-i angengan
Tua-i tamarmeng agayutait yuut agayutnguaruameng; tau͡gaam
Takarnaq, ucurnaq ciuqerrantuq; piniq angniq nuniintuq.
Nanrarciu
Nanrarciu
uulegten ciuqerrani, tamarpet nunami! Ellarpak ellinqegcaumauq nek'amini pekcecimangaunani-llu.
Quya, nunarpaak qilaak-llu! Qanruski angayuqauvillgutkellriit
Ellerrarten, imarpiik, tamarmeng-llu unguvalriit elpeni, quyaci, naucirivigni, tamarmeng-llu elpenelnguut!
Napat napalilriani qayagpaglit angnimek
Quyavikiu
Qanerluci elliinun, “Anirturkut, Agayun Anirturtemten̄i; quyureskut tamamta; anirturkut angyuqauvillgutkellrianek, quyavikniarput nanrarluku-llu tanqilria atren.”
Nanraumali
Nutaan-llu yuut qanertut, “Amen,” nanraraat-llu
Tua-i David-aam unitaa Asaph-aaq anelgutai-llu ciuqerranun Akqutem Yaassiigan
Obededom-aaq-llu ilakluki yuinaat pingayun pingayunlegnek cipluku anelgutai; Obededom-aaq qetunraa Jeduthun-aam, Hosh-aaq-llu iteryarat tarikestekarkaulekek.
Unismiluku-llu Zadok-aq agayulirta anelgutai-llu agayulirtet ciuqerranun agayuvian
Elliilararkauluteng ekuagiluteng
Pillguciragket Heman-aankuk Jeduthan-aaq-llu, allat-llu cucukumaluteng pillret aterpagcimaluteng-llu quyaaqluteng piarkaullret
Heman-aaq Jeduthun-aaq-llu cupu'uryarangqertuk qantarngalngungqerrlutek-llu allanek-llu aturcetaarlutek atu'urkamegnek yuarutet qigcignarqellriit atuumakata.
Tua-llu tamarmeng yuut utertut kingunermeggnun, David-aaq-llu uterrluni ilani nayuumaqernaluki.
Angayuqaq David-aaq uitallermini enemini, qanertuq Nathan-aamun prophet-aamun, “Tangerrluku, uitaunga enemi murakegtaarmi, tau͡gaam
Nathan-aaq-llu qanertuq David-aamun, “Caliaqiki tamalkuita ircaqurpenelnguut, tua-i Agayutem nayuaten.”
Tau͡gaam taumi atakumi Agayun qanertuq Nathan-aamun,
“Ayagluten qanrusgu pisteka David-aaq, Waten qanernilua, ‘Elpengunrituq naucestekaa agayuvigpiim uitavigkama.
Wani-wa uitaksaitua enemi ayagnirlua ernermek ciuliqagqaanemnek Israel-aat una erneq engelkarrluku, tau͡gaam pelatekametaurlua, nugtaqtaarturlua-llu uitavignun.
Tamalkuitnun ayagvik'lallemnun Israel-aam yui pillgutekluki ciuliqagtait aptellrunritanka ciin nauciksailuciatnek agayuvigpagkamnek murakegtaarmek?’
Watua taumek qanruciu pisteka David-aaq, Wiinga-gguq,
Pillguciumallruamken-llu natmun ayallren tamalkuan, cirlak'lallruanka-llu tamalkuita ingluten ciunerpenek. Ucurnariciqamken angtuatun ciuliqagtetun nunarpagmi.
Nakmiciqua-llu nunakaatnek yum'a Israel-aat, nunalgaurceciiqanka, uitaniartut nakmiin nunameggni, uitacurlagcecimangairulluteng, yuut-llu nangcitalriit tuqurqen͞gaunaki, ciunganicetun.
Cucukirraanemnek cuqcisten̄ek yumnun Israel-aanun; wiinga cirlakciqanka tamalkuita ingluten. Cali-llu nallunrircetamken
Qaku-llu qaqiskata erneten ayagluten-llu pillguciryarturluki aataten, wiinga nangerciiqanka yut'en kinguvni, iliit qetunrarpet nakmiin, piurciiqaqa angayuqauvia.
Elliin eneliarkaugaanga, piurciiqaqa-llu atanruvia qangvarpak.
Atakeciqaanga, wiinga-llu qetunraqciqaqa; wiinga au͡g'arngaitaqa caqtaanrilnguq kenkeka elliinek, tegullrucimtun ciuvni piullermek.
Tau͡gaam caqtaarpek'naku piuvkarciqaqa enemni angayuqauvimni-llu qangvarpak atanruvia-llu piugarkauguq akwarpak.’”
Maliggluku makut qaneryaraat, maliggluku-llu man'a tangrrualleq, Nathan-aaq qallatuq David-aamun.
Nutaan David-aaq iterluni aqumuq ciuqerranun
Man'a mikluni elpet iigpeni, Agayun; elpet-llu qalarutkeken pistevet eniin uitaarkaucia ak'anun tekitarkami, nasvillua-llu kinguverkanek tekitarkanek,
Qaillun-llu cali qaneryugngaa David-aaq elpenun takaqutnguluki pisten̄un? Tua-i elpet nallunrilavgu pista.
Pisten-llu pitekluku
Allamek elpetun ayuqellriartaituq,

Canek allanek kinguvellgutkellriartangqerta avatiitni elpet yugpet Israel-aat, Agayutem ullallrukai anirturyarturluki elliin yuknaluki, atengluten elpet angelriamek assilriatgun angelriatgun-llu caliarpeggun, anutnerpeni taungullgutkellriit ciuqerratgun yugpet elpet anirtullerpet Egypt-aamek.
Israel-aaq yuksagutellruan elpet yuk'arkauluku qangvarpak; elpet-llu
“Watua-llu
Elpet-llu atren piurcimaarkauguq misturiluni qangvarpak, qanrumaluni
Tua-i elpet Agayutmaa, alaillruavet pistevnun elpet eneliarkauluku ellii; taumek pisten piyuumirluni piicagtuq ciuqerpeni.
Waniwa-llu
Watua taumek angnirnaqli elpenun atawaqercetlerkaa enii pistevvet, ciumurrnaurtuq qangvarpak ciuqerpeni; ca elpet
Mat'um kinguakun David-aam kingupiartellrui Philistine-at cirlakluki-llu, teguluki-llu Gath-aq nunacuarautai-llu unataitnek Philistine-at.
Kingupiarrluku-llu Moab-aq tamakurmiut-llu teguarurtellruut David-aamun tailluteng-llu cikiutnek.
David-aam-llu cirlakmia Hadadezer-aaq atanra Zobah-m, tungiinun Hamath-aam, ayainanermini nunalgarcarturluku umyuaqutkani Kuigmun Euphrates-aamun.

David-aaq-llu tegutuq elliinek tiissitsaanek (1,000) pekcessuutnek, tiissitsaanek-llu malrunlegnek (7,000) horse-alegnek, yuinarnek-llu tiissitsaanek (20,000) piyualuteng pitulinek anguyagten̄ek; David-aam-llu kingulirnerita yualuit kepai tamalkuita pekcessuutet horse-ait, uitaciiluni tau͡gaam yuinarnun tallimanun (100) atuuyugngalrianek.
Syrian-aat-llu Damascus-aamek tailuteng ikayuryartullrani Hadadezer-aaq atanra Zobah-m, David-aaq tuquciuq yuinarnek tiissitsaanek (20,000) angutnek Syria-rmiunek.
Tua-llu David-aaq nunalgarciuq anguyagten̄ek Syria-mun Damascus-aami; Syria-rmiut-llu pisten͞gurtut David-aamun, tailluteng-llu cikiutnek.
David-aam-llu tegui suulutaat capkutat tegumiallrit pistain Hadadezer-aam, ut'rulluki-llu Jerusalem-aamun.
Tibhath-amek Cun-amek-llu, nunarpiigkenek Hadadezer-aam, David-aaq tegutuq amllermek punernermek; tamatumek aturluni Solomon-aaq erurivilillruuq naparyanek-llu assigtanek-llu punernernek.
Tuani Tou-aq atanra Hamath-aam niicami David-aamun cirlakniluki tamalkuita anguyagtai Hadadezer-aam, atanran Zobah-m.

Ayagcetaa qetunrani David-aamun, aryuqutmek pisqelluku, piyuumiutmek-llu pisqelluku tua-i-wa elliin calluaku inglulirluku Hadadezer-aaq cirlakluku-llu; tua-i Hadadezer-aam pulengtaq anguyalaaku Tou-aq. Tuyurluku-llu canek ayuqenrilngurnek suulutaanek akinek, punernernek-llu.
Makut-llu angayuqam David-aam tunellrui
Abishai-aq-llu, qetunraa Zeruiah-m, tuquciuq akimiaq pingayunek tiissitsaanek cipluku (18,000) Edomite-anek Kuignayuani Salt-am.
Nunalgarciuq-llu anguyagten̄ek Edom-aamun; Edom-aarmiut-llu tamarmeng pisten͞gurtut David-aamun.
Tua-i David-aaq ataniurtuq tamalkuitni Israel-aani; aulukluki-llu elluarrluki ayuqluki yun'i.
Joab-aq-llu qetunraa Zeruiah-m qulliuluni anguyagten̄i; Jehoshaphat-aaq-llu qetunraa Ahilud-aam igaucisten͞guluni.
Zadok-aaq-llu qetunraa Ahitub-aam Ahimelech-aaq-llu qetunraa Abiathar-am agayulirten͞gulutek; Shavsha-llu igarten͞guluni;
Benaiah-llu qetunraa Jehoiad-aam ciuqliuluni Cherethite-anun Pelethite-anun-llu; David-aam-llu qetunrai ciulirneruluteng kevgiurtainun angayuqam.
Wani-wa kinguakun mat'um Nahash-aq atanrat Ammonite-at tuquuq, qetunraa-llu ataniurtuq enairluku.

David-aaq-llu qanertuq, “Wiinga piciulua pilarciqaqa Hanun-aaq qetunraa Nahash-am, atiin piciuluni pilallruanga wii.” Tua-i David-aaq ayagceciuq qanerten̄ek qarucestekainek atii pitekluku. David-aam-llu pistai tekitut Hanun-aamun nuniitni Ammonite-at, qarucarturluku.
Tau͡gaam takarnarqellriartain Ammonite-am qanrutaat Hanun-aaq, “David-aaq-qaa taivkarian qarucesten̄ek elpenun, qigcikluku aatan piyukan? Taivkarai yuvriisqelluku nuna elliin cirlaknaluku!”
Tua-i Hanun-aam tegui David-aam pistai, asmeggluki-llu, kepurluki-llu aturait qukaitgun mecangqerritgun, ayagtelluki-llu; ellait tua-i ayagtut.
Tuani qanrucimiimi pitekluki angutet ayagceciuq pairrsaagtelluki, tua-i angutet cakneq kasnguyuata. Angayuqaq-llu qanertuq, “Uitaurci Jericho-mi ungagpeci ataam naunatkaatnun, nutaan uterrniartuci.”

Tuani Ammonite-at tangrramegteggu ellmeggnek eq'uyagutevkaucirteng David-aamun, Hanun-aaq Ammonite-at-llu ayagceciut tiissitsaanek akimiaq ataucimek cipluku uspernek qerrirlinek (16,000) navrarkameggnek pekcessuutnek, horse-alegnek-llu Qulirnermek Mesopotamia-mek, Syria-m nunainek Maacah-mek, Zobah-mek-llu.

Navrangut-llu yuinaq qula malrugnek tiissitsaanek pekcessuutnek (32,000) atanra-llu Maacah-m anguyagcetuumaan, tauna-llu taiguq uitaluni-llu ciuqerrani Medeba-m. Ammonite-at-llu quyurcimaut nunaitnek tailuteng-llu callullerkameggnun.
Tuani David-aam niicami, ayagcetaa Joab-aq tamalkuita-llu anguyagtet pinilriit angutet.
Ammonite-at-llu anluteng uptut anguyautellerkameggnun iteryaraani nunarpiim Rabbah-m, atanri-llu taillret allakararmeng cailkami uitaut.
Tuani Joab-am tangrramiu inglumeng anguyagtait upingaciat ciunemeggni tunumeggni-llu, ellii cucuklirtuq allakaumalrianek anguyagtaitnek Israel-aat, upluteng-llu cauluki Syrian-aat.
Ilait-llu anguyagtet elgartai ataniuresqelluki Abishai-amun anelgutminun, elgartai-llu cauluki Ammonite-at.
Joab-am qanrutaa, “Tangerquvnga Syrian-aanun cirlakevkarlua, tailuten ikayuqia, Ammonite-at-llu cirlakekatgen tailua ikayurciqamken.
Pinirluci alingevkenaci-llu pikici! Pitacimcetun yup'ut calluutnauput nunarpai-llu Agayutemta.
Joab-aq anguyagten̄i-llu ayakartut, Syrian-aat-llu qimagtut.
Tua-i-llu Ammonite-at tangrramegteki Syrian-aat qimalriit, ellait-llu qimagtut Abishai-amek, uterrluteng-llu nunarpagnun. Tua-i-llu Joab-aq-llu Jerusalem-aamun uterrluni.

Syrian-aat tangrramegteggu cirlakucirteng Israelite-anun, taivkariut anguyagten̄ek Syrian-aat nuniitnek keggaknelirneranek Euphrates-aam Kuigan, Shobach-amun-llu ciuliqagtelluki, ciuliqagtiitnek anguyagtain Angayuqam Hadadezer-aam Zobah-rmium.
David-aam niicamiki, quyurtai tamalkuita Israelite-at anguyagtet, qerarluku-llu Jordan-aam Kuiga, uptelluki-llu callullerkaatnun cauluki Syrian-aat. Callullrat ayagnirtuq,

Israelite-at-llu kingupiartait Syrian-aat anguyagtait. David-aaq-llu anguyagten̄i-llu tuquciut tiissitsaanek malrunlegnek (7,000) pekcessuutelegnek, tiissitsaat-llu yuinaak malruk (40,000) piyualuteng anguyatulinek. Tuqusmiat-llu Shobach-aaq ciuliqagtiit anguyagtaita.
Angayuqat-llu pistain Hadadezer-aam, tangrramegteggu cirlakucirteng Israel-aanun, inglulitenrirtut David-aamun elliinun-llu pisten͞gurrluteng. Tua-i Syrian-aat tengrunrirtut ikayurnaluki Ammonite-at.

Up'nerkaani taum allrakum, nalliini atanret ayagluteng callugyartulallrata, Joab-am ciuliqaggluki anutai anguyagtet, cekavvluku-llu nuniit Ammonite-at, tailuteng-llu kassugutaat Rabbah-q. David-aaq tau͡gaam uitaurallruuq Jerusalem-aami. Joab-am-llu callugaa Rabbah-q cirlakluku-llu.

David-aam-llu tegua atanrata nasqurrutii qamiqurranek; nallunriraa-llu uqamaltacia yuinaat pingayun akimiarmek cipluku (75) uspernek suulutaam uqamiinek, tauna-llu teggalquqegtaarmek pingqertuq tauna David-aam tegua elliluku-llu nakmiin nasqurrutminun. Ellii-llu anutuq cautainek nunarpiim amlleriluku.

Anusmiluki-llu yuut tamaanelnguut, calivkarluki-llu aturtelluki kegglanek cavignek itumcissuutnek piqertuutarnek-llu; tuaten-llu David-aam pii tamalkuita nunarpait Amorite-at. Tua-llu David-aaq tamalkurmeng-llu yuut utertut Jerusalem-aamun.
Mat'um-llu kinguakun anguyautenga'artut Philistine-at-llu Gezer-aami. Tua-llu Sibbecai-am Hushathite-am tuqutaa Sippai-aq, tauna kinguveqluku yugpiit; Philistine-at-llu cirlakumaluteng.
Cali ataam anguyautenga'artut Philistine-at-llu; Elhanan-aam-llu qetunraan Jair-am tuqutaa Lahmi anelgutii yugpiin Gittite-am, epua narulkarcuutiin pitauq enertaatun qilagtem qilagvian.

Ataam-am cali anguyagtut Gath-ami, yugtalegmi cakneq angelriamek, yuaralegmek arvinlegnek (6) cali tamarmeng it'gai yuarangqerrluteng yuinaq cetamanek, tamarmeng amllertaluteng; ellii-llu kinguveqmiat yugpiit.
Elliin-llu pitassiallrani Israel-aat, Jonathan-aam qetunraan Shimeah-m, David-aam anelgutiin, tuqutaa.
Makut kinguveqait yugpiit Gath-ami; tamakut-llu iqucimaluteng unataikun David-aam unataitgun-llu elliin pistain.
Tuunrangayak nangertuq inglulirluki Israel-aat, umyuangevkarluku-llu David-aaq naaqnaluki Israel-aat.
Taumek David-aaq qanertuq Joab-amun alerquastiitnun anguyagtet, “Ayagluten naaqiki Israel-aat, Beersheba-mek tekilluku Dan-aq, qanemcicarturniarpenga, nallunrirnaunka amllertaciat.”
Tau͡gaam Joab-aq qanertuq, “Ataki
Tau͡gaam atanrem qanellran cirlakaa Joab-aq. Taumek Joab-aq ayagtuq pekluni tumekluki tamalkuita Israel-aat, uterrluni-llu Jerusalem-aamun.

Joab-am-llu tunai amllertaciit naaqumallrata yuut David-aamun. Tamalkuan Israel-aani pitaut atauciq miilicessaaq yuinaat-llu talliman tiissitsaat (1,100,000) angutet nuussirpagmek tegumiatulit, Judah-mi-llu yuinaat yuinaat yuinaat-llu pingayun qulmek tiissitsaat (470,000) nuussirpagmek tegumiatulit.
Tau͡gaam elliin ilakenritaa Levi-aq Benjamin-aaq-llu naaqellermini tua-i atanrem alerquutii nall'arusnganrilan umyugaanun Joab-am.
Tau͡gaam Agayutem angniutekenritaa man'a, anucimirqecetaarai-llu Israel-aat.
David-aaq-llu qanertuq Agayutmun, “Wiinga assiilngirtua angtuamek waten man'a piamku. Tau͡gaam watua piicagtua au͡g'arru assiilngua pistevvet; tua-i tuaten piama usviinii.”
“Ullagluku qanrusgu David-aaq, ‘Waten qanertuq
Tua-i Gad-am ullagaa David-aaq, qanrulluku-llu, Waten qanertuq
Wall'u pingayunek allrakunek piitnanek; wall'u pingayunek iralunek cekavcimallerkavnek ingluvkun, angunatkaatnun nuussirpaita ingluvet; wall'u pingayunek ernernek nuussirpaikun
Tua-llu David-aaq qanertuq Gad-amun, “Wiinga cakneq nanikuaqapigtua pivkarnga unatainun
Tua-i
Agayun-llu ayagceciuq Jerusalem-aamun an'gilamek piunriisqelluku tau͡gaam piunriqataqanrakun,
David-aam-llu iigni naluamikek tangrraa an'gilaa

David-aaq-llu qanertuq Agayutmun, “Wang'unrituq-qaa ellimeqlilleq naaqesqelluki yuut? Wanguuq tauna assiilngilleq cakneq-llu assiinani pilleq. Tau͡gaam makut qusngit, camek pillruat? Pegeski, inglukia wii inglukluku-llu atama enii; tau͡gaam anucimirqecetaarun pinrilli yugpenun.”
Tua-llu an'gilaan
Tua-i David-aaq mayurtuq Gad-am qanrucani, qanellruan atrakun
Tuani Ornan-aaq kaugtuaruciuq mukaarkanek; tuigcami tangertuq an'gilamek, cetaman-llu qetunrai tuanelnguut ellmeggnek iirtut.
Egmian Arnaunah-m tangrramiu Angayuqaq David-aaq agiirtelluku, unitaa carririvik cikluni-llu aciqvanun, kegginaminek agturluku nuna.
David-aam qanrutaa Arnaunah-q, “Tun'ivikia carrirvigpenek, nauciniartua ekuavigmek

“Teguu, Elpet Ucurnarqellriami, qanertuq Arnaunah-q, piyullren aturluku. Waniwa tang angucalut kuluviit ekualuki elliitekaten ekuavigmi, waniwa-llu carririssuutet murait muragkaten, mukaarkat-llu elliitekaten. Wii tun'anka tamalkuita elpenun.”
Tau͡gaam Angayuqaq David-aaq qanertuq Arnaunah-mun, “Qang'a, tau͡gaam pikeken
Tua-i David-aam akiliraa Ornan-aaq tiissitsaam avga yuinarnek-llu tallimanek (600) suulutaanek carririvia pitekluku.
David-aaq-llu pililuni ekuavigmek tuani
Nutaan-llu
Taum nalliini, David-aam tangrramiu
Tua-i agayuvia
tau͡gaam David-aaq ayagciigatellruuq taum ciungani apqaurnaluku Agayun, tua-i alingami nuussirpiinek an'gilaan
Tua-llu David-aaq qanertuq, “Wantarkauguq enii
David-aaq alerquiguq quyurcesqelluki tekitaat tamaanelnguut nuniitni Israel-aat, elgarciuq-llu teggalqunek kepuristen̄ek tangnircaumalrianek, teggalqunek atuugarkanek eniinun Agayutem.
David-aam-llu pikirmii angelrianek quyurtarnek cavignek ussukcarkaitnek amiiget iteryarat qes'utarkauluteng-llu, ayuqluku-llu punernernek amlleriluki uspellerkaat caperrnariluku.
Murakegtaarnek-llu naaqumavkenaki; Sidon-iarmiut Tyri-armiut-llu taitellruat amlleriluki murakegtaarnek David-aaq.
Tua-i David-aaq qanertuq, “Solomon-aaq qetunraqa ayagyuartuq elisngavkenani-llu, ena-llu piliaqumaarkaq
Nutaan-llu qayagaurluku Solomon-aaq qetunrani, ellimerrluku-llu enelisqelluku
David-aaq qanertuq Solomon-aamun, “Qetunraaq, ircaqumnet'lallruuq caliaqnaluku, ena atranun
Tau͡gaam qaneryaraa

Tangerrluku, qetunraq yuurciiquq elpenun; tauna yuugarkauguq nepailngurkun. Wiinga cikirarkaugaqa nepaitmek tamalkuitnek ingluinek kassutmun; tua-i ellii atengqerrarkauguq Solomon-aamek, cikirarkauluki-llu uitanqegcitmek nepaitmek-llu Israel-aat elliin erenrini.
Ellii eneliciquq atemnun. Ellii wii qetunraqciqaqa, wiinga-llu elliin atakeciqaanga, piurciiqaqa-llu takarnarqellria aqumllera Israel-aani qangvarpak.”
Watua qetunraaq,
Kiimi, ataki
Nutaan elpet piluaqaraciquten mulngakluten atuquvki picirkiutet maligtarkat
Angelrianek nangtequtengqerrlua quyurcillruunga nekaanun
Amllernek calistengqertuten: teggalqunek kepuristen̄ek, qikuliurten̄ek, enelisten̄ek, tamalkuitnek-llu ayuqenrilngurnek calitulinek naaqumavkenateng, elisngaluteng calituluteng.
Suulutaamek, qerrirlinek, punernernek, cavignek-llu. Nangerrluten caliluten!
David-aam-llu alerqurmii tamalkuita ciuliqagtait Israel-aat ikayuusqelluku qetunrani Solomon-aaq.
Qanerluni, “
Watua atauciurrluku umyuan ircaqun-llu yuallerkaanun
David-aaq-llu cakneq ak'allaurcami, qetunrani Solomon-aaq angayuqrurtuq tamalkuitnun Israel-aanun.
David-aam quyurtai tamalkuita ciuliqagtait Israel-aat agayulirtet Levite-at-llu.
Levite-at yuinaq qulmek cipluku (30) allrakungelriit qulmun, naaqumaut-llu, amllertaut-llu yuinaq akimiaq pingayunek tiissitsaat (38,000) angutet.
Yuinaq cetamanek cipluku tiissitsaanek (24,000) makut ilait atanirturilriaruciqut calilrianun eniini
tiissitsaat-llu cetaman (4,000) iteryarat qaunqestekluki, cetaman-llu tiissitsaat (4,000) nanrarcuutekauluki.
David-aam-llu allakarai avegturluki maliggluku qetunraquciat Levi-amun: Gershom, Kohath, Merari-llu.
Qetunraak Gershom-aam ukuuguk: Ladan-aaq, Shimei-llu.
Qetunrai-llu Ladan-aam: Jehiel, ciulirneq, Zetham, Joel-aaq-llu pingayuluteng.
Qetunrai-llu Shimei-am: Shelomoth, Haziel, Haran-aaq-llu, pingayun.
Qetunrai-llu Shimei-am: Jahath, Zina, Jeush, Beriah-llu. Ukut cetaman qetunrai Shimei-am.
Jahath-aq ciulirneruluni, Zizah-llu tungliuluni; Jeush, Beriah-m-llu kinguvri amllenritut, taumek atameng eniini allakaqaumaluteng quyurrarmeng uitavkaumaut.
Qetunrai Kohath-am: Amram, Izhar, Hebron, Uzziel-aaq-llu, cetaumauluteng.
Qetunrai Amram-aam: Aaron-aaq Moses-aaq-llu. Aaron-aaq allakaumaluni kenciknaristen͞guluni canek tanqinrulrianek, ellii qetunrani-llu qangvarpak aruviaralararkaugut ciuqerrani
Tau͡gaam qetunrai Moses-aam, yuan Agayutem, aterpagcimaut ilakluki yui Levi-am.
Qetunrai Moses-aam: Gershom, Eliezer-aaq-llu.
Qetunrai Gershom-aam: Shebuel ciulirneq.
Qetunrai Eliezer-aam: Rehabiah ciulirneq; Eliezer-aaq allamek qetunraituq, tau͡gaam qetunrai Rehabiah-m cakneq amllertut.
Qetunrai Izhar-am: Shelomith ciulirneq.
Qetunrai Hebron-aam: Jeriah ciulirneq, Amariah tunglia, Jahaziel pingayuak, Jekameam cetamiit.
Qetunrai Uzziel-aam: Micah ciulirneq, Isshiah tunglia.
Qetunrai Merari-m: Mahli, Mushi-llu. Qetunrai Mahli-m: Eleazer-aaq Kish-aaq-llu.
Eleazer-aaq tuqullruuq qetunraunani, tau͡gaam paningqerrluni; ellaita tungelqurrita, qetunrain Kish-am, nuliqsagutelarait.
Qetunrai Mushi-m: Mahli, Eder, Jeremoth-aaq-llu pingayuluteng.
Makut qetunraqai Levi-am atameng eniitgun, ciuqliuluteng atameng eniini igausngallerteng aturluku naaqumaluteng atrit atauciuqaqluteng yuinarnek (20) ayagluteng qulmun caliyugngaluteng
Tua-i David-aaq qanertuq, “
Tua-llu tua-i Levite-at ayagaciarkaunrirtut agayuvigmek wall'u camek aturyukmeggnek agayuaqameng.”
Tua-i nangnerteggun qanellrikun David-aam makut Levite-at yuinarmek (20) allrakungelrianek qulmun,
tau͡gaam ellait caliangqerciqut ikayualuki qetunrai Aaron-aam agayullratni eniini

Ikayuagaqluki-llu tangrrutetgun kelipatgun, mukaamek-llu kinertellriaruluku elliitekaatgun, kelipayagarnek-llu quuleciryarailngurnek, uuciluki-llu elliitnek, elliitnek-llu uqumek avukumalrianek cuqtaarnarqellritgun-llu amllertacilegnek angtaciatgun-llu.
Nangerngalararkauluteng-llu unuakullra tamalkuan quyavikluku nanrarluku-llu
Nani-llu ekuagiaqata elliiluteng
Wani-wa murilkarkauluku ellaita pelatekaq quyurrvik agayuvik-llu, murilkarkauluki-llu qetunrai Aaron-aam, anelgutmeng calillerkaatnun eniini
Avgumallrat qetunrain Aaron-aam waten ayuquq. Qetunrai Aaron-aam: Nadab, Abihu, Eleazer, Ithamar-aq-llu.
Tau͡gaam Nadab-aq Abihu-q-llu tuqullruuk atamek ciungani, irniarunatek-llu, taumek Eleazer-aaq Ithamar-aq-llu agayulirten͞gurtellruuk.
Ikayuqluku Zadok-aq qetunrainek Eleazer-aam, Ahimelech-aaq-llu qetunrainek Ithamar-am, David-aam elgartai cucukumaciicetun caliarkarluteng kevgiullerkaatnun.

Amllenruata ciuqliulriit tegumiita qetunrainek Eleazer-aam nutaan qetunrainek Ithamar-am elgartait aciatnun akimiaq ataucimek ciuqliit atameng eniitni qetunrain Eleazer-aam, pingayunelguluteng-llu qetunrai Ithamar-am.
Elgartait tegulluteng pitatekenrilnguugnek, tamalkuita ayuqurluki pitangqerran atanerruanek agayuvigmi atanerruarinek-llu Agayutem tegulluteng tamarkenka qetunrakegnek Eleazer-aam Ithamar-am-llu.

Igatuli-wa Shemaiah-q qetunraa Nethanel-aam, Levite-aq, igauciurluni takuani angayuqam, takarnarqutellgem-llu, Zadok-aam-llu agayulirtem, Ahimelech-aam-llu qetunraan Abiathar-am, ciulirnerita-llu eniita aatat agayulirtet, Levite-at-llu; atauciq aatat eniit cucukumaluni Eleazer-aamun atauciq-llu Ithamar-amun.
Ciuqliq tegullrat tut'uq Jehoiarib-aamun, tunglia-llu Jedaiah-m,
pingayuak-llu Harim-aamun, cetamiit-llu Seorim-aamun.
Tallimiit-llu Malchijah-mun, arvinelgat-llu Mijamin-aamun,
Malrunelgat-llu Hakkoz-aamun, pingayunelgat-llu Abijah-mun,
qulngunritariit-llu Jeshua-mun, qulngurutiit-llu Shecaniah-mun.
Qula-llu ataucimek (11) cipnelek Eliashib-aamun, qula-llu malruurutiit (12) Jakim-aamun.
Qula-llu pingayuat (13) Huppah-mun, akimiarunritariit-llu (14) Immer-aamun,
akimiarat-llu (15) Bilgah-mun, akimiaq-llu ataucimek cipnerat (16) Immer-aamun,
akimiaq-llu malrugnek cipnerat (17) Hezir-aamun, akimiaq-llu pingayunek cipnerat (18) Happizzez-aamun.
Yuinaunritariit-llu (19) Pethahiah-mun, yuinaurutiit-llu (20) Jehezkel-aamun,
yuinaam-llu ataucimek cipnerat (21) Jachin-aamun, yuinaam-llu malrugnek cipnera (22) Gamul-aamun,
yuinaam-llu pingayuata cipnera (23) Delaiah-mun, yuinaam-llu cetamiita cipnera (24) Maaziah-mun.
Makut pingqertut cucukumaluteng caliarkangqertut kevgiullermeggni taigarkauluteng eniinun
Ilait-llu qetunrain Levi-am; qetunrai-llu Amram-aam Shuba-el-aakun, Jehdeiah.
Rehabiah-mek-llu, qetunrai Rehabiah-m, Isshiah-q ciulirneq.
Izharite-anek-llu, Shelomoth-aaq, Jahath-aaq,
Qetunrai Hebron-aam: Jeriah ciulirneq, Amariah tunglia, Jahaziel pingayuak, Jekameam cetamiit.
Qetunrai Uzziel-aam, Micah-m; qetunrainek Micah-m, Shamir-aam,
Anelgutii Micah-m, Isshiah; qetunrainek Isshiah-m, Zachariah;
Qetunrai Merari-m: Mahli-nkuk Mushi-llu. Qetunrai Jaaziah-m: Beno.
Qetunrai Merari-m: Jaaziah-kun, Beno, Shoham-aq, Zaccur-aaq, Ibri-llu.
Mahli-kun-llu: Eleazar-aaq, tauna qetunraituq.
Kish-akun, qetunrai Kish-am: Jerahmeel-aq.
Qetunrai Mushi-m: Mahli, Eder-aaq, Jerimoth-aaq-llu.
Makut qetunraqait Levite-at maliggluki atameng enait.

Makut-llu ciuqliugut atauciuqaqluki atameng enaitni anelgutni kinguqliq ayuqeliluku, tegutellruut aternek, anelgutmegcetun qetunraitun Aaron-aam, ciuqerrani Angayuqam David-aam, Zadok-aq Ahimelech-aaq, ciuqliulriit atameng enaitni agayulirtaita Levite-at.

David-aaq ciulirneri-llu agayullrata allakaumalriit-llu kevgauluteng ilait qetunrain Asaph-aam, Heman-aam-llu, Jeduthun-aam-llu, tauna nallunairituarkaulria qeluteleg­teggun, qantarngalngurteggun-llu.
Qetunraikun Asaph-aam: Zaccur-aq, Joseph-aaq, Nathaniah, Asharelah-llu, qetunrai Asaph-aam, ayuqucirtullratun-llu Asaph-aam, nallunairillrem ayuqucirtuutiikun angayuqam.

Jeduthun-aamek, qetunrai Jeduthun-aam: Gedaliah, Zeri, Jeshaiah, Shimei, Hashabiah, Mattithiah-llu, arvinelguluteng (6) eluciliumaluki atiita Jeduthun-aam, nallunairitulim tengtengaatgun quyaluni nanrarluni-llu
Heman-aamek, qetunrai Heman-aam: Bukkiah, Mattaniah, Uzziel, Shebuel Jerimoth-aaq-llu, Hananiah, Hanani, Eliathah, Giddalti, Romamtiezera-q-llu, Joshbekashah, Mallothi, Hothir, Mahaziaoth.

Tamalkuita makut qetunraqai Heman-aam angayuqam murilkestiin, maliggluku akqutii Agayutem naluumasqelluku ellii; tua-i Agayutem cikillruaku Heman-aaq akimiarunrita'arnek (14) qetunrarkainek pingayunek-llu (3) panigkainek.
Tamarmeng aciantut ayuqucirtuutain aturcetaaryarami eniini Agayutem. Asaph-aaq, Jeduthun-aaq, Heman-aaq-llu aciantut picirkiutain angayuqam.
Ilakluteng ellait ilakluki-llu anelguteteng, elitnaurumalriit aturyaramek
Aternek-llu tegulluteng caliarkameggnek piut, mikellriit angelriit, elitnauristet elitnaurait-llu ayuqluteng.
Ciuqliq tegutellrat tut'uq Asaph-aamun Joseph-aamun; tunglia-llu Gedaliah-mun, elliinun, anelgutainun qetunrainun-llu, qula malrugnek cipingalrianun (12);
pingayuat-llu Zaccur-aamun, qetunrainun anelgutainun-llu qula malrugnek cipnelegnun (12);
cetamiit-llu Izri-mun, qetunrainun, anelgutainun qula malrugnek cipnelegnun (12);
tallimiit-llu Nethaniah-mun, anelgutainun qetunrainun-llu qula malrugnek cipingalrianun (12);
